Hinglish_Question: Meri 10 saal ki beti ko chot lag gayi hai. Usko ek hafte baad cat scan karwaya gaya tha jisme koi bleeding nahi thi. Ab usko 6 hafte ho gaye hain aur woh abhi bhi nausea, exhaustion aur light sensitivity se pareshan hai. Woh abhi tak apni usual sports- soccer aur running me wapis nahi gayi hai. Woh abhi tak heavy mental work se door hai. Main ne haal hi mein notice kiya hai ki jab woh buri tarah se mehsoos karne se pehle dono aankhon ke chhed badh jaate hain- phir woh thakan mehsoos karti hai aur lamba time ke liye- ghante tak- letna chahti hai. Humein 6 din baad ek pediatric neuro ke pass jaana hai, kya main us samay tak wait kar sakta hoon. Kal raat ko maine notice kiya ki uski aankh ka ek palak thoda sa niche ud gaya tha. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko neeche. It's not major- bas palak thodi jhuki thi ya shayad sujad gayi thi. Kya mujhe kuch jaldi karna chahiye.

The image shows the condition of itichy eyelid. Swelling of pea size on the eyelid, on the left lateral side and shiny in appearance.

Hinglish_Question: हाय मैं एक 24 साल की लड़की हूँ, मेरे निचले होंठ की त्वचा के नीचे एक अचानक सूजन हो गई थी और यह दर्दनाक थी. कृपया डॉक्टर,नीचे वर्तमान स्थिति देखें। मुझे लगा कि यह हर्पीज है क्योंकि मेरे बॉयफ्रेंड को उस समय बुखार के छाले थे। मुझे डर था कि मुझे संक्रमित कर लिया गया है और मैंने ऐसलोवीर क्रीम ली,हालांकि हमने उसी अवधि में किस किसी नहीं किया था। लेकिन अब तक सूजन एक महीने के लिए है और मेरे बाएं होंठ के किनारे पर भी हल्की सूजन है। हल्की दर्दनाक छोटे बड़े दाने हैं. अब यद्यपि दर्द कभी-कभी आता जाता है, मेरी सूजन अभी भी हैं। कृपया मदद करें।

Mai office se nikalke both my eyes ke neeche aur raat ke end tak meri skin 2nd to 3rd-degree burning jaisi lag rahi hai. Par mujhe iski koi dard nahi hai. Jab maine usse baat ki aur use pictures bheji, toh usne btaya ki ye normal hai. Usne kaha ki ise koi zarurat nahi hai aur meri skin peel hogi aur 7 din mein heal hojayegi. Main bahut dar gayi hoon aur mujhe dar hai ki kya maine permanently apni skin ko damage kar liya hai. Maine kal ek alag doctor ka appointment book kar liya hai. Aapka advice bahut zaroori hai. Main doosra nikalne ke baare mein yaad nahi rakhti lekin ho sakta hai ki maine nikala ho, kyunki maine baad mein iske baare mein kabhi socha nahi jab tak mujhe naak se saans lene mein problem aur hamesha recurring extremely painful sore throats nahi hoti. Please dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Mujhe panic hota hai aur yaad aata hai ki kya hua aur agar maine doosra magnet nahi nikala toh kya lambi samay tak rahne se bahut damage hoga. Ye absurd lag sakta hai lekin main apne doctor ko comfortable nahi feel karti hai. Please suggest.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should a 26-year-old female with recurring sore throat and swollen tonsils be concerned about a possible magnet lodged in her nose? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. The tonsils turned red with inflammation.

Hinglish_Question: Hi, maine apni aunt ko haal hi mein khoya hai. Unhe sugar ki bimari thi (approx 18 saal se) aur unki umar lagbhag 70 saal thi. Wo sardi mein thand lagti thi aur sardi ke karan cough bhi karti thi, aur unhe gastric problems bhi thi. Unke paon par bhi sujan thi. Kripya dekhiye, kuch paon par hua hai neeche. Humare paas unki recent report thi, bas 9 ghante pahle, jisme unka hemoglobin 7 tha aur uric acid badh gaya tha. Lagbhag 4 baje wo jaag gayi thi aur 4.45 baje maine unhe foaming mouth aur thande haathon ke saath maut ki halat mein paya. Kuch log keh rahe hain ki unke kidneys high uric acid aur lambi samay tak high sugar ki wajah se kharab ho gayi thi aur kuch log keh rahe hain ki dil sardi aur kam hemoglobin ki wajah se fail ho gaya tha. Kripya batayiye ki wo hame itni jaldi kyun chhod gayi, usmein koi badi samasya to nahi thi, wo bilkul thik dikh rahi thi, isliye humne use hospital mein admit nahi kiya.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe 7th May ko root canal procedure karwaya gaya tha. Iske baad, mujhe turant pain reliever lene ki salah di gayi thi taki jab dard shuru ho, uska khayal rakhsakun. Agla din se hi mein apne honthon aur muh ke ek taraf mein sunapan aur sujan mehsus karne lagi. Yeh kamse kam chaar din tak jari raha. Main kuch dinon tak takleef mein bhi thi. Endodentist ne mujhe dekha aur kaha ki meri sujan badi nahi hai. Meri choti si chehra ke liye, sujan kaafi noticeable thi. Unhone mujhe clindamycin diya. Kuch aur din bar baad bhi, sujan aur dard wahi the aur mujhe bukhar bhi aya. Unhone mujhe Z-Pack diya aur kaha ki mai ek sath tylenol aur ibuprofen loon. Dono ne muhe pain rokne aur shayad sankraman ko dur karne mein madad ki. Mai 28th May ko endodentist ke paas laut gayi. Unhone doosre hisse ka pura karna tha, lekin unhone ye faisla liya ki kyun ki mujhe abhi bhi asal dant mein dard ho raha hai, hum sirf aur dawa dalenge. Jab mere dant ke andar wapas gaye, unhe realize hua ki unhone teesra canal miss kar diya tha. Toh unhone usko aur dawa di. Mere honth aur jaw mein ab bhi sunapan mehsus kar rahi hoon. Muh ukline mein firse dard mehsus hone laga hai. Kal mujhe ek ganth bhi dikhi. Endodentist bar bar keh rahe hai ki iske liye chinta ki koi baat nahi hai. Kya sach mein aisa hai? Kya abhi bhi kuch ho raha hai? Please dekhein vartaman sthiti ke chitra(doctor)  ko.

Hinglish_Question: Muje 16 saal ki umar hai aur mene apni gardan\kaan ke niche ek ganth ko notice kiya hai.Doctor Kripya patient ki image dekhe. Meri doctor ne bataya ki ye mono ya cancer bhi ho sakta hai, lekin mujhe mono ke koi symptoms nahi dikh rahe hai. Aur ye bahut zyada dikhti hai. Mujhe ise bhi bada kar sakti hai. Hinglish_Question: Mujhe haath mein IV lagi thi. Pehle din haath suj gaya aur laal ho gaya. Maine heating pad lagaya toh dard aur gaanth kaafi jaldi kalayi tak migrate ho gayi. Ab heating pad wrist par hai.Jo image hai usko neeche attach kiya gaya hai. Kya yeh normal hai. Pehle bhi mujhe haath mein dard aur gaanth hui hai, lekin kabhi kalayi tak migrate nahi hui.

Hinglish_Question: Female 25yrs old 5ft 140lbs. Mere skin mein abhi tak chicken pocks ke alawa koi samasya nahi hui hai aur mein puri tarah fit hoon. Mujhe ek bahut bura khujli wala rash hai. Mere pet ke button ke niche ke ilaake mein bhi kabhi kabhi dard hota hai. Ye rash mere gardan ke peeche, elbow par bhi hai, jo mere haath ke upar tak phail gaya hai. Ye paanch mahine pehle mere pet par bumso ke saath shuru hua tha, maine ise clean rakha, dhak liya, dawayi bhi try ki par kuch kaam nahi aaya, bas phailta gaya aur khujli aur jalan bardasht ke bahar ho gayi hai. Kripaya meri madad kijiye, ye rash itna bura hai ki maine jahan rash hai wahan khujlone ke chakkar mein use kharoch di hai. Kya koi mujhe is dukh se mukt kar sakega?

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor,Main 51 saal ka hoon aur main sugar patient nahi hoon. Mujhe lag raha hai ki mujhe pichle do hafte se balanitis ki problem hai. Pehle mujhe ringworm ki problem thi, lekin uske baad Clotrimazole ointment aur oral tablet Terbinafine ke dawa se theek ho gaya tha. Kuch mahine baad uss problem ke baad, mujhe do hafte pehle notice hua, mere glans aur foreskin ke ring par laal chhaala aur jalane ki sensation. Maine internet pe check kiya aur Clotrimazole ointment, FourDerm aur Terbicip ka upyog kiya. Woh kam ho gaya tha, lekin har baar snan karne ke baad wapas aa jata tha. Main genital area ka swachhta bhi rakhta hoon aur usse namak wale garam pani se dho bhi leta hoon. Lekin ye theek nahi hua, balki control me reh gaya. Do din pehle main ek dermatologist se mila, aur unhone mujhe kaha ki sab kuch bandh karke DK Gel lagao aur AF 150 orally lo, raat ko dinner ke baad teen din me ek tablet. Ye aur jyada laal hogaya aur foreskin pura laal aur sujh ho gaya hai. Maine dermatologist se check karwaya, lekin unhone kaha ki steroid FourDerm ointment ke upyog ki wajah se hai, aur yeh 7-8 din me theek ho jayega. Yeh jal raha hai aur kapde se touch hone par bhi bahut sensitive hai. Main apne ling ki tasveer bhi attach kar raha hoon. Kripya help karein.

Hinglish_Question: Hello, main 67 saal ki hoon, aur teen bachon ki maa hoon. Aakhiri 9-10 saal se meri skin mein kisi masle ki bahut badi problem hai, mere haatho, gaal, gardan aur muh ke aas paas. Meri hath ki nails badi sakht ho gayi hai aur din bhar skin rough rehti hai aur doctors mujhe medicated creams dete hain jise main lagati rehti hoon, lekin koi fayda nahi hota. Har teen mahine me mere puri gardan, hath, tummy aur peeth par red pimple jaisi cheezein aa jati hai aur mere honth phool jate hain aur bahut zyada dard hota hai aur mere muh ki skin bumpy aur bahut sukh jati hai. Maine Benadryl aur codine le liya, lekin koi fayda nahi hota aur mujhe proper neend nahi aati. Kripya bataiye ki kya ye mere parivar aur 9 mahine ke natin ke liye khatarnak hai unke aas paas rehne ke liye ya khana banane ke liye. Dhanyavaad.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe early may mein root canal hua tha. Root canal se pehle meri symptoms thi ki meri left ear mein hollow feeling hai aur jaw mein tingling hai. Endodontist ne ye diagnose kiya ki meri back lower tooth theek nahi hai (koikisi infection nahi hai) aur root canal ka procedure kiya. Initial root canal ke baad feeling mostly disappear ho gayi, lekin obviousl, endodontist aur dentist ne last month and a half mein meri muh mein kaafi baar check kiya hai, novacaine use kiya, etc. crown ke liye. Puri time mein, meri upper left cheek mein swelling hai (andar mein), jaise ki chote se chote inflammation ke pockets hai. Iske saath, meri allergies bhi bahut kharab hai aur mujhe sinus pain hai, sirf woh left side mein cheek mein. Jab dentist ne haal hi mein crown lagaya, meri left gland mere gaal mein swollen ho gayi hai aur abhi tak kam nahi hui hai. Sinus pain aata hai aur jaata hai, ear mein hollow feeling aati hai aur jaati hai aur meri ear ke neeche wala jaw stiff feel hota hai aur thoda dard karta hai. Urgent care mein gayi thi ear infection ya strep rule out karne ke liye. Unhone kaha ki meri tonsils aur salivary gland swollen hai aur mere paas bahut saara post nasal drip hai. Unhone Claritin D recommend kiya. Mein ise le rahi hoon, lekin swelling usse ya ibuprofen se kam nahi hui hai. Dentist ne bhi mere muh ko check kiya aur kaha ki meri daant theek lagti hai. Kripya dekhein affected area ki image doctor ke neeche.

Kharish kuch samay ke liye theek ho jati hai - lekin kuch mahino ke andar wapas aa jati hai. Kripya mujhe bataye ki ise kaise theek kiya jaye. Uske liye neeche image attach ki gayi hai.

Hinglish_Question: Mere bete ko kuch dino se jaw tooth ke paas aur naak ke aas paas, aankh ke neeche dard ho raha hai. Woh dard kam karne ke liye pani(room temp) muh mein rakhta hai. Nerve ke liye gabbapentin aur dard aur sujan ke liye tramadol prescribe kiya hai. Mujhe lag raha hai ki ye dard kisi daant se ho raha hai. Aap kya sochte hain doctor? Kripya dekhiye affected area ki image doctor neeche.

Hinglish_Question: Dard mein pulsa, jhunjhuni sa mehsoos hota hai, right leg ke taraf ek golak hai, dard ghutne tak hai, jahaan par golak hai wahaan bhi aur peeche ki taraf se leg ke nichle hisse tak. Mahino ke dauraan ye aur bhi badh gaya hai, especially exercise ke saath. Ghutne par thoda sujan hai. Doctor, please dekhiye niche di gay (image) mein. Exercise se thoda kam ho jaata hai, lekin dard meri leg aur toes mein khatam nahi hota hai.

Hinglish_Question: Mai ek 29 saal ki mahila hoon. Mai Italian hoon lekin February 2010 se Australia mein reh rahi hoon. Mera wajan 70 kg hai aur meri zindagi mein teen baar broncho pneumonia hui hai (jab mai 3 saal ki thi, 8 saal ki thi aur 18 saal ki thi). Teen mahine pehle mujhe dono aankhon mein bahut buri sujan hui thi. Ab thoda behtar hai lekin abhi tak bilkul gayi nahi hai. Tab se mai steroid drops le rahi hoon. Unhe karan nahi pata hai lekin unhe lagta hai ki ye fefdo se kuch sambandh ho sakta hai. Pichle shukrawar ko mujhe bukhar aaya, jo 2 din aur adha tak chala. Fir, somwar ko jab mai uthi toh meri ghutno mein bahut dard tha aur 1 ghante mein meri taango tak reedh ki hui gaanthon se dhak gayi thi, bahut dard kar rahi thi. Kripya rogpatra ki tasveer dekhe neeche. Dard ke liye mujhe paracetamol na mile tak mai so nahi paayi. Mai raat bhar paseena baha rahi thi, aur ye baat hui jab mujhe bukhar nahi tha. Kya ho raha hai? Mene sarcoidosis ke baare mein kuch padha hai, aur mujhe isse match karne wale kai lakshan hai, mujhe darr hai ki kya mai isse pakit rahi hoon. Kya ye possible hai? Doctor ko chal nahi pata hai ki gaanthen kya hai, unhe ye lagta hai ki ye flu ka hissa ho sakta hai, lekin unhe sach mein kuch pata nahi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could explain the patient's past bouts of broncho pneumonia, ongoing eye inflammation, and sudden onset of sore knees and leg lumps? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. Bothe feet are swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Mere left inner wrist mein ek haddi thodi bahar jhuki dikh rahi hai - wo dard kar rahi hai. Jab maine dono ankhon ki haddi hilayi aur dono ankhon ko ulajhaya, tab maine us par gir gaya tha. Mere right knee cap ke upar sujan bhi hai aur pair ke piche ki taraf bhi sujan hai. Doctor, kripya niche diye gaye image ko dekhiye. Intermittently, main knee cap mein tez dard mehsoos karta hoon. Ye paanch din pehle hua tha, kya mujhe hospital ya doctor ke paas laut jana chahiye further examination ke liye - unhone meri left ankle, wrist ya knee ka xray nahi karvaya tha.

The image here shows a medical condition related to knee_swelling. There is swelling accompanied by a redness, leading  to being of the legs outwards.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, maine three months ago unprotected sex kiya tha. Maine herpes ke alawa sare tests karwaye the aur sabhi negative aaye hai. Encounter ke baad har ek se do hafte mein mujhe red rashes aur small red dots glans penis aur foreskin par ho rahe hai. Unme koi ubhar nahi hai aur khujli bhi nahi hoti. Ye dots shayad ek do seconds ke liye hote hai aur discharge nahi hota. kabhi kabhi penis se badbu aati hai. Dots usually apne aap gayab ho jate hai, lekin fir se ek hafte ya do hafte baad fir se ho sakte hai. Kuch bhi bharosa dene wali baat herpes ki nahi lagti hai. Penis bhi kabhi kabhi bahut sukha aur wrinkly lagta hai. Saare STDs aur HIV ke test bhi negative hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of red rashes and dots on the glans penis, along with dryness and wrinkling, after unprotected sex? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, mujhe teen hafte se eye ke niche ke region mai swelling hai. Mai eye specialist ke paas gaya tha. Unhone mujhe ek hafte tak Zenoxim 500 two tablets per day aur Ocupol ointment three weeks tak lagane ko diya. Unhone kaha ki ye ek infection hai aur agar yeh teen hafte mai thik nahi hojati hai toh unhe use katne ke liye ek chhota dissection karna padega. Mujhe samajh nahi aa raha ki mai kya karun. Kya mai intezaar karun ya fir dawa le lun.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should the patient wait for the swollen lymph on the eye lining to resolve or undergo a small dissection? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Little swelling on the lateral side of the right eye's eyelid.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, mujhe lagta hai ki mujhe polymorphous light eruptions hai, aur main jaanta hoon ki ye kisi ke career ke liye jinke paas poore jeevan skin care ko samarpit kar diya hai, bahut pareshan karne wala sunta hai. Lekin har baar jab main beach par bahut tez dhoop mein hota hoon, kareeb din 2 ya 3 mein, mere sharir par ek ghaarawala aur khujli wala rash ho jata hai. Uski tasveer neeche attach ki gayi hai. Bahut research karne aur online tasveeron ko apne haalat se compare karne ke baad, mujhe lagta hai ki mere paas ek surya ki allergy hai jiski wajah se rash hota hai. Maine kuch online research bhi ki hai is haalat ko rokne aur ilaaj karne ke liye, kyun ki ye bahut uncomfortable hota hai, aur ek aam jawab hai Vitamin E. Kya ye sahi ilaaj hai? Kya Vitamin E ek accha upaay hai? Kya behtar hoga Vitamin E ka supplement lena ya Vitamin E serum ya cream istemaal karna?
multimodal_Question_summ: The patient self-diagnosed with polymorphous light eruptions and wonders if Vitamin E is a suitable treatment for their sun allergy rash. The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe ek rash hai jo aata jaata hai lekin jyada samay ke liye hai. Isse khujli hoti hai, jisme skin ke neeche hard bumps hote hain lekin khujli der tak nahi rehti hai. Jab bumps firse chote ho jate hain (kuch din baad), tab aap inme se beech ka hissa nikal sakte hain lekin acne pimple ki tarah dabakar nahi. Jo bahar nikalta hai, wo greasy nahi hota hai, balki solid aur jab aap unhe chhoo toh skin ke through ek nerve shock jaisa mehsoos hota hai. Kya ye fybromyalgia ya meri kidneys se juda ho sakta hai. Uski tasveer neeche attach ki gayi hai.

Namaste doctor,

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, Mujhe 2 saal pehle rheumatoid arthritis ka diagnosis hua tha. Main Ayurveda treatment pe hoon aur Panchakarma treatment bhi li hai. Thoda sa sudhaar hai, lekin meri left knee ki sujan nahi kam ho rahi hai aur haal hi mein left wrist mein dard shuru ho gaya hai. Iski image neeche hai attach ki hui . . Meri ESR aur CCP bahut high hai aur left knee ki cartilage torn hai. Main tezi se chal nahi sakta aur meri stairs chadhna bhi mushkil hai. Main nayi-nayi Methotrexate 7.5 mg aur Vitamin D bhi shuru kiya hai. Kripya mujhe RA se deal karne ke liye sabse accha sujhav dein. Kya mujhe Ayurvedic dawaon ka upyog jaari rakhe ya steroids try karun.

Hinglish_Question: Mere left collar bone par 6 saalon se ek semi-soft movable painless lump hai (pea ya marble jaisa lamba lump nahi). Kuch saal pehle iski diagnosis lipoma ke roop mein hui thi. Mujhe bataya gaya tha ki is baare mein fikar na kare. Pichle saal se left side par kuch flare ups huyehain joint area aur forearm mein dard ke saath. Mujhe wrist ke paas wale forearm mein bhi sujan hai. Doctor visheshagya, iske liye image hai jo include ki gayi hai neeche. Lagbhag 6 mahine pehle maine ise check karwaya tha aur doctor ne kaha ki sujan shayad is wajah se hai ki main us side par sone mein, jhukne mein, purse aur seat belt uthane mein aadi use karti hoon. Aaj jab naye doctor ke paas gayi toh unhone mehsoos kiya aur kaha ki ultrasound karana chahiye kyunki yeh shayad CAILIL hai. Main bahut dar gayi! Yeh kshetra thoda dard kar raha hai lekin lump khud mein dard nahi karta. Phir unhone kaha ki kuch din intezaar karein aur agar dard bandh ho jaye toh ultrasound ke baare mein bhool jayein.... Main sochti hoon ki agar mujhe cancer hai ya mujhe cancer hai toh ab tak kuch aur symptoms bhi hote jaise ki sujan aur inflammation/arthritis ke mamle mein. Main 41 saal ki hoon - femaleoon aur meri family mein koi bhi cancer ki history nahi hai. Main moti hoon aur 10 saal se jyada samay se moti hoon (mere bete ki maut ke baad se). Motapa ke alawa mere swasthya accha hai. Ab mujhe dar hai ki mujhe cancer hai!!! AAPKO SWALON KE ALLOW KARNE SE PEHLE AAPKO EK FEES BATA DENI CHAHIYE! :'( SHUKRIYA KUCHH NHI KE LIYE!

Hinglish_Question: Har saal mujhe rash ho jata hai jo sirf mere kalai aur kohni ke beech me dikhai deta hai, ye dikhayi nahi deta hai lekin skin ke neeche chote chote dane ya knots ki tarah lagta hai. Ye dardnaak ho sakta hai, ek sui jaise ya kharochne jaise sensation hoti hai. Scratching ke karan mere paas ghaw hai jise kabhi kabhi blood khud se nikalta hai. Kabhi kabhi ye dane ant hills ya mini volcanos ki tarah dikhte hain. Isse lagta hai ki keede twacha ke neeche aur upar chalte hain, ye feeling raat ko badhti hai. Mein thakan mehsoos karti hoon, dimag dhundhla-sa lagta hai, acchi tarah se so nahin sakti, mood swings hai aur often depressed raheti hoon. Kuch bhi isme madad nahi karti, mujhe nahi pata kahan madad ke liye jaun. Kya aapko koi idea hai ye kya ho sakta hai. Iska image neeche attach kiya hua hai.

Jab main ankhon ke doctor ke paas jata hu toh meri nazron ki sthiti aur bigad jaati hai, lekin mujhe kisi bimari ki samasya nahi hui hai. Haal hi mein maine notice kiya ki meri left eye suj gayi hai. Kripya doctor, neeche di gayi aankhein dekhe. Dard ya kharoch ke bina, lekin pink eye ki rang ki tarah lal hai. Mujhe nahi pata ki ye contact lenses ki wajah se lal ho rahi hai. Kripya madad karein.

Sirf mere chehre ke right side par. Yeh hamesha dard se bhara aur sujaa hua mehsus hota hai. Aur sabse bura hissa yeh hai ki mujhe pata nahi hai ki kya ho raha hai. Professional salah bahut prakashdhaamak hoti! Dhanyavaad!

Hinglish_Question: Hi, mujhe lagbhag do hafte pehle ek halka sa sore throat tha. Kripya neeche diye gaye image mein condition dekhein...Mujhe notice hua hai ki mere chehre par ek chotu sa ubhar aaya hai jo baad mein sukhkar ek dry brown patch ban gaya. Fir achanak aur zyada ubharne lage, ek yahan do wahan aur ab mere chest, neck, breasts ke niche aur arms ke under sides tak spread ho gaye hain. Wo ubharne shuru hote hai bumps ke roop mein, kuchh red aur pass hote hai, dusre bade lump ki tarah, fir wo brown patches ban jaate hai aur jab mein pasina karta hoon to jyada itching hoti hai. Mere foot par ek rash ban gaya tha, jiske baad wo gayab hua aur mujhe laga ki ye wo dry patches jaise hain lekin bas bade area ko cover kar rahe hai. Shayad ye meri sugar se kuchh lena dena ho kyun ki jab mein middle school mein tha to sirf mere arm par paanch the aur mere endocrinologist ne kaha tha shayad wajah yahi hai. Ab main 20 saal ka hoon aur mujhe samajh nahi aa raha ki kya ho raha hai. Main hypothyroidism ke liye levothyroxine le raha hoon aur kuchh dino ke liye use miss kar diya hai. Lekin abhi bhi mujhe ye problem ho rahi hai. Mere skin aur scalp toh pehle se hi dry hai meri dawai ki wajah se lekin ye samajh nahi aa raha. Main apne doctor se mil nahi sakta kyun ki meri insurance abhi haal hi mein bandh ho gayi hai. Aur mujhe teen hafte intezaar karna padega tabhi main fir se qualify kar paunga. Main jawaabon ke liye desperate hoon aur kaafi dar bhi hai, kyun ki shayad meri body meri dawai ko reject kar rahi hai aur pichhle saal mujhe hypothyroidism crisis ke danger zone mein tha, jab mere hormones zero ho gaye the aur main coma mein jaane ke kareeb tha. Kripya madad karein! Dhanyavaad.

Mai uske liye pareshan hoon kyunki mujhe pata hai ki ye normal nahi hai. Haha, doctor ke paas jane par unhone kaha ki unko uski throat mein dekh nahi sakte, toh whatever kehke use ghar bhej diya. Woh kayi baar bola hai ki woh saans nahi le sakta hai aur mujhe lagta hai ki ye bahut serious hai, aur usko bhi waise hi lagta hai, bas woh sochta hai ki iske baare mein woh kuch nahi kar sakta hai. Mujhe itching ke liye steroid ki injection bhi mili hai. Mere surgeon ne mujhe Clindamycin bhi diya hai agar test ka result Mersa positive aaye. Toh mujhe saare medicines lene pad rahe hai aur thodi bahut sudhaar dikh rahi hai par ab agla kadam kya hai. Kya mixed skin flora khatarnak hai aur ise kya aur serious cheezein trigger kar sakti hai aur ye kahan se aata hai. Main ab 24 saal ka hoon aur college 20 ghante hafte mein restart kiya hai, saath hi saath 40 ghante kaam karta hoon. Main keh sakta hoon ki stress ki wajah se iski nayi jagahon par rash ho gayi hai pichle kuch mahino se: ghutne ke niche aur pubic bone par. Yeh behad khujli kar rahi hai, bachpan ke patches ki tarah nahi. Main Dovonex ka chhota sa stock rakha hua tha, lekin pichle hafte se ise lagane se patches aur growth jo hai uska badhna shuru ho gaya hai; badhna tezi se ho raha hai. multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of an itchy rash on the tummy and back after consuming apple juice? Allergy? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Meri saas ke sharir ke various places par kai lipomas hai. Abhi haal hi mein, unhone bataya ki unko unke leg ke lower part par located lipoma ki touch se thoda dard ho raha hai. Dikhne mein ye gathli choti ho gayi hai aur iske kam hone ke saath hi, unko lower leg aur foot mein dard aur sujan bhi ho rahi hai. Doctor, aap ek baar patient ke legs ki condition dekhein  aapse request hai, kuch problem ho rahi hai unke legs mein. Woh maanti hai ki gathli ab unke foot mein shift ho gayi hai jisse chalne mein dard hota hai kabhi-kabhi. Unko lagta hai ki lipoma burst ho sakti hai aur infection spread ho sakta hai. Kya ye possible hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is it possible for a lipoma to rupture, spread infection, and cause foot swelling and pain? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The foot is swollen blue black discolour.

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor, Mujhe apne private parts par kuch growth hai. Voh bade thread jaise rashes lagte hain. Maine urine test karaya tha infections ke liye, aur result negative aaya tha. Maine skin culture test bhi karaya hai jisme pata chala ki yeh fungal infection hai. Maine various antibiotics liye hai jaise Ceftriaxone, Augmentin, The image for that is attached below. aur Septrin. Lekin koi significant changes nahi hai. Mujhe abhi antifungal drugs le rahe hain. Kripaya salah dein.
multimodal_Question_summ: The patient has thread-like rashes on their genitals, negative urine test results for infections, and a positive skin culture test for fungal infection. The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Main 45 saal ki hoon, meri height 5'6" hai aur weight 160 hai. Mujhe vulva area mein thoda irritation hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Mujhe sex nahi hota, main divorced hoon. Mujhe waha par sort of chapped skin hai aur waha chote-chote slits hain, jaise paper cuts, mixed in hai. Jab main shower ya aise kuch bhi karti hoon toh initially dard hota hai. Ye kya hai aur iska treatment kaise karen.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the cause of vulva irritation with chapped skin and paper cut-like slits, and how can it be treated? The image shows the condition of skin irritation. Irritated skin or light red patches around the left cheek. Granular red spots in between the patch.

Hinglish_Question: Mera beta, 11/19/14 ko 5 saal ka ho jayega, kareeb 5-6 weeks se ye kah raha hai ki use ungliyon me tickling ho rahi hai. Koi zahirai sharirik anormality nahi hai, koi excessive sweating nahi hai, kisi bhi jagah ungliyon ya skin par fungal growth nahi hai, ab wo hairbrush use kar raha hai ungliyon ko scratch aur rub karne ke liye. Ye mostly bedtime aur car me hota hai, stomping aur moving hone par bhi ye tickling kam nahi hoti, lekin active hone par kam lagti hai aur har din aur raat me rest ke waqt ho jati hai. Woh raat mein beech mein bhi jaag jata hai, lagbhag har raat rote huye aur ungliyon ki tickling ki shikayat karke. Kripya dekhein something happened on foot below.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of persistent foot tickling, nighttime waking, and foot swelling in a 5-year-old child? The image here shows the condition of foot swelling

Hinglish_Question: Ek chota sakht gaanth mere balon ke upar ki twacha ke neeche viksit ho gaya hai.Doctor, aap patient ke dry scalp ki image neeche dekh sakte hain. Isme dard nahi hota, lekin mere sir me bahut khujli hoti hai -- itni zyada ki pichle dino se main is par anti-itch lotion lagana shuru kar diya hoon. Mujhe kaun sa doctor dikhana chahiye. Main shift ho gaya hoon aur meri paas ek regular MD nahi hai -- mujhe chinta hai kyunki 10 saal pehle meri behen ke muh me squameous cell carcinoma viksit hua tha aur voh bahut tezi se badh raha tha aur uski wajah se uska nidhan ho gaya. Lekin, sare itching ke bawajood, umeed hai ki mera kuch kam serious hai. Mujhe ek saal se ek bahut bura fingernail problem bhi hai jise maine sirf dry skin condition samjha tha, lekin ab sure nahi hoon. Kya aap mujhe sahi disha mein le sakte hain. Mere swasthya ke baare mein main chinta nahi karta hoon, lekin mere room mate ne aaj pehle hi wakt gaanth ko mehsus kiya aur kaha ki mujhe doctor ko dikhana chahiye. Koi salaah swagat hai. Dhanyavaad. Pat
multimodal_Question_summ: What type of doctor should I see for a hard lump on my scalp, severe itching, a family history of cancer, and fingernail issues? The image shows the condition of dry scalp. White colored scalp and few spots of red lesions on the scalp.

Hinglish_Question: Hi. Mujhe 16 saal ki umra se apne right hand side ki gale mein ek chota sa hilne wala gantha hai. Doctor, kripya neeche image dekhein, mere gale mein kuch problem hai. Ab mujhe 31 saal ho gaye hai aur mujhe yeh jaanna hai ki kya mujhe ise check karwana chahiye. Meri tab ke doctor ne jaldi se palpation kiya aur mujhe kaha ki ye kuch nahi hai. Koi ultrasound nahi, kuch bhi nahi. Iska diameter lagbhag 12mm hai aur yeh dard rahit hai. Mere hamesha se ye soch hai ki ye ek cyst hai. Kya ye cheeze saal baad kuch bura ho sakti hai. Kya mujhe ise fir se check karwana chahiye.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should a 31-year-old with a painless, movable lump on the right side of their neck get a reevaluation? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The neck is swollen withe red rashes in the mouth.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctors, pehle toh aapko samay aur seva ke liye dhanyavad. mujhe haal hi mein ek raised blotchy rash ho raha hai jo khujli karne wala hai aur rang halka laal/pinkish hai (main african american hoon, bilkul dark ya light nahi hoon). mujhe lagta hai rash last month ke beech shuru hua aur kabhi aata hai aur kabhi jaata hai. shuruwat mein ye sirf meri torso par tha, kabhi mere chest area par nahi, lekin dono taraf ke serratus anterior par tha. phir do hafto tak kuch bhi nahi hua, phir aise aadhe ghante pehle ye mera upper outer thigh area par shuru hua, aur kal se ye mere gardan par bhi hua hai. Kripya doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Mujhe chinta hai ki mujhe HIV ho sakta hai. main isliye keh raha hoon kyunki mujhe lagta hai main february ke shuru mein risk mein tha aur possible exposure ke ek hafti ke andar hi meri lymp node in my groin suj gayi aur baad mein bahut dard hone lagi lekin ye sirf ek hafta tak hi chala, phir apparently ye fat gayi aur 2-3 din tak ye milky aur smelly fluid leak hui. Uske baad mujhe groin mein koi pareshani nahi hui, bas kabhi kabhi sore throat hota tha lekin us time mujhe  kuch beemar logon se touch hua tha isliye pata nahi kya ye sab mere concern se related hai. Waise toh rash consistent hai aur mujhe aapki raay chahiye aur agar koi aur information chahiye toh puchhiye.
multimodal_Question_summ: Patient has raised, blotchy, itchy, red/pinkish rash on torso, upper outer thigh, and neck, lymph node swelling, and occasional sore throat. Concerned about HIV. The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Lagbhag do saal pehle mujhe polycythemia vera ka diagnosis hua tha. Hydrea ke treatment se bimari control mein hai, lekin mujhe thakan aur mouth mein frequent issue ho raha hai. Please doctor, dekhiye ye mouth ko. Red blood cell production increase karne ke liye kai dietary recommendations hai, lekin disease ya uske side effects ko better control karne ke liye, kis tarah ka diet aur supplements avoid karna chahiye ya khana chahiye, ispar kya suggestions hain?
multimodal_Question_summ: Patient with polycythemia vera on Hydrea treatment seeks dietary advice to control disease and manage fatigue and mouth ulcers. The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. Little white patches on the inner skin of lower lip mostly on the left side.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, Mera beta chhah saal ka hai. Usko do hafte se nasal blockage hai. Ab usko bukhar bhi ho gaya hai. Uske gale aur tonsils suj gaye hain. Uska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai. Humne use doctor ke paas le gaya. Doctor ne use Benadryl 5 ml aur Crocin DS 7.5 ml prescribe kiya hai. Koi antibiotics nahi diye gaye hai. Kya ye theek hai. Kripya salah dein.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should a 6-year-old with nasal blockage, fever, and swollen tonsils be given antibiotics along with Benadryl and Crocin? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. The tonsils have swollen excessively in the back of the throat.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste, Shubh din! Mujhe bas apne vartaman dar ko lekar kuch puchna hai. Mujhe yakeen nahi ho raha hai ki ye sirf ek simple sujan hai ya kuch aur hai. Mere left foot ke upar ek chhota sa ganth ban gaya hai aur mujhe ek halki clicking sensation bhi mehsoos ho rahi hai jo dardnak hai aur mujhe lag raha hai ki meri nerves aur veins suj gayi hain.Doctor aap patient ko dekh sakte hain, leg me kuch issue hai please dekhiye, aur dard raat ko sone se pehle sabse jyada hota hai. Mujhe chalna ya khade hona bhi comfortable nahi hai clicking sensation ki wajah se. Kya aap mujhe salah de sakte hain ki main kya karun ya mujhe bata sakte hain ki ye kya hai. Dhanyavaad! Rolly M.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing the painful clicking sensation, foot swelling, and swollen nerves and veins in Rolly's left foot? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The foot is swollen with some reddishness in the foot.

Hinglish_Question:
Namaste doctor,
Yeh meri 5 saal ki beti ke baare mein hai. Char din pehle usko sudden se fever aaya tha. Fever lagbhag 100 degree F tha. Kal uska fever kam ho gaya hai aur ab use nahi hai. Usko koi cough, cold, etc. nahi tha. Lekin uski bhukh khatm ho gayi thi aur uski left eye ke safed hisse mein laalpani bhi tha. Ab redness bhi chali gayi hai. Vo thodi si matli aur sar dard ki shikayat bhi karta tha. Lekin kal sab kuch kam ho gaya tha aur vo theek ho gayi hai. Lekin, kal raat ko humne dekha ki uske chehre, mathe aur seena ke aas pass laal chote chote dane aa gaye hain. Kabhi kabhi iste mein khujli bhi hoti hai.
Please doctor, neeche di gayi aankhen dekhiye. Main aapke liye refer ke liye image attach kar raha hu. Ye dane thode se upar hain. Baaki vo ab sawasth lagti hai. Uski bhukh bhi badh gayi hai.
Uske fever ke doosre din, usne thodi der ke liye behoshi mein aa gayi thi (thodi si thook munh se aayi) 5 se 10 seconds ke liye. Usne jaldi se theek ho gayi 1 ya 2 minute mein. Ye subah ke waqt hua jab vo uthi aur khadi hui. Pure raat bhar usko moderate se high fever tha.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a 5-year-old's fever, loss of appetite, eye redness, headache, nausea, and red itchy bumps? The image here shows a medical condition related to eye_redness. The eye is swollen and the cornea has turned red.

Hinglish_Question: hi, Mujhe mere left foot par sujan hai...aur lagbhag ek mahina ho gaya hai. Main insulin lete hue diabetic hoon. Blood pressure ki tablets bhi leta hoon. Sujan kabhi kam ho jati hai, lekin thodi der baad fir se sujati hai. Dard kabhi kabhi paav ke upar hota hai, jab main paav neeche rakhta hoon to dard hota hai, lekin hamesha nahi, kabhi kabhi calf muscle ke paas ek cramping pain hota hai. Kripya, doctor, neeche diye gaye image dekhein jismein affected area hai. Meri neuropathy bhi hai aur kabhi kabhi nerve pain paav ke pasliyon ke paas aata hai, kabhi kabhi toh lagta hai ki haddi mein dard hai. Main roz yahi soch raha hoon ki ye chala jayega. Meri sawal hai, meri GP ne kaha ki meri pulse acchi hai, lekin maine use dard ke bare mein nahi bataya, usne kaha ki agar sujan laal ho jaye toh hamse milna chahiye. Lekin ye meri neend ko prabhavit nahi karta hai, kya ye stress fracture hai, kya ye clot hai ya sirf ligaments hai, kya ye diabetic se sambandhit hai?
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the persistent swelling, foot pain, cramping, and neuropathy in a diabetic patient indicative of a stress fracture, blood clot, ligament issue, or diabetes-related complication? The image here shows the condition of knee swelling

Hinglish_Question: Meri dost ke trunk par ek rash develop ho gaya hai jo belt line ko follow karta hai. Usne un bumpy sensations ko skin ke neeche mehsoos kiya tha jo kuch din se erupt hone se pehle the. Dr. Dx ye shingles tha. Usne 7 din ka Zovirax oral treatment kiya, lekin ab usko itching ho rahi hai aur dard bhi badh gaya hai. Ab Dr. Who ke paas wapas gayi jo kehta hai ki ye eczema hai. Papules ki line ab umbilicus ke dono taraf hai. Usne kuch mahine pehle ek pup ko rescue kiya tha jisme sarcoptic aur demodectic mange ki severe worm infestation thi aur use ivomectin se treat kiya ja raha hai. Kya possible hai ki usko sarcoptic mange se scabie mite ho gayi hai. Uski image attach ki gayi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Can the rash, itching, and pain be caused by scabies mite from previous exposure to sarcoptic mange in a rescued pup? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor, mujhe ENT doctor ne chronic sinusitis ka diagnosis diya hai. Mai kuch mahino se swelling ki pareshani se guzar raha hu, aisa lagta hai ki kuch mere gale me phasa hua hai jaise sputum ya kuch aur jo upar neeche ho raha hai, especially khane pine ya flu ke samay. Kya aapko lagta hai ki ye ENT ke sambandhit hai ya mujhe gastric endoscopy karana chahiye. Warna, mai bilkul swasth hu. Mai ek nasal spray (Cortisone) istemal karta hu iske liye. Iska image neeche attach hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is chronic sinusitis and feeling something stuck in the neck while eating related to ENT or should a gastric endoscopy be done? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. The tonsils turned red with inflammation.

Hinglish_Question: Hi Doc, Mera 2.5 saal ka beta last month loose motions tha, jo ab phir se ho gaya hai. Stool routine test mein kuch significant nahi show ho raha hai, bas Pus Cells: 1-2/hpf aur Macrophages: 1-2/hpf hai. Usko ek moth ulcer bhi hua hai (cheek ke andar), jo dard nahi karta. Please doctor, muh ko neeche dekhiye. Humne usko gutrite aur gramogyl syrup diya hai loose motion ke dauran. Please suggest karein.
multimodal_Question_summ:
What could be the cause of recurring loose motions and a mouth ulcer in a 2.5-year-old child? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. Pink coloured circular swelling with redness all around it prese t on the inner side of upper lip.
Condition- stomatitis ( Inflammation of the skin of mouth)

Hinglish_Question: Dear Doc.Main apne poore jism ke tvacha mein khujli aur jalan ka samasya se pareshan hoon, jisme sir bhi shamil hai. Khujli hone ke baad tvacha mein ek laal rang dikhai deta hai aur kuch prakar ki sujan bhi hoti hai. Kya ye Psoriasis ki bimari hai? Mai Calicut mein ek doctor se mila tha aur unhone mujhe ye dawaon ki salah di thi;-1- Tab. Nurobion forte   1 goli din mein teen baar2- hospital se tayyar ki gayi ek aur paste   Acid sil 5 gm, Naseline 100gm , HAD  5gm  Mai ye dawa ek mahine se istemal kar raha hoon lekin koi sudhar nahi dikhai de raha hai aur khujli mujhe bahut jyada pareshan kar rahi hai. Doc, kya mujhe is vishay mein koi salah prapt hogi? Chandra Mohan.Image is attached below.
multimodal_Question_summ: Does the patient's persistent whole body itching and skin inflammation indicate a condition like psoriasis? The image shows the condition of skin irritation. Small circular spots of red lesions. Little inflammed spots with little redness.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe lagta hai ki mere tonsils mein rukawat ya infection hai. Pehle mujhe laga ki mere daant mein koi problem hai aur aaj dopahar maine apne dentist ke paas jaake confirm karwaya ki koi problem nahi hai. Kal main apne doctor ke paas jaaunga. Doctor, kripya is affected area ki image dekhein. Lekin is bich mein main kya kar sakta hoon? Jab main khana khati hoon, mere kaan ke area mein dard hota hai. Ye subah shuru hua hai. Mere gale mein koi problem nahi hai. Mujhe thoda sa sardi hai jo akhri stage par hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing the patient's tonsils obstruction or infection, along with jaw pain and a recent cold? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. There was a swollen masses with white and red discolouration at the back of the throat.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, Pichle do saal se meri wife ko skin allergy ki problem hai. Ye delivery ke jaldi baad shuru hui thi. Kabhi kabhi lips aur mouth par sujan aur sharir par khujli hoti hai. Teen saal pehle, ek saal tak treatment liya tha aur skin allergy thik ho gayi thi. Kripya doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko neeche. Par ab ek mahine se phir se shuru ho gayi hai. Usne apne blood tests aur aur dusre skin tests karwaye hai aur sabhi normal hai. Abhi usko homeopathy treatment chal raha hai ek mahine se, lekin dawaiyon ka koi asar nahi ho raha hai. Kripya margdarshan karen.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the underlying cause of recurrent skin allergy with symptoms of lip swelling, mouth swelling, and itching that is unresponsive to previous treatment and homeopathy? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Swelling  on both upper and lower lip. Lower one more prominent.

Hinglish_Question: Mere bhai ko CKD 5 ki diagnose hui hai aur ab woh dialysis thrice a week karwa rahe hain.Uska current creatinine level 18 hai aur usko pulmonary aur RLS se bahut taklif hai.Kripya doctor, neeche diye gaye vartaman condition ko dekhein. Humne faisla liya hai ki hum jald se jald ek kidney transplant karwana hai.Meri maa donor hai. Kya usko tab tak theek rahenge?
multimodal_Question_summ: Can a CKD 5 patient undergoing dialysis with difficulty in pulmonary edema and RLS wait for a kidney transplant? The image here shows a medical condition related to edema. The left leg is swollen with deformation in the toes.

Hinglish_Question: Hello meri 15 week old abhi ek rash start hua hai, wo uske haathon par hai, wo red splotchy hai aur kuch jagahon par thodi si uthi hui hai. Mein ne uska lotion, shampoo ya detergent nahi badla, mujhe nahi pata kya problem hai. Wo sirf breastfed hai. Oh aur kal raat ko uske leg par bhi wahi cheez thi, par wo chali gayi hai aur ab wahan sirf dry skin hai. Wo garam nahi lag rahi hai, isliye mujhe lagta nahi hai ki ye heat rash hai. Mujhe bas pata nahi hai. Kripya madad karein. Iske liye wahan ki image attached hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the cause of the red, splotchy, slightly raised rash on the 15-week-old baby's arms and dry skin on the leg? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, mujhe kuch dino pehle total hip replacement surgery hui hai. Kal se mere torso, back, buttocks aur legs pe ek rash develop ho raha hai. Kripya doctor, niche diye hue vartaman condition ko dekhein. Meri hatheliyan aur pairon ki jhilliyan laal aur painful hai. Mujhe hip surgery ke liye epidural aur sedation hua tha. Surgery ke baad mujhe do rounds of IV antibiotics diye gaye hain. Mujhe iske baare mein kuch pata nahi hai. Dard ke liye mujhe Oxycodone, Tylenol aur Toradol (SP.) diya gaya hai inflammation ke liye. Mujhe Colace, Pepcid, Ranitidine, Aspirin aur Celebrex bhi diya gaya hai. Yahan ke doctors ko ye rash ke baare mein kuch samajh nahi aa raha hai. Ye bahut jyada khujlane wala nahi hai, mainly jab mujhe thoda jyada garam lag jata hai tab. Mujhe isse pehle bhi hua hai, 15 saal pehle, jab maine D and C kiya tha. Tab ye lagbhag chaar hafte mein theek ho gaya tha, lekin meri hatheliyon aur pairon ki jhilliyan blistered aur peel ho gayi thi tab tak wo sab gayab ho gaya. Agar aapko koi idea hai ki ye kya ho sakta hai aur iske effects ko kam karne ke liye kya kar sakte hai, toh main bahut grateful rahunga.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could explain the patient's red, painful rash on torso, back, buttocks, and legs, as well as palms and soles, after hip replacement surgery? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe June 2011 mein oral surgery hui thi aur ek hafte ke andar hi surgery ke baad meri skin mein itching aur kuch issue hui... iv site ke aas paas.. surgeon ne pehli baar vein miss kiya tha toh dusre try mein pakad lia... yeh rash mera right arm se left arm aur phir mere legs tak fail gaya. Kripya neeche diye image mein is affected area ko dekhe doctor. Dermatologist ke paas gaya tha aur unhone kuch sores ke slide liye aur uska result positive aya staph aureus ke liye... mujhe bactrim diya gaya... mujhe sirf itna pata hain ki main uske office ke bina bimari ke bahar gaya aur wapas aake mujhe bahut badi rash ho gayi... Main ek nurse aur acupuncturist hoon.. mujhe lagta hain ki contamination ho sakti hain kisi cheez ki...equipment... iv fluids... kya unka office isko document karta hoga... aur mere 4 tooth extractions with 2 dental implants mein badi dikkat hui pain aur infection ke karan jiske baad mujhe ek row of teeth aur 2 implants mein abscess hua... aapke kya vichar hain?
multimodal_Question_summ: Patient had oral surgery, developed itchy skin rash around the IV site spreading to arms and legs, diagnosed with staph aureus. Thoughts on contamination and dental complications? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Annular patches (ring like) with red/brownish colored lining all over the leg.

Hinglish_Question: Hi, maine pichle kuch mahino se ek dance competition ke liye intensively training ki hai aur lagbhag ek mahine pehle ek session ke baad maine apne left hand ke beech ki vein mein ek bada ganth mehsoos kiya. Doctor, iske liye neeche attach ki gayi image dekhe, ye bahut zyada bahar tha aur bahut dard kar raha tha. Kuch samay tak mujhe apne left hand se kisi bhi cheez ko halka bhi uthane mein takleef ho rahi thi. Ab ek mahine baad bhi woh wahan hai aur ab bhi dard ho raha hai . Lagbhag 2 din pehle wahan ke area mein bruise hona shuru ho gaya hai. Koi idea hai ye kya ho sakta hai. Dhanyavaad.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a painful, protruding lump in the vein of the left hand that has persisted for a month and recently started bruising? The image shows the condition of hand lump. One small swelling the the outer side of the hand.

Hinglish_Question: Bahut high liver count tha, phir RX ke baad count kam ho gaya par lagta hai meri taange/paon bahut elephantitis hai aur ankles par rang badal gaya. Kripya dekhein foot par kuch hua hai...Mera boyfriend Hep C hai...sorry = iski affordability nahi hai. Main wish karti hoon ki main kar sakti, terrible brain injury hua hai aur clinic mein kaam nahi kar rahi, ab SSD par hoon. Sorry!!
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of high liver count, persistent leg/foot swelling, ankle discoloration, and a partner with Hep C? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The foot wis stolen with deformation in the fingers

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe h.pylori ka antibiotics ka treatment khatam karne wala hai jiski maine 7 din tak liya hai, ye hai metronidazole 400mg, amoxicillin 500mg aur omeprazole 20mg. Mera problem ye hai ki mere skin mein abhi bhi kuch issues hai aur hives aur itchy eyes hai, kya aapko lagta hai ki ye kaam kar gaya hai. Attached below is the image for that.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the combination of metronidazole, amoxicillin, and omeprazole effective in reducing skin rash, hives, and itchy eyes? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Hello Dr. Grief, Mujhe meri upper spine area ke neeche skin ke andar ek bada ganth hai. Yah shuru me sirf pimple ke size ka tha aur saal ke dauran marble ka size ho gaya hai. Doctor, meri patient ki image dekh lena koi baat hai mere gardan mei samasya. Yeh dard nahi karta hai lekin mujhe bahut samsya ho rahi hai upper back mei. Mujhe benign growths ke medical history bhi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Large painless lump along upper spine, size of a marble, causing upper back pain; history of benign growths. Next steps? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. the back side of the neck is swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe apne gale ke right side mein sujan aur ganth hai. Doctor, please patient ke image dekhiye, mere gale mein kuch samasya hai. Hinglish_Question: Dear Ask The Doctor: Namaste mujhe mere docotor ke paas apne gale ke andar ek ganth ke baare mein bataya hai (swelling). Doctor kripya neeche di gayi patient ki tasveer ko dekhein, kuch issues mere gale mein hain. Main already 2001 mein ek thyroid ke baare mein jaanta tha, lekin tab kuch bhi detect nahi hua tha. Magar mujhe saans lene mein problem ho rahi hai aur khana khane mein bhi mushkil ho rahi hai aur mere kaan mein dard ho raha hai. Doctor ne ultrasound scan ke liye bheja hai lekin meri abhi tak koi letter nahi aayi hai (yeh 6 hafte tak lag sakte hain). Lekin abhi haal hi mein maine notice kiya hai ki mere upar ke gale mein, kaan ke paas ek chhota lekin bahut hi sakht ganth hai. Kya mujhe dobara jaakar apne doctor ko is baare mein inform karna chahiye... yeh mujhe dard de rahi hai aur bahut bura dar hai. Kripaya madad karein!!!!
multimodal_Question_summ: Should the patient inform their doctor about a recent hard lump in the upper neck, causing pain and earache? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The part of the neck near the ear is swollen.

Hinglish_Question:
Hindi: Namaste doctor, Mere aankh suj gayi thi aur maine Pred Forte lagaya aur sujan thik ho gayi. Mujhe computer par kaam karte waqt bahut khujli hoti hai. Pehle bhi kabhi-kabhi laalima hoti thi, lekin thandi patti lagane se madad milti thi. Laalima abhi phir se wapas aa gayi hai. Meri aankhein hamesha subah uthne ke baad laal ho jaati hain. Maine phir se thoda Pred Forte lagaya aur jaise pehle, laalima gayab ho gayi hai. Khujli, irritation, sensitivity, dard ya koi bhi visual changes nahi hui hain. Iske liye kya kiya ja sakta hai. Maine aankh ki ek tasveer aapki reference ke liye attach ki hai. 
English:Hello doctor, My eye was inflamed and I applied Pred Forte and the inflammation disappeared. I work on the computer a lot. In the past, there has been some redness, but cold compresses have been helpful. The redness is back again now. My eyes always go red after I wake up. I applied some Pred Forte again and as earlier, the redness disappeared. There has been no itching, no irritation, no sensitivity, no pain, no visual changes. What can be done for this. I have attached a picture of my eye for your reference.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is causing recurrent redness in the patient's eyes upon waking up, with temporary relief from Pred Forte? The image shows the condition of eye inflamation. Right side of the eye's blood vessels swollen and red. A circular red spot of blood clot also present.

Hinglish_Question: Meri behen ke peeth aur kaan ki piche itching wali ek rash hai aur halki sujan hai. Uski ungli suj gayi hai, honth suj gaye hain, aur uske kalaiyon aur kohniyon ke andar rash hai. Kya aapko pata hai ye kya ho sakta hai. Uski do hafta purani baby hai isliye usko uske baare mein chinta hai. Uska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai.

Hinglish_Question: Meri beti ko high blood pressure hai aur use ek recurring rash hai jiski duration ek ya do din hoti hai kabhi kabhi slight fever bhi hota hai...doctor ne uski heart ko xray se check kiya tha, wo theek tha, aur echo bhi theek tha phir usne cranial ultrasound bhi karaya aur kidney ka bhi test karaya hai, lekin ab tak almost do hafto se koi feedback nahi hai last test ka, toh assume kiya ja sakta hai ki wo bhi theek honge, isliye mein kuch samajh nahi paa rahi...kya wo theek hai...end of the month mein cadiologist se milenge. The image shows the condition of skin rash. Cluster of circular red rashes on the skin. Red around the rasied edges and clear skin in the center.

Hinglish_Question: Mai 45 saal ki mahila hoon. Mujhe apne gardano mein dard hone laga hai. Kripya neeche gardan par hua kuch dekhiye. Main doctor ke paas gayi aur unhone mujhe bataya ki mujhe upper respiratory infection hai meri sir ke kshetra mein. Meri kaan, gale aur sinus clear hai. Mujhe dant mein koi problem nahi hai. Mujhe apne nichle hoth mein sunapan aur mere left eye mein sujan hai. Mujhe 3 hafte se low grade fever ho raha hai. Main apne 3rd set antibiotics start kar rahi hoon aur mujhe thoda ghabraahat hone lagi hai. Kya ye ek respiratory infection lag rahi hai ya shayad kuch aur hai. Kya blood test se karan pata chalega.

Hinglish_Question: Mere right side of neck right next to collarbone par ek lump hai jiske around neck mein Thyroid located hai, no pain but lots of tenderness hai aur swallowing mein difficulty hai. Mere DR ko Friday tak nahi dekh paungi, kya aapko koi idea hai ki ye kya ho sakta hai.

Hinglish_Question: Main ek doctor hoon, haal hi mein ek young female mere paas aayi jo bronchial asthma ki background se hai aur right great toe mein chot se dard kar rahi thi. Maine use aceclofenac paracetamol combination di, sath hi amoxycillin clavulinic acid combination di. Uski finger ki sthiti mein kafi improvement hui, lekin uske dono pairon mein aur chehre mein sujan aayi, saath hi normal urine output thi. Aise sujan ka kya karan ho sakta hai aur ab kya karna chahiye?

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe apni ghutno mein bahut tez dard hai, Doctor kripya niche diye gaye image par nazar karen, left knee ke peeche meniscus surgery 16 mahine pehle hui thi, yeh ghutna sujh gaya hai, jiska size ek thumb ki tarah ka hai, right knee mein bahut dard aur jaln hai aur sujan hai aur loud pop hota hai, jaise ki rubber band ko paper bag ke khilaf snap kiya gaya ho.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste Mera naam Jenny hai aur mere paas 9 mahine ka ek baccha hai jisko Di George syndrome ka diagnosis hai. Usne 6 hafte ki umra mein open heart surgery karwayi, iske baad 5 mahine tak hospital mein raha aur har chest infection se ladte hue wo ab chronic lung disease ke saath rehta hai aur hamesha home oxygen par depend hai. Kuch mahine pehle usne echo karwaya tha aur confirm hua ki heart surgery ka bahut achha result tha aur ab usko heart medication ki zarurat nahi hai. Lekin mere ko chinta hai ki ek hafte pehle uske temples suj gaye they, wo jyada sujne nahi lagte lekin mujhe iski wajah nahi pata. Lagta hai uske aankhon ke palak bhi thodi suj gayi hai, kya aap meri iss samasya ka hal batane me madad kar sakte hain? Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko.

Hinglish_Question: Mai 35 saal ki hu, jab mai uthi, mere chehre par sujan thi (aankhe, upar ki hoth, naak ke aas paas), kripaya doctor, dekhiye is vartaman sthiti ko neeche. Hinglish_Question: Main 21 saal ki ladki hoon, sexually active nahi hoon. Mujhe itchiness ho rahi hai mons pubis aur mere thigh send hips ke aas paas ki skin mein. Iske saath saath, dryness bhi hai. Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, main 4 saal pehle ek car accident mein tha. Ek hafte ke baad jab main naha raha tha, toh maine apne left neck mein ek chota sa lymph node mehsoos kiya. Pehle maine use feel nahi kiya tha. Woh tab thoda bada tha. Abhi tak woh chhota ho raha hai lekin apne original size mein nahi ja raha hai. Ab mujhe nahi dikhta lekin mehsoos kar pa raha hoon. Isliye main pareshan hoon aur ise bar bar press kar raha hoon. Haal hi mein maine apne muh ke floor mein ek gland mehsoos kiya, left side mein hai aur woh bahut chhota hai aur size mein badh raha hai. Kabhi kabhi mujhe muh ke left side aur left leg mein sujan mehsoos hoti hai. Please dekhein neeche kya hua foot pe. Mujhe raat ko paseena nahi aata hai, fever nahi hai aur weight loss bhi nahi hai. Mujhe right chest mein paanch chhote petechiae (laal khoon ke daag) hue hain. Main apni poore blood test history ko teen mahino ke liye attach kiya hoon. Lakshan: Lagatar left shoulder pain hai, bone pain hai, hand pain hai. Zyaada thakan aur exhaustion hai. Muh mein kuch chipka hua mehsoos hota hai. Bowel habit change hai. Dawa: Doxycycline Hyclate 100 mg do hafte ke liye. Amoxycillin 500 mg ek hafte ke liye. Mere sawalon ka jawaab yeh hai: 1. Kya mujhe lymphoma ya leukemia hai. 2. Agar aapka jawaab no. 1. hai toh, phir antibiotics ki poore course ke baad bhi lymph nodes apne original size mein kyun nahi ja rahe hain. 3. Mere WBC aur lymph % itni fluctuation kyun kar rahe hai. 4. Kya CBC test se lymphoma ka pata chal sakta hai. 5. Aapki blood report ke baare mein aapki kya ray hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Can a car accident four years ago have caused lymph node swelling, bone pain, extreme fatigue, and other symptoms? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The foot is swollen with some reddishness in the foot.

Hinglish_Question: Aap doctor hai na...yeh emosone m cream mai apne bete ko lagata hoon.woh abhi infant hai(11 mahine)..2,3 mahine se uske chehre aur pamper area par redness aur pimples jaise cheezein hai...maine bahut saari creams lagayi hain..jab woh 6 mahine ka tha tab hum india gaye the, maine wahan kuch doctors se milwaya usko..us doctor ne yeh emosone m cream shuru ki thi..ab tak main us cream ko istemal kar rahi hoon..agar 1,2 din tak main cream na lagau toh uske chehre, gale, pamper area, knees par redness aur pimples ho jate hai...iske baad jab mai cream lagati hoon woh theek ho jata hai...ab mujhe jaanna hai ki actually mere bete ko kya problem hai..aur kitne time tak mujhe is cream ka istemal karna hai.Please doctor dekhiye is vartaman condition ko neeche .Agar mai cream continue karta hoon toh kya isse usko koi problem ho sakti hai..uske future mein bhi..pls dr reply kijiye..thanx

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor,Mai pichle do hafto mein apni aankh ki cornea do baar khujali karta raha hoon. Uski image attached hai neeche. Lag raha tha jaise mere contacts aankh mein fold ho gaya hai (aisa nahi tha). Thoda sensitive hai. Kuch din lag gaye aur mai normal ho gaya par tab se contacts nahi pehne tha jab tak kal mai thode der ke liye pehna, koi problem nahi thi. Kal pura din pehne rakhne par mujhe wahi reaction hua- dry eye, tearing, extreme pain, scratchy eyes, bahut light sensitivity aur bahut saari samasya aankhon mein. Kya mujhe iska ilaj ke liye doctor ke paas jaana chahiye ya ye apne aap heal ho jayega. Mai kitne din tak wait karun contacts phir se pehne ke liye.

Hinglish_Question: Mere 3 saal ke bete ko 3 din pehle utha to usko laal aankh aur neeche wala parda suj gea tha. Please doctor, aankhon ko neeche dekhe. Hinglish_Question: Mujhe khane se bahut badi allergy hai jo mere bachpan me hayfever ke saath mix ho gayi thi aur mere skin me kuch samasya hai jo seedhe tarah se kisi bhi cheez se sambandhit hai jo maine khaya hai. Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, Meri taraf se salaam, Mere paas ek sawaal hai. Lagbhag nau mahine ho gaye hain jab mujhe L4 hemilaminectomy, L5 foraminotomy aur L4-L5 level ke bone fracture ka drilling hua tha. Do mahine baad mujhe bahut tez dard hone ke karan MRI karaya gaya. MRI report mein dikhaya gaya ki peeth ke muscles mein sujan hai, Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko below. Nerve roots mein sujan hai, L4-L5 par nerve roots ki dabav hai, radiculitis/arachnoiditis ke liye sandeh hai aur L3-L4 par low-lying conus with tethered cord aur madhurit filum hai. Report ke baad mujhe Dexamethasone diya gaya tha ek 10-din ke course ke liye. Pichle aath mahino mein, mujhe kai lakshan ho gaye hain jaise gambhir peeth dard, constant dil ki dhadkan 130 aur upar badalne wala blood pressure. Results lagatar badalte rehte hain 100/40 se 200/140 sujan aur ghaav peeth par weakness ke saath bladder aur bowel issues. Mujhe EMG karaya gaya tha jismein L4-5 aur L5-S1 par acute neurogenic lesion annular distribution dikhai gayi. Mujhe echochardiogram bhi karaya gaya tha jismein bataya gaya ki rest HR 130 hai, effort mein - 3:36 HR 90% effort level - 5.3 hai. Mujhe agle hafte cardio examination ke liye schedule kiya gaya hai. Mera sawaal ye hai ki kya ye lakshan low-lying conus aur tethered cord se sambandhit ho sakte hain? Surgery se pehle, mere paas sirf CT tha isliye mujhe ye nahi pata ki tethered cord wahaan hai ya nahi. Kya hai ki sujan aur inflammation ne tethered cord ki samasya aur lakshan ko paida kiya ho sakta hai. Kya ye khud hi gayab ho sakta hai? Mein aapki is mudde par koi bhi sujhav aur salaah ka intezaar karunga. Kripya madad karen. Maine reports aapke reference ke liye attach kar di hai.

Hinglish_Question:
Title: Kya mujhe kya ho raha hai?


Hi, main ek 30 saal ka swasth purush hoon. Halhi Mein jab main utha to mere dono aankhon ke uper sujan aur khujli mahsus hui. Jaldi hi mere bayen mathe par ek sujan aur khujli wala rash bhi develop ho gaya. Ye chale jaata hai aur phir se achanak badh jaata hai. Mere honth bhi suj jaate hain aur wahi ho jaate hain...kuch ghanton mein hi chale jaate hain aur phir se badh jaate hain. Khujli aur rash mere upar ke pairon mein bhi dikhte hain. Mujhe kisi tarah ka autoimmune arthritis hai aur main roz sulfasalazine leta hoon. Mere pitaji ko psoriasis hai isliye aap turant psoriasis ki baat karenge. Lekin main roz Valacyclovir leta hoon aur prescription ek hafte se bhi jyaada waqt pehle hi khatam ho gaya hai aur ye tab badh gaya hai. Mujhe kuch samay se gaal laal hai, baaki Valacyclovir lete hue bhi aur aakhiri 6-8 mahine mein meri bazo aur haatho mein tez khujli ke lamhe bhi rahe hain. Mujhe lagta tha ki ye sulfasalazine ki reaction ho sakta hai, lekin ab main yakeen nahi rakh paa raha hoon. Mere saath kya ho raha hai? Neeche uska chitr hai.

Ye lagbhag 3/4 se 1/2 CM bada hai, aur ek hafte se lagbhag isi size ka hai, shaving ke irritation ke alawa, usne phir se kam ho gaya hai aur shayad thoda aur chota ho gaya hai. Lagbhag 3 mahine pehle mere gal ke niche bhi ek aisa hi cheez thi, vo thodi kam kathor thi aur usne tab se kafi kam ho gayi hai, lekin abhi bhi thodi hai. Jise main jyada chinta kar raha hoon, vo uske neeche hai, thoda bada hai (lekin 3/4 CM ya usse kam hi hai), kathor hai, ho sakta hai ki twacha se joda hua ho. Aur jab pehli gaanth aayi, 3 mahine pehle, mujhe lagbhag 2 ya 3 hafte tak sardi hui thi. Fir uska size chota hone laga. Is hafte ki shuruat mein maine nayi gaanth ko notice kiya aur phir usi raat mujhe lag raha tha ki mere gale mein kuch jama hua hai aur naak mein dabaav hai. Maine padha hai ki ye chote hai, isliye mujhe jyada chinta nahi honi chahiye, lekin ye dono gaanth hai aur sakht hai (ek bebe ke jaisa lag raha hai, lekin utna kathor nahi  par uske size ka hai), main next week ek appointment lekar check-up karaya hoon.
