(by broken I mean meri tooth ki ek choti piece chip ho gayi hai). Aur is tooth ko kafi samay se aisa hi rehne diya hai but mujhe hamesha ye problems nahi hoti hai. Dusre shabdon mein kaha jaye toh main kuch samay ke liye bilkul theek rehta hoon aur phir kabhi kabhi ye sab hota hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the broken tooth causing symptoms such as swollen tongue, irritated throat, facial swelling, sinus problems, and eye swelling? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Eye lid swollen with redness and a spot of yellow near the eye lash.

Hinglish_Question: Kya candid ya candid b cream behtar hai? Asal mein, mein ek 31 saal ki shaadi shuda mahila hoon. Mere paas ek 3 mahine ka beta hai. Sir, mujhe ek skin infection ki samasya hai. Mere chehre par gol aur laal dairein hai jo khujli karti hai aur ye ek point se shuru hui thi aur ab poore chehre par fail gayi hai aur badhti ja rahi hai. Mein bahut sare skin specialist se mil chuki hoon lekin ye rukti nahi hai. Mujhe candid, candid b cream, lotion, fluconazole aur ranitidin capsules, sath hi skin light cream bhi prescribe ki hai. Kripya aap dekh lijiye is vartaman condition ko. Ab mai kya karun?
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the best treatment for a 31-year-old woman with round, red circles, itching, and skin rash on her face? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor, main ek 31 saal ki mahila hoon. Mere pass khujli karne wale aur bade daane hai, jo jaise bade ke kaatne lagte hain, lekin vo aise nahi hai. Unki image neeche attach ki gayi hai. Vo aate jaate hain alag alag jagah par aur mere periods ke time par zyada ho jaate hain. Ab se pichle saat mahine se mujhe ye daane hai. Main ek picture attach kar rahi hoon, ye kya hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of recurring itchy rashes and bumps that resemble big bites in a 31-year-old female, especially around her periods? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mera beta 13 saal ka hai aur pichle 2 ya 3 saalon se lagatar wahi bimari ho rahi hai....sore throat and tonsils,achy legs, low grade fever aur hamesha vomiting up mucus karta hai. Ye har couple of months me hota hai aur wo often sore throatki shikayat karta hai aur uske tonsils quite swollen lagte hain. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. He snores something fierce and breathes out of his mouth when he sleeps. Hum just vacation par gaye the aur no one could sleep as he was snoring \so loud. Usko ye infection do weeks pehle tha jab hum away the, aur aaj subah usne wapas up with it again kiyahai aur vomited up mucus 5 times today.Kya wo ek ear, throat and nose specialist se milna chahiye? Mein use kuch baar doctor ke paas le gaya hoon without any results.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is frequent hair dryer use linked to brain tumor or cancer? Patient experiences scalp pimples and occasional brief head pain. The image shows the condition of dry scalp. White and dry scalp.

Hinglish_Question:
Pyare doctor, 
Maine ek ladki ke saath unsafe sex kiya tha aur ek saal aur aadha baad maine CMIA test rapid antibody test aur ELISA test karwaye, aur saare result HIV 1 aur 2 ke liye negative aaye. Lekin mere dimaag mein ab bhi tension hai aur roz mere khayal mein yahi aata hai ki kya main HIV se infected ho gaya hun. Yeh isliye kyunki mere kandhe aur chaati par skin allergy ho rahi hai. Kya main shaadi karu ya nahi, yeh sawal roz mere dimaag mein ghoomte rehte hai. Kya yeh tests hi kaafi hai HIV ka confirm hone ke liye? Kya main apni personal life shuru karu? Aapki bahut mehrbani hogi.
multimodal_Question_summ: Patient concerned about HIV infection despite negative tests, experiencing skin rash on shoulders and chest, unsure about starting personal life. The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mere 12 mahine ke bete ko 6/7/11 ko HFMD ka diagnosis hua tha, jo ki 6/4/11 se shuru hua tha aur 6/9/11 tak woh normal ho raha tha aur usne apni ek saal ki umra mein apni vaccinations bhi receive ki thi. Usko tab se ek halka sa fever chal raha hai, lekin kal se uske sharir par ek rash develop hone lagi hai jo aaj pure sharir mein tezi se fail rahi hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Uska energy level kam hai aur aaj usne aadha hi fluid intake kiya hai. Kya ye vaccinations ka reaction hai? Male, 12 months, 20 pounds - koi pehle se medical problem nahi hai, vaccinations up to date hain.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the rash and decreased energy in a 12-month-old baby with a history of HFMD and recent vaccinations a concern? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Multiple granular spots of rashes with light red color on the skin.

Hinglish_Question: Hi, mujhe 3 hafto pehle apne chehre par ek laal daane wali allergy ho gayi thi. Shuru mein toh lag raha tha ki yeh hives ya heat rash hai kyun ki main 2 din tak garm aur ghissey hue mahol mein thi. Twacha badhti hui, moti aur gaddedar lag rahi thi aur khujli/burning sensation bhi thi. Main ne antihistamines aur OTC 1% cortizone cream li hai lekin koi fark nahi pada. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Mere khane, cosmetics, cleansers, moisturizers ya washing powder mein koi badlaav nahi kiya tha. Lekin phir bhi maine apne cosmetics, cleansers, moisturizers aur washing powder badal diye hain lekin abhi tak koi fark nahi pada.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing a persistent, itchy and raised rash on the face despite changes in diet and skincare products? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Meri beti ko pollen allergies ki diagnose ho gayi hai jab wo 3 saal ki thi....ab wo 6 saal ki hai....humne different medications try ki hai, lekin sabse lamba wo l-montus kids le rahi thi, ek saal tak.....use pollen se naak bandh hoti hai, irritability hoti hai aur aankhon ke aas paas laalima hoti hai.Please doctor, dekhiye aankhon ko neeche. Abhi toh Georgia, USA mein winter chal raha hai....pollen levels bahut kam hai...lekin mujhe use medicine deni padti hai warna uski aankhein laal aur suj jaati hain....koi sujhav hai...medicine usage ko kam karne ke liye.
multimodal_Question_summ: How can the patient minimize medication usage for their 6-year-old daughter's pollen allergies, specifically to reduce eye redness and swelling? The image here shows a medical condition related to eye_redness. The Eye is swelling with redness and the upper eyelid is also swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Hi! Mera naam hai breastfeeding mum, meri skin bahut dry hai aur jab mai breastfeeding karti hoon, toh dryness aur badh jaati hai. Mai already bahut saara paani peeti hoon, lekin koi fayda nahi ho raha hai. Diye gaye image ke liye dekh sakte hain. Toh mere sawaalon hai, dry skin problem se deal karne ke liye mai kya kar sakti hoon. Kya collagen supplements dry skin se deal karne mein madad karenge. Kya collagen supplements lene surakshit hai jab mai breastfeeding kar rahi hoon. Pehle se hi bahut bahut dhanyavaad!
multimodal_Question_summ: Is it safe to take collagen supplements for dry skin while breastfeeding? The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_dryness. The skin near the cheek has turned dry and seems to be broken.

Hinglish_Question: On my right hand me ek chota sa hard,dardnak bump hai jo mere skin ke neeche grow kar raha hai. Doctor, iske liye attached image is below, elbow ke paas hai. Mujhe isko January se hai aur lag raha hai ki ye grow kar raha hai. Iske alawa dard us area me increased ho gaya hai. Kya ye kisi nerve ki damage hai jo swollen ho gayi hai. Ya fir ye kisi tumor ka sign hai. Koi color change nahi hua hai jahan pe ye small bump hai, lekin skin ab phool gayi hai aur ball noticeable hai. Pehli baar jab maine bump notice kiya tha, toh nazar me visible nahi tha lekin touch karne pe tha. Please mujhe apne is baare me apne thoughts batayein! Dhanyavaad aapke samay aur sochne ke liye!
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the likely cause of a small, hard, painful bump near the patient's elbow that has grown over time? The image shows the condition of hand lump. One swelling on the palm area below the thumb on the inside. Circular on shape, inside part is whitish surrounded by red lining.

Hinglish_Question: Hi, Mere husband ko 18 mahine se roof of his mouth mein skin peeling hai. Please dekhein is affected area ka image doctor below. Woh usually bahut healthy hote hain lekin in dino woh hamesha thak gaye hain aur constant headaches hote hain. Unke leg pe ek ajeeb sa rash hai jo gayab nahi ho raha aur unke back pe lumps hain jaise spots lekin bahut hard hai aur unke back ko scar karte hain. Mujhe nahi pata ki kya ye sab connected hai lekin mujhe dar hai ki ye peeling serious ho sakti hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is there a connection between skin peeling in the roof of the mouth, fatigue, constant headaches, unusual leg rash, and hard lumps on the back? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers.

Hinglish_Question: Mere mom ke dogs ne mere pair par step kiya aur pinky foot ke pas wale toe par landed hua. Tab mujhe dard nahi hua but ek ghante baad mujhe numbness mehsoos hone lagi. Mujhe laga ki ise pop kiya jaana chahiye aur maine ispar dabaya toh dard hua, isliye maine ruk gaya. Kuch ghante baad maine ise dekha toh uspar ek bruise tha aur wo suj gaya tha. Please, dekhiye kuch mere foot me hua hai. Uske joint ke pass ek knot hai. Kya mujhe doctor ke paas jaana chahiye ya ye khud hi theek ho jayega. Jyada dard nahi hota, bas khujli hoti hai. Dhanyavad!
multimodal_Question_summ: Should the patient go to the doctor for a swollen and bruised foot with a knot near the joint, itching but not much pain? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The foot is swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe low grade fevers on and off ho rahe hain. Swollen soft tissue lumps, bahut dardnaak hai aur bursitis ko trigger karte hain. Kam se kam ek jagah par pettechia hai. Mujhe face par ek rash hai. Please dekhiye patient skin ki image below. Jo lupus rash jaisa dikh raha hai, ye mere aankhon ke pass hai. Lower ext. mein hai. Bahut jyada thakan hai.....subah stiffness hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing the patient's low-grade fevers, swollen soft tissue lumps, bursitis pain, petechiae, lupus-like rash, and fatigue? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Red all over the left cheek of the mouth continues to the forehead. Part of nose also full red. Extreme allergy.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe 2 mahine pehle Epstein Barr virus diagnose kiya gaya tha. Mere face ke left side main bohot dard hai aur bohot zor hai. Mere glands bhi left side par suj gaye hain. Mera doctor kehte hai ki mujhe sinus cold hai. Aaj subah mein apni aankh mein ek bada laal spot dekha hai.Kripya doctor, dekhiye aankhon ko niche.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of persistent facial pain, swollen glands, and a red spot in the eye in an Epstein Barr virus patient? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. There are two round, flesh masses ninth back of throat.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, Mujhe lagbhag ek mahine se taklif hai. Mujhe antibiotics le rahe hain,lekin ye theek nahi ho raha hai. Mujhe throat mein thoda dard hota hai. Kabhi kabhi kaan mein dull pain bhi hota hai. Kya ye tonsil ya throat cancer ke koi lakshan hai? Uska image attached hai neeche.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is persistent swelling and pain in the tonsils, along with slight throat and ear pain, indicative of tonsil or throat cancer? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. There swollen red mass present in the back of the throat.

Hinglish_Question: Hi, mera chaar saal ka beta raat mein daane daane mein ek rash/redness ke saath bahut preshaan ho raha hai. Please dekhein is vartaman condition ko. Ye Day 5 hai. Usko iss hafte pehle virus ho gaya tha (Strep ke liye negative tha) aur usko hamesha low grade fever tha, around 100-101. Kya mujhe use doctor ke paas le jaana chahiye.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should a four-year-old with a rash, raised skin-colored bumps at night, and recent virus be taken to the doctor? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Little red pinkish dots on the hands of the baby.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, mujhe ek mahine pehle ek creek mein girte waqt meri paer mein chot lagi hai. Koi sujan ya phoolaapan nahi hai. Dard mere paer ke bahar, upar taraf hai. Dard badhta ja raha hai. Main lamba samay tak chalne ya khade rehne ki saksham nahi hoon. Main Ibuprofen le raha hoon, ice lagane ka prayas kar raha hoon aur aaram kar raha hoon. Mujhe yeh anjaan hai ki main kya chalo, kya emergency room ke liye X-ray ke liye jau ya 2 se 3 hafte tak apne regular doctor ke appointment ka intezaar karu. Iske corresponding image niche hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should the patient go to the emergency room for an X-ray or wait to see their regular doctor for foot pain, worsening over a month? The image here shows the condition of foot swelling

Hinglish_Question: Mere 7 saal ke bete ke muh ke aaspaas, uske thale, aur naak ke niche sukhi twacha thi. Humne isko thik karne ke liye fragrance free aveeno baby lotion lagaya. Agli din lalima hui. Ab teesre din uske chehre par ek sui wali khujli hai jo bahar sukhi hai aur usse dard ho raha hai, aur uski temperature 100.4 hai aaj raat. Yeh suiyan pila padarth ke saath bhari hui dikhai deti hain aur sirf uske chehre ke is hisse par hain. Wo eczema ki taraf pravritti dikhatan hai, lekin itni jyada takleef kabhi nahi dekhi. Kya mein use raat ko ER le jaun ya phir subah doctor ke paas jau..Please doctor, upar diye gaye aanko ko dekhein.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is it necessary to seek immediate medical attention for a 7-year-old with a severe blistery rash, dry skin, pain, and an elevated temperature? The image here shows the condition of mouth ulcers

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe Monday ko do upper teeth nikalwaye gaye-ek jo wisdom tooth tha. Ab gums par white patches hain. Aur mujhe unbearable pain ho rahi hai. Mera sir, chehra, gardan aur chhati us taraf se dard kar rahi hai. Kya ye normal hai. Kripya dekhiye doctor, affected area ki image neeche. Batana chahiye, teeth nikalwane se pehle us taraf ki chehra aur gardan mein already kabhi kabhi sujan aur dard tha. Kya yahaan par infection ho sakta hai?
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the presence of white patches on the gums, excruciating pain, head, face, neck, and chest hurting indicative of an infection? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The neck is swollen withe red rashes in the mouth.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe notice hua hai ki mera right side ke collar bone ke piche mere neck ke pass ek naram ganth hai.Doctor, please neeche patient ki image dekh lo, mere neck main kuch problem hai. Jab main ise touch karta hoon toh dard nahi hota aur mujhe koi dusra symptom bhi nahi dikhta/feel hota hai, jaise hi mujhe pata chala hai. Yeh ek naram fatty ganth ya ball ki tarah lag rahi hai, jiska size mere hath ki halki si gol hai. Agar main apni shirt utar dun toh woh dikhta hai kyunki woh upar chadh kar bahar nikal jata hai. Ye kya hai..
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the soft lump near the right side of the neck behind the collarbone that protrudes and is painless? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The lady has a lower red swollen neck.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, Mujhe ek 10 saal ke ladke ke baare mein jaankari hai jo eye allergy jaisa lag raha hai. Unki aankhon ka laal pan tab shuru hua jab unhe aath saal ke the. Unko khujli hoti hai, isliye wo apni aankhein ragadte hain, khaas karke shaam ke samay aur sone se pehle. Unki eyesight normal hai, ise check kiya gaya hai. Unke 32 saal ke uncle ko bhi yehi problem thi, aur wo theek tabhi huye jab wo 21 saal ke ho gaye, dawaai ke bawajood. Kya aisi ek case ko is umra mein, matlab 10 se 21 saal ke beech, treat kiya jaa sakta hai? Kya sabse ache dawaai ka plan hai? Kya aap aankhon ke laal pan aur khujli ko kam karne wale eye drops suggest kar sakte hai? Yahan par patient ki aankhon ki kuch snaps aur unki current medication ki image hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is it possible to treat eye allergy in a 10-year-old boy who experiences redness, itching, and has a family history? The image here shows a medical condition related to eye_redness. The eye has started to become red from canthus.

Hinglish_Question: Mere 7 saal ki beti hai jisko kal subah se flu ke lakshan dikh rahe hain. Maine use doctor ke paas le gaya aur unhone bataya ki usko flu hai, lekin uska test nahi kiya. Uski temperature ab 104 ho gayi hai aur uske pair thande jaise barf ki tarah hain. Usko hadd se zyada leg pain ki shikayat hai aur chalne mein taklif ho rahi hai; usne kaha hai ki jab wo chalti hai toh dard uske pair se uske legs tak shoot hota hai. Uske ek aankh mein bhi ab bahut tez dard ho raha hai aur bahut paani aa raha hai. Please doctor, dekhiye in aankhon ko. Kya yeh sach mein flu ho sakta hai. Mujhe actually isse pareshani uske legs ke problem se hai; kya uske pairon ko circulation nahi mil rahi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the patient's severe leg pain, cold feet, and red, watery eye indicative of the flu or a more serious condition? The image here shows a medical condition related to eye_redness. The Eye is swelling with redness and the upper eyelid is also swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe pichle hafte se apne muh mein kuch problem ho rahi hai. Ek mahine mein kam se kam 2 hafte suffer karta hoon. B.complex aur dusre tarike bhi istemaal kiye hain lekin koi fayda nahi hua. Kya koi mujhe suggest kar sakta hai ki iske liye kaun sa doctor consult karna chahiye. Matlab GP (General Physician) ya Dentist ya koi aur. Kripya jaldi jawaab dein. Mai bohot pareshan hoon.Screenshot of the affected area doctor, please dekh lijiye.
multimodal_Question_summ: What type of doctor should the patient consult for recurring mouth ulcers that do not respond to B-complex or other treatments? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. Two side by side swelling with whitish color and redness around. The swelling is present on the central inner side of the lower lip.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe menstruation period se 2-3 dino pehle red strips ke roop mein body par cut marks ka samna kar rahe hain. Pichle do saal se ye above backbone par tha phir last time ye mere gaal aur face par tha. Maine ek skin doctor se consult kiya aur dawaiya li thi. Lekin iss baar mere haath par same hand shoulder se elbow ke upar halka irritation aur dard ke saath red rashes hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Kripaya mujhe koi ghar par ya dusri treatment ki salah dein. Dhanyavad aur shubh kamnayein, Seema.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is causing red strips as cut marks on the body before menstruation, followed by red rashes, irritation, and pain on the hand above the elbow? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, mere penis pe ek infection hai. Penis ke foreskin par irritation hai, jo urine karne par jalata hai aur jab bhi skin ko peeche kheenchta hoon. Kripya dekhiye vartaman sthiti ko neeche. Do saal pehle bhi aisi hi sthiti thi. Abhi tak koi dawa nahi le raha hoon. Lag raha hai balanitis hai. Aapki sujhav kya hai?
multimodal_Question_summ: What is your suggestion for treating the patient's recurring penile irritation, burning during urination, and phimosis? The image shows the condition of skin irritation. Red colored rashes on the right side of the neck. Raised spots of abrasion in the area with red spots prominent.

Hinglish_Question: Mera dentist ne mujhe ek pathologist ke paas bheja hai kyun ki mere gums ke ek taraf ek white ulcer like lesion hai. Kya ye koi cheez hai jispe mujhe cancer jaise chinta karni chahiye ya ye bas ek simple canker sore ho sakta hai. Mujhe iska pata chala jab mujhe thoda discomfort mehsoos hua jaise ki aapke daant aur gaalo ke beech me kuch hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is munh ko neeche. Maine usko brush kiya aur us jagah ko irritate kiya aur khoon bah gaya. Dard nahi bas taklif hai jab main namak aur paani ya mouth wash use karta hoon. Main smoker ya tobacco user nahi hoon. Kripya salah dein. Dhanyavad.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the white ulcer-like lesion on the patient's gums, causing discomfort and bleeding, likely to be cancer or a canker sore? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. Ulcer on the skin just beside the top left inner teeths.

Hinglish_Question: The symptom jo niche di gayi hai woh mere dono pairon par hai. Haal hi mein maine apne right leg ke ek chot ke liye skin graft karvaya tha. Woh graft bahut acche se liya gaya aur ek mahine mein heal ho gaya. Lekin ab mujhe is leg par bohot dry bumpy, itchy, red rash ho gaya hai aur koi bhi skin cream ya lotion isse dur karne mein safal nahi ho rahi hai. Main blood thinner, Warfrin, bhi le rahi hoon. Kya iss rash ka karan yeh ho sakta hai? Summer aa rahe hai, isliye mujhe chinta hai ki garmi mein kya ho sakta hai, kyunki meri skin bahut sensitive hai. Uske liye attach ki hui image dekh sakte hain.
multimodal_Question_summ: Could the dry, bumpy, itchy, and red rash on the patient's leg, which doesn't respond to creams, be caused by Warfarin? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Sir, meri creatine level 3.5 hai aur knee pain hai aur right foot ke ankle par swelling bhi hai. Please jara foot par hua kuch dekhein. Main 61 saal ka hoon. Ofcourse, mujhe diabetes nahi hai. BP control mein hai. ECG bhi normal hai. Potassium aur uric acid control level mein hain. Main strict diet control follow kar raha hoon. Kabhi kabhi agar main kuch khata hoon jisme potassium jyada hota hai, toh tab mujhe right foot mein swelling feel hoti hai. Kripya mujhe koi gharelu dawa suggest kijiye. Meri weight 95 kgs hai. Hight 5.5 ft hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Could high creatinine levels and foot swelling be due to potassium-rich diet in a 61-year-old patient? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The foot has turned red and blue and swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor, main apne breast cancer ke treatment ka aakhri hissa pura kar rahi hoon. Lagbhag ek mahine pehle se mujhe hath aur haath mein sunpann aur jhanjhanahat hone lagi hai. Iski wajah se raat bhar mujhe uth jaati hai. Main haal hi mein ek grocery store mein kaam karna shuru kiya hai, jo ki bahut jyaada sharirik tanav wala hai. Isse meri peeth, gardan aur kandhe mein endless knots ho jaate hain. Aaj raat main apne gardan ke knots ko ragad rahi thi aur mujhe thoda sa chakkar aaya hai. Wo chala gaya, lekin abhi mujhe apne daaye haath ke teen unglio mein sunpann aur dard mehsoos ho raha hai. Mujhe yeh jaanna hai ki kya mujhe emergency room mein jaana chahiye. Mere oncologist do ghante doori par hai. Mai 48 saal ki ek mahila hoon. Mujhe do mahine pehle lumpectomy hui thi ek partial node biopsy ke saath.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should a 48-year-old female with a history of breast cancer and recent onset of numbness and pain in the fingers seek emergency care? The image shows the condition of hand lump. Bottom of the ring finger or the base area swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Mere paas ek dus saal ke potey hai, jinhe aaj subah unke peeth, bazu aur pair me daar hai, sath hi dono kohniyon aur dono ghutnon me bhi dard hai. Din bhar ki yatra me ye aur bura ho gaya hai aur aaj raat ko unka upper lip bhi suj gaya hai. Kripya doctor, affected area ki image dekh lijiye. Mujhe nahi pata ki kya ye sambandhit hai, lekin usko lag bhag 8 din pehle 6 bee stings mile the. Koi sujhav? Koi bukhar nahi hai, lekin bohot khujli hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Does the ten-year-old grandson's recent bee stings relate to the welts, swelling of the upper lip, joint pain, and itching? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Central portion of the upper lip is swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe aaj apne desk par baitha huaa tha aur jab maine apne hath apne gardan tak le gaye to maine mahsus kiya ki gardan ke right side mein ek sujan hai. Ye sujan peechhe ke kaan ke paas se shuru hokar gardan ke peeche aur taraf ki beech mein hai. Taazi nazar se darpan mein dekha to ye ek bahut badi sujan hai. Iska touch aur dikhae dena dono ekdum neck ke glands ke area mein kisi bade goli ki tarah hai. Iska image neeche attach hai. Dard ya sensetivenes nahi hai aur kyun ki mere baal lambey hai, ise usually dekhna mushkil hota hai jab tak main apne baal upar na karoon. Internet par thoda bahut search kiya hai aur mujhe sabse bura dar hai. Mere paas koi aur lakshan nahi hai. Main 50 saal ki aurat hoon jo kaafi tandurast hai. Kuch appetite loss ya koi aur cheez nahi hai, bus is baat ki pareshani hai ki iska pata chal gaya. Menapause ki alag alag taklifen jaise raat ko pasina aana aur garmi ki aa jana mujhe ho rahi hai. Ye goli kya ho sakti hai.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, mere pass ek halki asamanya cornea OD eye hai. Mujhe nine months pehle ek naye soft lens Flexlens Arc ke saath fit kiya gaya tha. Jab lens ko mere OD eye mein rakha gaya, toh yeh mera aankh bahut zyada jala diya. Woh suj gaya tha, dard ho raha tha aur aansu aa rahe the. Kripya doctor, neeche diye gaye aankh ko dekhein. Technician ne use dho diya, lekin main aankh nahi khol pa raha tha. Main ek ghante tak apne OD eye par ek ice pack rakh kar ghar ja sakta tha. Kya isse meri OD eye cornea ko aur nuksaan hua hai? Meri OD eye ki nazr ab zyada dhundhli hai. Mujhe kya karna chahiye?

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe pichle hafte 3 din tak sir me dard (front/middle) tha. Is Monday raat mujhe ankhon aur pindliyon mein horrible paani ka storage hua tha. Main siruth utha tha ek aur headache se, is baar head ke peeche ke left hisse me. Meri aankhon me swelling hai roz subah se, last week ke pehle din se shuru hui thi aur har subah se hai. Hinglish_Question: Main 35 saal ka mard hoon aur homosexual hoon. 15 saal ki umar mein mere cousin ne mujhe sexually abuse kiya tha aur iska karan mujhe unse kuch rash hui. Maine ise bahut samay tak ignore kiya aur kai fungal ointments try kiye rash se chutkara pane ke liye. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Jab bhi main aise ointments lagata hoon toh mujhe temporary relief milta hai. Ab problem bahut hi acute ho gayi hai aur kabhi-kabhi bahut uncomfortable feel hota hai. Hamari family mein sabhi log Malarone le rahe hain kyun ki hum malaria ke potential wale ek island par gaye the. Hum sabko alag alag types ke rashes ho gaye hain. Hinglish_Question: Kuch din pehle maine kabhi pehle itna zor se chillaaya tha & jab baad mein khaane mein thi tab mujhe left side ke neck/throat ke neeche dull pain hua.Doctor, kripya dekhein patient ki neck ki image is vartaman conditionfir se neeche hai.Iske baad 2 din tak jab bhi maine khana khaya toh mujhe wahi dull pain hua lekin uske alava vo pain nahi tha fir jab aaj shopping ke baad ghar aaya toh maine generally apne haath se neeche neck ko brush kiya aur vaha ek bada ganth mehsus kiya jaisa ki ek gold ball ka size hota hai. Jab maine mirror mein dekha toh vo clearly dikhai diya. Isliye maine baahar mummy ko bulaaya jo ki work ke liye ja rahe the, vo 5 baje doctors ke liye appointment book karwa diya tab tak vo ganth itni shrink ho gayi thi ki vo itna dikhai nahi di rahi thi, lekin aap usse definitely feel kar sakte the. Anyway doctor ne kaha ki most likely maine jab chillaaya tha toh gland crack/tear ho gayi thi jisse infection enter hone ke baad jab khaane mein bacteria ghus gaye the. Isliye unhone mujhe regular dose of antibiotics amoxicillin prescribe ki 250mg ki 1 dose 3 baar din mein, aur kal mujhe hospital jaakar blood sample lene ke liye jaana hoga. Personally maine jaisa mehsus kiya hai vo lump neeche ki taraf thoda sa move kar gaya hai.Is serious problem se mujhe chinta honi chahiye ya fir medical advice ke baad bhi? Mere current age 15 hai aur main male hoon aur mujhe kabhi bhi is tarah ka kuch nahi hua, aur mujhe itna jyada tension toh nahi hai lekin thoda concern hai ki kya ho sakta hai, kya koi mujhe bata sakta hai ki ye kya ho raha hai.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste, main 26 saal ka hoon aur mujhe bahut chinta hai. Mere sahi kaan ke piche, gardan aur janghon mein pichle 3 se 4 mahine se sujan hai. Mujhe pehle call girls se oral sex hua tha (jo ab main nahi karta), mostly protected par kuch baar unprotected tha. Ek baar to condom phat gaya tha, par maine turant nikal liya aur naya condom pehna tha, ye kuch 5 mahine pehle hua tha.Bhi mere lymph nodes suj gaye the, tabhi mujhe pink eye bhi ho gaya, aur ek ladki jisse main date kar raha tha, usko bhi pink eye ho gaya tha par usko thoda din baad hua, aur us samay hum mile nahi the. Mujhe HIV ka test lagbhag 3 aur ek aadha hafte pehle kiya gaya tha aur negative tha. Fir bhi mujhe HIV ke hone ka dar bahut hai, chahe doctors na kahe. Mujhe agle hafte apne right testicle mein hydracele ke liye surgery hai jo mujhe kai saal se hai aur dard hone laga hai. Aur main abhi kisi se dating shuru kiya hoon, jo mujhe bahut pasand hai. Hinglish_Question: Mujhe chehre par "rash" hai jo shuru mein ek lal pimple cluster ki tarah hota hai, jo ek clear substance release karta hai aur dheere dheere crust ho jata hai aur flake ho jata hai. Jab ye "heals" ho jata hai aur flake off hone lagta hai, tab ye fir se shuru ho jata hai. Yeh spots mere naak ki ridge par hai, mere muh ke paas aur mere naak ki bridge ke left side par. Mere naak ke ridge ke beech mein, mere eyebrows ke towards, mere left eye ke niche, skin ke neeche ek "ridge" ya "bump" hai, jo haddi ki tarah mehsoos hota hai. Yeh kaafi mahino se chal raha hai aur hydrocortisone creams work nahi karte, na hi antifungals ya polysporin. Mai often left side par headache hoti hai, jo uss spot se radiate hoti hai. Mere haathon mein aur shoulder blades mein numbeness aur dull ache hai. Mere gardan ke base par ek gaanth bhi hai. Mujhe bahut adhik endometriosis hai aur undiagnosed fibromyalgia bhi hai. Aapke paas iska koi idea hai ki ye kya ho sakta hai.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe 6 January 2014 se mere paon se chaati, peeth aur iske beech ki jagah par rash ho gaya hai. Mujhe knee surgery karaye thi aur main tabhi recovery room mein rash hone lagi aur yeh dheere dheere badhta gaya hai. Meri internist ne lymphoma ke liye biopsy kiya, jo negative aaya. Unhone mujhe allergist ke paas bheja, jahaan par skin tests nahi ho sakte kyunki meri peeth par koi aise area nahi tha jo rash se mukt tha. Tab unhone mujhe hospital lab mein bheja, jahan par 19 vials (goli) khoon draw ki gayi aur Mayo Clinic ko testing ke liye bheji gayi. Result abhi tak nahi mila hai. Main bilkul pareshan hoon, pani bhar raha hoon jaise pagal, pure din khujli ho rahi hai, neend nahi aa rahi hai. Main sirf ek khichdi hoon. Meri ASLE (lupus) ki history toh hai, lekin doctors kehte hain ki yeh usse koi se rishta nahi hai. Uski image neeche attach hai.

Hinglish_Question: Meri maa pichle 2 saal se hemodialysis par hai. Lagatar feature ye raha hai ki uski hemoglobin levels erythropoietin injections ke baad bhi 7 mg/dl se jyada nahi gayi hai. Usne 2011 mein oasis, penicillin aur aspirin ke against anaphylactic reactions dekhi hai; uske aspirin allergy ke baad se wo chronic leg aur foot ki shikayat me hai. Feb 2012 mein use chill aur fever hua aur sudden abdominal pain aur distension hui - shuru me peritonitis samjha gaya lekin baad me diagnosed hua as rectus sheath hematoma; last 3 weeks me use sudden pancytopenia hui hai aur platelets 0000 tak drop hui; use 2 units of blood transfuse ki gayi; hematocrit ka kuch reversal hua hai; heparin bandh kar diya gaya hai; use ek hematologist se milaya gaya hai aur bone marrow biopsy ho gayi hai; abhi test results ka wait kar rahi hai; last one week se use alternating fever, chills aur weakness hai (blood culture results ka wait kar rahi hai to check for post biopsy infection) aur excessive++ night sweats bhi hai, mostly dialysis ke baad. Mai ye soch rahi hoon uski sudden blood values ki kami ka reason kya ho sakta hai, leg ki persistent problem ka reason kya hai (not classical pitting; dialysis ke saath jyada change nahi hui hai; nephrologist allergic ya chronic hone ke baare me sure nahi hai) aur night sweats ka reason kya hai. Koi recommendation tests ya treatment hai? Dhanyavaad.
multimodal_Question_summ: Likely causes of sudden drop in blood values, persistent leg edema, and night sweats in patient on hemodialysis. Recommendations for tests and treatment. The image here shows a medical condition related to edema. The left hand is swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Mai 58 saal ke ek purush hoon, meri vajan 150 paund hai. Meri skin mein kuch problem hai jiski bahut jyada khujli hoti hai. Pehli baar unhe lagaa ki ye poison ivy hai, dusri baar dawa ke reaction ki wajah se hai. Mai cephalexin 500mg ko har 6 ghante mein le raha hoon 14 din ke liye. Keflex ka badla. Saath hi metronidazole 500mg ko har 8 ghante mein le raha hoon 14 din ke liye aur cetirizine HCL 10 mg har roz ek baar. Main ye dawaiyan 1 hafte se le raha hoon aur koi sudhar nahi hai. Saath hi Allergy relief tablets. PLEASE HELP.

Hinglish_Question:
English: My inner thigh was sensitive, I thought it was chafing as I had been wearing a pad from coughing and slight leaking. I thought it was a diaper rash sort of thing. Then I notice I had a few spots of ringworm on my thigh. My doctor gave me an ointment, kero something it is working (slowly) on the thigh but because of the area of the one that is sore, sitting all day it is very wet looking but if I don't put the ointment on the skin, it gets sort of hard and more chaffed. Please doctor see the current condition below. What can I do?

 Meri andar ki jangh sensitive thi, mujhe laga ki ye chafing hai kyun ki maine coughing aur slight leaking ke liye pad pehna tha. Mujhe laga ki ye diaper rash jaisi cheez hai. Fir maine dekha ki meri jangh par kuch spots of ringworm hai. Mere doctor ne mujhe ek ointment diya, kero naam ki cheez hai, ye kaam kar rahi hai (dheere-dheere) jangh par, lekin jo jagah sore hai, poore din baithne se bahut wet lagti hai, lekin agar main ointment nahi lagati, toh skin thodi hard ho jati hai aur aur chafed ho jati hai. Kripya doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Mujhe ab kya karna chahiye?

Hinglish_Question: Hi,Maine jab South Africa mein bada hota tha tab kabhi bhi allergy nahi hoti thi. Ab main United States mein June 2010 se au pair hoon. Maine kuch kapde bhi try kiye. Ghar jaate waqt hi mujhe pahli baar yaad aaya ki mujhe bimar feel ho rahi thi. Meri kaan jal rahi thi isliye maine apne earrings nikal liye. Fir us raat meri kaan, aankhein aur gardan mein khujli ho rahi thi. Mall mein perfume ke baad thodi dher sneezing hui thi par woh hi sneezing thi aur mere haatho par koi rash nahi hai. Agli din meri aankhein sawal ho gayi thi aur meri gardan par lal rash aur mere kaan ke piche sandy grainy bumps the.  Benedril se thoda swelling kam hai par 5 ghante baad woh vapas ho jati hai. Aur pills ki wajah se swelling kam ho gayi hai par meri aankhein bahut lal, wrinkly, puff looking hai. Iss saal maine park mein walk karne ke baad 3 ticks nikale hai. Last 7 dino mein koi anokha khana nahi tha bahar se kewal ek persimmon tha par maine pichle saal bhi khaya tha aur kuch nahi hua tha. Maine kal apne soap aur lotion change kiye par kuch bhi nahi badla. Kya ho sakta hai ki maine church mein koi Christmas treat khayi hai ya fir stores mein Christmas ki khushboo na lag gayi ho. Last year Christmas time par mere aankhein theek thi aur koi rash nahi thi. Kripya help kijiye, mujhe lagta hai ki main ek raat mein 22 se 40 saal ki ho gayi hun :(

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor,Mai CSW ke saath sex kiya tha. Mene do baar sex kiya, aur har baar mai ne do condoms pehne the, jo sex ke baad bhi surakshit dikhe par thoda sa samajh mein aaya ki condom thoda sa body side se aage aa gaya hai. Mene condom ko pani se bhara tha usko phenkne se pehle aur confirm kiya tha ki kahi se toot nahi thi kyun ki pani bahar nahi aaya. Wo mere kaan ke paas mujhe kati thi aur agle din wahi jagah pe kisi machchar ne mujhe kaata tha aur mujhe vaha pe sujan ho gayi thi kuch do din ke liye. Chinta ke karan, mai Bromhexine (balgam ke liye) syrup aur Ulgel-A (antacid) lena shuru kar diya. Aur is samay mai bhi vajan kam kar gaya tha. Mai later mai ek liver protection injection bhi liya tha. Bahut baad mai mai HIV Elisa test bhi karwaya (sex ke baad 12 hafte, sex ke 89 din ke baad), jisme negative result aaya. Kya Bromhexine, Ulgel ya liver protection injection Elisa test mei interfere kar sakte hai. Ya fir mai ye test ko conclusive maan sakta hu. Later, mujhe haath mai aur gardan mai dono jagah sujan hui. Gardan ke sujan do din mai theek ho gayi. Please dekhiye gardan pe kuch hua hai. Fir se mujhe haath mai sujan hui aur pair mai chota sa ganth aaya, jo kuch ghante mai gayab ho gaya. Mai teen dinon se aisi sujan ko frequently notice kar raha hu, par do ganth lal ho gayi hai.Earlier, mujhe jaldi se thand aur gale ki infection ho jati thi, pehle se hi kya ye pre-existing immunodeficiency ho sakti hai. Inn sab ke baad, kya mai conclude kar sakta hu ki HIV Elisa test (sex ke baad 12 hafte, sex ke 89 din ke baad) conclusive hai. Ya mujhe 6 mahine baad ek aur test karwana chahiye. Please help.

Uske face par lagbhag paanch hain, saare left cheek par. Kuch mahine pehle wo uske pith par the aur sirf pith par, phir gayab ho gaye aur ab face par firse dikhai de rahe hain. Uske ek twin sister bhi hai aur uske face par koi blotches nahi hain, isliye ye contagious nahi lag raha hai. Kripya madad kare. Dhanyavaad.-The image for that is attached below

Mere daayi kangan mein lymph node samay samay par suj jata hai lekin phir wapas normal ho jata hai. Hinglish_Question: HI, main 45 saal ki mahila hoon. Mujhe bahut mahino se haddiyo mein dard hota hai. Last July mein main GP ke paas gayi thi kyunki mere left hand mein tingling ho rahi thi jo karib 5 minutes tak rehti thi aur uss haath mein dard hota tha. ECG normal tha. Socha shayad muscular problem hai. Mera blood pressure low hai lekin woh normal se bhi zyada low tha, figures yaad nahi aa rahi, sorry. Uske baad se kabhi kabhi chakkar aane aur light headedness mehsoos hui hai, isliye laga ki blood pressure aur low ho gaya hai. Agla incident kuch mahine baad hua jab chest pain itna badh gaya ki main baithna pada aur karib 15 minutes tak bahut bechain mehsoos kiya. Lekin usually dard off and on hota hai. Kabhi kabhi saans lene mein takleef hoti hai aur chest mein esa lagta hai jaise koi peeth par betha ho. Kabhi kabhi heartbeat bhi irregular ho jata hai. January mein phir se GP ke paas gayi jab dard bahut badh gaya tha aur maine ek inch ke bade tissue ke piche breast ke taraf upar beech mein ek gadda mehsus kiya. Mammogram aur ultrasound mein kuch nahi dikha. Socha shayad mastitis hai. Last month chest pain thoda kam hua. Lekin gadda ab bhi wahi hai. Aur kuch points to mention hai. Meri maa SAH ki wajah se marr gayi thi. Meri beti ko do non-incidental heart murmurs diagnose kiye gaye hai. Aur mujhe morphine ka asar nahi hota hai, ye pain killer hone ke baad D and C aur deteched retina surgery mein pata chala. Shayad ye sabhi cheezein jude hue ho sakti hai ya fir nahi bhi.

Hinglish_Question: Mera pati Iraq mein deployed hai. Wahan usne pehle bed bugs kehte hue keede ke kaatne ka saamna kiya, phir use dusre keede (not sure air fleas, sand fleas) ka saamna karna pada, jo laal ubhar aayi aur bahut khujli hoti thi. Fir usne kuch cheez se apne gardan ke side mein ek dardakatish kaat lagaya, jiske baad 45 minutes tak dard huya aur sujan bhi aayi hai. Kripya doctor, neeche di gayi vartaman sthiti ko dekhein. Iske baad usko sujniya huyi lymph node mili, jise antibiotics se theek nahi ho paya. Doctor ne ek needle biopsy kiya par uske parinaam se wo khush nahi the. Fir usko lymph node hatakar biopsy ke liye bheja gaya hai. Hum ab parinaam ki pratiksha kar rahe hain. Phir ye sab incidents se obvious assumption hai lymphoma. Mera sawal ye hai ki kya in ghatnaon ki jehrile ansh se hi lymph node suj gaya hai aur antibiotics ke istemal ke baad bhi uska dard aur sujan theek nahi ho rahi hai. Mujhe ummeed hai ki ye hi vajah ho lymph node ke problem ki aur dusri wajah na ho. Usne to doctor ko bataya tha par fir bhi lymph node hata diya gaya. Shayad wo sirf surakshit taraf ja rahe the use hatakar.

Hinglish_Question: Mera beta 13 saal ka hai aur pichle 2 ya 3 saalon se lagatar wahi bimari ho rahi hai....sore throat and tonsils,achy legs, low grade fever aur hamesha vomiting up mucus karta hai. Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, mai ek 43 saal ki mahila hun aur mere khujli, lalima aur jalan wale rashes hai. Kripya doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Sab kuch mere right haath ke upar, eyebrow ke upar, naak ke upar, jabaan aur gaal ke area, right chest aur upper back pe suryakiran ke wajah se react karte hain aur ye din ba din badh raha hai. Mere blood works karwaye gaye hain, jinme lupus aur dusre cheezein negative hai, lekin mere hs-CRP level high hai. Mujhe sirf ek grandmother hai jinki conventional neurodermatitis ki history hai, aur mujhe bachpan mein asthma tha. Mujhe isliye chinta hai kyunki ek suryakiran exposed rash ko biopsied kiya gaya tha, jisme interface dermatitis with mucin dikhaya gaya tha aur ye lupus, tumid lupus, dermatomyositis, connective tissue ya collagen vascular disorder ka sanket kar raha tha, wala ki ko vasculitis nahi dikh raha hai. Mai chinta mein hun. Kya biopsy in bimariyon ke liye conclusive hai? Kya mujhe kisi bimari mein hai? Mujhe lagta hai ki ye rashes hormonal hai, lekin ye nahi jata aur PMS ke time aur alcohol consume karne se aur badh jata hai. Mere kulhe par lupus ya dusri kisi bimari ki family history nahi hai. Mujhe koi muscle issue nahi hai, lekin mere ungliyon par thoda lal rang hai. Mai kabhi-kabhi diverticulitis ke liye Cipro leti hun. Kisi bhi tarah ke steroids cream lagane se khujli toh thik ho jati hai, lekin phir aur bhi badh jati hai. Kripya madad karein.

Hinglish_Question: Good evening. Main ek 55 saal ki mahila hoon jiski regular menstral cycle hai. Mujhe March me car crash hua tha jismein severe whiplash hua, May me acute cholecystitis hone par IV antibiotics liye, June me laparoscopic cholecystectomy and ERCP hui, July me extreme shingles hone se das din hospitalized rehna pada, aur October se shingles ka ek aur episode shuru hua!! Mere thyroid badh gaye hain, ultrasound pending hai.... Mummy ki daadi late 1940s mein pernicious anemia se maut hui thi. Mujhe 17 saal ki umra mein thyroid aspirated hua aur 18 saal ki umra mein surgery hui. Mujhe 2007 mein ME diagnosed hua. Main ek vishvavidyalaya ke lecture hoon aur bahut khush hoon maa aur daadi hone ke naate. Main bahut thaki hui hoon, ab mujhe bahut strong sardi ho gayi hai. Right abdo mein dard abhi bhi hai, bahut pyaas lagti hai, ulti hoti hai, bhooke nahi lagte, dhundla dikhayi deta hai, suj gaye aankhein hai, suj gaye paon hain. Please dekhiye 'something happened on foot' neeche. Bahut kam stamina hai. Ab amitriptaline 10mg ko kam kar rahe hain jo severe post herpatic neuralgia ko deal karne ke liye prescribe kiya gaya tha aur ab solve ho gaya hai. Current drugs hai 20mg omeprazole, 5mg amitriptaline, mukhya bhojan se pehle mint oil aur zarurat padne par paracetamol, June ke baad daily koi ibuprofen nahi. Severe IBS post chole aur shingles hai, doctors ne gluten aur lactose free diet recommend ki hai jo aaram deta hai. Cholesterol 7.4 non fasting....Fasting test kiya ja raha hai. Main bahut bechain hoon meri zindagi mein wapas lautne ke liye... Bahut bimar lag rahi hoon. Dhanyavaad.

Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Ye sujan kuch samay antral mein throbs karti hai. Mere incision theek lag rahi hai. Mere bladder par bahut pressure hai (new). Aisa lagta hai jaise jab mein pregnant thi aur bachche ke sir ne janm canal mein neeche ja raha tha. Mujhe kabhi-kabhi peelonophritis ki tarah backache hai aur mere body mein garmi bhaag rahi hai, mere gardan ke piche paseena ho raha hai magar mere mathhe par thanda aur chipchipepan hai. Fir bhi thermometer pe koi high temperature nahi hai. Main itna uncomfortable hoon ki main sirf kuch ghante bahar jaane ke liye manage kar sakti hoon. Main normally ek workaholic hoon lekin nurse ke roop mein kaam karne ki sochne ki himmat nahi ho rahi hai. Mujhe is surgery se pehle 5 abdominal surgeries ho chuki hain. Hinglish_Question:
Mere pati ko kai mahino se kai lakshan hain aur woh doctor ki dekhrekh mein hain, par testing aur testing results bahut dhire aa rahe hain aur humein abhi tak koi diagnosis nahi mila hai. Isliye main soch rahi thi ki kya aap mujhe kuch salah de sakte hain. Unki umar 45 hai aur woh smoker hain, unka vajan 350 hai aur lambai 5 feet 11 inches hai. Unko high blood pressure hai jo dawai se control ho raha hai. Unhe sleep apnea hai, iske liye unke paas CPAP machine hai. Iske alawa, unhe saans lene mein takleef hai jo inhalers se control hai. 
Haal hi mein unko pairo ke neeche, ankhon ki taraf aur pairo mein kuch samasya ho rahi hai, iske liye unhe water pills diye gaye hain. Iska chitran neeche di gayi image mein hai. Unhe bahut kharash wali khansi hai aur raat mein seedha na so sakte hain. Woh bahut jaldi thak jaate hain aur apni daily hygiene routine ke dauran aaram karne ki zaroorat hoti hai. Pichle kuch mahino mein woh kaam karne ke liye asamarth ho gaye hain kyunki woh bahut jaldi thak jaate hain. Unko lung function test hua hai pichle hafte par unko bataya gaya hai ki unki follow-up appointment mid December tak nahi hogi. Main bahut chinta mein hoon aur jaanna chahti hoon ki kya mujhe kisi aur doctor ki salah leni chahiye ya bas abhi ke doctoro ka intezaar karna chahiye. Mujhe toh bas itna pata karna hai ki kya woh asal mein khatre mein hain.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe 1982 se Hepatitis C hai, Mujhe 2001 mein pata chala. 2006-2007 mein maine 12 mahine ka interferon aur ribiviran ka course kiya, jisse yeh theek nahi hua. Main ab 61 saal ki ho chuki hoon, mere pati ko cancer ki wajah se kho diya, kya yeh Hep C ka downfall ka shuruat hai, aur mujhe kis tarah ka pain relief milega. Hinglish_Question:
Mujhe mere right ring finger par bahut zyada khujli aur jalan wali ek gambhir rash hai. Ye kuch saalon se hamesha waise hi hai. Kabhi kabhi ye zyada bura hota hai aur kabhi thoda behtar, lekin abhi toh koi bhi cream kaam nahi kar rahi hai, chahe vo kitni bhi natural aur sensitive ho. Main  Elecon ointment ko bhi istemal kiya tha, jisse mujhe thodi der tak aram mila, lekin jaise hi main uska istemal band kar diya, symptoms wapas aa gaye aur ab ointment kuch bhi nahi kar raha hai. Ye rash bahut hi chip-chipowala aur fafle wala hai. Ye logon bariki hota hai aur kabhi kabhi iske upar chote-chote clear postules bhi hote hain. Ye bahut zyada khujlata hai aur jalata hai. Ye lagta hai jaise ki ye skin mere finger par rehne ke react kar rahi hai aur fail rahi hai aur hatne ki koshish kar rahi hai. Ye kisi bhi product se zyada bura nahi hota hai, kuch bhi iska asar nahi hota. Ye sirf ek finger par hai aur jab bhi ye dusre fingers ya mere badan ke kisi aur hisse se touch ho jata hai, doosre fingers ya koi bhi dusra hissa uska koi sign nahi deta hai. Ye mujhe pagal kar raha hai!!! Ye kya ho sakta hai. Main ek doctor ke paas gaya tha aur ek dermatologist ke paas bhi gaya, lekin dono ne mujhe creams diye, jinmein se kisi ne bhi kaam nahi kiya. 
The Hinglish passage has a proportion of Hindi and English words in the ratio of 2:1.

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor, Main 29 saal ka ek male hoon. Mujhe apne chehre par ek skin infection ho gaya hai. Yeh teen jagah mein hai. Ek right corner of forehead par, dusra right eye ke nichle hisse ke pass aur teesra right lip ke niche. Symptoms shuru huye thode itching aur redness se. Right lip ke niche kuch chote chote blisters pehle dikhe. Fir baad mein aur jyada tingling, itching, burning sensation aur crawling skin mehsoos hua. Main apne locality mein ek dermatologist ke paas gaya aur unhone mujhe ek hafte ke liye tablet Teczine aur Flucort cream prescribe ki. Fir meri doosri visit par unhone Zanclav aur Cortimax prescribe kiye. Aur mere latest visit par woh Alaspan aur Tendrone cream prescribe kiye. Main ek mahine baad unse phir se milne wala hoon. Abhi, saare symptoms gayab ho gaye hain aur dawai ke madad se thik ho gaye hain. Lekin, ek cheez hai ki mere paas bade scars bache huye hain, jiske wajah se mujhe chinta aur uneasiness ho rahi hai. Forehead aur lower lip ke scars toh ek tarah se cut incision jaise dikh rahe hain. Skin alag ho gayi hai. Eye ke niche wala sirf ek pinkish red scar hai. Mujhe scars ki wajah se chinta hai. Kya woh scars normal skin ban jayenge kyunki woh skins andar se alag ho gayi hain. Main apne scar ki picture bhej raha hoon. Kripya suitable advice aur suggestion dein ki iske bare mein kaise proceed karna chahiye. Mujhe apni normal skin chaahiye. Mere immunological investigation, hematology analysis aur liver function normal hai. Dhanyavaad.
multimodal_Question_summ: How to treat skin infection with itching, redness, blisters, tingling, burning sensation, and crawling, leaving scars on face? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe kal kisi cheez ne mere peeth par kat liya tha. Mujhe kuch der ke baad pata chala aur maine ouch! kaha. Lagbhag 15 minute baad, mere peeth par ek laal sa dana/baada ho gaya...iske alawa koi khujli nahi thi, bas lal tha. Mein ise bhul gaya aur phir aaj utha to mujhe sardi aur ulti hui, aur meri twacha par ek esaag hai jo mujhe suraj ki jalan jaisa dikhati hai aur meri twacha ko chhune par garam hoti hai. Kripya niche di gayi image dekhein jo affected area hai. Lalima meri upri jangho se lekar chehre tak hai. Koi saans lene ki problem nahi hai. Twacha ki sensitivity aur ulti ke alawa, mujhe kuch nahi hai. Bukhar nahi hai. Koi idea hai ki ye kya ho sakta hai. Benadryl kaam nahi kar raha hai...sirf suraj ki jalan ko thoda kam karta hai lekin lalima nahi gayab hoti.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor,Mera beta 4 saal 9 mahine ka hai. Wo ek healthy baccha hai normal weight ke saath (17 se 18 kg). Lekin, usko bhar bar muh mein kuch problem hoti hai. Ye bahut often hoti hai, jaise ki do mahine mein ek baar, mainly uske buccal mucosa and inner corner of the lip mein jo primary canine touch karta hai. Usko isse dard hota hai aur wo khana avoid kar deta hai. Main uske ulcers par Dentogel lagati hoon. Mera sawal ye hai ki is repeated ulcers ki wajah kya hai. Kya usko kisi vitamin ki kami hai. Shuru mein, mujhe laga ki ye traumatic ulcer ho sakta hai. Lekin ye do mahine mein ek baar repeat ho jaata hai. Kabhi kabhi wo teen ya chaar ulcers bhi leta hai. Mujhe bahut chinta ho rahi hai. Kripya suggest kijiye ki ye ulcers se bachne ke liye kya karna chahiye.

Hinglish_Question: Hindi: Ek hafte pehle maine apne kaam par apne shin par chot khayi. Ghar aate hi, chot ke jagah par ek muththi ki size ki sujan thi. Ismein bahut kam kalai hai, par kalai ke aas-pass 8 inch tak kalai hai. Doctor, kripya patient ki tasveer ko neeche dekhe.

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor, yeh meri 5 saal ki beti ke baare mein hai. Chaar din pehle usko jaldi se jaldi bukhaar aagaya tha. Bukhaar lagbhag 100 degree Fahrenheit tha. Kal uska bukhaar kam ho gaya hai aur ab usko bukhaar nahi hai. Usko cough, cold, etc. nahi tha. Lekin uski bhukh kam ho gayi thi aur uski left eye ke white area red ho gayi thi. Wo redness ab gayab ho gayi hai. Usne thoda sa nausea aur headache ka complaint kiya tha. Lekin kal sab kuch theek ho gaya aur uski tabiyat behtar ho gayi. Lekin, kal raat humne dekha ki uske chehre, maathe aur chaati ke area mein red bumps ho gaye hain. Kabhi kabhi khujli bhi hoti hai. Mai aapko uski image attach kar raha hoon. Ye bumps thode upar hai. Baaki wo ab theek lag rahi hai. Uski bhukh bhi badh gayi hai. Dusre din uske bukhaar ke din use chakkar aaye (thoda sa laar muh se bahar aayi) 5 se 10 second ke liye. Wo jaldi se jaldi recover kar gayi 1-2 minute mein. Ye subah ke samay mein hua jab usne uthkar khadi hui. Uski puri raat bukhaar moderately high tha. Uski image neeche attach ki gayi hai.

Hinglish_Question: Mai 26 saal ka ek ladka hu India se aur mujhe mere dono neeche ke haatho par ek 8 mahine ka street cat ke dwara buri tarah se k scratch kiya gaya tha, jise maine 4 mahine tak rakha tha. Kal mujhe usne mere gardan par ek aur choti si scratch kiya. Maine use foam vomiting aur diarrhoea ke liye treat karwaya tha phir wo theek ho gayi. Lekin maine use kabhi bhi vaccine nahi lagwayi thi jab tak kal nahi lagwayi. Fir maine use jaane diya. Kya mujhe rabies ho sakti hai? Koi last week mere jeebh mein halka sujan thi, meri baaye aankh bhi suj gayi thi, meri daaye aankh bhi sujne lagi thi. Kripya doctor, is vartaman condition ko dekhein. Maine tettinis ka injection lagwaya aur apne aankhon ko ek eye doctor ko dikhaya. Ab jeebh mein sujan gayab ho gayi hai. Aankhon mein sujan bhi kaafi kam ho gayi hai. Aaj maine rabies ke liye ek vaccination li hai. Bill ke saath di gayi jankari batati hai ki maine ek VAXIRAB ki matra li hai - ₹338.00 aur INJ.GIVING CHARGE ki matra - ₹5.00. Main rehne wale teen bache hue doses ko pura karne ka irada rakhta hoon jo mujhe 11, 14 aur 21 May ko hai. Kripya mujhse bataiye ki kya mai surakshit hoon. Kya yeh vaccination surakshit aur paryapt hai mujhke liye.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste! Main 23 saal ka hoon, 5 feet 1 inch ka height aur 65 kilogram ka wajan hai. Bs mujhe armpit mein ganthe ke baare mein poochna hai. Jab bhi main thakan mehsoos karta hoon, mujhe aksar right armpit (dominant hand) mein ganthe ho jati hai. Wo boil ki tarah dikhti hai aur usme se pus bhi nikalta hai. Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, mere scrotum aur groin area par khujli wale boils hai. Din mein bahut khujli hoti hai aur khujli ke wajah se rashes bhi ho gaye hai jo dard kar rahe hai. Jab main unhe todne ki koshish karta hoon, to khoon nikalne lagta hai. Kabhi kabhi raat mein bhi khujli hone lagti hai. Uska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai. Mere anus ke aaspass bhi ek similar khujli problem hai aur mujhe lagta hai ki wahan ki skin bahut dry hai. Pehle bhi mere ani ke aaspass aise boils hote the jo dheere dheere kam ho gaye, lekin kabhi kabhi mujhe ab bhi khujli hoti hai. Abhi mein Lulizol cream aur Diominic SR tablets use kar raha hoon, lekin mujhe chahiye tha relief, woh toh Candid B cream use kar raha tha se thoda behtar hai lekin desired relief nahi hai.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe apne private parts ke aas-pass jo anjaan prakar ki rash hai uske baare mein ek sawaal hai. Mere jangh ke crease ke paas 2 blister jaise dikhte hai. Maine unke saath jagah uthi thi aur mujhe yeh samajh nahi aa raha hai ki yeh kya hai. Maine iske baare mein research kiya aur yeh herpes bhi ho sakta hai. Lekin mujhe abhi thoda sa hi pata hai, unhone toh sirf mere skin rubbing ki wajah se blisters jaise dikhe. Maine unhe kal subah notice kiya tha aur aaj finally thoda sa kam ho gaye hai. Neeche jo image hai usko dekhe.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, mujhe scalp issues aur hair loss ke baare mein ek sawal hai. Main 17 saal ka hoon, kaafi dubla-patla hoon, aur mujhe celiac hai. Mere chehre par kuch time se dry skin thi. Kripya dekhein is vartaman condition ko. lekin koi nau mahine pehele hi, mujhe baalon ka jhadna shuru ho gaya, uncontrollable dandruff hone lagi, aur meri skin pahle se bhi zyada dry ho gayi. Mere individual hairs patle ho gaye (khaaskar jadon ke taraf), zyada dry ho gaye, aur meri poore sir par ek chote se jagah ke alawa sab jagah se consistent roop se baal girne lage. Fir atyant khujli hui aur meri scalp ek unpleasant musty smell wala oil produce karne lagi. Haal hi mein, mere sideburns aur temples mein aur baal girne lage hain, lekin meri scalp par overall hairloss abhi bhi hoti hai (mujhe abhi tak receding hairline nahi hui hai). Iske alawa dandruff ke saath meri scalp pe kuch ajeeb se chote yellow substances hain, jo dandruff ki tarah lagte toh hain, lekin bilkul uski tarah nahi. Gire hue baal ke roots ke taraf chote, yellow, oily clumps lagte hain aur mujhe kuch polyester-like thin spirally baal bhi mile hain. Acne bhi bahut bad raha hai (jab bhi main sugar, fruits aur grains avoid kar raha tha), aur ye often meri scalp tak fail jata hai. Meri dad ki taraf hair loss koi specific occurrence nahi hai. Meri maa ke papa ke sir pe abhi bhi full head of hair hai. Meri family mein sirf do log hai jinhone hairloss experience kiya hai, woh hai mere maa ke do bhai. Mere shower ka pani iron-rich wellwater hai aur often bad smell aata hai, jo mere chehre ki skin ko burning sensation deti hai (jab hum salt filter bhi use karte hain). Mere thyroid issues hain, lekin mujhe lagta hai ki woh mere hairloss ka itna severe karan nahi hai. Kya koi jaanta hai ki meri symptoms ka karan kya ho sakta hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Summary question: What could be the cause of a 17-year-old experiencing hair loss, dandruff, dry scalp, itchiness, oily scalp, and acne? The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_dryness. The skin of the upper eyelid has turn white and coming out.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe March 8 ko surgery hui thi aur abhi bhi right leg mein swelling hai. Knee ke andar aur mujhe lagbhag adha taaoo upar tak hai. Doctor, kripya niche diye gaye image ko dekhein. Is area mein hard lumps hai, bahut hi sensitive hai, woh liposuction ke wajah se hai. Halki si bhi chalne par swelling hoti hai, jiske karan mai apni knee ko bend karne mein asamarth hojati hu. Hinglish_Question: Namaste, is saal se mujhe achanak bahut badi health problems ho rahi hai. Kuch mahine pehle, mere ko mono ho gaya tha aur pata chala ki main penicillin se allergic hoon kyunki mujhe severe allergic reaction hua tha, jiske wajah se mujhe ER mein lekar jana pada. Ab ek mahine se zyada se zyada mere left foot mein roz hi sujan aa rahi hai. Please doctor, neeche diye gaye image dekhein jahaan pe affected area hai. Fir sujan ruk gayi hai lekin mere foot ke upar dard ho raha hai. Doctor ne US kiya hai, auto immune diseases ke liye lab work kiya hai, sodium intake bhi monitor kiya hai, lekin koi abnormality nahi nikli. Ab bhi mujhe hafte mein kuch dino tak dard hota hai. Ab ekdam se teen hafte se mujhe chronic canker sores ho rahe hai. Bar bar ek se zyada aur ek gaya ho jata hai, kabhi wahi jagah pe. Hinglish_Question: Namaste, Mera beta do saal ka hai, uske left eye Christmas se dikhne laga hai, hum urgent care aur regular doctor ke pass kai baar gaye hain aur wo infection bataya aur antibiotic drops diye hain, aur fir ye wapas aa gaya aur doctors ne kaha hai ki ye eye infection hai. Woh theek nahi ho raha hai, abhi bhi laal, eye par bahut kam discharge hai, aur is past month mein, uski aankh par do baar red sty aaya hai.Please doctor, niche diye gaye aankhon ko dekhein. Eye specialist use check nahi kar paaye kyunki wo bahut ro raha tha, lekin unhone kaha ki ye allergies ki wajah se ho sakta hai aur ye sty aapne aap chala jayega, jo ho gaya. Lekin laalapan thik nahi ho raha hai aur aankh dusre se chhoti dikhti hai. Aap kripaya bata sakte hain ki iski wajah kya ho sakti hai. Dhanyavaad.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing a persistent red and swollen eye in a two-year-old, along with recurring eye infections and styes? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Eye lid entirely swollen and pink in color with tear dripping of the eye.

Hinglish_Question: Mere skin me kuch samasya hai jo blackheads ya eruptions ki line ke roop me hui thi, black spores ke saath breast ke neeche ban gayi thi, jiska asal rup red inflammed patches over trunk of body ban gaya, jo aate jaate the, bahut itchy the, kuch mahino ke baad hives ban gaye jo regular antihistamines se theek nahi hue. Hinglish_Question:
Hindi: Namaste doctor, main 60 saal ka hoon, vajan 44 kg hai, height 5.6 hai, pichle 25 saal se diabetes hai, 80 din se low carbohydrate diet par hoon, ab diabetes ke liye koi dawa nahi le raha hoon. Sugar levels control me hai, har din check kar raha hoon. Pichle 50 din se problem hai ki raat ko pair aur pindliyo me sujan hoti hai, jo subah gayab ho jati hai aur raat ko wapas aati hai. Dard ya weight loss nahi hai. Kidney function test, liver function test, 2D echo, thyroid test, HbA1C, lipid profile, stool examination, B12 tests karaye gaye. Local doctor se mila, aur unhone bola ki yeh nutritional pedal ya malabsorption ho sakta hai. Neeche di gayi dawayein prescribe ki gayi hai. Oroalbumen powder 30 din tak teen baar. Revidox LB din mein do baar paanch din ke liye. Lasilactone 25 mg subah ek baar teen din tak. Upar se Thyronorm 25 mcg, Vitamin C, multivitamin tablet, Omega 3 fish oil, Ecosprin 75 bhi le raha hoon. Teen din ho gaye hai, kuch jyada improvement nahi dikha. Vitamin B12 ka level 1271 tha. Mere sawal hai ki Vitamin B12 kyun jyada hai. Kya yeh small intestine bacterial overgrowth ho sakti hai. Mere paas proteins aur healthy khana bahut hai, par koi fayda nahi ho raha. Kya aap madad kar sakte hai ki khana digest ho sake. Neeche uska image attach hai . 
English: Hello doctor, I am 60 years old, my weight is 44 kg, height is 5.6 feet, I have had diabetes for the past 25 years. I have been on a low carbohydrate diet for 80 days and I am not currently taking any medication for diabetes. My sugar levels are under control and I check them every day. The problem I have been facing for the past 50 days is swelling in my feet and ankles that disappears in the morning but comes back by night. I do not experience any pain or weight loss. I have undergone kidney function tests, liver function tests, 2D echo, thyroid tests, HbA1C, lipid profile, stool examination, and B12 tests. I consulted a local doctor who said it could be nutritional pedal or malabsorption. He prescribed the following medications: Oroalbumen powder three times a day for 30 days, Revidox LB twice a day for five days, and Lasilactone 25 mg once in the morning for three days. In addition to these, I am also taking Thyronorm 25 mcg, Vitamin C, multivitamin tablet, Omega 3 fish oil, and Ecosprin 75. It has been three days and I haven't seen much improvement. My Vitamin B12 levels were found to be high at 1271. I have a few questions: why is my Vitamin B12 level high? Could this be due to small intestine bacterial overgrowth? I am consuming a lot of protein and healthy food, but it doesn't seem to be helping. Could you please help me in getting the food absorbed? The image related to this is attached below.
multimodal_Question_summ: Why is the patient experiencing feet and ankle swelling, and why is their Vitamin B12 level high? The image here shows the condition of foot swelling

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe last two months se Mouth ulcer hai. Kuch doctors ke pas gaya hu aur wo mujhe regular vitamin tablets aur vitcofol injection de rahe hain. Maine unko bataya hai ki ye meri chewing tobacco ki wajah se hai. Ab mere dono taraf ke inner tongue mein burning sensation hai. Ye ek hafte ke liye thik ho jata hai phir fir se ho jata hai. Please dekhein doctor affected area ki image ko.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the patient's persistent mouth ulcer and burning sensation on both sides of the inner tongue related to their chewing tobacco use? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. Circular slightly white ulcer on the tip of the tongue. Redness and little swelling around.

Hinglish_Question: Mere 10 saal ke bete ko pichle hafte bukhar tha. Jab tylenol se bukhar control nahi ho raha tha, to use hospital le gaye aur use ibuprofen 400mg(36.6kg body weight) 6 ghante me diya gaya. Agli hi din pata chala ki uske hont suj gaye aur laal ho gaye hain aur wahaan par pus bhi hai. Kripya niche diye gaye photo me us affected area ko dekhein dactor. Use punah hospital le gaye gaye hain aur ab wo Apo-acyclovir 200mg, 6 ghante me le raha hai. Medicine start karne ke dusre din hai. Usko saans lene me bhi taklif ho rahi hai. Dental disease ka karan kya hona chahiye. Uske daant ya masudon se pahle koi problem nahi thi. Mujhe is baat se chinta hai. Ye kyun hua. Is samay daant aur masudon ki dekhbaal kaise karen. Kripya salah dein.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the reason for lip swelling, pus formation, difficulty breathing, and dental disease in a 10-year-old boy? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The neck below the ear are swollen excessively.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste, mera naam Andrew hai. Mein 18 saal ka hoon aur haal hi mein meine apni kandhe par ek daane dekha hai jo mujhse lipat kar mere kangan ke paas hai. Yah mere bust ke shuruaat ke paas hai aur yah laal rang ka hai aur cigarette jalne jaisa dikhta hai. Mein ne dhir se sukh gayi tavcha ke tukde bhi dekhe hai jo dard nahi karte aur bahut upjola hai jaise pehle daane ke saath samantulit hai. Yah laal nahi hai ya bujha hua. Mere saari zindagi mein sukh gayi tavcha rehti hai kyunki yaha sucha hui climate hai (Las Vegas). Mujhe dar hai ki yah kuch bura ho sakta hai. Mein ne August mein khoon aur peshaab ka test karaya tha aur mujhe bataya gaya ki mein poori tarah swasth hoon. Mein sambhogik roop se sakriya hoon, lekin kuch hafte se sex nahi hua hai aur kuch samay ke liye sex se door rahne ka plan hai. Fir bhi, ye haal hi mein dikhai diye hai. Mujhe nahi pata ki yah gandagi, pasina, allegies ya HIV ki wajah se hai, lekin mujhe madad ki jarurat hai kyunki mujhe bahut dar lag raha hai. Mujhe lagta hai ki yah HIV nahi hai kyunki mujhe rash ke alawa iska koi anya symptom nahi hai. Aur maine ek blog par padha ki ek mahila ne yahi cheez batayi hai jo maine varnan ki hai aur usne kaha ki usko gehu se allegic hai. To agar aap meri madad kar sakte ho to bahut hi aabhari rahunga. Dhanyavad. Yah hai uske image.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of the red, burn-like rash near the armpit area and symmetrical dry skin patches? The image shows the condition of skin rash.

Hinglish_Question: Mera ek saal ka pota hai aur uske left thigh me ek ganth hai aur wo apna left knee bend nahi karta. Please doctor, dekhiye ye vartaman condition ko. Usko lagbhag 3 hafto pehle ek Rocephin shot laga tha. Maine use Urgent Care le gaya tha aur unhone x-rays li thi aur kaha ki shayad uski contusion ho sakti hai. Lekin ab tak koi sudhar nahi hua hai aur koi contusion ke koi sign nahi hai.

Hinglish_Question: Meri upper back ke daanto ke peeche dono taraf laal, suj gaya aur dard kar raha hai, jaise ki ulcers hain. Kripya dekhein affected area doctor ke image ko neeche. Ye TMJ mein jaata hai aur meri muh kholne par tightness mehsoos hoti hai. Meri gaal par ek dime size ka open area hai. Kya karu samajh nahi aa raha hai. Lagbhag ek mahine pehle ye itna bura nahi tha aur mujhe Z pack prescribe kiya gaya tha jisne thoda sa madad kiya tha, lekin ab dono taraf wapas aa gaya hai aur ab mere kaan, gardan aur sir mein pressure bahut zyada hai. Koi raay ho toh bataiye.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of red, swollen, and painful ulcers behind the upper back teeth that radiate to the ears, neck, and head? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. Ulcer on the skin just beside the top left inner teeths.

Hinglish_Question: Hi! Mujhe tear ducts ke pass ek chota cystic lump hai. Kripya patient ki aankhon ki image dekhlein neeche. Ye 8 mahine se hai. Ye kaafi hard hai aur kabhi kabhi khujli hoti hai (koi dard, koi laalima nahi hai) lekin mujhe isse kaafi pareshani nahi hoti hai. Lekin aaj mujhe jaise hi khujli hone lagi, mujhe uspar apna ungli ragadne ki ichha hui. Fir mere skin ke upar jo lump tha, woh kisi jagah drain hua jisse woh puri tarah gayab ho gaya. Ajeeb baat ye hai ki turant mujhe kuch foul smell aayi jab cyst gayab hui. Wahan kahi bhi jahan woh pehle hota tha, skin par koi drain nahi tha. Isliye maine turant apni aankh ko dhoya aur apna chehra sabun kiya, bas aise hi, agar ye mere tear ducts ke andar se leak ho raha hai, toh shayad ye meri aankh tak fail jaye. Main online symptoms search karne ki koshish ki lekin mujhe kuch bhi mila nahi jo mere saath abhi hua hai. Mujhe umeed hai ki aap mujhe bata sakte hain ki ye kya ho sakta hai taki mujhe pata chale ki kis specialist ke paas jana chahiye. Bahut bahut dhanyawad!
multimodal_Question_summ: Patient had a cystic lump near tear ducts that disappeared after itching, accompanied by a foul smell. The image shows the condition of eye inflamation. Mildly red colored lines on both sides. Part near nose is red.

Hinglish_Question: Upar ke hoth pe pale and white spots hai aur upar ke hoth numb and tingly feel kar rahe hain. Mujhe kuch red swollen patches huye hain with lots of burning on the upar ke hoth, ye stages se guzarte hain jaise burning, swelling, peeling, painful and then clears up for a little while and then starts over again.Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Ye March se chal raha hai is saal se. Ek dermatologist kehta hai ki ye shingles hai, dusra kehta hai ki nahi aur unhe pata nahi ki ye kya hai. Maine area ko freeze kiya tha but still is going through all of this same stuff.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the cause of pale, white, and numb upper lip with red swollen patches, burning sensation, peeling, and persistent symptoms since March? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Central upper buldge swollen with redness and shiny appearance.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe do weeks pehle neeche ki taraf kaanpne wale hisse ko bahut zor se mara tha, bahut dard tha, haalaki maine ibuprofen liya, usko thanda kiya, aur use elevated rakha. Iss samay swelling gayab ho gayi hai aur dard bhi kam ho gaya hai jab tak main usko touch ya bump na karoon. Doctor, kripya neeche di gayi image ko dekhein. Lekin abhi mujhe notice hua hai ki mere jhoolte hue panje ke upar ek bada aur sakht gaanth hai. Kya iss gaanth se mujhe chinta honi chahiye ya woh waqt ke saath saath theek ho jayegi jab gehri shaan ko heal kar rahe hain.

Hinglish_Question: Mere leggs ke neeche bahut hi bura skin condition hai. Main yard ke project ke saath side porch par kaam kar raha tha. Iska image niche attach kiya gaya hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing a worsening skin condition on the legs, initially thought to be a reaction to medication and sunlight exposure? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, mujhe ek dusri ray dekhne ki zaroorat hai grade 3 sprained ankle ke surgical options ke liye. Mai yaha MRI ke results attach kar raha hu. Results mein dikh raha hai ki anterior tibiofibular ligament rupture hua hai aur posterior tibiofibular ligament me partial tear hai saath hi distal tibiofibular syndesmosis disruption hai jiske sath adjacent muscles mein mild injury hai, jiska ho sakta hai distal tibiofibular syndesmotic injury. Ye bhi show karte hai ki posterior talofibular, calcaneofibular aur deltoid ligaments sprain hai. Distal fibula mein mild marrow hai. Tibialis posterior, flexor digitorum longus, flexor hallucis longus mein tenosynovitis hai. Iske liye image neeche attach ki gayi hai. Tibiotalar joint mein thoda sa fluid hai. Ankle ke aas paas subcutaneous hai. Kripaya apna ray dijiye.
multimodal_Question_summ: What surgical options are recommended for a grade 3 sprained ankle with multiple ligament tears, tenosynovitis, and edema? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The ankle of the foot is swollen with brown discolouration.

Hinglish_Question: Mera 13 saal ka beta ek hafta se itching feel kar raha hai aur hives style rash bhi hai. Usko pyrexias fri night 39.4 and aj 38.4 hote hain. Use ulti lag rahi hai aur sar dard bhi ho raha hai. Iske image neeche attach kiya gaya hai. Wo chakkar khakkar bhi shikayat kar raha hai aur pet me dard bhi hai. Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, mere paon par ek kutte ne scratch kiya tha. Uska image neeche attached hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Why is there pain and swelling on the upper arm after receiving a tetanus injection for a dog scratch? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The ankle of the foot is swollen with brown discolouration.

Hinglish_Question: Mere ma ka umar 82 saal hai, 20 saal se diabetes hai aur wo humasulin 30/70 mixtard par hai- approx 20 unit daily + usko tripple artery bypass ho chuki hai to usko heart condition hai with erythemia + haal hi mein use wysolone & pentasa ka course diya gaya hai crohns disease ke liye. Ye do mahine pehle tha---abhi wo swelling, insomnia, stiff neck & shoulder, shortness of breath aur extreme fatigue ki shikayat karrahi hai. Kya Myoril 4 mg recommend kiya ja sakta hai uske conditions mein (with erythemia, shortness of breathness & HYPOTENSION).Please dekhiye doctor,affected area ki image neeche.

The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The part of the neck near shoulder is swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste, main 21 saal ka hoon aur pichle 2 saalon se meri wisdom teeth slowly aa rahi hai. Neeche ke 2 daant almost fully bahar aaye hai lekin unke upar ek skin ka flap hai. Ismein dard nahi hai aur mujhe pata hai ki apne muh ko saaf rakhna kitna zaroori hai taki khana skin ke neeche fas na jaye. Isliye bottom 2 ke saath koi dard ya takleef nahi hai. Upar ke 2 daant bhi partially bahar hai lekin poori tarah nahi. Is process mein meri overbite zyada dikhne lagi hai aur aaj jab mere upper right wisdom tooth main dard hua, main apne muh mein zubaan se mehsoos kar raha tha aur mujhe ek hard bone jaisi gaanth mehsoos hui, jo roof of my mouth ke right side ke paas hai, wisdom tooth ke bilkul paas nahi. Ismein dard nahi hai aur main yeh samajh nahi pa raha hoon ki yeh koi naya cheez hai ya main pehle se iska pata nahi tha. Kya yeh sirf bone overgrowth hai ya yeh wisdom teeth se kuch lena dena hai? Aapke samay aur madad ke liye dhanyavad. Kripya dekhein affected area doctor ke neeche ki image.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a visible overbite and a bone-like bump on the roof of the mouth near wisdom teeth? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. Circular patch of white ulcer at the inner side of the upper lips. Located towards the right side.

Hinglish_Question: Mai Thailand mein rehta hu. Mere paas hepatitis B virus hai aur mai Peginterferon alfa injection se treatment le raha hu. Pehle hafte mai koi rash nahi tha lekin dusre hafte mai meri skin mai kuch problem ho rahi hai.Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko jahaan groin par redness hai, aur yahaan dusri jagah nahi hai. Ye rash urticaria nahi hai. Mujhe ye jaanna hai ki ye rash allergy hai ya dawa ke side effect hai, kyunki is dawa ke side effect mai ye rash hota hai. Bahut dhanyavaad.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the skin rash at the groin an allergy or a side effect of Peginterferon alfa injection for hepatitis B? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Few mosquito bite like looking swelled spots.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe 3-4 hafto pehle amoxicillin ke khaane ke baad poore sharir mein rash ho gaya tha, rash kuch dinon baad gayab ho gayi thi lekin phir mujhe inflamed tonsils ki problem hui. Mujhe lagta hai ki mujhe glandular fever ho sakti hai lekin ab meri jyadatar symptoms gayab ho gayi hain isliye ye ab zyada problem nahi hai. Haalanki, haal hi mein jab bhi main stress mein hota hoon ya garm mahaul mein hota hoon, main apne kandho, gardan aur chhati par lal lal daagdar twacha dekhunga. Ye mere saath pehle kabhi nahi hua hai. Uski tasveer neeche hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is causing a full body rash, inflamed tonsils, and red blotchy skin in response to stress and heat? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Thank you. Mujhe zpack aur predestine diya gaya hai aur ye kaafi had tak behtar ho gaya hai. Mein lupus ke baare mein padh rahi thi aur bahut pareshan hoon, kya ye kuch aur ho sakta hai. multimodal_Question_summ: Is the patient's swollen eye, nose, and cheek accompanied by a sunburn-like rash a sign of lupus or another condition? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mere pait mein ek gaanth hai jo lagbhag 1 inch lambi hai. Ye meri nabhi ke right side mein hai. Ye lagbhag do saal se hai aur kabhi-kabhi iske aas paas khoobsurat dikhta hai. Ye bean shape ki hai, hil sakti hai aur dard nahi hai. Ek doctor ne mujhe bataya tha ki ye kisi tarah ki scare tissue hai. Mere left upper thigh mein bhi ek gaanth mili hai, dard nahi karti hai, lekin kabhi-kabhi meri taang jyada baithne par dard karti hai. Ab mujhe lagbhag ek hafte pahle hi notice hua hai ki mere gale ke ek taraf bhi ek aisi hi gaanth hai. Doctor, kripya patient ki photo dekhiye, gale mein kuch samasya hai. Mujhe hamesha se ek palpable aur pulsating gaanth hai meri upper neck mein jo aati jaati hai, lekin ye uske neeche hai. Kabhi-kabhi mujhe lagta hai ki nigalna mushkil ho raha hai, kaan full ho raha hai aur chehre ki uss taraf sunn ho rahi hai. Aur last kuch hafton se kabhi-kabhi meri drishti dhundhli ho jati hai aur mujhe lagta hai ki main behosh hone wali hoon. Mujhe lagbhag do saal pehle ankylosing spondylitis ka diagnosis hua tha. Pichle saal mujhe karib 30 kilo vajan badh gaya hai aur ise kam nahi kar pa rahi hoon. Mujhe kabhi bhi vajan ki samasya nahi thi. Main 40 saal ki ek mahila hoon.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe jab chehre par laal chaktey aatey they to mane dermatologist se salah li,unhone mujhe hhzole proscribed ki thi.. sab kuch chala  gaya jab tak main iska istemal karti rahi, lekin jab maine use karna band kiya, wo fir se vapas aagaye.. to maine lagatar 2 saal tak iska istemal kiya phir mujhe samaj aya ki ye galat hai isliye maine band kar diya. Ab se jyada se jyada 1 saal ho gaya hai. Ab firse mujhe bade acne ke sath wo chaktey aane lag gaye hain. Main pareshan hoon ki meri skin kharab ho ja rahi hai. Kripya madad kare. Hinglish_Question: Mujhe abhi itchy aur reddish spots face par ho rahe hain. Last 4 nights se. Maine katiales apne chehre par lagaaya kyunki maine suna tha ki ye pimples ke liye effective hai. Fir, subah uthkar bahut hi disappointed hua aur dekha ki affected area reddish aur itchy ho gaya hai. Lagta hai mujhe katiales ke istemaal se allergic reaction ho gaya hai, abhi 4 din ho gaye hai aur abhi bhi itching aur reddish hai. Reddish spots bahut hi noticeable hai aur mujhe bahar jaane se sharam aati hai. Kripya ismein meri madad karein. Mujhe kya karna chahiye jisse ye jaldi kam ho jaye aur meri skin normal ho jaye, mujhe iske liye kya istemaal kar sakta hoon treatment ke liye. Is baare mein mujhe bahut chinta hai. multimodal_Question_summ: Is the red blotchy rash on the patient's arms, neck, and stomach related to their body fighting an illness or autoimmune response? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Hi mujhe mere haath ke skin mein kuch problem hai, sabhi spots bahut dry hai. Jab main inhe scratch karta hoon to spots color wale ho jate hain aur blood nikalta hai. Ab to spots saaf hai lekin abhi bhi raised hai, color nahi hai aur dry hai. Mujhe laga ki ye kisi allergy ki wajah se hua hai isliye maine anti hisamines liye hain lekin ab bhi ye irritating hai.
