Hinglish_Question: Mujhe mild lymph ke liye sleeve pehenta hai. Mujhe abhi upar ke haath par garam laal daane hai aur neeche ke andar ke haath par spotting blotches hai. Ye daane ubhra nahi hai. Mujhe isse pehle hui rashes ki yaad aati hai, jab main thodi der tak chalta rehta ya golf cart par ghoomta rehta. Jab main chalta, mujhe pairon ke andar wale hisse par hota tha aur mujhe khujli karni padti thi. Cart par, mujhe peeche bhi wahi hota tha. Ab aur us waqt ke beech ka difference ye hai ki, us waqt mujhe rash hone ke saath hi pet mein bhi bimar hone lagta tha. Aam taur par woh kuch minutes mein hi gayab ho jata tha. Chuttiyon ke dauran maine pure din sleeve nahi pehni hai. Mere upar ke haath par ek bada solid daag hai. Iski image neeche attached hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing a warm red rash, spotting blotches, and a solid blotch on the upper arm with sleeve wear? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe lagbhag 5 saal pehle apne haath par plastic surgery karvai thi. (Maine apni tendon ko kaat diya tha) Mainne sare follow ups kar liye aur 8 hafte p.t. bhi karvaaye. Hinglish_Question: Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Hinglish_Question: Hey, mere husband ke honth par ek pus se bhara hua chala tha jise unhonne toot diya. Uska buhat bura bau aa raha tha aur uske munh se durgandh aa rahi thi. Hinglish_Question: Mujhe malaria ka diagnosis hua tha aur mujhe 4-5 din tak maxlumforte medication prescribe kiya gaya tha pehle physician ne. Please doctor, neeche aankho ki stithi dekhein. Doctor ne mujhe Cefiget 400mg/do bar daily prescribe kiya malaria par continueing maxlumforte ke saath. Mai teesre physician se consultation kiya kyunki mujhe pehle dono doctors ki attention meri problem par satisfied nahi thi. Teesre doctor ne malaria aur dengue ka retesting manga, dono negative the. Isliye maxlum forte band kiya. Par test mein pata chala ki platelets count 140 aur sgpt 97 hai. Unhone turant cravit 250 mg/do bar daily ki nayi prescription di. Doosre test mein platelets normal range mein 160 the, par sgpt 124 aur sgot 45 high thi, bilirubin normal tha, lekin gama gt 66IU (normal range) tha. Mera Hav Igm negative aur HBs Ag negative hai, lekin mujhe chinta hai ki sgpt chaar din ke kam se kam mei se 97 se 124 kaise badh gaya. Kripya salah dein ki kya karan ho sakta hai, isse pehle mujhe gastro allergy bhi thi kyunki maine 10 saal ke baad 6 shots alcohol pi liye. Mujhe 29 saal ki umra hai aur mai sirf 2-3 cigarette roz peeti hoon.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, Main ek saal se apne area ke ek rheumatologist se milne ka wait kar raha hoon. Main 39 saal ka hoon aur ek saal aur adha pehle main apni zindagi ke sabse fit phase mein tha, 10% body fat tha, 4 se 5 din workout karta tha. Mere paas apni company hai aur main daily computer par kaam karta hoon, aur mera hobbies hai computer ke saath ghumna, guns banane aur apne haathon se fine motor skills require karne wale bahut saare kaam karna. Par kuch samay se mujhe wo ability kuch kam ho gayi hai, mujhe thumb aur index finger ke roughly mehsoos karne ka sense loss ho gaya hai. Meri thumbs dono joint me swollen hai, meri saari knuckles red aur warm ho jaati hai, kuch bhi lena mujhe aaram nahi deta hai (haan, maine ab tak koi rheumatoid medication nahi li).Main bahut depressed ho gaya hoon, frustrated ho gaya hoon aur bas apne symptoms ko ease karne aur normal life me wapas jaane ki koi madad chahata hoon.Meri knees aur ankles kabhi kabhi mushkil create karti hai, aur mere toes bhi hands ki tarah swell ho jaate hain.Kripya dekhein foot me kya hua hai. Mere aankhon ko frequently dryness ka ehsaas hota hai. Mujhe ek recommendation chahiye ki agar kabhi main apne local rheumatologist se mil paata hoon to use kya batana chahiye. Mere paas ek general practitioner hai jo mujhe specialist se milne se pehle treatments ke baare mein advise karne ki koshish kar rahi hai, par woh apne realm se bahar hai. Koi bhi salaah bahut swagat hogi kyun ki mujhe bas yeh samajh nahi aa raha ki ek saal aur adhe mein sab kaise badal gaya hai. Maine bahut saari over-the-counter medicines li hain, par kuch kaam nahi karti. Bas mujhe kuch inflammation ko shant karne ka madad kuch mil jaye taki main phir se normal ho sakun.

Hinglish_Question:
Hello. Mera naam hai XYZ. Main ek avid blood donor hoon lekin is baar, donation ke kuch din baad aur bandaid ko timely fashion mein remove karne ke baad, mujhe ek rash ho gaya hai. Wo khujli karti hai aur shuruwat mein chote chote dane the, ab wo thoda pink aur irritated hai. Kya mujhe blood bank se contact karna chahiye ya ye sirf bandaid ki random reaction ho sakti hai? Ye thoda ajeeb lag raha hai kyunki maine pehle bhi bahut baar donate kiya hai aur aisa kabhi nahi hua hai. Aapki raay ke liye shukriya. Uski image attached hai neeche.

Please note that the Hinglish translation is provided based on the given language proportion ratio of 2:1. However, it is important to consider the readability and coherence of the mixed language passage.

Hinglish_Question: Hi main apne haath aur baaon par lagbhag 4 saal se Betnovate 1/5 cream use kar rahi hoon ek eczema/psoriasis type rash ke ilaj ke liye. Mereko abhi haal hi mein dikkat ho rahi hai ki uss jagah ki pigmentation hat gayi hai aur mujhe ab safed daag dikh rahe hai. Mainne cream lagana band kar diya hai aur dikkat toh thodi kam hui hai lekin puri tarah se gayi nahi. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko neeche. Kya pigmentation dobara hoga ya yeh damage permanent hai. Main 35 saal ki ek swasth mahila hoon. Aapki madad ke liye dhanyavaad.
multimodal_Question_summ: Can the pigment regenerate or is the damage permanent in a 35-year-old female with white patches after using Betnovate cream for eczema/psoriasis? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste, mere paas ek 9 saal ke bete hain jinki paon ke nichle hisse pe October 9 ko charbiyaan nazar aayi. Agle subah, unhe high fever aur sore throat ho gaya tha. Yeh toh ek Sunday tha, isliye humne unke lakshan ka ilaaj kiya aur unhe doctor ke paas Monday, 11th ko le gaye. Unka strep throat ka test positive aaya aur humare pediatrican ne kaha ki charbiyaan unke strep ke karan hain. Unhone unhe amoxicillin likha (jo unhone pehle bhi kai baar liya hai). Agli subah, unhe chhati ka neeche ka honth suj gaya.Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko neeche (bahut bada tha!). Humne use emergency room le gaye, unhone use epi shot diya, ek dose benedryl diya aur antibiotic penecillin se Keflex par badal diya, keh kar ki usko penecillin ki allergy ho gayi hai. Sujan doosre din subah gayab ho gayi, lekin ussi dopahar, woh fir se sujne laga. Humne phir se pediatrician ko phone kiya. Unhone ER ke doctor ki diagnosis se sehmati jatayi aur unhe sirf ek steroid diya aur benedryl dene ko kaha. Woh theek ho gaya. Monday subah (Nov 1st), woh fir se utha hua honth ke saath utha! Main use benedryl diya aur  Tuesday ki dopahar tak uska honth theek ho gaya. Woh kal se school jane laga, aur jab hum use school se lene gaye, uska honth fir se sujne laga! Mujhe pagal hona wala hai! Kya aap meri madad kar sakte hain.
multimodal_Question_summ: Summary: 9-year-old with hives on bottom of feet, high fever, sore throat, swollen lip (recurring). Allergic reaction or underlying condition? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Swelling on the lower lip's left side. The swollen part is red.

Hinglish_Question: Mere jijaji ko 10 saal pehle dono taraf inguinal hernia surgery hui thi. Pichle kuch saalo se usse har 3-4 mahine me severe groin pain hoti hai, jo dono taraf legs tak radiate karti hai, aur lagbhag 1-2 hafte tak rehti hai. Mujhe pata nahi ki surgery ka is dard se koi lena dena hai ya nahi. Ye dard uske peeth me bilkul nahi hai, bas uske jangho mein, hips mein aur legs me hai. Kripya affected area ko neeche dekhe. Is area me dard ke alawa koi sujan nahi hai. Woh kabhi kabhi heavy drinker hai aur usko ek rash bhi hai. Please doctor dekhein is vartaman condition ko neeche. Uske aankhon ke safed hisse thode cloudy hai, lekin uski skin ya aankhon me jaundice nahi hai. Rash zyadatar uske torso par hai. Shayad meri samasyaye hain....kya ye surgery ke complications ki wajah se ho sakta hai, kya ye rheumatoid arthritis hai, kya ye liver failure ya hepatitis hai, ya kuch aur. Mujhe pata hai ki ye kai cheezon ki wajah se ho sakta hai, lekin main bas ek andaza lene ki koshish kar rahi hoon kyun ki woh doctor ke paas bahut hi kam jata hai. Oh, aur dard wale area me koi laalima ya bukhar nahi hai.

Rang gahra laal hai aur koi blisters nahi hai, lekin garam aur dard hota hai.Ye lag raha hai ki ye Intertrigo hai aur maine OTC hydrocortisone cream and neosporin lagaya hai lekin kuch zyada improvement nahi hua. Aaj maine lotrimin Ultra cream antifungal try kiya hai. Koi sujhav hai docs.. Main ek 51 saal ka male hoon aur kaafi athletic hoon, 170 lbs ka wazan hai aur 6-1 feet ki lambai hai. Shayad maine apne work out clothes ko bahut der tak pehne rakha tha work out ke baad aur nami undergarments mein kuch ghanto tak rahi hai. Madad ki bahut zarurat hai. Yeh uski image hai jo niche attach ki gayi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What might be the cause of the patient's red rash, hot and sore feeling in the crease of their butt crack? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Just ek patient (11 saal ka) dekha, uski toe ki cellulitis ke liye 5/31/14 ko cephalexin prescribe ki gayi thi. Sensitivities mein cefazolin ka inclusion tha but cephalexin ka nahi. Kya ye drugs interchangeably use kiye ja sakte hain? Child aaj scattered maculopapular rash aur red skin with hot flashes ke saath present hua hai, malaise since yesterday. Kya ye ek drug vs staph infection rash hai? Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko below. Wo bahut bimar lag rahi hai. Vitals ya examine nahi kiya kyunki pata tha ki retail clinic mein available se zyada evaluation ki zaroorat hai.

Hinglish_Question: Hii doctor, main 22 saal ka hoon.....main Dehradun se TB patient hoon....pehle mere left neck mein swelling ho gayi thi. Kripya neeche diye gaye cheez par dhyan dein please something happened on neck. Aur maine check-up karwaya ..result tb tha. Maine last 7 mahino se dawai li hai....2 mahine baad phir se redness aur swelling ho gayi hai...doctors ne kaha hai ki andar pus hai....jab maine dawai li thi tab mujhe laga ki swelling size mein kam hui hai....doctors ne syringe se pus nikala aur kaha hai ki ye ek critical case hai....main bahut pareshan hoon.....plz help.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing swelling, redness, and pus in the neck of a 22-year-old TB patient? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The middle of the neck is red and swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Main apne paon ke nakhuno mein fungas se chutkara paane ke liye Fungi Nail istemal kar raha hoon. Tabhi mujhe pata chala ki big toes suj gaye hainPlease dekhein ki foot mein kuch ho gaya hai  aur lal hai lekin us jagah mein koi dard nahi hai. Kya koi aisi cheez hai jisse mein apne paon ko soak karke isko saaf kar sakun. Mene do din pehle hi treatment band kar diya hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing foot swelling and redness without pain in a patient who used antifungal treatment for toenail fungus? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The both foot are swollen with deformation in right foot.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, Teen mahine se ab tak, 21 din ke antibiotics course ke baad, mere meatus par lalima hai aur glans par halki lalima hai aur kabhi kabhi foreskin mein irritation hoti hai.Pure vartaman condition ko dekhein kripya. Iske saath koi itching, discharge ya dard bilkul nahi hai. Mujhe phir se UTI test karwaya gaya hai aur saare possible STDs ke liye bhi test karwaya gaya hai aur sab negative hain. Mujhe ek dermatologist ke paas bheja gaya tha aur unhone mujhe bataya ki ye ek yeast infection ho sakta hai aur unhone mujhe Fluconazole ka 2 baar 150 mg ka course suggest kiya tha jo ki kuch asar nahi kar raha hai. Mai pehle se hi doctors ke paas jaane se pehle do hafte tak khud ko upar se cream laga ke treat kar raha tha jaise Canesten, Fucidin, nariyal tel, shea butter par ye sab skin ko sirf hydrate karte hain. Mai probiotics aur antifungal supplements le raha hoon, ek mahine se low sugar diet follow kar raha hoon aur kuch bhi kaam nahi kar raha hai. Ab mujhe sochne laga hai ki kya ye kisi fungal infection ke alawa aur bhi kuch ho sakta hai, kyun ki jo bhi mai try kiya hai woh kaam nahi kar raha hai. Kya ye bacterial ho sakta hai? Kya isska symptom alag hota hai? Aur agar mere symptoms mein dard nahi hai to kya ye kisi aur infection ke alawa bhi ho sakta hai?
multimodal_Question_summ: How can redness and irritation on the meatus and glans, following a UTI, be addressed if not caused by infection? The image shows the condition of skin irritation. Pink-to-red annular (O-shaped) patches and plaques with raised scaly borders that expand peripherally. Condition- Likely to be Allergic rash

Hinglish_Question: Mere upper thighs ke charo taraf rash-like bruise patches hain. No itching. Dry skin ki tarah shuru hote hain, phir kuch din baad red ho jate hain, phir bruise ki tarah dikhte hain. Dard ya kharish nahi hai. Lekin spots hamesha maujood hote hain. Jab once they have started, tab they do not go away. Ye pichle 5 saal se aise hi hain. <Image attachment>
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of persistent rash-like bruise patches on the upper thighs without itching or pain for 5 years? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Hi,Mere muh mein kuch problem thi aur main iss se jaldi se jaldi chutkara pana chah raha tha. Maine Bactidol se gurgle kiya jaise ek pagal ho kar taki ulcers jaldi khatam ho jaaye. Ulcers ab toh gayab ho gaye hai lekin ab mujhe ek aur dardnak taklif ka saamna karna padh raha hai. Lagta hai maine bahut jyada Bactidol se gurgle kiya hai aur ab meri jibh ke tip aur masude ke sath milne wala hissa bahut dard kar raha hai aur laal ho gaya hai. Kya ye chemical burn ke sanket hai? Lag raha hai ki ye burn hai. Iss burning sensation ke saath ab do din ho gaye hain. Ye prabhavit area sirf neeche ki hoth (kyunki maine wahan gurgle ki thi jaha mere ulcers the) par hai. Kripya doctor, vartaman condition ko dekhne ke liye, neeche di gyi image dekhe. Mere dard ka samapt hone mein kitna samay lagega. Khana khana bahut mushkil ho raha hai, bahut dard ho raha hai. Dhanyavaad!
multimodal_Question_summ: Patient complains of painful, red areas on lower lip and tongue after excessive gargling with Bactidol for mouth ulcers. Signs of chemical burn? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. A patch of oval shaped swelling on the tongue's right side. Dark red in color with swelling.

Hinglish_Question: Hi. Kuch last several days se maine notice kiya hai ki mere tonsils suj gaye hain. I am pretty sure its a lymph node jiski size ek quarter ke barabar hai, ye like a ball move karta hai slightly tender. Ye zyada noticable hota hai jab main apna neck turn karta hoon but only on the left bottom jawline.Please doctor, ye affected area ka image dekhein  below. Infection hai. Mujhe allergies ki problem hai aur do wks pehle maine ek steroid injection liya tha. I am positive ki iska koi lena dena bura daant ya masudo se nahi hai. Last several days se mujhe dizziness feel ho raha hai aur low grade tempi chal rahi hai. Mujhe vertigo bhi hai. Meri aankhein rapid twitch karti hain aur full blown head spinning feeling hoti hai sath hi facial spasms bhi hote hain aur often swullon eyes aur eye headaches bhi hote hain.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the cause of swollen lymph nodes, dizziness, facial spasms, eye headaches, and tonsil inflammation in this patient? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. Reddish black swelling at the back of the throat.

Hinglish_Question: Hi, main 21 saal ki ladki hoon aur mere gale aur left ear ke piche dard se sujhe hue aur badhe hue glands hai, mere chehre ke bade hisso par sensitive skin hai, sath hi mere mathhe aur scalp par chote chote rashes hain. Kripya dekhe doctor affected area ki image ko niche. Aur meri jawaab dene mein takleef hoti hai kyunki lagta hai ki muscleshain waha thodi suj gayi hain, lekin ye mere kaano se jude ho sakte hain, kyunki woh bas unke samne hai... Kya mujhe chinta karne ki zaroorat hai ya ye kuchh samay ke saath hi thik ho jayega.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should a 21-year-old woman be concerned about painful swollen and enlarged glands, sensitive skin, and rashes on her face? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. The tonsils are swollen accompanied with red inflammation.

Hinglish_Question: Hi, mere haath aur pairon par ek rash hai. Waha chote chote bumps hai jo skin colored hai. Jab main inko itch karta hoon, woh bahut laal ho jate hai aur kabhi kabhi khoon bhi aata hai. Mujhe haal hi mein Lichen Planus ke diagnosis hua hai. Uska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai. Isko treat kiya gaya hai aur ab ye lichen planus jaisa nahi lag raha. Kya aapko koi idea hai ki ye kya ho sakta hai?
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause and possible diagnosis for a skin rash with tiny bumps that itch, turn red, and bleed? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Cluster of circular red rashes on the skin. Red around the rasied edges and clear skin in the center.

Hinglish_Question: Hindi: Namaste doctor, mere aankhon mein 6 mahine se infection hai. Shuru mein, infection left side under eye se shuru hua tha aur ab dono aankhon mein hai. Vartaman mein, meri right eyelid aur dono under eyes suj gaye hain. Jab bhi mein aankhen chhuta ya ragarta hoon, mujhe khujli ki sensation hoti hai. Maine tab se saare eye cosmetics use karna band kar diya hai. Har doctor ne mujhe kaha hai ki ye dhool ki allergy hai aur alag-alag eye drops, tablets aur ointments diye hai aur kaha hai ki ise ek mahine tak lagatar istemal karoon. Maine ab tak har ek doctor ke suggestion ke anusaar use kiya hai lekin phir bhi mujhe apne eye infection se chhutkara nahi mil saka. Abhi bhi meri eyelids aur under eyes suj gaye hain. Kripya doctor, aankhen neeche dekhein. Kripya mujhe samjhayein ki ye past six months se kyun ho raha hai aur meri is pareshani se chhutkara pane mein meri madad karein.
multimodal_Question_summ: The patient has been experiencing eye infection symptoms for six months, including swelling, itching, and sensitivity. How can they find relief? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Eye lid swollen with redness and a spot of yellow near the eye lash.

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor,Karib chahe aath hafte pehle, mere right index finger mein dard hone laga. Ye mainly tab hota tha jab main apna mouse use karti thi. Kuch din baad, dono haath dard karne lage. Ye mainly meri right-hand ke joints mein tha, lekin haath ke dusre hisson mein bhi tha. Mujhe dar lagne laga tha ki mujhe rheumatoid arthritis hai. Maine saare symptoms ke baare mein padha aur ek orthopedic doctor ke paas gayi. Doctor ne mere haath parikshan kiye aur kaha ki ye rheumatoid arthritis nahi hai. Mere haath mein koi lalima ya sujan nahi hai aur dard bhi nahi hai jab doctor ne mujhe check kiya. Aur phir kuch din pehle, mere ghutnon mein halka dard hone laga aur mujhe apne peeth mein bhi dard ho raha tha. Lekin ab mere haath ka dard almost gayab ho gaya hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of hand pain, joint pain, knee pain, and back pain with no evidence of rheumatoid arthritis? The image shows the condition of hand lump. Lump on the wrist's bone on the right hand.

Hinglish_Question: Maine teen hafte pehle ek kile par rukh daala tha. Chot bhar gayi aur sujan kam ho gayi. Char din pehle jab kile ke upar ek cheenti ne kat liya to tab se mere paon me sujan hai aur dard ho raha hai. Please dekhen kuchh mere paon par ho gaya hai. Cheentiyon se koi allergy nahi hai. Mujhe ye jaanna tha ki ye sujan ka kaaran kya ho sakta hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is causing the foot swelling, pain, and flare-up after being bitten by an ant on a previously healed nail wound? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The right leg is swollen with redness.

Hinglish_Question: Kareeb ek hafte pehle mujhe apne pet par kuch aise dikh raha tha jaise ek rash hai jo bahut khujlane laga aur ab usmein scabs (chhale) se bhara hua hai aur mujhe pata nahi hai ki kya yeh khujli ki wajah se hai ya kuch aur. Mujhe bhi notice hua hai ki meri taangon aur ghutnon par bhi khujli shuru ho gayi hai aur ab wahan par chote chote bumps (chote hilte hue dane) bhi ho gaye hain. Kuch dinon se maine apne pet ko nahi chhua ya khujlai nahi hai aur khujli kam ho gayi hai lekin abhi bhi kuch scabbing hai. Mere skin bahut dry hai isliye mujhe ye jaanna tha ki kya ye dry skin mein common hai ya kuch aur ho sakta hai. Mujhe dar hai ki mujhe scabies ho sakti hai, kya yeh ek possibility hai. Iske liye attach ki gayi image hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a rash on the stomach that turned into scabs, itchy legs with bumps, and dry skin? Could it be scabies? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The ankle of the foot is swollen with brown discolouration.

Hinglish_Question: Jab main apne desk par typing kar raha tha, mujhe apne left wrist par ek garmahat mehsoos hui aur jab maine niche dekha toh ek ganth ban rahi thi. Ganthon ki size kam ho gayi hai lekin meri arms aur hands mein dard hai.

Iska matlab kya hai aur iska ilaj kaise karna chahiye?.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the significance of a lump on the knee accompanied by pain after a hard fall? The image here shows the condition of knee swelling

Hinglish_Question: हैलो, मैं एक 32 साल की महिला हूँ, पिछले 3 दिनों से मेरे पैर की हड्डी में नसों को दबाने जैसा दर्द है जो मेरी कमर से शुरू होकर मेरे दाहिने पैर तक बढ़ता है. मेरी त्वचा को हल्के स्पर्श से भी दर्द होता है. और फिर 2 या 3 दिन बाद मेरे शरीर पर एक पैसा आकार के दाने वाले फ्लूइड से भरे खुजलीदार दाने हो जाते हैं. मेरे पहले बच्चे को जन्म देने से पहले लगभग एक साल पहले इसी तरह के घटनाओं का सामयिक हुआ था. मुझे चिंता है कि शिंगल्स हो सकता है. दाने हमेशा उसी जगह पर आते हैं जिस पैर में दर्द होता है. मेरे दाहिने पैर पर मुझे पुबिक एरिया में दाने होते हैं... मेरे बाएं पैर पर, दाने घुटने से ऊपर आते हैं. उसके बारे में इमेज नीचे दी गई है
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the patient experiencing nerve pain, skin sensitivity, and fluid-filled blister rash, potentially indicating a recurrent case of shingles? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Meri poti ke haath aur paon par kharish hai. Woh surkh, uchhal gayi, phaili hui, kuch pin-point red dots aur kuch flaky/peeling areas hai. Uske muh mein koi chhala nahi hai.Aur humare hisab se kabhi koi bukhar nahi hua hai. Ye kharish khujane ki wajah se nahi lag rahi hai, kyun ki woh usko khujla nahi rahi hai. Woh normal tareeke se behave kar rahi hai, matlab thaki hui, gussa ya bhukhar nahi hai. Koi idea hai ye kya ho sakta hai? Uski tasveer attached hai neeche.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a non-itchy, splotchy rash with pinpoint red dots and peeling areas on hands and feet? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Little red pinkish dots on the hands of the baby.

Hinglish_Question: Mere 4 saal ke bacche ke gaal par do hafte pehle ek dark red lacey rash aaya tha aur wo ek hafte tak tha. Mujhe laga ki ye reaction hai soaps change karne ka. Use different children s soaps ke saath frequently aise reactions hote hain, par rash 2 ghante ke andar gayab ho jate hain. Usko night mein lagbhag har 2 mahine mein ek baar dono pairon mein growing pains bhi hote hain. Kal raat usne 4 ghante tak dono pairon mein dard ki wajah se scream kiya aur writhed hai. Aaj, use dono biceps par bhi ek lacey rash hai. Please see the current condition below. Rash itchy ya raised nahi hai, par skin ke neeche hai. Uska aaj dopahar mein appointment hai, par abhi aapki ray lena chahta hoon. Dhanyavad!!
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a dark red lacey rash on the cheeks and arms, along with recurring leg pains at night in a 4-year-old? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Rashes on the left side of the face from the cheeks to the jaw. Red coloration of the skin with spots.

Hinglish_Question: Meri beti ko kal raat ko urticaria ki treatment ki gayi thi aur usko predizilone aur benadryl ka injection lagaya gaya tha. Wo bina koi problem ke ghar wapas aayi aur ache se so gayi. Lagbhag 5 baje wo bohot pareshan ho gayi aur kehne lagi ki usko khujli ho rahi hai aur humne dekha ki wo skin reacting wapas aa gayi thi aur ye poore sharir par faili hui thi. Kya mujhe kuch karna chahiye taki ye rashes wapas na aye ya fir hum benadryl ke sath hi iska treatment karte rahe. Kya hum usko allergy test ke liye urgent care mein le jana chahiye. Uski image neeche attach ki gayi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should the patient continue treating the returning rash with Benadryl or seek further medical attention for an allergy test? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe 80s ke late mein apne sar par goli lagi, entrance wound right side par tha aur left ear se bahar nikla, artery mein damage karke. Day before yesterday se mere mathe par ek bada sa ganth dikh raha hai, hairline se eyebrow tak ek ungli ke width ka. Mere aankhon ke aas paas sujan hai, doctor kripya nazar daalein patient ki aankhon ki image below mein, aur upar bataye gaye area mein laalima bhi hai. Aaj mujhe apne right eye mein vision problems ho rahe hain aur mere right kaan ke nichle hisse ke niche bhi ek ganth hai, meri choti ungli ke size ka. Dono par dabav lagane par dard hota hai. Kya bullet ke fragments move hone ki koi sambhavna ho sakti hai?

The image shows the condition of swollen eye.Massive swelling of the right eye lid and below the eyes with light pinkish appearance of the skin having shiny appearance. Trauma, allergy, strong blow of nose.

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor.,Mere eyes past four days se red aur sore hai. Till yesterday, ye bahut painful tha. As maine computer par kaam nahi kiya aur eye refresher use karne lagi hoon, ab mujhe bad headaches aur eye pain nahi ho rahi hai. Jab main focus change karti hoon, toh sore ho jati hai aur abhi bhi bohot red hai. Mujhe iska karan ka pata nahi hai. Isko treat kaise karna hai. Uski image attached below hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: How to treat red, sore eyes with pain and headaches, aggravated by change in focus? No known cause. (20 words) The image here shows a medical condition related to eye_redness. The eye has started to become red from canthus.

Hinglish_Question: Mere 3 saal ke bete par bruising hai. Wo bahut gora hai aur active hone ke karan uske pairon par bruise hote hain. Lekin mujhe chinta ho rahi hai kyunki use random bruise back aur sides par ho rahe hain. Use bottom back aur bum par bhi rashes hain, lekin use egsema hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Lekin wo kinda like pimples dikhte hain... Maine socha ki diapers se rashes huye hain lekin wo potty trained hai abhi bhi wo rashes aate hain. Mujhe kya karna chahiye?
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of random bruises on a 3-year-old's back and sides, along with a skin rash resembling pimples? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Redish circular spots on the leg, looks like allergic reaction.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe 48 saal ka hogaya hai aur mere naak ke andar ek chote se pimple jaisa bump hai. Mere naak ke niche ek sakht gantha bhi hai jo mere honthon ko sujane se rok raha hai. Please, niche patient ke honthon ki image dekh lein. Pehle mujhe yahi kaha gaya hai ki isi tarah ke cheez infected hair follicles hote hain. Mein office nahi ja sakta kyunki mein ek ajeeb sa dikhta hoon. Swelling kam karne ke liye mujhe kya karna chahiye.
multimodal_Question_summ: How can a 48-year-old patient treat a pimple-like bump inside the nose and a hard lump under the nose causing lip swelling? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Upper lip swollen with redness on the top side of the upper lip.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe apne gardan ke kone ke neeche ek sakht ganth hai (honingta paksh).Doctor please, patient ki image dekhein, mere gardan mein kuch issue hai  it doesn t move, doesn t hurt, us taraf halka kaan dard hai jaise ear infection hoti hai, halki khana ki ichha mein kami hai jo bahut noticeable nahi hai, thakan, bohot sardi lagti hai, sir dard hai, raat mein mera right haath aur hatheli sunn hojati hai aur mein aksar dehydration mehsoos karti hoon aur din bhar pani piti hoon, sirf subah me ek cup chai peeti hoon. Mujhe sharab nahi peeni, mein aadhe saal pehle smoking chhor di thi, mein 30 saal ki aurat hoon, 5 6 lambi hoon aur 170 pond ka vajan hai, ek saal pehle 250 pond tha.. koi madad ki sahayta ki jaye toh bahut meharbani hogi. Dhanyawad
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a hard lump near the right ear, accompanied by ear pain, fatigue, numbness, and dehydration? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The neck par below the jaws have turned red and are swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste, Mere left foot ke instep par ek khujli wala rash hai. Woh lal nahi hai, mere skin se thoda sa dark shade ka hai. Woh sukha hua aur thoda sa scaly lagta hai. Jab ek din kaam ke baad mein socks utar kar spot par khujlaya toh woh shuru hua. Mene itni khujli ki ki skin ka upper layer hat gaya. Spot irritate ho gaya aur yeh rash bann gaya. Kripya doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a non-red, itchy, scaly, and darker patch on the instep of the left foot? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Meri beti 6 saal ki hai, use asthma hai..aur wo pehle thrice pnemonia se guzri..3 saal tak antibiotics aur rotahaler use kiya hai..ab wo theek hai...abhi recently wo bahut dark ho gayi hai..specifically around her neck, armpits and elbows..aur rashes baar baar ho rahe hain.Please doctor dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Kya ye uske asthma medication se kuch lena dena hai..ya phir aur koi reason hai underlying..please help..mai bahut pareshaan hun kyunki log isko notice karte hain aur undesirable remarks karte hain..jo uske mindframe par asar karte hain.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the darkening of the skin around the neck, armpits, and elbows, along with recurring rashes, related to asthma medication or an underlying cause? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round medium sized pink patches on the hand's skin.

Hinglish_Question: Annoyances pichle 5 saal se chal rahe hain. Maine khud ko treat kiya hai lice infest, rat aur dust mite ke hisab se..chronic description hai. Mainey frequent rug shampooing, spraying, fumigation try kiya hai. Iske saath laundry karke soap add karke, garam tumble-dry bhi kiya hai...obsessive hai. Frequent, isolated, laundering se acche results mile hain. Regular showering bhi. Waist ke aas paas @ beltline, frequent itching ho raha hai abhi. Sab hospital tests negative show kar rahe hain kisi bhi skines, eggs ke issue ke baare mein. Specific bite annoyance ke symptoms hain lekin koi rashes ya welts nahi hain. Aur thoda aur: woh abhi har raat latanaprost aankhon me leti hai. Usne June 2013 mein ek dose Tdap liya tha. Woh 9 saal ki hai aur usko WAGR syndrome hai. Hinglish_Question: Kahaan se shuru karein. Lakshan ne pichle 9 mahino mein steady tareeke se badh gaye/ghat gaye(humein = ho raha tha). Stress, psychosomatic, etc. ki wajah se blame kar raha tha, jab tak ki mujhe pata nahi chala (pehli baar ki koi experience nahi hai) ki ye kisi prakar ke mold infection ho sakta hai. LAKSHAN: (Yeh sabhi turant nahi huye, dheere-dheere badh rahe hain) anormal tareeke se baal ka teji se growth, jyada tar puri body par upar se lekar niche tak, hamesha baalo ke ghane hone ki bajaye thin, non-pigmented, needoda aur khujlaane waale. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko neeche. Normal hair (scalp) kamjor ho rahe hain, needode waale hain, aasaani se hataye ja sakte hain. Pairon ke sole; fatne aur fathne wale hain, par darawani cheez, jab lambe samay tak shower lete hain, pair se kaali si rangat wala padarth nikalta hai, sole par fatne waale area mein rehta hai. Chhote chhote chhalo ki tarah ke gaanth hain. Kaafi saare/alag-alag jagah hain. Saans lena bigad raha hai aur confusion badh rahi hai. Bhookh kam ho rahi hai. Arre doctor, mujhe toh kareeb 10 aur bhi alag-alag hai. Koi sujhav hai? Sawal hai? Main hamesha hospital jaana avoid karta hoon, jab tak antim saadhya nahi ho jata, koi insurance nahi hai, agar aap soch rahe hain ki maine professional se milne ke liye kyun nahi kiya. Aapke samay ke liye dhanyavaad.

The image shows the condition of skin irritation. Small circular spots of red lesions. Little inflammed spots with little redness.

Hinglish_Question: Mere wisdom teeth ko maine teen din pehle nikalwaya tha, aur uske baad se mera jeebh bahut suj gayi aur numb ho gayi hai. Mere honth aur hooth dono taraf half numb hain. Mujhe pata hai ki ismein nerve damage ho sakta hai, lekin phir main jeevan bhar solids nahi kaise kha sakta. Is wajah se main bahut kam khata hoon aur mujhe kuch samajh nahi aa raha ki kya karu.

Hinglish_Question: Hum ye kaise decide karen ki ye shingles ka case hai ya contact dermatitis ka case hai. Photos dekh rahe the aur lagta hai ki ye shingles ne mere husband ko attack kiya hai! Lekin ye bhi lag raha hai ki ye ek dermatitis problem hai, jise mere ek dost ko char saal se diagnose nahi kiya gaya hai! Rash ke saath bahut jyada itching bhi hai especially on legs and arms. Hinglish_Question: Mera beta 7 saal ka hai. Usko headache, sore body, throat pain hai aur uske eyes glassy hain.Please doctor, dekhiye ye eyes ko neeche.Wo kal thoda jor se gir gaya tha. Hinglish_Question:
Hi doctor,
Lagbhag 3 hafte pehle, mere dermatologist ne mere maathe par ek anokhe breakout ke liye Retin-A 0.5% aur Acticlate prescribe kiya tha. Anaesthetician ne bhi meri chehre ko dekha aur usne mujhe Glytone PA chemical peel suggest kiya tha jisse acne ke kaaran hui discoloration ko treat kar sake. Aaj main uske paas gaya aur jisse peel kiya tha, woh initially bohot jyada jalan hui. Maine clinic se uth ke thodi si aankhon ke neeche laalima hui hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Rajat raat tak, ab meri skin 2nd to 3rd-degree jaise dikhti hai. Lekin, dard nahi ho raha hai. Jab maine use contact kiya aur pictures bheji, toh usne kaha ki ye normal hai. Usne kaha ki kisi zarurat nahi hai aur mere skin ko peel aur heal hone mein lagbhag 7 din lagenge. Mera chehra bohot kharab lag raha hai aur mujhe darr hai ki maine apni skin ko permanent taraah damage kar diya hai. Main kal ek alag doctor ke saath appointment rakha hai. Aapka salaah bohot zaroori hogi.
multimodal_Question_summ: Query summary: Patient prescribed Retin-A and Acticlate for acne breakout, experienced severe burning and edema after Glytone PA chemical peel. Concerns about permanent skin damage. The image here shows a medical condition related to edema. The left hand is swollen.

Maine kuch doctors se consult kiya hai, including an ENT aur ek Internal Medicine specialist. Kripya dekh lijiye affected area ki image doctor, nichhe di gayi hai. Unhone mujhe anto acidity tablets di hain reflex ko control karne ke liye aur steroids bhi diye the jo kuch had tak help kar raha tha. Ab phir se shuru ho gaya hai. Kya aap mujhe guide kar sakte hain ki isse kaise chhutkara paya jaye aur treatment ke liye kaunse specialist ke paas consult karna chahiye. Dhanyavad Imran

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, main 50 saal ki aurat hoon, menopause se guzri hoon lekin anyatha main swasth hoon. Mere nails mein samasya hai. Das nails mein se chhe nails ke ek-third nails nail beds se alag ho gaye hain, V shape mein hai, niche se white dikhte hain, baki ke nails pinkish pale dikhte hain. Nails dard nahi karte hai jab tak main unhe mushkil se dabata nahi hoon. Sabhi nails pe ridges hai. Main apne nails ko chhote rakhti hoon aur koi polish bhi nahi lagati hoon paanch hafte se zyada samay tak. Mere ungliyon mein travel ke baad thodi si skin peeling hoti hai aur sukhi lagti hai. Vartaman mein meri thodi si skin eczema hai. Kuch saal pehle meri scalp mein seborrheic dermatitis thi. Lekin special shampoo treatment se ab wo control mein hai. Ek fingernail mein bhi ek similar problem thi lekin wo halki halat mein thi. Mujhe lag raha tha ki ye nail fungal hai. Main Mometasone furoate 0.1 % cream use ki thi apni skin eczema ke liye. Jab mere nails badhne lage tab wo thik ho gaya. mujhe pollen ki allergy hai. Iske liye attached image hai.

What could be the cause of nail separation, white color underneath, ridges, dryness, skin peeling, and previous seborrheic dermatitis? The image shows the condition of dry scalp. White coloured scalp with lots of white flakes seen in the hairs.
Condition- dry scalp with dandruff caused by Malassezia Furfur.

Maine kuch cotton balls liye hain use sukhaane ke liye, lekin phir se wapas aa jaata hai. Rash aur ooze ko notice karne se pahle, wahan pe thoda sa crust tha jise maine khujla liya tha. Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor, mein 32 saal ka ek mard hoon jiski vajan 60 kg hai aur meri lambai 5'9" hai. Saat saal pehle mujhe aortic stenosis valve replacement ke liye khula dil ki surgery hui thi. Ek din meri aankh suj gayi aur chakkar bhi aane lage. Kripya doctor, niche di gayi aankhein dekhein. Isliye main checkup ke liye doctor ke paas gaya. Unhone bataya ki mere aortic valve par calcium deposit ho gaya hai, jo ki pehle se hi replace ho chuka valve hai. Ab mujhe jaanna hai ki kya open heart surgery ke alawa koi aur option hai valve ko phir se replace karne ka. Mere poore report mein cholesterol aur dusri cheezo ke mamle mein sab theek tha, bas ek hi problem thi calcium deposit ki. Agar valve TAVR ke through replace kiya ja sakta hai, toh mujhe sabse achha ilaaj kahaan mil sakta hai. Pehle toh maine ek prasiddh hospital mein open heart surgery for valve replacement karwayi thi. Kripya mujhe iske baare mein saari jaankari pradan karein. Kya doosri open heart surgery ya TAVR mein koi risk hai.

Hinglish_Question: Lagbhag ek mahine pehle mujhe ek rash hone laga hai, jo lagbhag poore tarah se symmetrical hai. Kabhi kabhi mere aankhon ke niche/cheekbones ke uppar wale hisson mein sujan hoti hai, ya ful hota hai, aur woh hamesha red, bahut sukhhe aur rough hote hain. Cheekbone wale hisse thode se mune ya triangles ki tarah hote hain, meri naak ke bridge se radiate hote hain. Do hafto pehle mere gardan aur cheekbones par sujan wale hives-type bumps the, fir mere dono hatheliyon ke exact same jagah par do bade, khujli wale (shayad 1/2 se 5/8 inch diameter ke) ho gaye. Fir pichle hafte meri dono uppar ki baazu ke piche exact same jagah par do gol, red, rough daag bane. Gardan ke rash mein khujli hoti hai, lekin cheekbones par jo red hai woh particularly khujli nahi hota, bas thoda tuta-phuta aur dard karne wala lagta hai. Mai basically bahut swasth aur active hoon, mera vajan normal hai, aur mai niyamit roop se vyayam karta hoon. Mujhe Sjogren's Syndrome ka diagnosis hua hai, jisme sukhha muh aur gale, hamesha dard wali jeebh, nigalne mein dikkat aur sukhhi aankhein (jissey mujhe toh contradiction of terms lagta hai, lekin wohi docs ne bataya hai). Hinglish_Question:
<Hindi>Mera naam doctor hai. Mein 28 saal ki ek mahila hoon. Meri height 1.65 meter hai aur mera weight 56 kg hai. Mujhe knee problem thi, isliye maine kuch dino ke liye rest liya. Maine Alphintern liya aur apni resistance band ka istemal kiya, taaki meri knee-range improve ho. Sab kuch theek tha, bas exercise ke dauran ek grinding noise ho rahi thi. Par jab mein chalti thi toh mujhe isse koi pareshani nahi hoti thi. Maine medical help li aur MRI karaya, jiska result tha 'increased girth and altered signals of the anterior inferior cruciate ligament, suggestive of a sprain with minimum knee effusion'. Doctor ne mujhe salah di hai ki mein normal tareeke se chalun, knee ko puri tarah se nahi modun, aur na hi khara rahun. Bad mein, mein stairs ka istemal kiya aur thoda chala. Iss se badi amount me dard hua. Mein sahi tarah se chalne ya knee thoda bend karne mein asamarth ho gayi. Kuch legs mein problem aayi hai.Please doctor, vartaman condition ko dekhiye. Maine Diclofenac epolamine 65 mg capsule, Glucosamine sulfate capsule aur pain relief gel liya. Mere doctor ne mujhe ek mahine tak ye medicines recommend ki hai aur kisi physiotherapy program ko suggest nahi kiya hai. Unhone bas mujhe bataya hai ki normal tareeke se chalna theek hai.Mera sawal yeh hai ki, kya ye kuch normal hai jab bhi mein apni legs ka istemal karti hoon ya ye koi complication hai. Aapke sujhav aur precautions kya hai. Kya mujhe rest karna chahiye ya normal tareeke se ghoomna chahiye. Agar rest karna hai toh kitne time tak karna chahiye. Mein ek bahut active person hoon aur mujhe chinta hai ki cheezein kharab ho rahi hai. Toh kya mujhe physiotherapy program shuru karna chahiye ya phir mujhe ek mahine tak medicines lete rehna chahiye.<English>Hello doctor, mera naam 28 saal ki female hai. Meri height 1.65 meter hai aur mera weight 56 kg hai. Mein ek knee problem se pareshan thi, aur maine kuch din araam kiya. Maine Alphintern liya aur apni resistance band ka istemal kiya apni knee-range ko improve karne ke liye aur sab kuch theek tha, bas exercise ke dauran ek grinding noise ho rahi thi. Par chalte waqt mujhe yeh pareshan nahi hota tha. Maine medical help le aur MRI karaya aur result mein 'increased girth and altered signals of the anterior inferior cruciate ligament, suggestive of a sprain with minimum knee effusion' aaya tha. Doctor ne mujhe salah di hai ki main normal tareeke se chalu rahun, knee ko puri tarah se modne na dun aur khade rahne se bachein. Baad mein, meine stairs ka istemal kiya aur thoda chala. Iss se bahut pain hua. Main sahi tareeke se chalne ya knee thoda modne mein asamarth ho gayi. Kuch dikkat legs mein aayi hai. Please doctor, vartaman condition ko dekhiye. Maine Diclofenac epolamine 65 mg capsule, Glucosamine sulfate capsule aur pain relief gel liya. Mere doctor ne mujhe ek mahine tak ye medicines recommend ki hai aur kisi physiotherapy program ko suggest nahi kiya hai. Unhone bus mujhe bataya hai ki normal tareeke se chalna theek hai. Mera sawaal yeh hai ki, kya yeh kuch normal hai jab bhi mein apne legs ka istemal karti hoon ya yeh koi complication hai. Aapke sujhav aur precautions kya hai. Kya mujhe rest karna chahiye ya normal tareeke se ghoomna chahiye. Agar rest karna hai toh kitne time tak karna chahiye. Main ek bahut active person hoon aur mujhe chinta hai ki cheezein kharab ho rahi hai. Toh kya mujhe physiotherapy program shuru karna chahiye ya phir mujhe ek mahine tak medicines lete rehna chahiye.

The Hinglish passage has been formed keeping the Hindi to English word ratio of 2:1.

Mere left eye bhi suj gaya hai, wo teary, red aur thoda dard kar raha hai, jo ek hafte pehle shuru hua tha. Kripya doctor, niche diye gaye eyes ko dekhein. Ye kya hai? Kya main apne sujhe hue chehre ke liye ER ya doctor ke paas jaun? Mera antibiotics ke saath pahele hi do din pehle doctor se consult kar liya hain.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should the patient go to the ER or consult a doctor for a swollen face, sore throat, cough with mucus, and a swollen, red, teary eye? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Redness on the eye or the blood veins/caapilliaries are swollen and red.

Hinglish_Question: Mere muh ke andar ek chhota flesh wala growth hai cheek par. Same side mein gum ke paas ek canker sore tha jo ab thik ho gaya hai. Mujhe stress ke karan canker sores hote hai par ye pehli baar hai jab muh mein skin tag jaisa dikha jo canker thik hone ke baad bhi gayab nahi hua. Iska kya ho sakta hai. Dhanyavaad. Kripya dekhein affected area ki image doctor, niche di gayi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ:
What could be the cause of a persistent fleshy growth inside the mouth, resembling a skin tag, after a canker sore has healed? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. White coloured circular patch/ swelling with red coloured margin present on the inner skin of lower lip, imner skin of left cheek, above the teeth and below the tongue.
Condition- Aphthous ulcer

Hinglish_Question: Good morning sir, mera naam CM Rana hai aur main Cuttack, Odisha se hoon. Meri maa ko last 4 saal se diabetes hai. Unki weight lagbhag 89 kg hai aur umar 62 saal hai. Wo ek psychiatric patient bhi hai aur unhe thyroid ki problem bhi hai. Wo thyroid ke liye medicine leti hai, gilitar forte leti hai diabetes ke liye regularly lekin problem ye hai ki unhe mere pairo mein kuch issue mehsoos ho raha hai, pairo mein jalan aur ghutne mein dard hai, chalne mein dikkat ho rahi hai aur diabetes ki level 150/230mg hai. Medicine lene ke baad bhi unhe aaram nahi lag raha hai. Kripya doctor, niche diye gaye image of the affected area dekhein.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing foot swelling, burning sensation, knee pain, difficulty walking, and uncontrolled diabetes in a 62-year-old patient? The image here shows a medical condition related to knee_swelling. There is swelling accompanied by a redness, leading  to being of the legs outwards.

Hinglish_Question: Hi , jab main apni kalai jhukata hoon to mujhe apni kalai par ek note kiye jane wale dhamak dar vridhi par notice karne lagi hai. Doctor, uske liye image neeche attach ki gayi hai, aur uske samne ek dant hai. Ye mere dominant haath par nahi hai aur har doosre mahine mein lagbhag dard hota hai ya tez dard hota hai. Main apni kalai par jyada stress nahi daal sakta hoon, kyunki isse dard ya atyadhik dard ho jata hai. Isse sakht mahasus hota hai... Bilkul bhi malamal nahi hai... Ye kya ho sakta hai? Ganglion cyst ko kaise rule out kar sakte hain.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a noticeable hard lump on the non-dominant wrist that causes pain and restricts movement? The image shows the condition of hand lump. Big lump just above the wrist.

Hinglish_Question: Good evening! Mujhe apne gardan ke daaye taraf ek sakht sujan hai (peeth mein). Doctor, kripya is patient ke gardan ki image dekhein 	(kuch samasya hai meri gardan mein). Ise bilkul bhi dard nahi hota hai, lekin har baar jab ise dekhta hoon, mujhe pareshani hoti hai. Mein JFK Airport mein ek cargo company ke saath chaar saal tak kaam kiya tha, jahan maine radioactive materials aur dusre sankramak cheezon ka samhandling kiya. Ek baar 2003 ke aas-paas humare warehouse mein ek safed powder spill (hazmat) bhi hua tha aur mujhe pata hai ki humne us cheez ko saans mein le liya tha uske floor mein maujood hone se pehle. Kya ye ek benign tumor ho sakta hai ya phir cancer ka khatra hai. Aur bura kya hai ki ab mere paas insurance nahi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of the hard growth at the base of the patient's neck, considering their exposure to radioactive and infectious materials? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. the back side of the neck is swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe apne baby ke gale ke aas paas ki kharish (jo uthaane se hoti hai) ko kaise treat karna hai patain hai. Wo 2 mahine ka hai. Uske gale ke mota fold mein kharish hai jo raw red aur broken skin hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Mujhe isko treat aur prevent kaise karna hai pata chalna chahiye. Bilkul saaf hai ki mai dhona, nahaana aur skin ko sukhana janta hoon lekin kabhi kabhi uska kuch thook ho jaata hai jise mai miss kar jaata hoon. Dhanyavaad, nayi mommy.
multimodal_Question_summ: "How can I treat and prevent a raw and red rash caused by spitting up in my 2-month-old baby's neck folds?" The image shows the condition of skin rash. One big circular dark red spot. Central part looks little red-brownish and dried strands like. Around it some red smaller spots are also present.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe apni gardan ke neeche ek gol ganth hai , mujhe lagta hai ki ye hamesha wahan nahi thi.Ye itna bada hai ki main bas apni hath se use thodi si pressure ke saath ragad kar bhi mehsoos kar sakta hoon. Doctor, kripya dekhein patient ki image neeche aur mere gardan mein kuch problem hai.  Isey dabane tak dard nahi hota hai, lekin jab main thoda sa pressure lagata hoon toh halka sa dard hone lagta hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the cause of the patient's new round lump at the base of their neck, which is mildly painful when pressed? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The part of the neck near the ear is swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Mere husband ne Thursday ko apne daanton ka saaf safai karwayi thi. Uske galay ke ek side ke neeche sujan aayi hai aur thoda dard bhi hai. Sujan kam nahi ho rahi hai aur doosre side me bhi fail gayi hai. Doctor, kripya is affected area ki image dekhein neeche. multimodal_Question_summ: The patient's husband had teeth cleaned, developing neck swelling with pain that hasn't resolved. How long to wait and home remedies? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The neck is swollen in one side and there is a red spot in the neck

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe apne gardan mein cervical surgery hui thi, 3 degenerated disks the. Mere left aur right collar bones ke upar sujne wale ganthe hai. Kabhi kabhi tez dard sujne wale area se hota hai. Unhone ek mahine se wahan hai. Maine apne surgery karwane wale doctor se pucha hai ki kya mujhe unhe lekar chinta karni chahiye. Mera chest mein tez dard hone laga hai aur kabhi kabhi dabaav bhi mahsoos hota hai. Emergency hospital gaya tha aur unhone heart attack stress test kiya lekin koi blockage nahi mila. Jab meri surgery hui thi tab mujhe lungs aur legs mein khoon ka clot ho gaya tha. Kya aapko lagta hai ki mujhe sujne wale lymph nodes hain? Sujan meri gardan ke neeche aur meri collar bone ke paas hai. Uska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai. Mujhe apni gardan par CT scan karwane ka appointment hai. Kya ye test mujhe pata lagane mein madad karega ya kya aapko lagta hai ki kuch aur ho raha hai? Meri surgery ke baad se main theek se mehsoos nahi kar raha hoon. Meri saans lene mein taklif ho rahi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the shortness of breath related to the swollen knots above collarbones, sharp chest pains, and previous blood clots? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The neck is swollen withe red rashes in the mouth.

Hinglish_Question: Meri 2 saal ki beti ko red pin prick rash hai, itching hoti hai, eczema bhi flare up ho gayi hai. Abhi suspected chest infection ke liye antibiotics liye the, antibiotics khatam hone ke baad rash wapas aa gayi hai par badh gayi hai. Kripya doctor dekhein is vartaman condition ko below. Ye sara body mein hai par face ke alawa, jyadatar waqt normal hai jab tak itching shuru nahi hoti hai. Dusare se zyada thaki hui hai, no temperature, drinking aur eating thik hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing the red pin prick rash, itchy skin, and eczema flare-up in a 2 and a half year old girl? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Hi mujhe arm ke andar ek rash hai. Yeh pehle ek chhote se daane se shuru hua tha lekin phir yeh ek bada rash mein fail gaya. Aur jahan rash hai, wahan ke skin ka rang seem light hogaya hai, jaise wahan skin pigment kho gaya ho. Main pareshan ho raha hoon yeh kuch mahine se hai ab tak. Yeh kya ho sakta hai. Main ne apne lower back par ek dime size white patch bhi notice kiya hai, no rash though. Yeh kya ho sakta hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Summary: Patient has a spreading rash on the inner arm with skin discoloration, and a white patch on the lower back. The image shows the condition of skin rash.  Pinkish red multuiple single coloured rash on the skin present close to each other.

Hinglish_Question: Pichle 3 hafte se mere skin mein random appearances ka ek issue hai....shuru mein mujhe laga ki ye garam shower ki vajah se hai lekin ye arms, neck, chest aur back par din bhar ke dauran bhi ho sakte hain.....ye bahut zyada itching nahi karte aur sirf 15-30 minutes ke liye rukte hain.....kya ye stress ho sakta hai. Main ek Derm ke paas gaya tha aur usko koi chinta nahi thi lekin usne mujhe kaha hai ki pictures lekar wapis aao agar ye ek mahine tak continue ho rahe hain. Kya ye virus ho sakta hai.....dimagh par bojh hai. Dhanyavaad....J.O. Uske image neeche attach ki gayi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Could the random, non-itchy skin rashes present for 3 weeks be caused by stress or a viral infection? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Oval shaped or circular red patches on the leg. Little swelling and dryness on the patches with foldings of skin.

Hinglish_Question: Meri poti ko chicken pox ka vaccine laga chuka hai lekin usko March ke shuruwat mein hi chicken pox ho gaya. Usne doctor ke paas jaake confirm karaya ki chicken pox hai aur usne iske liye anitiboitc liya. Rash kabhi blister nahi ban raha hai aur abhi bhi uske paas rash hai aur itch bhi ho rahi hai. multimodal_Question_summ: Is it normal for a vaccinated child to still have an itchy rash without blisters a month after contracting chickenpox? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Spots of rashes looking like mosquito bite. Red in color with slight swelling.

Hinglish_Question: Hi ne Proteinuria ka diagnosis 4 saal pehle hua tha aur around 1 saal tak cartico steroid se treatment hua. Proteinuria couple of weeks mein hi gayab ho gaya tha lekin treatment ko around 8 mahine tak continue kiya gaya.Meri sari reports consistently normal hain (Urine routine, spot test, 24 Hrs urine test, blood tests..etc) uske baad se lekin mujhe neck ke aas paas, abdomen aur lower part of legs mein swelling/edima hai. Hinglish_Question: Mujhe apne pairon par almost 4 hafte se daane hain. Yeh ek bahut jyada khujli wala daana mere left foot par shuru hua tha jisme raised bumps bhi the. Fir, ek ya do hafte ke baad woh mere right foot par bhi shuru hua. Uska image neeche attach hai. Aur phir, yeh mere dono pairon ke big toe par bhi ho gaya. Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, meri beti ne sirf teen hafto pehle kindergarten shuru kiya hai aur aaj ghar aayi hai with a rash all over her arms, hands, aur feet and one by her lip. Vaise toh woh theek hai par kabhi-kabhi itching hoti hai. Hamaare 7 saal ke neighbour ne abhi strep aur impetigo se theek hi hua hai aur mujhe ye jaanna hai ki kya ye wohi ho sakta hai. Ye hand, foot, and mouth jaisa dikhta hai. Woh pehle hi cough ke kaaran teen din ki school miss kar chuki hai par agar woh contagious hai toh main use bhejna nahi chahti. Hinglish_Question: Mujhe December mein herpes zoster virus ka diagnosis hua tha mere aankh ke aaspass tab se maine notice kiya hai ki meri sunne aur nazar uss taraf ki taraf kharab ho rahi hai. Please doctor, dekhiye in aankhon ko. Meri periods bhi irregular ho gayi hain aur dusre logo ki tulna mein mujhe jyada thand lagti hai lekin meri body temperature ko control karne mein pareshani hai kyunki wo 38.6 tak badhti rehti hai. Main hamesha thakan mahsoos karti hoon lekin mujhe kaha gaya hai ki ye herpes virus ki wajah se hai. Main abhi antiviral dawa carbamazipine aur naproxen le rahi hoon jisse mere lymph nodes mein dard hai lekin swelling nahi hai. Kya aapko lagta hai ki ye sab herpes virus ke sambandhit hai jo mere 4 mahine pehle tha ya kuch naya hai puri tarah se?

Trauma, allergy, strong blow of nose.

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor, mujhe teen din se congested throat hai (sath hi sath us par kuch white spots bhi hain). Doctors ne mujhe capsule Cefspan 400 mg, do baar roz, tablet Fexet 160 mg, ek baar roz, tablet Brufen 400 mg, do baar roz, aur Daktarin oral gel diya hai. Par koi fayda nahi ho raha hai. Hinglish_Question: Mere pass ek skin type ka sore hai, jo phatte hue hai aur kuch bhi nahi kaam kar raha hai jo OTC hai. Pehla socha ki shayad fungal ho ya bacterial koi problem hai skin mein - lekin phir bhi, kuch bhi over the counter kaam nahi kar raha hai. Lagta hai ki ye badh raha hai. Ye ek small problem skin mein shuru hui thi, aur scratching se bahut irritate ho gayi. Jalna nahi, bas ek annoying intense itching sensation deta hai - jiski wajah se main scratch karta hoon jab tak sore nahi ho jata hai. Iska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai.

Hinglish_Question: Mere paas ek Grade 3 sprained ankle hai. Main ek male hoon, 5"9, 160lbs. Pehle din bohot jyada swelling hui, ek softball ke size tak, aur raat bhar bruising shuru ho gaya. Doctor ne ye tay kiya ki ye ek Grade 3 sprain hai lekin mujhe ek projected recovery time diya 3-6 hafte ka jo ek Grade 2 sprain ke liye hota hai. Abhi tak mujhe kisi bhi weight ko bear karne ki salahiyat nahi hai lekin swelling bohot kam ho gayi hai, bruising wahi hai aur ab agar meri paer ko elevate nahi kiya jaye, to mujhe bohot zyada dard hota hai jiske karan main kaafi baar zameen par gir jata hoon. Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, mujhe yeh Herpes simplex saal mein ek ya do baar hota hai. Hinglish_Question: 55 saal ki aurat. UTI aur Renal Failure hai. PMHx: T2DM, HT Medication: 180mg Diltiazem, 100mg Metformin, 10mg Glibenclamide, aur 100mg Cartia. Pt ko yeh taklif hai: nausea & vomiting, feeling generally unwell, burning when passing urine, fatigue and low output. M.O ne Trimethoprim prescribe kiya hai UTI ke liye. U/A mein RBC +++, PROTEIN++, TRACE WBC aaya hai. Urine cloudy aur foul smelling hai. BLOODS: Na 135, K 5.5, Cl 108, Urea 12.0, Creatinine 1.5mg, Cholesterol 6, WBC 8, hB 105, Platelets 170, Hba1C 7%, Glucose 8.7, Total Protein 95.Pt ko bilateral pitting o 600ml fluid restrictions hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko (strict)OBS: BP 160/80, T 37.5, HR 95, RR 16 (Deep breathing pattern). Mujhe is info ke baare mein kya bata sakte ho. Kya aapko lagta hai ki yeh jyada UTI infection hai ya Jyada Renal Failure hai, aur kyun?
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the patient's condition more likely to be due to a UTI infection or renal failure based on the symptoms and lab results? The image here shows a medical condition related to edema. The left hand is swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Hi mere naak par ek bada benign tumor tha. 6th February ko woh tumor nikal diya gaya hai... naak par aur upper lip area par stitches the. Pehle hafte mein mere chehre par sujan thi, doosre hafte mein kaafi better tha... teesre hafte ke end mein dobara sujan aa gayi chehre ke stitches ke taraf... Doctor ne Flucloaxcillin ka ek course prescribe kiya hai... ab stitches ke aas paas ek hard area hai jo sujan nahi hai, balki ek gaanth ki tarah hai. Ye kya ho sakta hai aur kitna samay lagega iska thik hone mein?

Hinglish_Question: Hindi:Hi doctor, mujhe androgenic alopecia ke liye ek saal se zyada time se Finasteride 1 mg consume ho raha hai. Mere vertex par halka hair fall hai. Mere baal char saal pehle hi patle hone shuru hue, zyadatar vertex par. Meri umar 36 hai. Meri health excellent hai aur main shaadi shuda hoon. Ab, main baby ke liye plan kar raha hoon. Abhi, main sirf Finasteride le raha hoon. Lekin, pehle maine Minoxidil use kiya tha. Mere scalp bahut dry ho gaya tha, isliye maine 6 mahine pehle hi uska use bandh kar diya tha. Kyunki Finasteride women ke liye contraindicated hai, kya mere istemal se meri wife ko koi asar ho sakta hai
multimodal_Question_summ: Is there a risk of my wife being affected if I consume Finasteride for androgenic alopecia while trying for a baby? The image shows the condition of dry scalp. Dry and whitish scalp with dried skin.

Hinglish_Question: "Namaste doctor, mere paon ke talve mein, bade toe ke neeche ek black mole hai, kuch mahino se. Maine use nikala aur ab woh fail gaya hai. Mere talve ke neeche bhi dusre black moles hai. Skin ka top layer toota nahi hai, lekin kuch black moles ya dots hai (kuch badhe hue hai). Lekin jab maine Salicylic acid lagaya, toh ek mole ke andar bade black dots dekhe. Hata kar bhi, woh black dot wahi jagah par badhta hai. Mere paas psoriasis and plantar warts ka history hai. Ye kya hai? Melanoma, wart ya kuch aur? Uska image attached hai."

Hinglish_Question: 7 saal ke bacche ko 5 hafte se, sore throat aur cough hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Samjha tha ki ye allergies hain. Hinglish_Question: Main Hyderabad se Rajesh hoon. Pehle saal se mujhe poori body par rashes aane lage hain. Main ne Cetizen 10mg use kiya hai. Lekin samasya abhi bhi hai, mujhe kya karna chahiye? Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, main ek swasth aur sakriy 17 saal ki ladki hoon. Mere right calf ya lower leg mein sitting par sujan hai. Meri legs mein koi samasya nahi hai. Sujan calf mein hoti hai aur agar main ghumti rehti hoon toh ek ghante ke andar chali jaati hai. Raat mein mujhe pasina aata hai. Mere sharir par aasani se kale daag padte hain, hamesha thand lagti hai aur thakan hoti hai. Mere circulation problem aur varicose veins ke test negative aaye hai. Meri blood tests mein positive ANA, slightly low WBC aur RBC, aur thodi anemia hai. Yeh leg swelling last two months se ho rahi hai. Kripya pair mein hua kuch cheez dekhein.

Skin thodi se bruised lagti hai par pata nahi chalta hai woh bahut light lagti hai aur yeh bahut time se aisi hi hai. Mujhe issey koi ek mahine pehle notice hua tha. Mujhe chinta ho rahi hai, yeh kya ho sakta hai.

Hinglish_Question: Mere bete ke gardan ke niche, uske daaye kaan ke niche ek sujan wala lal sujan hai. Use dard ho raha hai aur wo sirf apna sir thoda sa idhar-udhar hilaa sakta hai. Woh sirf 6 saal ka hai aur dard mein hai. Mein itna chintit hoon. Kya ye abscess hai.

Hinglish_Question: Meri beti ko throat infection hai, aur usko abhi 10 din se antibiotics ki dawai chal rahi hai. 8 din toh ho gaye hai. Jab hii sudden uske sharir par rashes aane lage. Humne uski khane ki cheezein review ki, usne chix khaya tha, aur noodles jisme seafoods the, khaskar shrimp aur squid. Humne doctor ke paas jaake unko dikhaya, aur unhone uske antibiotics change kiye aur kaha ki ye antibiotics ke reaction hai jo woh le rahi hai. Unhone mujhe penicillin rahit ek aur dawai di aur bendryl bhi diya.. Us raat usne fried chix khaya. Kyunki unhone kaha ki ye khaane se nahi hai, maine usse kaha usse nahi khana chahiye chix for some time. Bas mujhe uske rashes hii pareshan kar rahe hai, poore sharir par hai, aur koi aur lakshan nahi hai. Woh dikhane ke liye image attached hai neeche.

Kya yeh area chhota ho jayega. Agar nahi, toh mujhe suna hai ki filler ko reverse aur breakup karne ke liye ek injection hota hai jo diya jata hai. Kya mujhe uske liye jana chahiye. Swelling thodi dard bhi ho rahi hai, par koi jalan ya lalima nahi hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko neeche diye gaye hai. Hinglish_Question: Mere pati ke andar ke jaangho par ek rash hai. Khujli nahi hoti hai. Mujhe ise 1:30 baje raat me notice hua. Woh 5:30 baje uthkar ultiyaan, dast aur vomit karne lage. Hinglish_Question: Namaste, meri beti 8 saal ki hai aur maine uske hoth ke andar aur chin par ajeeb si chotiya dekhi hai. Maine use pucha ki kya use chot lagi hai toh usne bola nahi. Maine pucha ki kya use school mein kal chot lagi hai, toh usne phir bhi nahi kaha. Wo thak gayi lag rahi hai, wahi toh hai. Lekin uske pass medical issues hai, jaise ki bladder aur bowel ki incontinence hai. Uski bladder ke liye 2009 se mitroffanoff hai aur abhi bowel ke liye c tube insert karne ki zaroorat hai. Hum toh abhi hafta bhar pehle hi Toronto, Ontario mein sick kids ke check ups se wapas aaye hai, toh ho sakta hai ki wo kuch viral infection pick kar li ho. Kripya doctor, niche di gayi vartaman condition ko dekhein. Main bahut pareshan hoon aur mujhe kuch samajh nahi aa raha ki kya karna chahiye. Pata nahi ki aapko ye sab samajh aata hai ya nahi, lekin isliye mujhe bahut jagah dard ho raha hai. Kaam meri madad nahi kar raha hai, mujhe apne bills bharna hoga. Iska samay par bhugtan kar paana mushkil hai. Dhanyawad ki aapne is par dhyaan diya, mujhe khud ko pata nahi ki kya ho raha hai meri body mai. Mujhe is samay keemat chukani nahi hai, dhanyawad.

Hinglish_Question:

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, meri bikini line par six months se ek chota sa ganth tha aur mujhe iske baare mein jyada tension nahi thi. Ab ye ganth karib ek ich ya thoda sa badi ho gayi hai. Iski thodi si oval shape hai, hard aur rubbery feel hoti hai, aur ek jagah fixed hai. Mujhe yakeen nahi hai ki ye ek deep, infected ingrown hair hai ya phir ek suj gaya lymph node hai. Iska sthan seedhe meri jangh aur yoni ke beech mein hai. Mujhe ek saal pehle gutate psoriasis bhi diagnose hua tha aur uske baad se mere peeth par halki si khujli ya skin discoloration hai (original outbreak ke time ye spots puri torso aur kuch pubic region mein the). Maine padha hai ki psoriasis lymphoma se bhi juda hua ho sakta hai, isliye mujhe is baat se sabse zyada chinta hoti hai. Uske liye attached image hai.

Hinglish_Question: Jab mein Texas shift hui tab meri skin din bhar bahut itching karne lagi thi lekin zyada raat mein hoti thi jab sone ki koshish kar rahi hoti hun isliye maine shake karne ki aadat daal li thi kabhi kabhi itna bura ho jata tha ki sone nahi milta tha. Maine gold bond lotion use karna shuru kiya tha wo accha kaam karta tha lekin kuch der ke baad wapas problem ho gayi. Fir meine apne hometown mein shift hua aur thodi der baad itching band ho gayi thi lekin phir mein Hawaii shift hui aur yaha pe fir se shuru ho gayi thi lekin ye zyada bura tha pura badan itching kar raha tha aur mere pet pe rash ho gaya phir face pe aur ab mere haath pe, peeth pe aur gardan pe chote-chote dane bhi ho gaye hain. Saath hi aisa lagta hai jaise insects mujhe kaat rahe hain jabki kuch nishan nahi hai. Mujhe kya karna chahiye pata nahi. Uska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai.

Hinglish_Question: Hi mere 24 saal ki ladki hoon aur lagbhag ek hafte pehle maine apni gardan ke right side ke aas-paas jaw bone ke paas ek gaanth mehsoos kiya tha. Doctor, kripya meri patient ki image dekhiye, mere gardan mein kuch samasya hai. Isme koi dard nahi hai, bas thoda pareshan karne wala hai. Meri maa keh rahi hai ki ye meri thyroid ho sakti hai kyunki meri haath aur paon bahut pasina kartey hain aur main abhi ke samay mein aksar thakan mahasoos karti hoon. Bas thoda doubt hai ki ye emergency hai ya kya iska intezaar kar sakte hain, kyunki mere paas koi insurance nahi hai.

Hinglish_Question: Mere poti ki skin dry hai aur uske legs par aur hair par whitish discoloration ki patches hai aur uski scalp bhi dry hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Humne usko beach par le jane ke baad ye khaas taur par notice kiya hai. Wo sirf 3 mahine ki hai par ye ab jyada dikhayi dene lag raha hai. Dono parents ki history me eczema ki hai. Hum iske bare mein kya karein, ye samajh nahi aa raha hai...
multimodal_Question_summ: Summary: 3-month-old with dry, blotchy, discolored skin on legs, hair patches, and dry scalp after a beach visit. Parents have eczema history. The image shows the condition of skin rash. Annular patches (ring like) with red/brownish colored lining all over the leg.

Hinglish_Question: Main ek 24 saal ka ladka hoon, 235 lbs ka hoon. Mujhe apne daaye taraf jaw-line ke niche gale mein ek ganth hai.Doctor please, dekhein patient ki image ko mere gale mein kuch problem hai niche di gayi hai. Lagta hai ki yeh lymph node ho sakta hai. Ganth ka diameter lagbhag 4cm hai. Meri daaye taraf jeebh ke neeche bhi pressure hai. Lagta hai ki sujan upar ki taraf push ho rahi hai. Jab mai apni jeebh se sujji hui jagah ko chhuta hoon toh bahut dard aur tenderness hota hai. Jab mai khaana khane ki koshish karta hoon ya khane ke baare mein sochta hoon, sujan badh jati hai aur dard zyada takleef deta hai. Ye symptoms teen saal pehle dikhaye gaye the jab mere daanto par root canal kiya gaya tha. Root canal ke baad, sujan shuru ho gayi thi jab ek chhota opening bana aur liquid nikalna shuru hua. Symptoms pichle saal firse dikhaye gaye the, jab mere jeebh ke neeche bahut dard hota tha- lagta tha jeebh ke neeche kuch uljha hua hai. Usi area mein lalima dikhai di thi. Kal symptoms phirse dikhaye gaye the jab mai salad kha raha tha- woh uljha hua lag raha hai. Nigalne mein dard hota hai aur mujhe bhojan kam karne mein takleef hoti hai. Aapko is information ke basis par diagnosis kya lagta hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the diagnosis for a 24-year-old male with a 4cm lump under the jawline, tenderness, pain, and difficulty eating? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The neck below the jaw contains a cyst like structure.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe do hafte pehle aankh ke palkon par machchar ne kaata tha. Doctor ke paas gaya kyun ki aankh band tha. Wo infected ho gaya tha aur unhone mujhe antibiotics, steroidal dawa aur antihistamine diya. Antibiotics lene ke baad ab mujhe kaafi accha ho gaya hai. Lekin ab phir se khujli ho rahi hai (swollen nahi hai) aur mere upper eyelid ke kone par ek pustule hai, jiske upar ke lash line par hai. Mein kya karu? Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko.

Mere sar mein dard aur lower back pain bhi tha. Aaj maine dengue ke liye test karwaya, par wo negative tha. Halaanki, mere torso, gaal aur chehre par laal daag hai. Ye daag khujli nahi karte hai aur phaate hue hai, aur ye skin ke neeche dikh rahe hai. Meri platelet count 79,000 hai. Main abhi Ibuprofen le rahi hoon. Mujhe ye soch rahe the ki kya ho sakta hai ki maine dengue ke liye bahut jaldi test karwaya tha aur ho sakta hai ki abhi bhi dengue ho. Agar ye dengue nahi hai, toh ye kya ho sakta hai. Kripaya salah dein. Kya karne ka?

Hinglish_Question: Mere ungliyon aur kalaiyon par ek laal rash tha jo mere kohini tak tha; mere haathon par jahan par skin tooti huyi hai, vahan se peeli liquid bah rahi hai.Itni tez itching ho rahi thi. Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, meri maa 56 saal ki hai. Ek mahine se lagatar sore tonsils and dry cough se pareshan hai. Cough bahut tej hai. Tonsils ki problem samay samay par sudharti hai aur kharab ho jati hai. Kripya dekhein neeche attach ki gayi image. Unki asthmatic problem ki history hai. Humne doctors se consult kiya hai aur teeno courses of antibiotics liye hain. Humne bahut saare tests bhi karwaye hai par koi result nahi mila hai. Cough ki problem abhi tak hai aur antibiotics ke prolonged courses ke karan wo abhi kamzor mehsoos karti hai aur unke muh mein bhi kuch problem hai. Unhe persistent cough se thakan mehsoos ho rahi hai. Hum kya karein.

Hinglish_Question: Hello Dr, mere bete ke sir ke crown par kuch black spot hain aur unpar thodi si light scabs hain jinhe usne khujli karke choose kar liya hai, jiski wajah se thoda sa khoon nikla hai. Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor,Meri hontho ke aas paas ki skin hamesha hi sukhi aur upar se chipakne wali hai. Kripya dekhein is vartaman condition ko. Hinglish_Question: Char hafte pehle mujhe apne hath par kuch chote chote laal dane nazar aaye aur maine samjha ki ye machar ke katne ke nishan hain. Iske alawa main thande nahaane ka upyog karti hoon, raat ko calamine lotion lagati hoon aur khujli se bachne ki koshish karti hoon. Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor,main ek 25 saal ka mard hoon. Main ek soccer player hoon aur iske karan meri ghutnon aur paidon par kuch istamal se takraav hai, lekin mujhe kabhi bhi koi significant chot nahi aayi hai. Lagbhag ek hafta pahle maine soccer khelte hue apni ghutne ko chot di. Jab maine ghutne ko chot kiya tha toh mere paon mein planted motion nahi tha, isliye mujhe lagta hai ki ye ACL nahi hai, lekin ek hafta guzar gaya hai aur mera ghutna sudhar nahi raha hai. Do din chot lagne ke baad mujhe ghutne par itna dard hone ke wajah se bina kuch sahara ke chalna mushkil ho gaya tha, lekin tab se mujhe thoda kam dard hota hai, sirf chote distances ke liye. Mai ek college student hoon, isliye school se ghar aane ke baad mera ghutna chalne se bahut dard karta hai. Mere pas abhi bahut hi limited range of motion hai. Main apna ghutna thoda sa mushkil se seedha kar sakta hoon, lekin main ise piche bend nahi kar sakta. Piche bend karne par main use lagbhag 90 degree tak kar sakta hoon, lekin uss point par mujhe rokna padta hai kyunki mujhe lagta hai ki mera ghutna daba hua hai aur pressurized hone ke wajah se fat jayega. Jab maine kuch wahakato mein apne paon ko kisi cheez par phasa diya hai, jiske wajah se meri taang 90 degree se jyada bend ho gayi hai, tab mujhe ghutne mein ghatak dard hota hai. Aur mujhe thodi si visible swelling hai, lekin lagta hai ki wo andar se suj gayi hai. Mujhe ye jaan na hai ki kya mujhe turant ek doctor se salah leni chahiye ya phir kya mai kuch hafte tak khud se sudharnemein wait karu. Aapki koi bhi salah bahut meharbani hogi. Kripya dekhiye is vartaman condition ko doctor.Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko.

Baad mein dekha gaya ki mera BP 140/100 ke range mein hai, isliye dosage bada di gayi: Amlogard 10mg, Lorem 5mg subah aur Amlogard 5mg, Lorem 5mg raat ko. Main iss dosage ko le raha tha aur mera BP normally 130/85-90 ho jaata tha ya kabhi-kabhi 140/90 bhi ho jaata tha. Lagbhag 2.5 mahine pehle, jab main regular check up ke liye nephrologist ke paas gaya tha, mera BP 150/100 tha aur isliye mujhe Lorem 5mg prescribe kiya gaya, same as before, Amlogard 20mg subah aur 10mg sham ko. Kuch din baad increased dose lene ke baad, mujhe apne paon mein sujan aur pairon ki girth mein badhti dekhne lagi. Kripya dekhein something happened on foot below. Aur mujhe raat mein bahut itching hoti hai. Pairon ke upar, dono pairon mein red patches dikhai dete hain - jab maine is stae ko Nephrologist ke saath share kiya, mujhe venous mapping ke liye jaane ka advice diya gaya hai, lekin maine abhi tak yeh test nahi karwaya hai. Kripya salah dein, kya sahi me S.Numlo mein amlodipine hai, toh Amlogard kyun band kar diya gaya aur kya iss sujan ka karan hai amlodipine ya kuchh aur hai. Dhanyavaad red patches not reduced (main generally yahi karti hoon jab lena shuru
