Lag raha hai jaise ye kisi nerve par press kar rahi ho. Kya ye ek common scenario hai.. First time for me.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the growth on the upper right arm muscle, which has grown over a year and is now tender, causing nerve compression? The image shows the condition of hand lump. Lump on the small fingers side of the palm.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor,Mere pita, jinki umar 45 saal hai, chemotherapy mein hain ek badi surgery ke baad jisme unka pet nikala gaya tha. Unhe Non-Hodgkin lymphoma hai. Unhe R-CHOP dawa di ja rahi hai. Ab, chemotherapy ke dusre cycle ke baad 9 din ho gaye hain aur unhe mjhe danton mein dard ho raha hai, jisme se ek food pipe pe hai. Doctor ne sujhav diya hai ki khane se pahle Lignocaine hydrochloride ka estheshan prayog karein taaki dard se bacha ja sake. Unhe munh mein dard sehna sambhav hai lekin jab bhojan ulcer pe jo food pipe pe hai, use chhoohta hai, toh woh bahut takleef hoti hai.Please doctor, dekhiye hamare munh ko neeche. Woh ulcer pe Mucaine gel le rahe hain. Kya koi jaldi se upaay hai. Kya Lignocaine ya Lidocaine ya Xylocaine hydrochloride 2% nigal sakte hain. Kripaya sahayta karein.
multimodal_Question_summ: Can Lignocaine or Lidocaine or Xylocaine hydrochloride 2% be swallowed for painful mouth ulcers and ulcer on the food pipe? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers.

Hinglish_Question: Kya Evion 400 capsules skin ke dryness ko treat karne ke liye use kiye ja sakte hain? Kyunki meri skin bahut dry hai aur hamesha khujli kar rahi hai, moisturizing creams jaise cocoa butter aur wheat germ oil wale bhi lagane ke baad bhi. Uska image neeche attach hai. Kya aap iska upyog karne se skin ko relief milega? Please suggest kijiye.
multimodal_Question_summ: Can Evion 400 capsules effectively treat severe dry and itchy skin that is unresponsive to moisturizing creams? The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_dryness. Dryskin with small peels of skin coming out.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe October 25th ko knee replacement surgery hui thi. Tab se kabhi kabhi mujhe itching hoti hai, mainly affected leg par, lekin thoda sa to dusre leg par bhi hoti hai. Koi real rash nahi hai, lekin jab main usko scratch karta hoon, to ye hives ki tarah lump up hojati hai. Ye almost always raat ko hoti hai. Din mein, mujhe kaafi kam itching hoti hai aur koi rash nahi hai. Uski image neeche attached hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of itchy skin with hives-like lumps primarily on the affected leg occurring mostly at night after knee replacement surgery? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mere left elbow ke tip par ek spongey lump hai, bilkul bhi dard nahi hai. Ye teen hafton se waha hai. Mujhe yaad nahi aa raha ki maine ise kaise takraaya ho. Doctor, iske liye image neeche attach ki hai. Main right-handed carpenter hoon. Meri umra 58 saal hai, lambai 6 foot aur vajan 105 kg hai. Mujhe 5-6 saal pehle halka dil ka daura aaya tha, stent insert kiya gaya tha.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a painless, spongey lump on the left elbow of a carpenter with a history of heart attack and stent insertion? The image shows the condition of hand lump. Oval shaped swelling the on the palm side of hand below the middle finger.

Hinglish_Question: Mere 21 mahine ke bacche ki skin red raised rash ho jaati hai, lagta hai ki ye cinnamon toast khane ke baad hota hai lekin hum soch rahe hain ki iska kaaran sugar free syrup bhi ho sakta hai. Ye sugar free jelly ke saath bhi ho chuka hai. Kya koi tarika hai Sugar free products dene ka jisse unse usko nuksaan na ho? Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Agar uski skin par rash hoti hai toh ye use andar se kya harm kar rahi hai. Dhanyavaad!
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the red raised rash on the 21 month old's skin caused by cinnamon toast or sugar free products, and is it harmful internally? The image shows the condition of skin rash.Cluster of circular red rashes on the skin. Red around the rasied edges and clear skin in the center.

Hinglish_Question: Maine Monday ko Dentist ke paas jaake apne daant aur masoode saaf karwaye the us buzzing drill se. Wo mujhe bohot gehre takhleef hua tha meri mouth mein aur wo bottom lip se gum tak waale skin part par drill kiya tha. Please doctor, vartaman area ki image dekhein neeche. Ye kaise rokein? Ye bohot pareshaani cause kar raha hai aur mujhe thoda sa bhi baat karne se rok raha hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What should I do to alleviate bothersome lip swelling and difficulty talking caused by drilling near the gum? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Swelling on the lower lip's right central buldging part. Disformation of lip shape.

Hinglish_Question: Hi, meri chotti si bacchi hai, wo 2 saal ki hai. Usko aaj flucloxacillin prescribe kiya gaya hai. Usko bahut digiye hue black marks hain, wo chote chote phode lagte hain aur wo shikayat karti hai ki unhe dard ho raha hai aur khujli ho rahi hai. Uske bade bhai ko chicken pox ho gaya tha...kya usko chicken pox ka bahut bura skin reaction ho sakta hai? Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Usko abhi tak spots nahi hain, sirf ye ajeeb sa skin reaction hai aur thodi si temperature hai, uske alawa wo normal tareeke se khaana aur peena kar rahi hai. Kripaya salah dein.
multimodal_Question_summ: Could the 2-year-old's painful and itchy skin rash, along with a slight fever, be a severe reaction to chickenpox? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Oval shaped or circular red patches on the leg. Little swelling and dryness on the patches with foldings of skin.

Hinglish_Question: Mere ek hafte se dard ho raha hai toothache lekin 4 din pehle mere left tonsils suj gaye. Kripya dekhein doctor, affected area ki image neeche hai. Isne mere left eye ke niche bhi sujjan paida ki hai. Kal raat se mere pet mein takleef ho rahi hai aur aaj mere gaal mein numbness ka ahsaas hai. Main ibuprofen le rahi hoon aur swelling kam karne ke liye ice packs ka upyog kar rahi hoon lekin kuch kaam nahi kar raha hai. Kya ye ek infection ho sakta hai? Mujhe naukri nahi hai aur mera boyfriend hi kaam kar rahe hain, isliye hum cash ki wajah se thode tight hain abhi.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is toothache accompanied by swollen tonsils, under eye swelling, stomach pain, and cheek numbness a sign of infection? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. There swollen red mass present in the back of the throat.

Hinglish_Question: Mere 11 saal ke bacche ne abhi abhi ek baby tooth kho diya hai, uske permanent teeth uske peeche se bahar aane lage the, isliye woh ise aage push kar rahi thi. Mujhe notice hua hai ki jab humne baby tooth nikal diya hai, uske gum ke upar ek taza red skin jaisa tukda hai jahan uske teeth the, kya ye normal hai ya kya mein use kal dentist ke paas le jana chahiye? Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the presence of a fresh, very red skin growth on the gum after losing a baby tooth normal? Should the patient see a dentist? The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_growth. There are red mass elevated from the surface on the skin having smooth surface.

Hinglish_Question: Mere legs aur arms ki skin par hamesha kisi na kisi problem rehti hai. Har baar sirf ek rash hota hai aur har baar alag jagah par. Ye kya ho sakta hai? Mujhe kam se kam 10 saal se ya may be jyada se ye problem hai. Uski image neeche attached hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a persistent skin rash appearing on different areas of the arms or legs over 10 years? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, mere eyes ke aas paas lagbhag teen aur aadhe saal pehle maine Co2 laser treatment karaya tha. Ab mere aankhon ke neeche dark circles, hyperpigmentation aur redness hai. Lagbhag ek aur aadhe hafte pehle, doctor ne mujhe ek cream prescribe ki hai jisme Kojic acid 1%, Glycolic acid 5%, Betamethasone dipropionate 0.1% aur Chamomile extract 5% hai. Doctor ne mujhe bataya hai ki main iss cream ko raat ko lights off karke lagao. Par mujhe koi sudhar nahi dikhai de raha hai. Mujhe lagta hai ki yeh bahut bura lag raha hai. Ab main kya kar sakti hoon. Main apni tasveerein upload kar rahi hoon. Main Bepanthen aur sunscreen bhi istemal kar rahi hoon. Vartaman mein main Synthyroid, Cytomel aur Progesterone le rahi hoon. Tasveer iske neeche attach ki gayi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What are the possible solutions for dark circles, hyperpigmentation, redness, and lack of improvement in skin condition after laser treatment? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Hi, mujhe November ke shuru mein ek infected wisdom tooth tha. Iski wajah se meri left side ke face mein sujan aa gayi thi. Maine ek oral surgeon ko dikhaaya jo mujhe antibiotics diye taaki ye sujan clear ho jaaye jab tak main appointment  lekar unhe remove karwa saku. Sujan kam ho gayi thi lekin is samay maine notice kiya ki mere jaw ke left side ke neeche ke lymph nodes dusre side se bade hain. Unse koi dard nahi hota lekin aap bilkul farq mehsoos kar sakte hain. Maine padha hai ki kabhi-kabhi wisdom teeth ke infections ke sath ye hota hai. Ek hafte ya doosre baad maine apne chaar wisdom teeth remove karwa liye aur sab theek tha. Main recovery ko seriously nahi liya kyun ki mujhe sirf ek hafte tak antibiotics liye the jab tak dard nahi gaya, bottle khatam nahi ki. Isliye yahan hum February ke shuru mein hain aur mujhe notice hua hai ki us side ke lymph nodes abhi bhi sujhe hue hain aur pichle hafte mein maine notice kiya hai ki meri left tonsil dusre se jyada sujhi hui hai. Please doctor, dekhiye iss affected area ki image ko. Fir bhi dard nahi hota hai lekin jab main nigalne ki koshish karta hoon, mujhe thoda sa taklif mehsoos hoti hai. Mujhe lagta hai ki ab iska bada hissa psychology ho sakta hai kyun ki main iske baare mein bahut chinta kar raha hoon. Bas mujhe curious hai ki kya aapne kabhi is baare mein suna hai aur kya aapko pata hai ki main kya karu.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing persistent lymph node swelling and a swollen tonsil without pain or fever after wisdom teeth removal? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. The tonsils are red and swollen.

Hinglish_Question: 28 saal ka purush, Ski durghatna February 20 ko hui. Mri reports mein acl complete midsubstance tear aur possible lateral meniscus tear dikha rahe hain. 2 mahine baad acl reconstructive surgery hogi. Tab tak, ghutne ka extend limit hai aur puri extend se lagbhag 5-6 degrees kam hai aur thodi si dard hoti hai jab stairs se chalne mein. Knee mein koi bhi signs of buckling nahi hain. Mera sawal ye hai ki jab main ghutne ko extend karne ki koshish karta hoon toh ghutne ki lateral side par ek chota lump mehsoos hota hai. Doctor, kripya neeche di gayi image dekhe. Abhi knee mein koi sujan nahi hai. Kya yeh lump torn lateral meniscus hai jo main mehssoh kar raha hoon ya fir acl stump ho sakta hai. Dhanyawad.
multimodal_Question_summ: Could the small lump on the lateral side of the knee be the torn lateral meniscus or the ACL stump? The image here shows a medical condition related to knee_swelling. The knee has a swelling with a slight pain.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe abhi ek tree service mein kaam karte hue Christmas lights lagaane mein kaam kar raha hoon aur mere skin mein kuch problem ho gayi hai, Mujhe is rash ki problem ko lagbhag 4 din se hai. Meri aankhon mein sujan hai aur subah ke samay mein crusty hai. Mere haathon, gardan aur chehre par red spots (rash) hai. Aur meri rash bahut khujli karti hai. Mujhe kabhi bhi pine trees ya trees se koi allergic reaction nahi hua hai, lekin mai abhi CO se MI mein shift hua hoon. Mai face mask pehanta hoon, meri haath pair cover hai, aur kaam karte samay bahut thandi hai. Madad kijiye. Uski image neeche attach ki gayi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What are the possible causes for a skin rash, swollen and crusty eyes, and red spots on arms, neck, and face? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor, Mere lower lid par chalazion tha aur usko ek mahine pehle remove kar diya gaya tha. Lekin abhi tak wo bump gayab nahi hua hai aur us par thodi si redness hai. Aur jab maine ise remove karvaya tha, toh mere doctor ne kaha ki mere blepharitis hai. Lekin mere aankhon mein dard nahi hai aur palakon ka rang bhi nahi hai. Jab tak mera chalazion puri tarah se gayab aur flat ho jayega? Kya main phir se eye makeup kar sakti hoon? Kyunki ye ek cheez hai jiske bina mujhe confident feel nahi hota hai. Ye bahut depressing ho raha hai mujhe. Iske liye attach ki gayi image hai neeche.
multimodal_Question_summ: Patient query: Will the chalazion on the lower lid ever fully resolve and flatten, allowing me to wear eye makeup confidently again? The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_growth. There is black coloured tissue/mass elevated from the surface on the skin.

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor, mujhe past four nights se daily 101 degree fever hai. Two days back, mere scrotum pe kuch white spots aaye aur mere muh mein bahut saare ulcer hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is mouth ko neeche. Mujhe yeh confirm nahi hai ki white spots ulcers hai ya nahi, lekin unmein dard ya khujli nahi hoti hai. Fever intermittent hai, mostly evening ya night mein hota hai. Mere pass running nose ya loose motion nahi hai. Mujhe sore throat hone laga hai. Mere thode mild night sweats aur chills hai. Abhi tak maine koi antibiotic nahi liya hai. Lekin last four days se daily teen tablets Paracetamol (650 mg) li hai. Mujhe photosensitivity ya joint pain nahi hai. Meri skin pretty oily hai aur mere face pe acne hai. Kripya apne sujhav dein.
multimodal_Question_summ:
What could be the cause of intermittent fever, white spots on scrotum, mouth ulcers, sore throat, and mild night sweats? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. White coloured circular patch/ swelling with red coloured margin present on the inner skin of lower lip, imner skin of left cheek, above the teeth and below the tongue.
Condition- Aphthous ulcer

Hinglish_Question: Meri wife hal hi me, raat ko, apni peeth, chhati, gardan aur upper pairon par khujli se mutasir hui hai. Sirf ek cheez hai jise Unhone nayi start ki hai, vo skin lotion hai jise unhone kal liya tha; Vaseline Aloe fresh moisturizing body gel with "100% natural aloe vera" Ingredients dekh kar, is gel me bahut kuch hai. Unhone thoda benedril liya hai lekin effective nahi lag raha hai. Koi sujhav ho to bataein. Is gel me ingredients hai; pentylene glycol, isoceteth-20, glycerin, aloe barbadenasis, leaf juice, cucumis sativus, fruit extract, peg-14, peg-33, peg-8, dimethicone, acrylates/c-10-30 alkyl acrylate crosspolymer, potassium hydroxide, fragrance, disodium edta, methylparraben, dmdm hydantoin...wo kehti hai ki unhone sirf ek thoda sa chehre par lagaaya tha raat ko. Iska image neeche diya gaya hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of rash on back, chest, neck, and upper legs after using Vaseline Aloe Fresh lotion? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Kya FLUTIBACT skin ke inflammation ke liye istemal hota hai jab skin rashes ke baad skin par affected hota hai? Skin ke inflammation ke center ke aas pas hard paye jate hain, jo thoda sa red hota hai aur uske aas pas ki skin itching karti hai. Skin ke inflammation bacterial infections ke karan hone ka shakkarate hain, kyunki skin rashes ke natije me skin par thode se chote chote ghav bhi aye hain.
multimodal_Question_summ: "Is Flutibact effective for treating bacterial skin inflammation characterized by itching, redness, hard bumps, and associated with skin rashes?" The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mere 5 mahine ke bacche mein pichle hafte se kuch problem dikh rahi hai mere skin mein. Chote res bumps, poore peeth par cover ho rahe hain aur chehre par bhi hain, lekin itne zyada nahi. Mujhe lagta tha ki ye ya toh laundry detergent se hai ya uske bath soap ko achhe se rinse nahi kiya gaya hai. Bacche ke chehre par ke chote bumps gayab hone lag rahe hain, lekin peeth ke chote bumps ab bhi hai. Ab hum ek hafte ke liye hotel mein stay kar rahe hain aur bacche ne pool mein bhi dip liya. Ab uske hairline aur ears ke peeche se bright pink splotchy looking rash ho gaya hai. Ise khujli bhi ho rahi hai. Iski image attached hai neeche.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a skin rash with small bumps on the back and face, and a subsequent bright pink splotchy rash after swimming in a pool? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe lagatar kisi problem se pareshani hai mere mo mein aur tongue ulcers hai aur lagta hai ki meri jeebh suj gayi hai, jab main leta hoon toh mere muh mein lagatar saliva bharta hai aur main use swallow karna padta hai yeh bahut annoying hai aur mujhe koshish karni padti hai apne gardan ko upar ki taraf rakh kar soone ki. Please doctor dekhiye is affected area ki image neeche. Mere kaan bhi dard kar rahe hain, yeh ek chalta hua condition hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Summary: Patient experiences frequent mouth and tongue ulcers, swollen tongue, excessive saliva, difficulty sleeping, and painful ears. The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. Circular slightly white ulcer on the tip of the tongue. Redness and little swelling around.

Hinglish_Question: Hi, mujhe abhi ye ajeeb si kharish ho rahi hai jo roz badti ja rahi hai. Agar meri heartbeat baadhti hai ya mujhe dar lagta hai to mere sharir par garam aur gaane jaisa ehsaas hota hai aur agar main khujlate bhi nahi, to mere sharir par bahut saari nails ho jaati hai. Ye garam aur bardasht nahi ho sakne wali hai. Isse mujhe bahut stress aur chinta hoti hai kyunki main kuch bhi thoda bhi physical karne ke bina is garam kharish mein phat jaati hoon. Kya ye kisi food ya drink ki allergy ho sakti hai? Aur kya iska koi tarika hai jisse ye kabhi na ho? Koi dawai hai jo ise dur karde. Maine apna detergent aur body wash bhi check kiya hai, wo hi toh main hamesha istemaal karti hoon. Neeche uska image hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing the patient's worsening rash, hot and singing sensation, and anxiety, even with no physical activity? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mere dad 2 din pehle guzar gaye, unko cirrhosis thi lekin mujhe jaanna hai ki unki maut ka kaaran kya tha. Lagbhag ek hafte mein sthiti bahut kharab ho gayi, woh poore din so rahe the, phir bed se bhi uthne na paa rahe the, khana peena se bilkul bandh kar diye, phir unki zubaan suj gayi aur woh baat karne aur hosh mein rehne mein dikkat ho rahi thi, aur unki jaan ke aakhri do din mein woh hil nahi sakte the, baat nahi kar sakte the aur aankh jhapakne mein bhi mushkil ho rahi thi. Woh coma mein the jab woh guzar gaye, unki mauth se muh se foam nikla aur unke left eye se fluid beh raha tha. Please doctor, dekhiye in aankhon ko. Mujhe sirf jaanna hai ki unki jaan kis cheez ne le li.
multimodal_Question_summ: What medical condition caused the rapid decline of a patient with cirrhosis, including swollen tongue, coma, and eye inflammation? The image shows the condition of eye inflamation. Blood vessels of the one side very red and inflamed.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, 7 din pehle mujhe conjunctivitis hua tha. Mere aankh lal ho gayi thi aur ankhlid suj gayi thi. Mene Moxifloxacin hydrochloride ka istemal kiya tha pehle hi din se, har 2 ghante mein. Fir maine Fluorometholone ko 4 baar roz aur Cyclosporine ko 3 baar roz shuru kiya hai. Aur ab 2 din se meri aankh dhundhli ho gayi hai. Lalima gayab ho gayi hai lekin dhundhlaapan abhi tak present hai. Kripya madad karein. Uska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing blurred vision after treating conjunctivitis with Moxifloxacin, Fluorometholone, and Cyclosporine? The image here shows a medical condition related to eye_redness. The eye has started to become red from canthus.

Hinglish_Question: Maine aaj subah jaldi uthkar khujli ki awaaz suni. Jaldi hi uske baad, maine apne beech wale ungli ki sujhan aur phoolna dekha. Thodi der baad, meri right foot bhi sujhne lagi.Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko.Phir meri ghutane suj gayi. Phir dusri hath ki beech wali ungli. Phir meri kalaiyan. Phir meri kohniyan. Sankshipt mein kahoon toh, sab joints suj gaye hain. Maine 2 doses Benadryl li, aur khujli tham gayi, lekin sujhan halke se kam hua hai. Kya aur koi ghar par upay hai jisse ye sujhan thik ho jaye. Ye dard nahi hai, bus bahut irritating hai. Doctor ke paas jane ke alava koi salah ho toh, uska aapka pura samarthan hoga. Dhanyavaad!
multimodal_Question_summ: What potential home remedies can minimize swelling in multiple joints accompanied by itching? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The ankle of the foot is swollen with brown discolouration.

Hinglish_Question: Hi Doctor, Good Evening.Meri wife last 30 saal se filaria patient hai. Isne uski right leg tak asar kiya hua hai, knee level tak. Kuch foot mein hua hai, please dekhiye. Ab tak koi bukhar nahi hai. Kya mein Benocide Forte tablets use kar sakta hoon. Aur kya supplementary medicine leni chahiye. Wo 58 saal ki hai aur diabetic hai. Uski 49 Kgs hai. Right wrist mein ek fracture ke baad 10 mahine se usko neck se wrist tak running pain ho raha hai. Orthos ke hisaab se wrist joint theek hai aur unhone physiotherapy ka sujhav diya. Uske ungliyan phool gayi thin aur ab wapas normal ho gayi hain. Right hand ke finger movements abhi bhi stiff hain. Wo tense aur thaki hui hai is wajah se. Kya aap kuch help kar sakte hain? Alvi.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of foot swelling in a filaria patient with diabetes, along with running pain from neck to wrist? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The foot has turned red and blue and swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Hi, main Hawaii mein rehti hoon. Humne haal hi mein ek 12 din ka trip Wyo & Montana par kiya tha jahan bahut thand aur sukha hua tha. Uske antim din mujhe neeche ki peeth par ek rash patch se uth gaya. Mein use mehsoos kar sakti thi, lekin dikha nahi sakti thi, mere pati ne kaha ki twacha lal aur puckered thi. Humare wapas aane ka safar bahut lamba tha, lagbhag 24 ghante ke baad ghar vapas laute, jismein udan, driving aur airport mein intezar tha. Jab main ghar aayi tab maine dekha ki rash meri right leg par fail gayi thi. Sabse bura sthan meri ghutne ke peechhe tha, ek blisters ka cluster lal se purplish rang mein. Unhone mere sharir ke kisi aur hisse tak phail nahi gaye hain, lekin meri right leg par aur jagah ho gayi hain. Main 52 saal ki hoon, aur meri leg mein pareshani thi puri yatra ke dauran,  ghutne aur koolhe ki jagah mein khichav tha. Main lambi udan par apni leg ko aaram dilaane ke liye ise bahut ragad rahi thi. Ab tak main lagbhag 40 ghante se ghar par hoon. Uska chitra neeche attach kiya gaya hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing a rash that initially started on the lower back and has now spread to the right leg? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mere baaye kangan mein suj gayi hai. Jab main haath uthati hoon toh aap use bina chu ke dekh sakte hain. Ye thoda dardnak hai, sensitive aur chhune par sensitive bhi hai. Mere paas 9 saal pehle lumpectomy (carcinoma in situ) hui thi. Mere mammograms aur ultrasounds lagbhag 6 saal tak do baar aur fir ek baar saal mein scheduled hote the. December mein maine mammogram karaya tha; radiologist ne kaha ki mujhe ultrasound ki zaroorat nahi hai kyunki sab theek hai. Is July mein mujhe suj gayi vein mili hai. Doctor uske liye wala image neeche attach kiya hua hai. Jul 27 ko maine ER mein arm ka ultrasound, chest ka CT scan, x-ray aur blood work karaya tha. Mujhe kaha gaya tha ki sab theek hai. Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor,Maree ma ka umar 58 saal hai, jinki chronic psoriasis hai jo control mein hai. Unko do hafto pehle hospital admit kiya gaya tha.FBS, ESR aur uric acid report normal aaye. Unko cryotherapy aur physiotherapy di gayi thi. Ab wo ghar wapis discharge ho gayi hai. Unki condition thodi behetar hai lekin dard aur swelling poori tarah resolve nahi hui hai. Unko kuch aur cycles of physiotherapy follow karni hai. multimodal_Question_summ: Is the swollen eye related to the 9-month-old's runny nose, watery eyes, and nasal congestion? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Little swelling on the lateral side of the right eye's eyelid.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor,Mera right eye kabhi kabhi suj jata hai.Kripya doctor,neeche diye gaye aankhon ko dekhein. Mujhe koi dard, khujli ya aankhon mein paani nahi hai. Lekin ye teen mahine ya chaar mahine mein ek baar aata hai. Sirf ek din tak hota hai aur baad mein theek ho jata hai. Mera pehle ye samjha ki ye body heat ki wajah se ho raha hai kyunki maine ye sirf ek din ke liye hota hai. Us din doctor se appointment lena bahut mushkil tha aankhon ko dikhane ke liye. Lekin phir bhi mujhe ye problem hai. Maine internet par research ki (kyunki yahan ek medical practitioner se milna bahut mushkil hai) aur samjha ki iska karan ho sakta hai kyunki mere right eye ke aas paas ke hisse mein suj gaya hai. Sujan shuru hone se ek ya do din pehle mere right eye thoda paani aata hai aur mujhe aksar right eye ko ragadne ka ehsaas hota hai. Agar aap mujhe bata sake ki iska karan kya ho sakta hai aur kya main yahan par turant ek doctor se salah lena chahiye.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the reason for occasional swelling in the right eye, teary eyes, and possible tear duct blockage? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Redness on the eye or the blood veins/caapilliaries are swollen and red.

Hinglish_Question: Mere paas ek 4 saal 9 mahine ki ladki hai. Uski skin rash hui thi aur ek dermatologist ne acutret 5mg suggest kiya tha. Uska weight 18 kg hai. Main dosage start karne se dar rahi hoon kyunki maine tablets mein di gayi warning padhi hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Kya acutret lete samay koi food restrictions hain? Kripaya suggest karein.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should I give my 4-year-old daughter Acutret 5mg for her skin rash? Are there any food restrictions while on this medication? The image shows the condition of skin rash.  Pinkish red multuiple single coloured rash on the skin present close to each other.

Hinglish_Question: Hey, ek hafte pehle mere palet par ek hard piece aa gaya aur mere daant dhila lagne laga tha aur ab sab lips daant ke aas-paas suj gaye hain aur jalan ho rahi hai...meri kaan me dard hai, glands bhi suj gaye hain aur naak aur aankh ke aas-paas jalan ho rahi hai...Ek saal pehle mere is daant par filling karwayi thi aur root canal bhi...please bohut dard ho raha hai, mujhe madad ki zaroorat hai...dhanyavaad...Please dekhiye affected area ka image doctor sahab, niche diya gaya hai.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe cellulitis infection kuch saalo pehle hua tha, kabhi kabhi hota hai. Aaj mujhe ek hua hai aur mujhe ek din baad 5 ghante ka flight lena hai. Maine antibiotic start kar diya hai. Kya aapko lagta hai ki agar ye badhne nahi lage aur fever na ho toh mujhe flight lena chahiye ya nahi. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko.

Hinglish_Question: Mai 34 saal ki hoon. Mai ek female hoon, mera wazan 77kg hai aur meri height 165cm hai. Mujhe sukhne wala jyada khujli wala scalp hai jo kan ke peeche aur andar tak extend hota hai aur samne bhi hai. Sabhi jagah par flakes hai. Uska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai. Mujhe bhi pith par ye patches hai. Aisa lagta hai jaise mere sir mein kuch move ho raha hai. Mujhe koi dawa nahi le rahi hai aur mujhe koi past health problems bhi nahi hai. Maine ketaconazole shampoo ka istemal kiya hai, lekin ye aur bura ho gaya hai. Mera scalp aur jyada tight aur sukh gaya hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Patient, a 34-year-old female, complains of dry, itchy, flaky scalp, with patches on their back and a sensation of movement in their head. The image shows the condition of dry scalp. Dry and whitish scalp with dried skin.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste, pichle ek hafte se mere right thumb ke neeche ek chota sa ganth hai, jab main apna thumb apne gaal par rakhti hoon to wo dusre thumb se zyada garam lagta hai. Main right handed hoon, isliye jab ye mera right haath par hota hai to kuch pakadna ya knife se kaatna etc. mushkil ho jata hai. Doctor, uski image attach ki gayi hai niche. Mujhe bas ye pata karna tha ki ye kya ho sakta hai, ganth to badi nahi hai lekin bahut dard hota hai, lekin aap use dekhne se kuch nahi dikhta hai, bas touch karna padta hai jo bahut dard karta hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a small, sore lump under the skin on the patient's right thumb, accompanied by increased heat? The image shows the condition of hand lump. Little swelling below index finger.

Hinglish_Question: Main apne muh ke kuch gambhir samasya se bahut samay se pareshan ho raha hoon...muh ke chaatane par chhate hain 10-12 dino mein thik ho jati hain...lekin frequency bahut jyada hai. Mujhe Gilberts syndrome ka diagnosis hua hai. Kripya doctor, niche diye gaye affected area ki tasveer dekhe. Mujhe bhojan ke baad ghaatak pet dard aur dast ki samsya hai...mera pet bahut ajeeb tarah se react karta hai, dast se pencil stool tak. Meri umra 27 saal hai...mera sharir ka weight 46 kg hai, lekin variance hai. Mujhe thakan bhi mehsoos hoti hai...main CCU mein male nurse ke roop mein kaam kar raha hoon isliye stress bahut hai...main lagbhag 2 mahine tak tab VERINE le raha tha...uska asar hua tha aur pantazole bhi le raha tha...kya yeh sirf stress ulca hai ya koi gambhir malignancy ya positive serology hai...kripya madad karen.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of severe and frequent mouth ulcers, abdominal pain, loose stools, fatigue, and weight variance? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. Whitish swelling on the immediate inner section of the right side of upper lips.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste, mera naam Donna hai aur mere chest par ek rash hai aur ab random roop se abdomen area par bhi. Ye ek garam aur kharish wala feeling se shuru hua tha. ye lal chote chote dane hai, kuch bade aur kuch chote. Shuru me mujhe laga ki ye fungal rash hai isliye maine Hydrozole cream aur Clonea cream istemal kiya par koi asar nahi hua. Maine natural healing antiseptic bhi try kiya hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Ye chote dane ek chote se sir bana lete hain, phir uske upar chota sa scab ban jata hai. Mujhe Dermotologist ke paas 2 hafte baad appointment hai par kya aapke paas koi sujhav hai? Meri zindagi mein kabhi kisi cheez se allegic reaction nahi hua hai (main 57 saal ki hoon). Koi khana, cream ya skin product kabhi mujh par asar nahi karta hai, isliye main kuch samajh nahi pa rahi hoon..............dhanyawad
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a rash on the chest and abdomen, with red bumps forming scabs, and failed treatment attempts? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Hi mujhe lagbhag 6 hafte pehle mono ka diagnosis hua tha....main abhi bhi bahut thaka hua aur gumsum hoon lekin meri mukhya chinta hai meri chehre ke right side aur dono aankhon ki dheere dheere badhti hui sujan. Please doctor, neeche diye gaye aankhon ko dekhiye. Ab meri mathe mein bhi sujan shuru ho gayi hai aur ye bahut chinta ki baat hai. Maine apne dimag aur sinus ka MRI karwaya tha aur usmein koi bhi tumor ya dimag ki sujan ki koi nishani nahi thi. Kya ye mono ke saath normal hai? Aur symptoms kb tak fade hone shuru honge? Dhanyavaad.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is progressive facial swelling, swollen eyes, and forehead swelling normal with mono? How long until these symptoms fade? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Swelling present below the left eyes more toward the medial side (towards nose) with  pink coloured skin over the swelling.

Hinglish_Question: Mere hatho aur peron par aur mere stan ke neeche aur meri upper to md back par mujhe bahut khujli wala rash hai - kuch jagah par sujan ke dhabbe aur garmi hai - meri diet mein koi badlav nahi hua hai (koi nayi khane ya peene ki cheez nahi hai) aur koi environment mein badlav nahi hua, aur na hi mujhe common poison ivy, sumac, oak jaisi chizen se sampark hua hai. Ye mujhe pagal kar raha hai aur main khujate-khujate apni skin chhil rahi hoon - jisse bilkul bhi aaram nahi milta hai - aur ab meri gardan mein bhi dard/ khujli hone lagi hai jaise ki wo meri andar ki taraf hai. Kripya bataye ki ye kya ho sakta hai. Uske image neeche attach hai.

The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mera pati (34 saal ka hai) ko pichle saal se rekurring cellulitis hai unke pair me. Unko saal bhar tak antibiotics diye gaye hain. Pata chala hai ki unko MRSA hai aur unhe sahi antibiotics bhi diye gaye hain, lekin jaise hi wo dawai lena band karte hain, 2 hafte se jyada nahi hota aur phir se redness aur swelling aa jate hain. Kripya dekhiye, pair me kuch hua hai. Unhe bukhar bhi hota hai aur mujhe use ER le jana padta hai. Aam taur par unhe admit kar lete hain aur IV antibiotics dete hain aur ghar par oral antibiotics diye jate hain. Last time, unhe clindamycin diya gaya tha. Isko hum kaise ek baar aur hamesha ke liye dur kar sakte hain.
multimodal_Question_summ: Summary: How can recurring cellulitis with MRSA be treated effectively to prevent redness, swelling, fever, and hospital admissions? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The left leg is swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor,Jab mujhe sone jata hai, to mere aankhon se paani aane lagta hai, mainly left eye se. Jab mai apne bed se uthkar mirror me dekhta hu, to meri aankhein laal ho jati hai aur meri palakon me sujan aa jati hai. Jab mai subah uthkar hota hu, to mujhe wahi pareshani hoti hai, aankhon me aansu aur palak sujan. Please doctor, dekhiye is situation ko neeche diye gaye aankhon ko. Mai left side par sota hu aur left eye right eye se zyada prabhavit hoti hai. Jab mai uthkar bed se nikalta hu, to laalima aur sujan adha ghanta se lekar 2 ghante me dur ho jati hai, aur pure din mai theek rehta hu. Mujhe last 6 months me left eye me 3 conjunctivitis hui hai, jise ek general doctor ne teen baar confirm kiya hai. Mujhe 4-5 saal pehle ek general doctor ne left eye ke upper eyelid par Xanthelasma ka diagnosis diya hai. Please help.

The image shows the condition of swollen eye.Massive swelling of the right eye lid and below the eyes with light pinkish appearance of the skin having shiny appearance. Trauma, allergy, strong blow of nose.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe hepatitis A ki bimari hui thi 9 mahine pehle. Ab main Wysolone le rahi hoon kyunki mere skin mein kuch problem hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko, dermotologist ke salah par. 19.04.2012 se pehle 20 din tak 20mg li, phir ek mahine tak 10 mg, phir 15 din tak 7.5 mg aur 5 din tak 5mg li. Kya yeh meri sehat ke liye harmful hai? Is effect ko kaise kam kar sakti hoon?
multimodal_Question_summ: How can I reduce the potential harmful effects of the Wysolone medication I have been taking for my hepatitis A-related skin rash? The image shows the condition of skin rash. One section of oval skin with dark brown lining and central area light pink in color.

Hinglish_Question: Hello Doctor, main 25 saal ka hoon. Mujhe MDR TB tha. Mujhe gardan mein sujan thi, please dekhein neeche gardan mein hua kuch. Isko 2007 mein surgery se thik kiya gaya tha (dono taraf meri gardan mein). ATT mid 2007 se sep 2008 tak chala. Aur wo puri tarah se thik ho gaya tha. April 2010 mein, mujhe phir se glands ke bare mein kuch problem notice hui. Fir se doctor se mila aur Tuberculosis ka diagnosis hua. May 2010 se mid March 2011 tak ATT ke neeche tha. Aur ab blood test reports mein sab normal dikh raha hai. Mera doctor kahe raha hai ki ab sab thik hai. Lekin abhi ek hafte se meri gardan mein thoda dard ho raha hai (ATT band hone ke kuch din baad hi). Kripya batayen ki ye kya ho sakta hai aur mujhe kya karna chahiye. Main is bare mein bahut nervous hoon.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing the recurring neck pain in a patient who previously had MDR TB and underwent surgical treatment? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The lower part of the neck is excessively swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Hi maine isko ab ek saal se jyada samay tak face kiya hai aur do doctors se dikhaya hai. Yah ek tarah ki kuch samasya hai meri skin mein, jahan par lal daag hain alag-alag sizes mein aur kuch flat hai toh kuch bumps hai. Ye sukhe hote hain aur chipak jate hain. Ye mera pure sharir par hai jaise ki mere haath, mere pair, mere peeth aur mere gardan par,  aur abb mere chehre par bhi shuru ho rahe hai. Dermatologist bola ki result skin inflammation hai, jiska image neeche attach hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of the patient's persistent skin rash with red spots, bumps, dryness, and peeling all over their body? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, maine do teen mahine pehle ek sex worker ke saath unprotected sex kiya tha. Do mahine baad mujhe ARS ke lakshan hone lage, thakan, dast, chakkar, gala dard aur muh mein kuch samasya. Kripya doctor, neeche diye gaye muh ko dekhe. Bas ek din pehle maine ek sex worker ke saath protected sex kiya tha, lekin mera ling poori tarah se tanavit nahin tha aur gehre andar nahi gaya tha. Isliye mujhe lagta hai ki vagina se sampark ho sakta hai, lekin main yaad nahin kar pa raha hoon, confirm nahin hai. Lekin usne mujhe unprotected blow job ya oral sex kiya tha. Do din baad maine p24 antibody combo test karaya tha jo negative tha. Kuch din baad maine DNA PCR karaya tha jo negative tha. Pehle exposure ke 11 hafte baad maine western blot karaya tha jo negative tha. Pehle exposure ke 12 hafte baad maine CMIA rapid test karaya tha jo negative tha. Do din baad, maine HIV 1 aur 2 ke liye RNA PCR karaya tha jo negative tha. Ye dusre exposure ke 30 din baad tha. Chhe hafte baad maine antibody p24 combo CMIA test karaya tha jo negative tha. Mere paas abhi bhi thakan, zyada thuk, gala dard jaise lakshan hain. Main bahut chintit hoon. Kripya batayein ki mere tests sahi hai ya nahi. Main ne padha hai ki kuch log late seroconvert hote hain aur mujhe chinta ho rahi hai. Aur ek aur vyakti jiska mujhe status nahi pata, uske bhi roz dast, chakkar, muh mein kuch samasya aur pair dard hai. Kripya madad karein.
multimodal_Question_summ:
Is the patient's HIV test conclusive after experiencing symptoms such as fatigue, increased saliva, throat pain, dizziness, diarrhea, and mouth ulcers? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. White coloured circular patch/ swelling with red coloured margin present on the inner skin of lower lip, imner skin of left cheek, above the teeth and below the tongue.
Condition- Aphthous ulcer

Hinglish_Question: Metsformin ke acche alternate kya hai agar aapko diarrhea ho raha hai aur aapko allergic reactions ho rahe hain jaise ki rash, hives aur lips ka sujna. Please doctor, neeche image dekh lein jahaan par problem hai. Allergy ko kisi bhi khane ya peene se jod nahi paaya gaya hai aur reactions hamesha same nahi hote hain. Kabhi hives legs aur buttock par ho sakte hain, kabhi mere muh mein ya sar aur gardan ke piche sujhan ho sakti hai. Kabhi-kabhi zantac aur loratidine use karta hoon jo relief dete hain, kabhi-kabhi kam relief dete hain aur benadryl bhi le raha hoon.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is a suitable metformin alternative for a patient experiencing diarrhea, rash, hives, swelling of lips, and allergic reactions? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Swelling on the lower lip's right central buldging part. Disformation of lip shape.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe haal hi mein ek raat upper groin area mein khujli hui, maine use khujaya aur phir mere leg ke andar chote rash aur mera scrotum ke right side pe chaffage hua. Ek bahut chota sa hissa hai jo mere leg aur scrotum ke beech ghiste rehta hai aur mera scrotum bahut tight lagta hai. Main 3 doctors aur ek dermatologist ke paas gaya par koi madad nahi mili. Ye STD nahi hai, sirf wo cheez jo maine ajeeb ki thi, gym mein exercise bike par chal kar basketball khelna aur us raat se yeh shuru hua. Mujhe ye soch rahe hain ki shayad maine apni positioning ko theek nahi kiya tha bike par thodi chaffage ke baad aur wahi iska kaaran hai. Main har jock itch spray aur cream ko try kiya hai par koi fayda nahi hua. Mere body odor mein bhi fark aaya hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Mere stool ki buhut alag si smell hai aur often times woh black bhi hai. Mene apni diet mein saara gehu bandh kar diya hai aur spot par tea tree oil bhi use kiya hai. Tea tree oil ne mere scrotum ko bahut irritate kiya aur uske istemaal ke baad maine jo skin waha se hatayi thi, woh dead thi. Ye ek mahine se chal raha hai. Nariyal tel toh thoda madad kar raha hai, par chaffing wahi hai aur mera scrotum ki kuch areas seems tighter hain (main assumption kar raha hoon, kyunki dead skin ke wajah se). Main ek dermatologist ke paas gaya tha aur unhone kuch nahi dekha, par ek culture liya. Please meri madad kijiye, har roz yeh saha nahi jata mujhse.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing the persistent rash, chaffing, and tightness in the scrotum area, along with changes in body odor and stool color? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Kya hai possible causes multiple lumps/bumps jo skin ke under hai aur knee aur ankle ke beech mein hai. Irritation ya swelling nahi hai, skin se bahar nahi nikalte, sirf pressure applied ho to sore hai, x-rays mein kuch dikhta nahi hai bone se attached aur MRI inconclusive hai.Doctor aap meri legs mein kuch problem hai, aap dekh sakte hain below Orthopedic ne kaha hai ki ye shin splints ya shin splint lumps se related nahi hai. Meri next steps kya honi chahiye. 19 saal ki meri beti ko kis doctor ke paas le jana chahiye diagnosis ke liye. Pehle se hi aapki madad ke liye advance mein shukriya.
multimodal_Question_summ: Possible causes for multiple lumps/bumps under the skin between the knee and ankle, sore when pressure applied, no swelling or protrusion, inconclusive MRI and no related shin splints - next steps for diagnosis? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The foot os swollen with brown coloration.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, main apne sir ko razor blade se kuch dinon mein ek baar shave karta hoon jaise apna chehra shave karte hai. Mene isko saat saal se kar rahe hain ab tak. Char saal pehle, mera doctor ne notice kiya ki mere sir ke peeche rang badla hua hai. Unhone kaha ki iske liye chinta karne ki koi zarurat nahi hai aur ye shayad hamesha se waise hi ho yahi ke birthmark ki tarah. Ab, kuch saal baad bhi, ye kabhi bhi gayab nahi hua hai. Ye bada ho gaya hai, aur hamesha se jyada dikhne laga hai aur lal hai. Kabhi bhi khujli nahi hoti hai, lekin ye lal rehta hai aur normal skin se touch mein rough lagta hai. Ye bas ek bright lal daane ki tarah dikhta hai jo kabhi bhi gayab nahi hota hai. Ye na toh chhil jata hai ya white ho jata hai aur na hi mere jankari ke according chipak jata hai. Mujhe iske baare mein bahut zyada chintanahi hai, lekin ye bahut sharminda karne wala hai itna ki main public mein apna poora sir dikhaata nahi. Kya ye folliculitis ho sakta hai? Kya ye saalon tak chal sakta hai? Kripya madad kare.
multimodal_Question_summ: Could the long-lasting, red, non-itchy rash on the back of the scalp be folliculitis, and can it persist for years? The image shows the condition of dry scalp. Few areas of white and dry scalp.

Hinglish_Question: Mere calves aur back of thighs pe ek summer mein mujhe bahut ajeeb se blotchy rash hua tha. Doctor ne kaha ki ye fungal infection ho sakta hai aur mujhe Selson blue se iska ilaj karna chahiye. Par wo kaam nahi kiya, isliye maine usko chhod diya. Is mysterious rash ke baad se, mujhe notice hua hai ki meri legs, specially inner lower legs bahut red aur blotchy ho jaate hain jab main shower leti hoon, jismein especially knees ke aas paas redness aur warmth bahut hoti hai. Redness 30 minutes ke baad shower ke khatam ho jaati hai par har shower ke baad wapas aa jati hai aur blotches ke alag-alag jagah pe. Main ne triamcinolone se iska treatment karne ki koshish ki par koi khaas farak nahi pada. Ye kya ho sakta hai? Uska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing the patient's recurrent, blotchy, and red skin rash after showering, which is unresponsive to treatment? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mere haath par ek laal, feverish rash hai. Woh poison ivy jaisa lagta hai lekin bilkul khujli nahi hoti. Mainey ise 2 din pehle notice kiya tha lekin socha tha ki yeh sirf chote-chote cuts hain jinhe field mein ghoomte waqt mil gaye honge. Mere puri body par jahan skin exposed thi wahan cuts the lekin woh ab theek ho gaye hain aur yeh rash jaise cheez abhi bhi hai aur aur badh rahi hai. Ek din mein yeh spots 2mm se 1 centimeter tak ho gaye hain. Kuch spots to blotches ban gaye hain. Mujhe ismein samajh nahi aa raha ki yeh sirf meri left side par hi hai, uppar ki jang par kuch spots hain aur uppar ke haath par bahut saare spots/blotches hain. Mujhe ye jaanna hai ki mujhe iske baare mein chinta karni chahiye ya nahi. Attached image neechey di gayi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should I be concerned about the non-itchy, red feverish rash on my arm and thigh that has worsened and spread? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question:
The side of my face where your cheek meets your gum on my R. side has been swollen for about 36 hours. I have no pain in my mouth or teeth on that side of my face, and until 10-12 hrs ago had relatively no pain, other than what I felt from the pressure of it being swollen.Please see the image of the affected area doctor below. However, I have started experiencing some pain in front of my ear just below the temple, along my cheek bone to the side of my nose, where it ends. It is an "achy" to a subtle throbbing pain, which I have taken some Ibprofen's for, in doses of 3 @ 200mg per pill. I have concern, because of the swelling, but also when i initially felt a weird sensation, & it was shortly after that that it started to swell. Once it started to swell, it did so at such a rapid rate, that I was heading into the ER, as I called my mother (a retired RN) for her opinion. She instructed me to try a hot wash clothe, wait for 30 mins. then to apply a cold/ice pack, along with taking Ibprofen's to see what effect that would have on it. After doing that I felt that the swelling had stopped and possibly started to go down, as that area didnt feel as tight. However, i was woken up with discomfort early this AM, with the pain I described earlier, along with feeling as though the swelling had increased, to my R. side of my upper lip, and lip itself. I dont have insurance and would like to know if it would be better to get into a dentist, physician, or ER. Thank you for your time and advice.

 Mere chehre ka woh hissa jahan aapki gaal aapki masudon se mile hain, wo 36 ghante se sujha hua hai. Mere muh ya daanton mein us side ke koi dard nahi hai, aur haal hi mein sujhan hone ki wajah se mujhe dabaav hi mehsoos hota hai. Kripya doctor, neeche diye gaye image par nazar daale. Lekin, mere kaan ke saamne ke hisse mein thoda dard hone laga hai, sath hi meri gaal ki haddi se mere naak ke side tak jaha wo khatam hoti hai, waha dard hai. Ye "achy" ya halka throb wale dard hai, jiske liye maine kuch Ibprofen li hai, 3 pills @ 200mg har goli ki matra mein. Mujhe isliye chinta hai kyunki sujhan hone ke saath saath jab maine shuru mein ajeeb sa mehsoos kiya tha, tabhi wo sujha hua hai.Mujhe lagbhag atyadhik tezi se sujha hua hai, jiski wajah se main ER mein jaa raha tha, jab maine apni maa (ek retired RN) se uski raay li. Unhone mujhe salah di ki main ek garam wash cloth try karu, 30 minute ke liye wait karu, phir thandak wale pack ko lagau, sath hi Ibprofen lekar dekhu ki ispe kya asar hota hai. Uske baad karne ke baad mujhe aisa laga ki sujhan tham gayi hai aur shayad kam bhi ho gayi hai, kyunki wo jagah itni tight nahi lag rahi thi. Lekin mujhe aaj subah discomfort se jagaya gaya, jisme pehle wale dard ke saath saath mujhe laga ki sujhan badh gayi hai, meri upper lip aur lip ke khud bhi meri R. side mein. Mere paas insurance nahi hai aur mujhe ye jaan na hai ki is case mein dentist, physician ya ER me jana behtar hoga. Aapke samay aur salah ke liye dhanyavaad.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the patient's swollen face and lip, along with pain in the cheek bone and temple, a dental or medical emergency? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. 2 mouth ulcers, one on the lower lips inner side with white colored circular swelling. Similar one on the tongue's right side of the tip.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, mujhe syphilis ke bare mein ek sawal hai. Main 29 saal ki hoon, aur female hoon. Main sexually active nahi hoon lekin maine haal hi mein sagai kar li hai aur mere hone wale pati ke pehle se hi relationships thi. Woh mujhe kabhi kabhi kiss karte hain, jiske wajah se mujhe dar hai ki kiss karne se mujhe unse koi bimari ho sakti hai. Mujhe 5 din pehle haatho aur pairon mein kuch samasya aayi thi. Kripya doctor, dekhiye is vartaman sthiti ko. Jab main search kar rahi thi tab mujhe syphilis ke bare mein pata chala. Kya syphilis kiss karne se transmit ho sakta hai? Main ek doctor ke paas gayi aur unhone mujhe bataya ki yeh ek skin virus HFMV hai aur mujhe antibiotic cream di. Main unhe kissing ke bare mein mention nahi kiya. Lekin unhone blood test aur crp kiya, jiske natije normal aa gaye. Main abhi tak apne partner ko is baare mein nahi bataya hai. Mujhe bahut chinta hai ki kahi yeh koi aur bimari na ho.
multimodal_Question_summ: Can syphilis be transmitted through kissing? Patient has skin rash on palms and feet, doctor diagnosed it as HFMV. The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe haal hi mein khujli shuru ho gayi hai. Maine apne baalo ka rang badalwaya tha aur uske baad color oops bhi use kiya tha use theek karne ke liye. Mujhe abhi tak kabhi bhi aisi khujli nahi hui thi baalo ko rang karne se, mujhe notice nahi huyi thi. Ab mere gardan par chote chote skin-toned ke dane ho gaye hain, baal rekha par lal chote dane aa gaye hain, ye ab mere tango tak aur mere chehre tak bhi fail gaya hai. Kya karu, doctor, kripya dekhein is vartaman condition ko.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a rash with tiny skin-toned and red bumps on the neck, hairline, shin, and face after coloring hair and using color corrector? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, main 29 saal ka ek purush hoon. Mere chehre par ek skin infection develop ho gaya hai. Wo teen jagah par hai. Ek sahi kone par mathewale bhaag mein, ek bas mere right aankh ke neeche hai aur phir ek bas mere right hoth ke neeche hai. Symtoms se shuru hua tha kuch khujli aur laalima se. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Mere hoth ke neeche pe pehle kuch chote-chote chhale dikhe. Phir baad mein mujhe aur tingling, itching, jalaan ki sensation aur skin pe kuch ghoomte rehne jaisa feel hua. Mere aas paas ke ek dermatologist ke paas gaya tha aur unhone mujhe tablet Teczine aur Flucort cream prescribe kiya ek hafte ke liye. Phir meri doosri visit par, unhone mujhe Zanclav aur Cortimax prescribe kiya. Aur mere recent visit mein, unhone mujhe Alaspan aur Tendrone cream prescribe kiya. Mai usse phir agle mahine milne wala hoon. Abhi, saare symtoms gayab ho gaye hain aur dawai ke use ke saath woh kam huye hain. Lekin, hamesha ke liye mujhe pareshani aur asuvidha dene wale bade nishaan reh gaye hain. Mere mathewale bhaag aur neeche k hoth par kisi tarah ka ek incision ki tarah ka nishaan hai. Abhi skin separate ho gayi hai. Aur ankhe ke neeche wala sirf ek gulaabi nishaan hai. Mujhe in nishaano ki chinta hai. Kya ye nishaan normal skin ho jayenge jaisa ki ye skin alag alag ho gayi hai andar se. Mai apko apne nishaan ki tasveer bhej raha hoon. Kripya ek suitable salah aur sujhav de ki iske liye kya karna chahiye. Mujhe apni normal skin waapis chahiye. Mere immunological investigation, hematology analysis aur liver function normal hain. Dhanyavad.
multimodal_Question_summ: How can I treat the remaining scars on my face after a skin infection that caused itching, blisters, and redness? The image shows the condition of skin irritation. Red colored rashes on the right side of the neck. Raised spots of abrasion in the area with red spots prominent.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, main ek 21 saal ki ladki hoon. Mujhe apni vulva mein ek phoolgobhi jaisa growth dikha, jise warts kehte hain. Mujhe Acivir tablet 800 mg di gayi, jabki mujhe kisi ke saath bhi koi sexual contact nahi tha. Fir, mujhe saptaah mein saat din tak period hua. Main vaginal wash aur tea tree oil lagati thi aur paanch din tak Acivir leti thi. Ab mere pubic hair, vulva ke left part, thigh crease aur buttock line par dandruff jaisa ho gaya hai. Ye sukhapan mere scalp par bhi ho gaya tha, lekin kuch mahine pehle kam ho gaya tha. Uska image neeche diya gaya hai. Mere paas hypothyroidism bhi hai. Wart almost kam ho gaya hai. Ek raat jab maine vulva mein tea tree oil use kiya, mujhe jalan ka ehsas hua, to shayad mujhe allergy ho gayi hai. Mere paas yellowish discharge nahi hai aur main apni vagina ko din mein teen se chaar baar saaf karti hoon. Mere baal bhi bahut samay se jhad rahe hain sath hi dandruff ki shikayat hai. Jab main milk cream ya Vaseline jaise cheezon ka istemal karti hoon, to sukhapan adhe din ke liye ya usse bhi zyada door ho jata hai, lekin phir baad mein wapas ho jata hai. Mujhe do mahine pehle reticulocyte count aur thyroid T3, T4 aur TSH ke liye checkup karaya gaya tha, aur ab meri thyroid almost normal hai. Kripya meri is haalat ke liye madad karein.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of dryness, dandruff, skin rash, and hair loss in a patient with hypothyroidism and genital warts? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mera naam Poonam hai aur meri umar 23 saal hai. Mujhe past 5 se 6 saalo se dono taraf suj gayi hai, kabhi kabhi gardan mein dard aur kaan mein dard bhi hota hai. Please doctor, vartaman visthit jagah ki image dekhiye. Mujhe paani peene mein bhi problem ho rahi hai. Maine ek homeopathic doctor se consult kiya, unhone kaha ki aapko sinus problem hai. Maine uske liye dawai shuru ki. Fir mein aur ek doctor se consult kiya, unhone kaha ki aapko tonsil hai. Lekin un dawaiyon ka koi asar nahi hua. Lekin mujhe wahi problem hai. Bahut chinta ho rahi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a swollen jaw on both sides, occasional neck and ear ache, along with difficulty in drinking water, despite previous treatments for sinus and tonsil issues? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The lower neck is swollen accompanied with redness.

Hinglish_Question: kuch samasya hai mere aankhon ke palakon mein... Hi... ye teesri baar hai ki mere aankhon ke palakon me sujan hai. Dard nahi hai par bahut pareshan karne wala aur bahut suja hua hai... jaise ki lagta hai ki aankhon mein chot nahi hai aur aankhein bhi bahut jyada paani nahi bahar aa raha hai... sirf bahut laal hai kuch samasya hai mere aankhon ke palakon mein...(to the point ki main ajeeb dikhti hoon). Mein athletic hoon, 40 saal ki hoon, female hoon aur bahut acchi condition mein hoon. Mera vajan 128 hai. Mere kaano mein dard aur gale mein dard hua tha haal hi mein aur mujhe amoxicillin lena pada kaan ki infection ke liye... antibiotics lenese pehle mere kaan ke samne ek ganth bhi thi... (ye assume karke ki vah poora suja hua lymph node hai...) kuch dinon ke antibiotic lenese baad vah ganth chali gayi, par mujhe kuch samasya hai mere aankhon ke palakon mein zyada fikr hai. (Maine aapko ye jankari isliye di hai taki kahi aisa koi connection ho)... mujhe ye bhi kehna chahiye ki lagta hai ki meri lower groin mein bhi suja hua (lymph node) hai, jiski size ek ping pong ball ki tarah hai... uska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai.C.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the possible cause of swollen red eyelids, ear pain, sore throat, and a swollen lymph node? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Eye lid swollen with redness all over. Little swelling on the lower side of the eye as well.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, mujhe eye ke aas paas bahut dard ho raha hai jab mujhe toy gun ki goli se unexpected hit laga. Cornea mein thodi si redness hai aur eye ball ke niche pricking sensation hai. Iski image neeche attached hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of severe eye pain, redness in the cornea, and a pricking sensation after being hit? The image here shows a medical condition related to eye_redness. The bottom part of the eye has turned red.

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor, Meri throat mein ek white spot hai aur last three days se mujhe mild headache hai. Main past five days se immunity badhane ke liye rozana do lahsun ke tukde kha raha hun. Mujhe frequently sardi hoti hai. Har six months mein mujhe typhoid fever ho jata hai. Mujhe kuch STD bhi hai, lekin mujhe nahi pata kaunsa hai. Mujhe khooni bimari ki wajah se jangh mein dard bhi hota hai. Meri skin mein warts hai aur kuch issue hai, itching aur burning bhi hoti hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. 14 saal pehle bhi mujhe throat mein white spot ho gaya tha.
multimodal_Question_summ: What are the possible causes of a persistent white spot in the throat along with a headache, recurrent cold, typhoid fever, STD, groin pain, warts, skin rashes, itching, and burning? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Small muliple red spots present on the skin. Clustered spots of rash.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe mere muscles mein knots hote hain woh areas mein jahan par kaam karte samay zyada dabav padta hai, jaise feet ke arch, hands swelling. Doctor woh image iske liye attach hai niche. Yeh mainly tab hota hai jab movement ki nayi routine hoti hai. Jo mujhe tension deta hai, woh swelling aur knots bohot itching karte hai. Kya yeh diabetes ka sign ho sakta hai. Mein bohot zyada peeta hoon aur binge night ke baad irritation zyada hoti hai. Mein 34 saal ka hoon.
multimodal_Question_summ: Could knots and swelling in the feet and hands, along with itching and excessive drinking, be a sign of diabetes? The image shows the condition of hand lump. Lump on the small fingers side of the palm.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, Mere gale ko paanch din se bahut dard ho raha hai. Mere tonsils suj gaye hain aur pura gala bahut laal hai. Mere gale ke piche peele aur laal daane hain. Mujhe low-grade fever hai off and on. Mere poore sharir mein dard ho raha hai aur thand lag rahi hai. Mere kaano ko bhi dard ho raha hai. Nigalne mein dard ho raha hai. Mein over the counter dawa try kiya hai par koi asar nahi hua.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is causing severe throat pain, swollen tonsils, red and yellow bumps, fever, body aches, cold, and earache? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. The tonsils have swollen excessively in the back of the throat.

Hinglish_Question: Hi, main XX hoon, mere IgE level 466.3 hai, test 18/06/2012 ko kiya gaya tha. Mujhe ek saal se skin ke kuch problem aur acidity ki samasya hai. Lagbhag 10 saal pehle mujhe bhi aisi hi episode hua tha, uska image neeche attach hai. Symptomatic treatment ke baad mujhe aaram mila tha. Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor, mujhe mere baalon ke baare mein aapse kuch poochna hai. Mere baal 6 mahine baad jhadne lage hain, shayad jab maine diet pe jaake strong diet kiya (maine jo zaroori tha woh khana nahi khaya). Iski image neeche attach ki gayi hai. Mere baalon mein ganjepan ki jagah hai. Main kuch hafte pehle doctor ke paas gaya tha aur unhone mujhe hair, skin aur nails ke liye multivitamins (tonic) aur dusra spray hair grow diya tha. Mujhe ye puchna hai ki kya main is par aage badhun ya dawaai badalun. By the way, main ek smoker bhi hoon. Bohot dhanyavaad.

Hinglish_Question: Mere 5 hafte ke bacche ke aankh mein staph infection hai aur use Mon ko vigamox prescribe kiya gaya tha. Use 5 drops lage hai..... 1 Mon raat ko, 2 kal aur 2 aaj. Uski aankh laal aur suj gayi hai aur abhi bhi infected hai. Please doctor, aankhein dekhiye. Kya drops kaam nahi kar rahe hain? Kab tak clear up hone shuru hoga?

Hinglish_Question: Hi doc, Chetna Jaini here from Pakistan. Main shaadi hue hai 3 saal pehle aur mera 1 saal ki beti hai. Meri beti ke janam se pehle, mujhe 2 mahine ke liye miscarriage hua tha. Magar baad mein mujhe ek beti se ashirwad mila. Lagbhag 10 mahine pehle, mujhe vaginal infection aur skin infection/irritation hui thi. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Mujhe aur mere pati ko sex nahi kar pa rahe hai kyun ki mujhe bahut dard ho raha hai.Skin laal ho jaati hai aur ek boond paani bhi bahut dard karta hai. Main yaha ke doctors se mil chuki hoon...unhone mujhe antibiotics diye jaise ke sporanax, flagyl, augmentin, calamox...doctor ne kaha ki mere pati ko bhi infection ho sakta hai...isliye unke liye bhi antibiotics recommend kiye gaye hai...humne course pura kiya hai aur samasya kam ho gayi...kuch din pehle hum so rahe the aur uske baad mujhe wahi problem phir se ho gayi hai...kya aap mujhe guide kar sakte hai ki main kya karu...aapki meharbani ki umeed mein. Dhanyavaad.

The image shows the condition of skin irritation. Dark pink rashes near the behind side of the left leg's knee area. Little raised and slight swelling present.

Main 3 mahine se dawai le raha hoon jab mujhe apne right neck aur shoulder mein sujan, thoda dard aur sunn padne laga.Kripya neck par hua kuch dekhein. Kya ye antibiotics ke reaction hai. Kya mujhe chinta karne ki zaroorat hai. Shukriya.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the swelling, pain, and numbness in the right neck and shoulder a reaction to tuberculosis medication? Should the patient be concerned? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The lady has a lower red swollen neck.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, Mere left eye ke cornea ke pass conjunctiva par ek yellowish bump hai. Jagne ke baad, dono aankhon mein redness hai, especially the bump ke aas-paas. Aur dono aankhon mein, naak ki taraf se limbus se ek brown margin dikh raha hai. Iske liye aap kis treatment ko recommend karte hain. Uska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the recommended treatment for a yellowish bump on the conjunctiva, redness around the eyes, and a brown margin near the nose? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Little swelling on the lateral side of the right eye's eyelid.

Hinglish_Question: Mere peeth ke beech me ek rash hai jo ek golf ball jitna bada hai (shayad thoda bada). Maine ise kuch din pehle notice kiya aur bas samjha ki meri skin irritate ho gayi hai ya kuch aisa hai. Iske liye neeche ek image hai. Thoda itching hai aur wo area thoda dard kar raha hai lekin rash phaile ya badhe nahi hain. Aaj online dekha toh shayad ye shingles ho. Koi ray ho toh bataiye, kya doctor ke paas jana chahiye. Aur kya treatment zaroori hai.

The image shows the condition of skin rash. Oval shaped or circular red patches on the leg. Little swelling and dryness on the patches with foldings of skin.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe laga ki meri 18 mahine ka bacha dant nikal raha hai, lekin aaj tak wo kuch nahi khaya hai. Maine abhi uske muh mein dekha hai aur uske danton par pus wale chhalde aur laal aur sujhe hue gusse bhi hai, jinme se thodi bleed bhi hui hai last 2 nights ko. Yeh kya ho sakta hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is mouth ko neeche. Hum ek farm par rehte hain aur wo chicks, piggies, horses and dogs ke saath bahar jaata hai. Kya use animals se kuch ho gaya hai?

Condition- Aphthous ulcer

Hinglish_Question: Mai 34 saal ki mahila hoon aur average weight (150 lbs) aur average height (5'5") hai. Mainey halka sa samjha tha ki meri upper lips par ek flat piece of tissue/growth hai. Hinglish_Question: Humare paas ek budiya dost hai jiske baad kharab IV start hone ke baad uske haath ke piche ek hard soft lump dikhne laga. Doctor, uska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai. Hinglish_Question: Mere last 10 days se fever hai, ranging from 99 - 100...subah ke time par temperature generally normal hota hai aur shaam ko badhne lagta hai. Mere skin mein bhi kuch issue hai. Iski image neeche attached hai. Aur mujhe last 4 days se medication chal rahi hai. Allegra 180 mg OD, Atrax 10 mg OD, Levofloxacin 500 mg OD.

multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a bulge and blue discoloration on the knuckle of the ring finger, followed by a painless purple bruise? Hinglish_Question: Mere pas ek skin condition hai jo Jan this year se rash ke roop me shuru hua aur ab tak meri lower body se mere ear lobes, neck, head tak progress kar chuki hai aur ab predominantly meri arms par hai. Gradually climbing ke saath saath meri neck aur head me itching hai lekin meri arms sabse badi problem hai. Ye shuru me creeping fungal rash ki tarah dikhai diya tha lekin ab change ho gayi hai. Iski image neeche attached hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a rash that started as a fungal infection and has spread to various parts of the body with persistent itching? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Maine apne haath ke upar, bina kisi chot ke, ek gol, chhota ganth develop kiya hai. Ye ganth jaise idhar-udhar ghoomti hai lekin ya toh ek vein par hai...ya usmein hai. Mujhe blood clotting disorder ka dar hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a sudden, purplish, stingy lump on the top of the hand, potentially related to a blood clotting disorder? The image shows the condition of hand lump. One small swelling the the outer side of the hand.

Hinglish_Question: Mera bacha abhi ek saal ka hua hai, aur woh kuch din pehle bimar ho gaya. Pehle din woh cough kar raha tha aur aaj subah uth kar usse aankhon mein kuch samasya ho gayi, aur phir se nas bandh ho gaya, uski saans lena mushkil ho gaya hai aur woh wheezing kar raha hai. Please doctor, eyes ko dekhiye. Kripya mujhe bataye ki kya ho raha hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing my one-year-old baby to have a swollen eye, cough, nosebleeds, difficulty breathing, and wheezing? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Little swelling on the lateral side of the right eye's eyelid.

Hinglish_Question: Mere paas ek char saal ke bete hain jinke haath ke upar weekend se ek ganth hai, jab dabaya jaata hai toh wo sakht lagti hai lekin main use squeeze kar paata hoon, touch karne par koi dard nahi hai aur kisi bhi jaankari ke mutabik kisi chot ya sikri ki wajah se ye nahi hui hai. Ismein koi aas-paas haddi ya nas toh dikhti nahi hai.Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a painless, hard knot above a four-year-old's wrist with no known injury or bruising? The image here shows a medical condition related to edema. The left leg is swollen with deformation in the toes.

Hinglish_Question: Hi, mere gaal par allergies hue thi. Maine ek dermatologist ke paas jaake consult kiya, unhone suggest kiya ki jab tak allergies dur nahi ho jate Momtaz cream lagayein. Mainne usse 10 din tak ek moisturizer ke saath istemal kiya, allergies chale gaye lekin jab mainne uska istemal bandh kiya toh meri skin bahut khujli karne lagi aur woh jagah pe dark ho gayi.
