Kya ye volar wrist ganglion hoga. Kya mujhe is baat se chinta karni chahiye mere previous history ke wajah se. Agar mujhe ise check karwana hai to kis type ke doctor se consult karun kyunki aajkal sab specialist ban gaye hain.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should a small, hard, non-mobile lump on the wrist of a breast cancer survivor be concerning, potentially indicating volar wrist ganglion? The image shows the condition of hand lump. One small swelling the the outer side of the hand.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, mera right ear me off and on ear pressure rehta hai aur mujhe last 1.5 weeks se thoda sardi jaisa mahsus ho raha hai (thanda lag raha hai), jukam, sharir dard, etc. Mere bachche bhi is sardi se jujh rahe hain, jaise ki mere office mein hi hai. Mujhe notice hua ki mere right submandibular lymph node thoda suj gaya hai. Mujhe apne GP ke paas gaya tha aur unhone antibiotics prescribe kiye the jiske koi asar nahi hua hai. Mujhe sinus ke issues pehle se hai. Muje notice hua hai ki mera right tonsil dusre se bada hai, jo pressure aur lymph node ki taraf hai.Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Kya ek viral bimari ek taraf sujjan ka karan ho sakti hai? Kya ye tonsil cancer ho sakta hai? Main 6 mahine me ek baar dentist ke paas jata hoon jismein wo mere tonsils ka checkup karte hain. Mujhe chinta hai ki ye ek taraf hai. Mera gale itna dard nahi kar raha hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Can a viral illness cause one-sided, swollen tonsils without a sore throat, possibly indicating tonsil cancer? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsilsx. The tonsils are swollen at the back of the mouth.

Hinglish_Question: Meri chhah saal ki beti ke saath aisa hua ki uske poore sharir par ek laal chhap nikli. Pehle mujhe laga ki ye german measles hai, par koi zyada fever nahi tha. Please doctor, dekhein is vartaman condition ko. Kuch din baad uske haath aur paon ke skin peeling shuru ho gaye bahut buri tarah se. Chhap toh abhi almost gayab ho gayi hai par skin peeling bahut zyada hai. Ye kya ho sakta hai? Antoinette.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a red rash all over the body followed by severe peeling of the hands and feet in a 6-year-old without fever? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Ring like big circular few areas of the back. Lining color is red and inside color is same as skin color.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe apni gardan ke piche left side mein ek ganth hai. Doctor please check kijiye patient ki image dekhne ke baad neeche di gayi hai. Yeh mere baalo ke aakhri hisse se shuru hoti hai aur meri kamar ke upar tak jaati hai. Mujhe sir ghoomane par dard hota hai aur aage jhukne par bhi dard hota hai. Kya mujhe doctor ke paas jana chahiye? Maine is par garam kapda rakhne ki koshish ki hai, lekin usse kuchh nahi hua. Main ise teen hafte se hai, pehle chota tha ab bada ho gaya hai. Kya hai yeh, kya ye cancer hai? Kya mujhe medical attention ki taraf jana chahiye? Meri madad karein, please.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should the patient seek medical attention for a growing lump on the left side of their neck, causing pain and discomfort? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The neck is swollen in one side and there is a red spot in the neck

Hinglish_Question: Hi Doctor, meri beti 8 saal ki hai aur usko 2 saal se vitiligo hai. White patches uske aankhon se shuru hote hain aur ab ghutnon aur kuch aur hisson par bhi fail gaye hain. Hum kuch creams use kar rahe hain jo doctor ne recommend ki hai. White patches ki growth slow hai lekin samay ke saath badhti jaa rahi hai. Kripya doctor, neeche di gayi vartaman stithi dekhein. Kisi ne mujhe bataya hai ki agar vitiligo 10 saal ke neeche shuru ho to recovery chances achhe hote hain aur skin recovery ke chances high hote hain, kya yeh sahi hai. Regards, Faraz
multimodal_Question_summ: Does the onset of vitiligo in children under 10 years of age increase the chances of successful skin recovery? The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_growth. The skin has red rash like growths.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe ek bahut khujli wala rash hai, jo mere scalp, lower back, shoulders aur elbows par develop hota hai. Mere dermatologist ne socha ki shayad ye dermatitis herpetiformis ho sakta hai. Sabhi tests negative aaye hain, including skin biopsy, Iga & Ttg. Rash temporarily clear ho jata hai mostly jab main prednisone leta hoon. Mere high BP ke liye main Maxzide lete hoon aur maine padha hai ki ye rash ka karan ho sakta hai. Main ise 2.5 saal se le raha hoon. Rash Maxzide lene ke 2 saal baad develop hua hai. Mujhe samajh nahi aa raha hai aur khujli se pareshan hoon.
multimodal_Question_summ: Could the itchy rash on scalp, lower back, shoulders, and elbows be caused by Maxzide medication or dermatitis herpetiformis? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, mere paon mein ek infection hai aur wo mera right paon ke upar, ankle se thoda upar hai. Uss particular jagah par thoda sujan hai aur kabhi-kabhi jab main use saaf karta hoon to pus aur thoda khoon bhi nikalta hai. Aur uss infection ke wajah se mere paon mein sujan hai aur chalne mein dard ho raha hai. Kal main clinic ja raha hoon par is beech Amoxyclav 625 (ek tablet) lena kya advised hai sujan kam karne ke liye?
multimodal_Question_summ: Is it advisable to take Amoxyclav 625 to reduce foot swelling, pain, and infection with pus and blood discharge? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The ankle of the foot is swollen with brown discolouration.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe 49 saal ki umar hai aur mujhe diabetes aur high blood pressure hai. Mera 6ft ka height hai aur 260lbs weight hai. Mera ghutna Monday se dard kar raha hai. Jab maine knee brace pehna to dard ruk gaya. Lekin meri leg ankle se mid thigh tak suj gayi hai. Main samajh sakta hoon ki ye fluid hai. Dard to nahi hai, lekin mujhe ye jaanna hai ki sujan kyun hai. Please doctor, niche diye gaye affected area ki image dekhiye.
multimodal_Question_summ: Why is the patient experiencing painless swelling in their leg from ankle to mid-thigh after wearing a knee brace? The image here shows the condition of knee swelling

Hinglish_Question: Friday aur Saturday ko mujhe bahut tej dard hua tha daant mein jo shayad ek nerve ke marne aur gale se nikalne ki wajah se tha (sirf barf ki paani hi madad kar rahi thi.) Kal raat daant ka dard gayab ho gaya, lekin meri upper lip tender ho gayi, maine samjha ki thanday paani ki lambi exposure ki wajah se. Aaj subah uthne par mujhe daant ka dard nahi tha, lekin meri upper lip suj gayi hai aur left side of my nose tak phail rahi hai, mujhe apni left eye ke vision ke neeche sujan dikhai de rahi hai. Kripya dekhein doctor affected area ka image neeche.
multimodal_Question_summ: Can severe tooth pain followed by upper lip swelling and tenderness be caused by a dying nerve? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Upper lip's left part is swollen with little redness.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, mujhe penis ke bare skin par lal chakatte (rashes) aa rahe hain. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Mainne Candid Total ka use kiya aur woh poora disappear ho gaya. Fir, saat din baad woh right aur left side of the penis par phir se aa gaya. Mainne iska istemaal continue kiya aur phir mere dost ne mujhe Surfaz sn aur DOXT-SL 100 ka upyog karne ke liye salah di. Main ise last saat din se use kar raha hoon. Chakte ab orange color le rahe hain. Kabhi-kabhi penis ke foreskin ke duran peshaab karne par jalan hoti hai. Dard nahi hai, peshaab karne mein koi pareshani nahi hai, kabhi-kabhi skin ke forehead par itching hoti hai. Kripya salah dein.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing red rashes on the penis, recurrence after using Candid Total, orange patches, burning during urination, and occasional itching? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mere masude aur honth top right side par suj gaye aur dard kar rahe hain, peeche wahin jagah hai jahan meri wisdom teeth thi (unhein 18 mahine pehle nikala gaya tha). Meri gardan ke glands bhi thode suj gaye hain aur meri right eye ke aas paas thoda dard ho raha hai. Please doctor, niche diye gaye affected area ki image dekhein. Kya aapko pata hai ye kya ho sakta hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of swollen and painful gums and lips on the top right side, along with swollen glands and eye pain? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Full upper lip swollen. More swelling on right side of upper lip.

Hinglish_Question: Maine kaafi der se soch rahi thi ki iska karan kya ho sakta hai,par mere chest aur upper back par ek daane ki tarah dikh raha hai. Mai ek female hu aur woh mere breasts par bhi hai. Isme thode-se laal daag dikh rahe hai, par ye dard ya khujli nahi karta hai. Aur ye affected area se dry ho jaata hai aur skin peel ho jaati hai. Kripya meri madad karein taki mai isse chutkara pa sakun. Dhanyavaad! Uska image neeche attach kiya hua hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could the little red splotches on the patient's chest, upper back, and breasts, causing dry skin, be? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mere dono anguthe sukh gaye hain aur unki skin bahut patli hai aur agar kuch bhi unpar touch karta hai toh dard hota hai. Meri umar 71 hai aur mera vajan 85 kg hai. Main haal hi mein halki chemotherapy se guzar raha hoon aur rectal cancer ka ilaj karane ke liye lagatar radiation bhi kar raha hoon. Iske liye attached image dekhein.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing dryness, redness, thin skin, and pain on both thumbs in a 71-year-old undergoing chemotherapy and radiation? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Oval shaped or circular red patches on the leg. Little swelling and dryness on the patches with foldings of skin.

Hinglish_Question: Mere zuban ke piche-baye taraf ek ulcer hai. Main tambaaku ka sewan bhi karta hoon. Mai is ulcer ko namak aur paani ka mishran se treat karne ka shuru kar diya hai, jise mai ulcer par lagata hoon. Kya ek din me thoda sa tambaaku chabaane se munh ke dusre taraf ye cancerous ho jayega ya ise heal hone me disturbance hogi, iske baare me mai bas jaanana chahta tha. Please doctor, dekhiye is munh ko neeche.
multimodal_Question_summ: Does using chewing tobacco on the opposite side of a mouth ulcer affect healing and increase the risk of cancer? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. A patch of oval shaped swelling on the tongue's right side. Dark red in color with swelling.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, mujhe elevated optic disc with blurred edges sirf left eye mein hai, jo routine eye examination mein pata chala hai. Please doctor, dekhiye ye aankhein neeche . Mujhe kuch hafton se headaches ho rahe hain. Agar ye papill hota toh kya ye dono aankhon mein hota?
multimodal_Question_summ: Does the patient's elevated optic disc with blurred edges in the left eye, along with headaches, indicate papilledema? The image here shows a medical condition related to eye_redness. The eye has started to become red from canthus.

Hinglish_Question: Maine abhi notice kiya hai ki mere haath ke bahar ke hisse ke neeche mera aam ke aakar ka chota sa cheez hai. Doctor, uski image niche attach ki gayi hai. Jab maine usse darpan mein dekha, to cheez ke neeche kali dikhai di. Wo thoda dard kar rahi hai, isliye mujhe pehle hi pata chala ki wo wahan hai. Mujhe bilkul bhi pata nahi hai ki wo kitne samay se wahan hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the likely diagnosis for a tender, black lump under the skin on the outer part of the arm? The image shows the condition of hand lump. Lump on the wrist's bone on the right hand.

Hinglish_Question: Muje hypertension hai jo dawai se control hoti hai. Aaj mujhe aankh ke pass ek bruise (area closest to my nose) aur slightly eyeslid me kuch issue hai. Please dekhein doctor affected area ki image niche. Mein rural Nicaragua mein rehti hoon aur Tuesday ko zarurat padne par doctor se mil sakti hoon. Kya mujhe chinta karni chahiye? Mujhe bilkul bhi taklif nahi hai. Mein 48 saal ki female hoon. 135 pounds. 5'3" tall.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should a 48-year-old female with hypertension be concerned about a bruised and swollen eyelid, living in rural Nicaragua? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Eye lid swollen with redness all over. Little swelling on the lower side of the eye as well.

Hinglish_Question: Mera beta ke left cheek aur eyes suj gaye hain. Please doctor, dekhiye in eyes ko neeche. Uske teeth aur gums theek lag rahe hain. Humne 10 din pehle doctor se mila tha aur unhone kaha ki ye ek infection lag raha hai. Unhone antibiotics di aur sujan 2 din baad kam ho gayi thi. Lekin aaj subah se fir se flarred up ho gaya hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing the recurrent swelling in the left cheek and eyes of the patient's son? The image shows the condition of swollen eye.  Little swelling on the lateral side of the right eye's eyelid.

Hinglish_Question: Hi Mere jangh ke bade sukhed paton par kuch large dry patches hain jo khujli ki wajah se itching ke kaaran jab mein use scratch karta hoon tab lal ho jate hain..khujli sirf tab shuru hoti hai jab mein use scratch karta hoon ya kapdon ki ragad hone par, anyatha ye dry skin with dark spots lagti hai. Iske one month se hai. Is dauran mujhe sharir ke kinar par kuch irritation aur lal dane bhi hote hain aur underarm mein dark spots hote hain. Uska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai. Mein Glob-NM cream use kar raha hoon jo Clobetasol Propionate, Neomycin Sulphate aur Micronazole Nitrate ko contain karti hai, dusri cream hai MOM-F jo Mometasone Furoate ko contain karti hai (doctor se consult kiya gaya). Mujhe jaanna hai ki mere skin infection ka reason kya hai aur in ointments ke alawa aur kya precautions leni chahiye taki ye aur fail na ho. Koi ghar ka upay bhi. Aapki response ka intezaar kar raha hoon. Dhanyawad Chinmay Goyal
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the reason for the patient's skin infection with dry patches, red bumps, and dark spots? Recommendations for treatment and prevention? The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_dryness. Dryskin with small peels of skin coming out.

Hinglish_Question: Hello, meri beti 6 saal ki hai kal uski left eye bahut laal thi aaj woh theek hai. Kripya dekhein patient ke aankhon ki image neeche. Right eye thoda gunky hai aur usne kaha ki kabhi kabhi thoda dhundla dikhai deta hai. Fir usne kaha ki uski throat thodi si sore hai. Maine light li aur andar dekha toh uski throat ke bahut peeche teen chote flesh colored bumps dikhe. Kya ye normal hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of redness in the left eye, gunkiness, blurry vision in the right eye, and throat soreness with bumps? The image here shows a medical condition related to eye_redness. The eye has turned reddish blue.

Hinglish_Question: Hamne notice kiya ki mere 2 hafte ke bete ke neck ke right side par ek gaanth hai. Humne jaldi se uske doctor ko dikhaya aur unhone hame ek specialist ke paas refer kiya hai jo abhi tak hame nahi dekh paaye hain. Jab uske cheek par forceps ki wajah se swelling kam hui, humne aur 2 gaanth aur notice ki hai aur kal raat ko humne uske left ear ke neeche aur ek gaanth payi. Kripya neck par hua incident dekhein. unhe dard nahi hota, usey cold ya infection nahi hai. Humne kai doctors se mila hai aur kisi ke paas iska jawaab nahi hai. Kripya bataye ki usme kya problem ho sakti hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of multiple painless lumps on the right side of a 2-week-old baby's neck and under the left ear? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. There is round shaped swelling in the neck below the lower jaws.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe apne munh mein kuch samasya hai baar-baar. Please doctor, nichle munh mein dekhein. Hugh uric acid bhi mujhe tha jo ab control mein hai. Kya ye dono related hain? Mein abhi kuch samasya se peedit hoon apne munh mein jo dawai ke bina thodi si sudhar hui hai. Pehle mujhe high uric acid ki sthiti ka ilaj hua hai jo ab normal hai. Kya ye dono sthitiyan related hain? Mera email hai: YYYY@YYYY. Aapki madad ke liye dhanyavaad. Mrs. lobo. Age: 67 yrs.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is there a connection between frequent mouth ulcers and previously treated high uric acid condition in a 67-year-old patient? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. Whitish swelling on the immediate inner section of the right side of upper lips.

Hinglish_Question: Meri maid ki skin par rashes hai, jo chote chote daag ke roop mein shuru hote hain aur katne par, wo bade rash spot @ 1"-2" ban jate hain. Iska rang bhi black ho jata hai. Daag mein koi sujan nahi hoti hai. Ye condition ab 6 mahine se hai. Ye last 2-3 mahine se zyada dikhne lagi hai. Usne kuch doctors ko dekha hai. Use Tri-o-bloc cream prescribe ki gayi thi. Usne iska use 2-3 hafte tak kiya tha aur use band kar diya kyunki ye mahenga hai.Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. agle doctor ne Tenovate NM cream, Laveta tab, Betnesol tab aur AF 400 prescribe kiya. Lekin is condition mein koi sudhar nahi hua hai. Kripya salah dein.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a persistent, non-swollen skin rash with black discoloration and ineffective treatment with Tri-o-bloc and Tenovate NM creams? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Meri 9 saal ki beti ke arm, legs aur feet ke tops mein use lagta hai jaise koi use poke kar raha ho. Usko lagta hai ki uske kapdo mein kuch hai jo use poke kar raha hai, lekin jab wo apne kapde check karti hai toh waha kuch nahi hota...aur ye use kai jagah par hota hai. Wo kehti hai ki ye aata jata hai aur ye dard se zyada pareshani wala hai. Maine uski skin check ki hai aur waha koi bhi gaanthen ya irritation ki koi nishani nahi hai. Use haal hi mein Celiac Disease ka diagnosis hua hai, aur mujhe kuch idea nahi hai ki iska koi taaluka hai ya nahi, lekin socha ki mention karu. Mujhe nahi pata ki mujhe iske baare mein chinta karni chahiye ya shayad ye bas sukhhi twacha ya kuch aur ho. Please doctor, vartaman sthithi ko dekhe.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the feeling of something poking in arms, legs, and feet related to the recent diagnosis of Celiac Disease? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Redness and spots on the right side of the neck extending to the jaw. Some have little blood as well at the center due to too much irritation.

Hinglish_Question: Hi there, mere paas 14 mahine ki ek chhoti si ladki hai aur lagbhag ek hafte pehle hume notice hua ki uske dono aankhon ke andar ki taraf redness hai. Aankh bilkul saaf hai, koi laalima nahi hai, koi resha ya discharge nahi hai aur wo unhe kisi tarah se ragad rahi nahi hai, is baat se mujhe to lagta hai ki wo usse preshan nahi hai. Please doctor, dekhein neeche diye gaye aankhon ko. Bas ye jaan na chahti hoon ki kya ye clogged tear duct ho sakta hai. Har aankh ke niche thoda sa sujan bhi hai. Diet, mahaul, sabun etc. mein koi bhi badlav nahi hai, koi medical history bhi nahi hai. Aaj subah uthne par usko kal se alag ek thoda ho gaya hai. Kisi bhi madad ke liye shukriya.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of redness around the inner outside of both eyes, minor swelling, and a runny nose? The image here shows a medical condition related to eye_redness. The eye has started to become red from canthus, also there is a swelling in the canthus of the eye.

Hinglish_Question: Meri 75 saal ki maa ko lagbhag 2-3 dino se sahi se paakhane nahi ho pa raha hai. Woh "rabbit pelting" kar rahi hai. Raat ko, mujhe ek tez awaaz sunayi di, maine maake kamre mein gaya to use bathroom ke floor par girte hue paya. Mujhe lag raha hai ki woh toilet par behosh ho gayi aur gir gayi. Mujhe abhi maake mathhe par ek goose egg, yaane skin ka abnormality aur thoda sa skinned up nose notice hua. Woh do baar gir gayi hai.Padhiye, doctor, neeche di gayi image ko. Main jaldi se dukaan mein gaya aur usko kuch magnesium ciltrate liya. Usko bhi ulti ho rahi hai. (mere paas ek 2 saal ke toddler hai, isliye main pedialyte rakhta hoon) maine unflavored pedialyte ko thode se seb ka ras ke saath milaya (sirf swad ke liye) usko thoda sa sweating bhi ho rahi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing the lack of bowel movement, fainting, multiple falls, goose egg skin growth, and nausea in a 75-year-old woman? The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_growth. There are red mass on the skin surface

Hinglish_Question: Mere 8 mahine ke bete ko november mein vsd heart surgery hui thi aur haal hi mein usko achhi sehat ki report mili hai. Mujhe pata hai ki wo daant aa raha hai kyunki mujhe neeche do daant nikale dikhai dete hain. 16 January ko wo bahut beemar dikha, isliye maine use doctor ke paas le gaya aur unhone kaha ki usko kaan ki infection hai aur amoxicillan prescribe kiya. Saath din baad main phir se gaya kyunki usko raat mein infection hone ke baad chest congestion aur coughing bohot hui. Is baar unhone kaha ki usko RSV hai aur J-TAN D PD prescribe kiya. Kuch din baad usko laal chakte ho gaye aur wo apne sir ko piche se khujla raha tha.Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Wapas doctor ke paas gaye to unhone kaha ki usko hives hai aur benadryl aur prednisolone sod phos prescribe kiya aur kaha ki J TAN band kar do. Ab meri tension ye hai ki uski twacha ka rang aur gaalo ka rang baar baar laal ho raha hai par mujhe koi bukhar ya koi aur pareshani nahi hai, to ab ye kya ho raha hai color ke saath.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing the rosey skin color and cheeks in an 8-month-old baby with a history of heart surgery, teething, ear infection, RSV, hives, and rash? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Multiple clusters of red patches with big raised swollen spots in between like mosquito bite.

Hinglish_Question: Meri beti 17 saal ki hai, aur do din pehle uska lower inner right lip suj gaya tha, aur wo bahut numb tha. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Humne use urgent care le gaye the aur usko check kiya, usne koi bhi bite (spider) ya head (pus) type nahi dekha, usne kaha ki aur 1 din wait karein agar numbness gayab nahi hoti to apne doctor se consult karein. Aaj numbness kam hui hai aur use ek hard like bump mehsus ho raha hai aur jaise wo kahti hai...uska apna pulse aur brain hai...ye kya ho sakta hai. Use koi aur problem nahi hai, no headaches, no nausea, no fevers...Mujhe chinta hai, please madad kijiye. Bahut dhanyavaad!!
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of lip swelling, numbness, and a pulsating and hard bump in a 17-year-old girl? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Swelling on the lower lip's left side. The swollen part is red.

Hinglish_Question: Mai raat ko 3 baje A & E (Accident & Emergency) gaya tha jahan meri haatho aur paao ki khujli se shuru hui thi, Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Phir mera chehra aur sharir bright red ho gaya, phir mujhe sujan hone lagi, mujhe kuch mahine pehle bhi yehi saare lakshan the lekin mujhe laga ki mujhe kuch khane ki vajah se hua hai, lekin is baar mere jeebh, muh aur honth bhi suj gaye, dono casos mein common factor tha omeprazole jo ki mere Partner ne likha tha aur maine dono mauko par ise liya. Kya ye mere pehle kabhi kisi bhi allergy ki vajah se hua?
multimodal_Question_summ: Why did the patient experience itching, swelling, redness, and tongue/mouth/lip swelling after taking omeprazole despite no previous allergies? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The foot is swollen blue black discolour.

Hinglish_Question: Mera beta Cam abhi tak 6 mahine ka hai, aur haal hi mein main aur dusre logon ne notice kiya hai ki uske haath aur pair blue ho jate hain (cyanosis), aur kabhi kabhi uske muh ke aas paas bhi. Jyadatar samay mein, ye tab hota hai jab wo bottle pee raha hota hai ya bas uth raha hota hai. Uske haath aur pair nahaane ke samay bhi blue ho jate hain, haanikarak hai main hamesha ghar ko extra garam kar leta hoon aur uske paani ko bhi garam rakhta hoon, aur jab tak wo naha raha ho, main garam paani bhi daalta hoon. Jab wo sirf do-din-ka tha, tab maine notice kiya ki uske honthon  aur naak ke aas paas blue dikh raha tha, isliye maine nurse ko apne kamre mein bulaya aur usne mujhe bataya ki usko bas dakar maarna tha. Uske baad bhi wo blue hi tha, toh usne use le jaake uske vital signs check kiye, aur tab sab theek tha, shayad gas ka tha, unhone kaha. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Maine uske doctor ke paas 19 tarikh ko appointment bhi le li hai, lekin kya main usse pehle hi dikhane ki zidd karo? Aur usne 1 mahine ke hone par Cystic Fibrosis ke liye bhi test karwaya tha kyunki usko prolapsed rectum tha. Usne sweat chloride test karwaya tha, aur technician ne jo sample liya tha, wo keh rahi thi ki samajh gayi hai ki sahi sample liya hai, jab doctor ne result diya, toh unhone kaha ki sample ke aadhar par wo bilkul theek hai, lekin unko thoda sa sankoch bhi tha. Kya aapko pata hai ki kya sweat chloride test galat ho sakta hai? Aur chahe jaise bhi dabao uski twacha par ho, uski twacha lal ho jaati hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Summary: Can a sweat chloride test be inaccurate in diagnosing Cystic Fibrosis if a 6-month-old baby experiences cyanosis, bluish skin, and blotchy redness? The image here shows the condition of cyanosis

Hinglish_Question: Meri diabetes ko treat karne ke liye, mujhe do mahine pehle tradgenta lene shuru kiya, glimiperide aur metformin ke sath. Mujhe isse koi reaction nahi hua hai, shayad abhi hua hai. Hinglish_Question: Main teen mahine se bimar hoon. Doctor ne mujhe August se antibiotics ya antiviral diye hain aur abhi tak mujhe koi fayda nahi ho raha hai!! Unhone pehle kaha tha ki mere kaano mein paani hai, isiliye 10 din tak antibiotics li. Fir bhi bura haal tha, isliye dubara gaya. Ab mere dil mein cough ho gayi thi! Fir inhaler, khoon ka test aur aur antibiotics liye, lekin koi asar nahi hua aur ab meri skin dard karti hai, koi daane nahi hai, aur meri jodo mein itni dard hai ki main ro raha hoon! Fir se gaya, cough abhi tak saans ke andar hai aur maine 10 pound wazan kam kar diya hai, kaan dard kar raha hai aur gale mein dard hai! Doctor ko ja kar ek antiviral aur ear drops diye, lekin phir bhi main bahut behtar mehsus nahi kar raha hoon aur teen mahine ho gaye hain aur mera emotional state bhi unstable hai kyunki main hamesha bimar rehta hoon!! Meri skin bahut dard karti hai aur sensitive hai. Kripaya doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Meri skin par koi daane nahi hain, mujhe ear ache hai, gale mein dard hai aur cough hai aur meri jodo mein bahut dard hai! Kuch gadbad hai kya aur medicines mere kaan dard ko kyun nahi dur kar rahi hai.

Amoxicillin & clay, ke saath travel kar rahi hoon. Kripya dekhiye doctor, affected area ka image below. Kya aapko lagta hai ki mujhe inme se ek try karna chahiye, ya aap kya sujhate hain. Hinglish_Question: Mere MCV level 103 hai. Ye last 6 mahino mein 100 se badh gaya hai. Mere Dr. ne liver count ka order kiya hai aur yahaan niche uske result hain. Total Bilirubin 16 Alkaline Phosphatase A 31 42-116 U/L Gamma GT 10 10-58 U/L ALT 12 Thyroid Function TSH 0.50 0.27-4.2 mU/L. Alk low hai aur MCV 103 hone se saaf pata chalta hai ki liver par ultrasound karana chahiye. Last month se mujhe poore din nausea ki symptoms hai, jo morning sickness jaise hai. Hinglish_Question: Mere Pyaare Doctor,Samjho ke shaan se ho gayi hai meri biwi ki jeevan ki yatra kuch hi hafte mein. Hamari beti ko human parvovirus (5th disease) ho gaya tha aur vo bina kisi takleef ke gayab ho gaya- lekin phir meri biwi ko bhi yeh ho gaya- ek bade vyakti ke liye anokha hai. Usne mere skin mein kuch samasya develop ki. Kripya doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko niche di gayi. Phirse uske pairo ki taraf badhti hui swelling aur sujhan ho gayi-- yeh sab adult parvovirus ke lakshan hain. Lekin, 10 din ke baad ya aisa ho gaya ki vo sudden vomiting karne lagi aur bahut hi jyaada ultiyaan hone lagi-- almost kuch kha bhi nahi paa rahi thi aur usse splitting headache ho gayi. ER se kuch gastrointestinal drugs lekar ke, yeh bhi fade ho gayi. Humne usse doctor ke paas le gaye- jinhone uska khoon pichhle hafte liya tha parvovirus ke silsile mein aur unhone paya ki uski white blood cells 2 (.) par crash ho gaye the, jabki 3.5 se 5.0 ke beechh rehne chahiye. Usko anemia bhi dikha. Naye blood tests uss haftemein kiye gaye aur uski white blood cells normal they- lekin usme mycoplasma pneumococcus positive aaya aur X-ray mein pneumonia dikhi. Blood test mein ALT bhi elevated hua tha. Abhi, usse pneumonia se recover hona shuru ho raha hai- aur vo khana bhi kha rahi hai- lekin uski left calf aur pairo mein sujhan abhi bhi hai. Kya yeh sab parvovirus se hi hua hai? Kya yeh sab mycoplasma pneumococcus se hi hua hai? Kuch hafte pehle vo bilkul theek thi- jab parvovirus nahi aaya tha- lekin usne bahut zyada kaam kiya aur apni shakti ko khatam kar diya hoga. Kuch dino baad uska doctor ka appointment hai- lekin mujhe darr lag raha hai aur main usse pehle jaane ke liye keh raha hoon. Kya aapka kya raay hai?Dhanyavaad

Hinglish_Question: Hello, Kuch ghante pehle, main apne neighborhood mein ripsticking karte waqt concrete par gir gaya. Meri parents kehte hain ki ye sirf sujan hai aur baad mein thik ho jayega. Ab, 3 ghante baad, mujhe koi zyada farak nahi dikh raha hai. Aur results ye hai ki meri gums aur daant mein koi damage nahi hai. Lekin mere chin ke neeche aur upar kuch cuts aur scrapes hai. Kuch dikha nahi, bas gum mein thodi swelling thi. Hinglish_Question: Mujhe uth te hi chehra aur aankhein suj gayi hai. Please doctor, dekhiye aankhein neeche hai, mujhe lagatar hives aa rahe hai lekin ye kisi allergy se nahi hai. Un logon ne har baar aisa hi samjha hai lekin mujhe pata hai ki ye fluid retention hai. Ye ya to dil se hai ya phir kidney se. Mere bete ko kidney transplant hua hai aur use bhi yahi ho raha tha. Hinglish_Question: Main Flutivate 13 saal se use kar raha hoon aur meri skin mein koi problem aisi koi samasya nahi thi jise maine notice kiya except ye ki jab main ise use karna band karta tha toh meri skin dry ho jati thi aur dry flakes bhi nazar aate the. maine Flutivate use karna shuru kiya kyunki ek doctor ne 1999 mein mujhe bataya tha ki mujhe dry Ezema hai aur jab bhi main ise use karna band karta tha, mentioned ki tarah dryness aur falkes ki wajah se skin react karti thi, lekin 2011 March mein, ek samajhdar doctor ne mujhe bataya ki mujhe Ezema nahi hai aur Flutivate ko chhodna chahiye. Maine ise band kar diya aur ek saal aur adh baad tak khujli aur rashes huye lekin jyada symptoms nahi dikhe, sirf meri skin bahut dark ho gayi hai aur yeh sirf chehre tak nahi balki poore sharir par hai, bas chehre par zyada hai. Kya aap suggest kar sakte hain ki main pigmentation ko kaise kam kar sakta hoon? Hinglish_Question: Hi, pichle kuch mahino se mere pairon ke talwo mein different areas mein bahut khujli ho rahi hai. Inhe aane do ya do din ke andar they seem to go away. Mere hato par bhi ye symptoms hain. Currently mere palm mein aisa ek area hai jisse my inner wrist tak spread ho gaya hai,wo red aur suj gaya hai aur bahut tender hai. Hinglish_Question: Main 21 saal ki hu. Main ne haal hi me apne baal aur patle hote dekhna shuru kiya hai. Maine kabhi unhe kaata nahi hai, aur naahi karna chahti hoon. Meri baal hamesha se lambi hoti thi, meri peeth se niche tak zaroor jaati thi. Ab woh mere peeth ke akhiri hisse tak hi pahunchti hai. Mujhe iski wajah nahi pata. Main jawan hoon, bas stress ho sakta hai. Uski tasveer neeche attach ki gayi hai. Main ne kuch samay pehle waise shampoo istemal kiya tha jo baal badhane ka tha, lekin usne mujhe baal ke jhatke aur lambe baalo ke bade tukde jhadne ka nateeja diya. Tab se ab tak (lagbhag 3 mahine pahle) meri baal girne ka prayaas hamesha hota hai shower mein aur mere hair brush mein. Mujhe pata nahi hai ki peeche ke kuch kam baal toot gaye hai ya naye baal ubhar rahe hai. Main aveda Invati advanced shampoo ka istemal kar rahi hu, jo baal jhadna kam karne ke liye hai. Mujhe bahut zyada rusi aur sukhe scalp bhi hai. Bas mujhe kuch salaah chahiye.

Uska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai. Ab mujhe ek aise twitch ka ehsaas hota hai jo aankh ke neeche hai aur rash ke saath chalta hai. Ye bohot ajeeb hai aur meri zindagi ka koi bhi twitch nahi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a recurring rash under the eye, inadequate response to cortisone cream, and an unusual twitch? The image shows the condition of skin rash.  Pinkish red multuiple single coloured rash on the skin present close to each other.

Hinglish_Question: Mere finger joints aur leg finger joints par halka psoriasis hai aur haath par bhi halka hai pichle 12 saal se. Main corticosteroids preparations jaise flucort, clobetsol propionate, dipsalic aadi ko alag-alag formulations ke saath chakkar lagakar lagata hoon taaki koi formulation resistant na ho. Lekin jaise hi main isko lagana band karta hoon, kuch dinon mein psoriasis badh jaata hai. Mujhe lagta hai ki ye sirf mental disturbances aur meri sensitive nature ki wajah se hai kyunki main construction industry mein kaam karta hoon. Mere pass November 2010 mein SVT attack hua tha, isliye main high BP ke liye angizem CD 90 (Diltiazem) le raha hoon aur iske sath clonezapam + nitrest bhi mild doses mein leta hoon taki meri soch kam active ho aur isse (clonozepam) mujhe lagta hai ki psoriasis ke inflamation ko kam hota hai. Kya moisturizers jaise Evion cream dryness mein madad karte hain aur kya Ranbaxy brand ki Xerina cream (Glycolic Acid+ Urea Cetylated Fatty Ester Complex) madad karti hai? Kya homeopathic treatment try karna chahiye kyunki maine 3 mahine tak homeopathic treatment shuru ki thi jisme acche result mile aur psoriasis ke flakes 3 mahine mein 75% tak clear ho gaye the, lekin mujhe SVT attack ke wajah se continue nahi kar paya. Kripya salah dein (Main Indian origin ka hoon aur vegetarian hoon).
multimodal_Question_summ: The patient has had mild psoriasis on finger joints and leg finger joints for 12 years, exacerbated by mental disturbances. Seeking advice on treatment options. The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_dryness. Dryskin with small peels of skin coming out.

Hinglish_Question: Right underarm ke niche ek gaanth hai (skin ke neeche), sparsh me bahut komal hai aur dard nahi hota, sabse lamba anuchhed 1 cm se kam hai. Dono kohniyo par khujli aur jalan ka anubhav kiya hai. Mein ek Liver allograft transplant patient hoon, 9 saal se sthir hun, 1mg Prograf (har 12 ghante mein), 180 mg Myfortic (har 24 ghante mein) aur 5mg Prednisone (har 24 ghante mein) le raha hun. Transplant ka karan, PSC hai. Lagbhag 4 hafte pehle sardi hui thi, jisme khansi kaafi kam ho gayi hai. Doctor, uska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai. Raat mein kuch zyada pasine nahi hote - kabhi kabhi kuch pasine bed ke sampark wale hisso mein hote hai. Mera C. Difficile Colitis ka diagnosis hua hai - baar baar hoti hai (chronic).
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the significance of a soft lump in the underarm of a liver transplant patient with recurrent C. Difficile Colitis? The image shows the condition of hand lump. Lump on the small fingers side of the palm.

Mujhe lagta hai ki mere wisdom tooth bhi nikal raha hai, lekin mujhe bilkul bhi sure nahi hai. Main painkillers le raha hoon, ice packs lagaa raha hoon aur namak wale paani se mooh khaala raha hoon. Main ek dentist ke paas gaya par jaise ki Christmas ane wala hai, mujhe kuch din tak wait karna padega pehle mujhe dekhne ke liye, agar aapko lagta hai ki main kisi aur se jaldi milna chahiye toh kya mujhe karna chahiye. Aapke samay ke liye dhanyavaad.

Hinglish_Question: Jab se hum Nigeria se Thursday ko wapas aaye hain, mere bachche ke muh mein kuch issue hai aur high temperature hai, jab wo rote hai to uske gums se neeche se khoon nikalta hai. Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor,Do mahine se zyada pehle, mere left tonsil ke upar piche khane ka mehsus karne laga. Maine darpan mein dekha aur meri gale mein kuch shak nahi tha. Kyunki mere tonsil stones hamesha aate hain (haalaanki mujhe unhe mehsus nahi hota), maine socha yeh wahi hai aur chala jayega. Ek aur aadhe mahine baad, woh mehsus aur bhi tez ho gaya aur jab bhi main nigal raha tha, mujhe left tonsil par kuch mehsus hota tha. Jab maine darpan mein dekha, toh mujhe kuch lalima aur kuch chote veins dikhe mere tonsil ke pas mere gale ke left side par, aur tonsil bhi thoda sujaa hua aur lal tha.Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Maine ek ENT doctor ke saath appointment li hai. Unhone light se janch kiya aur kuch anormal nahi dekha, isliye unhone kaha ki yeh kuch khaas nahi hai. Kyunki main ek mahine se zyada constant feeling ke baare mein bahut tense tha, isliye unhone apne ungliyon se mere tonsils ko mehsus kiya aur kaha agar yeh cancer hota toh unhe mehsus hota aur mujhe assurity di hai ki yeh koi significant cheez nahi hai.Dono hafte baad bhi mujhe wahi sensation mehsus ho rahi hai ki khana mere left tonsil ke upar piche atka hai, lekin aur tez aur khujli wala. Maine kal raat darpan mein dekha aur notice kiya left tonsil ke upar ek bada sa safed ghora hai. Mujhe bukhar nahi hai, na ear pain hai, na tonsils pain hai aur na flu ke koi symptoms hain. Jab main nigal raha hoon, left side pe mushkil hoti hai mujhe, aur mujhe left tonsil par kuch mehsus hota hai. Right tonsil bilkul theek hai aur mujhe kuch ajeeb nahi lag raha. Hinglish_Question: Mere 7 saal ke bete ne subah mein ek sujaa hua gale ke sath utha. Kripya dekhein is vartaman condition ko. Mein use jald hi emergency room le gaya aur vahan viral parotitis ka diagnosis hua, aur mumps ruled out kiye gaye kyunki use dono immunizations (MMR) hain. Koi bhi blood test nahi hua. Mein agle din primary care doctor ke paas bhi jaa kar unhone bhi viral parotitis ka diagnostic sahi maana. Kuch test nahi hue. Agle din usne poori body pe ek daane waala rash se utha. Unke body pe sporadic bumps hain (bahut saare nahi, lekin yahan wahan bhare hue hain) kuch chote hain jinpe whitehead hota hai aur kuch sirf laal hain. Dono kohni ke niche unke nichle hisse pe bade laal daane hain (dime ya nickel ke size ke). Mein use kal firse doctor ke paas le ja rahi hoon. Kya aap viral parotitis diagnostic se sehmat hain rash ko bhi consider karke. Aur kyun blood test ya virus test nahi ho rahe hain. Mujhe meningitis jaisi serious samasya se chinta ho rahi hai. Wo swasth hai, koi allergies nahi hain, aur uski zindagi mein bahut jyada bimar nahi rehta hai (sirf 2 baar kaan ki tubes ki surgeries hue hain repeat ear infections ke karan). Dhanyavaad, Chintit Maa

Saath hi mera sharir achanak thakan aur thakan mehsus karne laga hai. Mere honth bhi sujne lage hai aur mere gardan ke piche wale glands bhi suj gaye hai. Please see the image of the affected area doctor  below.
multimodal_Question_summ: Why is the patient experiencing increased sickness, vomiting, worsening fatigue, body ache, swollen lip, and swollen neck glands? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. the back side of the neck is swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste, mujhe kai saalo se muh mein samasya hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is muh ko neeche. Lekin iss baar meri upper lip ke andar 5 mm wala ek bada sa hai aur saath hi upper lip mein sujan hai ek hafte se. Bohot jyada jalan hoti hai aur mujhe koi aaram nahi mil raha hai.. mein ek doctor se consult kiya hai aur unhone bataya ki ye allergic stomatitis hai..isney do din mein thik ho jayega. Lekin abhi tak koi sudhaar nahi hua hai.. unhone meri metrogyl dg gel suggest ki hai.. lekin mujhe koi aaram nahi hai aur sujan aur muh mein kuch samasya ek hafte se aise hi bani hui hai.
multimodal_Question_summ:
Patient has recurrent mouth ulcers, a 5mm ulcer and swelling on upper lip for a week without relief from metrogyl dg gel. The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. Pink coloured circular swelling with redness all around it prese t on the inner side of upper lip.
Condition- stomatitis ( Inflammation of the skin of mouth)

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe lagbhag do saal ho gaye hain jab mujhe apne skin par kuch skin disease ke symptoms dikhne lage hain. Meri skin par chote-chote balls ban rahe hain jo pani se bhare hue hote hain. Pehle kam the, lekin dawai leni ke baad doctoron ki salah se ye regular dikhne lage hain aur ye mainly haath aur pair par hote hain. Doctors ne HIV ka doubt rakha toh maine blood test karwaya, lekin reports negative aayi. Fir maine ek dusre doctor ko dikhaaya ek reputed charitable hospital mein, wahan mujhe intezaar karna pada aur bahut paisa kharch karna pada. Wahan ke doctoron ne kaha ki ye scabies hai..... Lekin ye theek nahi ho raha aur main thak gaya hoon. Discovery Channel mein maine dekha ki ek vyakti skin disease se pareshan tha aur doctor use theek nahi kar pa rahe the. Baad mein ek doctor ko realize hua ki uske aankhon mein kuch ajeeb cheezein hain. Unhone use nikal diya aur ab wo theek hai. Mujhe shak hai ki kya ye kuch mere sath bhi ho raha hai kyunki jab main right eye ko roshni mein hilata hoon toh mujhe aankh mein ek chhota sa kaala cheez dikhta hai jo hil rahi hoti hai jab main apni aankh kholta aur band karta hoon. Please help. Dhanyavaad. Uski tasveer neeche attach ki gayi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: The patient has been experiencing skin rashes with small water-filled bumps that do not heal, along with a suspicion of foreign bodies in the eyes. The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mai 49 saal ki mahila hoon. Meri zindagi mein ab tak kabhi bhi chehre ki twacha se sambandhit koi problem nahi hui thi. Mujhe kisi chiz se allergy nahi hoti hai. Lotions badalne se meri twacha par kabhi asar nahi hua hai. Mainey haal hi mein koi soap ya lotion nahi badla hai. Aaj subah mujhe apne gaal par laal rashes (chote chote rashes) dikhayi diye. Kripya doctor, niche diye gaye vartaman sthiti ko dekhein. Mujhe sirf ek hi wajah yaad aati hai, jise mai laxative (liquid) bolte hai, mainey jeevan mein pehli baar do din pehle liya. Isse koi dard ya khujli nahi hoti hai. Kya woh chale jayenge kyunki mai ab us laxative ka sevan nahi kar rahi hoon.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the facial skin rash related to the laxative taken two days ago, and will it go away on its own? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question:
Mere Priy Sir,
Meri maa 62 saal ki hai, unhe diabetes aur High Blood Pressure hai. 20 din pehle (4th May) unhe achanak poore sharir par Skin Rashes aaye (laal rang ke) aur unka skin suj gaya, aur kuch ghanto mein unhe temperature 101 ka aaya. Usi din unke treating doctor ne unhe ek tablet di, uske kuch ghanto baad mere skin ke kuch masle kuch kam ho gaye. Unhone teen din tak antibiotic liya (ofloxin aur cefpodoxime). Uske baad se wo antibiotic band kar diye. 2-3 din baad unhe low grade fever mehsoos hua, uske baad unhe Blood test ki salah di gayi jisme Blood culture bhi tha. Blood culture me Steph Aureus mila aur uska kuch saare drugs jaise ki ofloxin (azithromycin, cephalexin, clarithromycin, erythromycin,tetracycline etc) ke prati sensitivity chhi thi, phir unhone phir se 5 din tak Ofloxin liya. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko neeche di gayiye gayi conditions ke baare mein. Ab unhe subah 99 F tak ka fever hota hai, 1-2 ghante ke liye, jo khud hi antibiotics lena ke bina thik ho jaata hai. Ye tarah ki situation 8-10 din se chal rahi hai. Beech beech me kuch din aise bhi hue hai jab unhe fever nahi aaya. Ab doctor ne unhe ek urinary tract infection ke liye ek antibiotic diya hai. Pleaser suggest kijiye agar blood culture report sahi lagti hai aur further treatment kaunsa hona chahiye.
Dhanyavaad.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the blood culture report accurate and what is the recommended treatment for a 62-year-old woman with diabetes, high blood pressure, skin rashes, and recurring low-grade fever? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mere mo ke upar ke baye taraf kuch samasya hai, lekin ye mo ke chhat me hai. Please doctor, neeche diye gaye image se affected area dekhe. Ye severe dant dard ke roop me shuru hua, lekin ab pus ki sujan bhi ban gayi hai...thoda sa thoda thoda dard kam hua hai...muje dentist ka appointment nahi mila, lekin doctor ne amoxicillin prescribe kiya hai jab tak mein dentist se mil nahi paata...dard toh kuch had tak kam ho gaya hai, lekin abhi mera gardan aur gale mein dard hai aur mera chehra gudgudahat mehsoos ho raha hai, aur main bahut beemar/migraine aur chakkar mehsoos kar raha hoon...kya ye normal hai?
multimodal_Question_summ: Is it normal to experience neck and throat soreness, facial tingling, headache, and nausea while taking amoxicillin for mouth ulcers? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers.

Hinglish_Question: Do hafto pehle mujhe apne bayen hath ke bhitar wale hisse, jonki meri kalai se 2 inch upar hai, ek chhote se yellow jacket (hindi translation of yellow jacket) ne kaata tha. Dus din dard aur khujli, chhale aur sujan hone ke baad, finally wo chala gaya. Do din pehle usi jagah dard hone lag gaya hai, aur jab main use bahar se chhoo raha hoon toh aur zyada dard hota hai, par wo skin ki surface par nahi hai. Aaj ratko under-the-skin sujan ke karan wo thoda utha hua hao aur utha hua hisa ek chote se anda ke barabar hai. Kripya is prabhavit kshetra ka chitra dekhe doctor sahab.

The image shows the condition of skin rash. One section of oval skin with dark brown lining and central area light pink in color.

Hinglish_Question: Hi, mujhe ek rash/hive hai - kaun jaane. Seriously, ye lag raha hai ki mujhe jalaya gaya hai aur skin lifted hai. Yeh mere torso mein shuru hua, phir mere breasts, underarms, lower inner thigh (vagina ke paas) aur ab mera saara back par. Yeh months se aata jaata hai lekin ab yeh phail raha hai. Kya mujhe chinta karne ki zaroorat hai. Uski image neeche attached hai.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe weekend mein ek triathlon mein participate kiya tha aur ab mere gardan, upar ki taraf, kaanon ke peeche aur kaanon mein ek bumpy rash hai. Mere kaan thode suj gaye hain. Ye wahi skin hai jo wet suit se dhak nahi thi. Koi idea hai ki ye kya hai aur rash se chutkara pane ke liye mein kya karoon. Ismein thoda sa itching hoti hai. The image for that is attached below.

Hinglish_Question: Mene apna kidney transplant ek mahine pehle karwaya tha. Mujhe day one se two weeks post op day tak leg and scrotal swelling hui thi. Mein 50 saal ka hun, 1.67cm lamba hun. Mene 15 saal se diabetes hai jo ki insulin par control mein hai aur 4 saal se hypertension hai jo kidney transplant ke baad control me hai. Mein cyclosporin, cellcept, prednisolone le raha hun. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste, main 35 saal ka ek purush hoon, 160 pound ka vajan, 15 saal pehle mujhe ek gambhir staph infection hua tha jo mere right groin area ko stress aur lack of sleep ke liye sensitive banaya. Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, main pichle do saal se pterygium se pareshan hoon. Poore din aankhon mein sujan mehsoos hoti hai, kripya doctor, neeche diye gaye aankhon ko dekhein. Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor,Meri behen, ek 15 saal ki ladki, ko intermittent pain ki shikayat hai R sublingual area aur neck (submandibular area) mein, jo rest par 6/10 aur khane par 8/10 ho jata hai. Ab tak bhi area par dard hai.R submandibular triangle area par Grade 1 tenderness hai, fever nahi hai, halki cough abhi bhi hai, R sublingual area mein lump ki feeling hai, jab zubaan area par press karti hai toh dard hota hai. Hinglish_Question:
Namaste doctor, tooth extraction ke baad ulcers hote hain aur woh badhte ja rahe hain aur jaane nahi ho rahe hain. Woh ek mahine se wahan hain. Kripya doctor mouth ko dekhen niche . 
Main pareshan hoon ki ye oral cancer hai. Aur mere jeebh mein sensitivity hai aur jeebh thodi si safed hai, mere gaal ke andar white spots bhi aaye hain aur jeebh aur mouche ke upar khujli wala laal daagh hai. Mujhe Amoxicillin le rahi thi.

Kya ye summer rash hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Inmein koi rasayan nahi hai. Mujhe bukhar ya dard nahi hai. Aur ye mujhe pehli baar ho raha hai abhi.

Isliye mai ek skin specialist se mila aur mujhe diye gaye instructions ke anusar, mai momate lotion use karne laga. Lekin jab mai iska istemaal karna band kar diya, meri skin mein phir se problem ho rahi hai jaise ki rashes aur sab kuch. Mujhe kya karna chahiye? Uski image neeche attach ki gayi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What should be done for recurring skin problems like rashes and dryness after using momate lotion? The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_dryness. Dryskin with small peels of skin coming out.

Hinglish_Question: Hi there, haal hi mein mere pati aur mujhe kuch samasya ho gayi hai hamare moo ke andar aur extreme thakan bhi hai. Ye chale telhaan ek hafta se zyada samay tak rahe hain aur poora jeebh ko cover kar rahe hain. Mujhe aise 4 din se bura dast ho raha hai. Usne mujhe bola hai ki mujhe usko dekhna hai kyunki usse dard ho raha hai aur usko pata lagana hai ki kya wo infected hai. Mere paas bhi teen c-section huye hain. Hinglish_Question: Mai 47 saal ka hoon. Sirf do mahine pehle maine apne lipid profile karwaya tha aur mere cholesterol aur triglycerides dono high the. Mujhe do mahine ke liye tonact-tg aur vitamin e tablet ke sath sath multivitamins bhi liye jane ki salaah di gayi thi. Mai pure vegetarian hoon. Mai gym/yoga me teen-char din week me exercise bhi karta hoon. Jab bhi time milta hai, mai long walks par bhi jaata hoon. Lekin ab mujhe apni munh me kuch samasya ka samna karna pad raha hai, jo bahut halki form me hoti hai. Kripya doctor, neeche diye gaye prabhavit kshetra ki tasveer ko dekhe. Mai folic acid tablets bhi leta hoon. Lekin ye thik ho jata hai aur phir se wapas aata hai. To kya ye tonact ke karan hai ya koi aur samasya hai? Kripya kuch upay bataiye. Kya mai apni tests dobara karwaun? Jawab jaldi se ummid hai.

Hinglish_Question: July is saal mujhe mere aankhon ke aas-paas ek khujli wala laal chidchidahat wala daag aaya tha. Meri aankhon ke palkon par aur aankhon ke sochet aur mere honthon ke upar tha. Maine apne G.P se mila jo ne Daktacort ka prescription diya. Ye khujli aur laalpan ko kam karne mein madad karta hai, lekin iska asar thik nahi rehta. Mujhe kal jab meine apne G.P ko dikhaaya toh mujhe bataya gaya ki mujhe apne makeup mein allergic ho gaya hai. Main roz Loratadine 10mg le rahi hoon jisse mujhe aaram mil raha hai, lekin ab khujli aur laalpan mere aankhon ke neeche wapas aa raha hai aur mere chehre ke ek chhote se laal chidchidahat wale daag par bhi. Main apne chehre par koi bhi makeup nahi kar rahi hoon dekhne ke liye ki kya isse fark padta hai. Main 51 saal ki umra mein fit aur swasth hoon. Mera vajan 7.5 stones hai aur main kabhi bhi bimar nahi hoti. Mujhe koi bhi swasth sambandhit samasya nahi hai. Mere G.P ne mujhse blood test karwaye hain anemia check karne ke liye aur ab main uske parinaamon ka intezaar kar rahi hoon. Mujhe pehle kabhi koi skin problem ya allergy nahi hui hai. Main nahi jaanti ki mujhe kya aur kar sakti hoon, bas antibiotic try karke dekh sakti hoon ki kya isse fark padta hai. Uske liye wali image niche attach ki gayi hai.

Ek product mene paya tha jiske wajah se meri chehre par rash ho gaya tha aur uske baad mere ko ab tak koi problem nahi hui thi jab tak aap vash me nahi aaye. November ke beginning se maine bahut saare gandum se bane products ko kam kar diya hai. Mujhe kuch rash hai jise main low dose cortisone cream se treat karta hoon, lekin wo meri dusri itching me koi madad nahi kar raha hai jo roz badhti ja rahi hai..
