Hinglish_Question: Mera doctor ne mujhe 3 saal tak Lasix aur potassium diya thakan aur pulmonary ke khatre ke karan. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Main aakhirkar khud se nearly a year ago ise chhod diya kyun ki mujhe almost saari sujan chali gayi thi, sirf shaam ke aakhiri samay mein jo dikhti hai lekin subah uthne par usually chali jati hai (shayad mujhe 6 se 8 ghante tak inclined rehna padta hai). Mera darr hai ki mere lungs tak oxygen sahi tareeke se nahi pahunch pa raha hai aur meri dil ki pumping sahi tareeke se nahi ho pa rahi hai, is wajah se meri kidneys thoda saahi tareeke se kaam kar rahi hain. I think aapko samajh aa jayega. Kya main lasix aur potassium ko chhodne ke liye theek hoon? Thanks, Thomy.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is it safe for the patient to continue staying off Lasix and potassium, considering the resolved edema symptoms? The image here shows a medical condition related to edema. The leg has two red band like marks.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste, mai 2006 mai root canal treatment karwaya tha, jise do saal baad gir gaya aur uske baad wapas nahi lagaaya gaya. November 2011 mai mere gardan mai kuch samasya thi, jo November 2012 tak rahi. Kripya doctor, affected area ki image dekhein neeche. Mai sirf antibiotics lekar thik ho gaya tha. Maine physician se mila aur janch aur biopsy ke baad pata chala ki yeh fibrosis hai aur unhone kuch anti tb dawa di hai. Mai 30 saal ki vidhwa hoon aur ek nurse hoon. Kya yeh sahi diagnosis tha?
multimodal_Question_summ: Was the diagnosis of Koch's disease correct in a 30-year-old nurse presenting with a previous root canal and neck swelling? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The part of the neck near the ear is swollen. The neck below the lower jaw is red and swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Meri 3 saal ki beti raat ke khane mein apni kursi se gir gayi aur pahle chehre par gir gayi. Turant ek bruise uske aankh ke neeche dikhne lagi. Chehre par almost cheek bone par thi. Jab maine use check kiya to wo bahut hard aur swollen thi. Kripya below diye gaye affected area ke image ko dekhe. Mujhe chinta honi chahiye? Main use pakadkar rakha aur wo meri god mein 7 baje hi so gayi, yani ki apni bed time se do ghante pehle. Aur usne girne ke turant paanch minute baad meri god mein sone lag gayi.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should I be concerned about my three-year-old's hard, swollen bruise under her eye after falling onto a hardwood floor? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The both foot are swollen with deformation in right foot.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe apne gardan ke baye taraf ek ganth hai. Doctor, kripya niche diye gaye patient ki image dekhein, mere gardan me kuch samasya hai. Ye dardrahit hai aur bada ya chota dikhayi nahi deta hai. Mujhe ise lagbhag 18 mahine pehle notice hua tha. 18 mahine pehle mai apne pet ke bal soya karta tha (jise baad me pata chala ki gardan ko dar hote hai). Sada gardan ko darbate hue, mujhe gardan ke baye taraf dard aur sujan mehsoos hone lagi hai (jahan ab ganth hai). Tab se mai samanya tarike se soya hoon aur dard gayab ho gaya hai lekin ganth wahi rahi hai. Mujhe yeh nahi pata ki kya ye isse related hai lekin mujhe aisa lagta hai. Ganth dardrahit hai aur mere bal rekha aur trapezius ke beech hai. Iski lambai aur chaudai lagbhag inch hai. Mai ise tab mehsoos kar sakta hoon jab mai apni gardan jhukata hoon aur use masaj karta hoon. Ye sirf tab hilta hai jab mai use masaj karta hoon aur akhir me, jab bhi mai apni kamar ko dar karta tha, kisi karan se wo jyada bura ho jata tha. Kya mujhe chinta karne ki zarurat hai... Kya koi possible upchar hai ise treat karne ke liye... Kripya madad karein, mai bahut bechain hoon.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should a painless lump on the left side of the neck, present for 18 months, be a cause for concern? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. There is round shaped swelling in the neck below the lower jaws.

Hinglish_Question: Mere haathon aur ungliyon par kuch bumps hain jo thode alag-alag aur mere kohin bhi hain. Haathon ke elbows par bhi hain. Ek nedaye maine inhi bumps ka cluster mere paer par bhi paya hai. Doctor, iske liye image bhi haijo attached hain. Ye mere skin ke colour ke samaan hote hain aur thoda itchiness bhi hoti hai. Jab main inko scratch karta hoon, tab thoda hot/cold sensation bhi hota hai... Mujhe kaise samjhayoon, pata nahi. Koi idea hai ki ye kya hai aur main isko theek kaise kar saktahun..
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of the itchy bumps on hands, fingers, elbows, and foot with a hot/cold sensation when scratched? The image shows the condition of hand lump. Swelling in the palm just below the middle finger.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe April mein ek car accident mein bahut chot lag gayi thi. Mere left shin mein ek soft painless lump hai jo khada ho jata hai jab mein khada hota hoon aur jab mein baith jata hoon, wo gayab ho jata hai. Mera right leg knee ke niche jaise thoda suj gaya tha aur usmein hard knots hain. Doctor, kripya neeche di gayi image ko dekhiye. Bohot kam ho gaya hai lekin abhi bhi thoda sujan mehsoos hota hai aur kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki suj gaya hai aur phir se normal ho gaya hai. Kya koi mujhe bata sakta hai ki unka kya khayal hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the cause of the soft painless lump on the left shin and the swelling with hard knots on the right leg below the knee? The image here shows a medical condition related to knee_swelling. There is swelling accompanied by a redness, leading  to being of the legs outwards.

Hinglish_Question: 27 saal ki ladki. Urine protein 4+, serum albumin 2.3. Bilateral pitting pedal. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko below. Kisi bhi pehle ki bimari ki koi history nahi hai. Urine mein pus cells 30-35 dikha rahe hain. Culture mein klebsiella paya gaya hai. Kidney usg mein sirf ek medical renal disease dikha. Koi other abnormality nahi. Puffy eyes ya legs ke alawa koi aur issue nahi hai. Kripya apne sujhav dein.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of bilateral pitting pedal edema, urine protein, low serum albumin, pus cells, and klebsiella infection? The image here shows a medical condition related to edema. the calf muscle of the right leg has swollen badly.

Hinglish_Question: Meri twins babies, 13 months ke ho gaye hain, unko 2 din pehle hand foot and mouth disease ka diagnosis hua hai. 8 din ho gaye hai jabse sab shuru hua tha, ab koi fever nahi hai lekin ek ki mouth ke ulcers sudharne ka koi asar nahi ho raha hai.Please doctor, dekhiye neeche ki mouth ko. Ye din ba din buri dikh rahi hain, uski gums hamesha bleeding ho rahi hain specially raat mein. Kya mujhe chinta karni chahiye ya ye sirf is disease ka process hai? Kya kuch aisa hai jo main usko dekar uski mouth ki samasya ko sudhar sakun, hospital mein kaha tha ki koi cream ya kuch nahi hai jo madad kar sake aur bas usko touch na karein, lekin bleeding ki wajah se uski mouth se aane wali smell quite stinky hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should there be concern if hand, foot, and mouth disease ulcers worsen, bleed, and produce a foul smell, despite no fever? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. Big sized white ulcer or swelling just below the front inscisors of the lower line of teeths. Redness and little spot of blood around.

Hinglish_Question: Meri 1 saal ki beti ko red blotchy rash hai mostly uske stomach aur chest par. Ye mostly bath ke baad appear hota hai aur jab inflamed hota hai toh painful lagta hai. Lotion ya oil se ye aur bhi badh jata hai. Humne kuch alag-alag soaps try kiye hain - johnson s moisture therapy, aveeno aur aquaphor baby soaps. Humne eucerin extreme dry skin lotion, aquaphor ointment, johnsons s creme lotion aur regular lotion bhi try kiye, lekin sabhi se red raised rash aur bhi jyada inflamed aur painful ho jata hai... please help! Uski image neeche attach hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a painful, red blotchy rash on a 1-year-old's stomach and chest, worsening after baths and lotion application? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Hi there, maine bahut der tak Prednisone li thi, gout ki wajah se. Unhone ab mujhe is dawai se hata diya hai, lekin phir maine notice kiya ki mere haatho par aur haatho ke alawa bhi red spots ya rashes ho rahe hai. Ab main ye skin rash ting ko lekar pareshan hun. Ye spots scabed up lag rahe hain. Uska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What are the red, scabbed up spots on the patient's hands and arms after being weaned off Prednisone? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor,20 saal pehle, jab main ek yuva tha, mere foreskin ko circumcision mein mostly remove kiya gaya tha. Kuch alag skin hai, lekin ye head ko cover karne ke liye bilkul enough nahi hai. Kya skin regrow ya uske parts grow karne ki possibility hai. Aur kya koi medicine ya cream hai jo meri skin mein koi abnormality stimulate kar sake. Kripya doctor, dekhein is vartaman condition ko.
multimodal_Question_summ: Can the loose remaining foreskin be regrown or stimulated with medication/cream? Patient provides image for reference. The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_growth. There is a mass elevated from the surface on the skin in the outer ear.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, mere Adam's apple ke pas halka sujan hai. Mere gardan ke piche aur kaan me tez dard hai. Kripya dekhiye neck par kuch ho gaya hai neeche. Maine tests karwaye hain. Report me likha hai TSH 13 mIU/L hai aur Anti-TPO 209 IU/mL hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What might be the cause of mild swelling near Adam's apple, along with acute pain in the back of the neck and ears? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The neck below the jaw contains a cyst like structure.

Hinglish_Question: Mera khaliya hua khoon ka sugar 106 hai aur liver function abnormal hai, although mujhe drink nahi karna padhta hai. Mere pairon mein swelling aur numbness hoti hai, muscles aur joints mein dard hota hai, aur hips mein chalne aur uth bethne mein taklif hoti hai. Kya yeh diabetes hai, ya koi aur samasya ho sakti hai. Mere muscles aur joints pehle bahut severe the aur mein chal nahi sakta tha. Dhanyavaad. Kripya dekhein affected area doctor ki image ko neeche.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is high fasting blood sugar, abnormal liver function, foot swelling, numbness, muscle/joint pain, and mobility issues indicating diabetes or another condition? The image shows the condition of hand lump. One circular lump at the center of the palm.

Hinglish_Question: Hi my 10 month old has apne aankh andar se scratch kar liya hai, according to the optometrist aur abhi wo scab hone laga hai. Humne uski treatment 14 din se Exocin ointment se kar rahe hain lekin abhi bhi wo red hai, hamesha se paani nikal rahi hai, light se bache nahi jaa sakti aur suj gayi hai aur adha bandh hai. Please doctor, aankhein dekhiye neeche di gayi hai. Optometrist ne kaha hai ki hum sirf ointment lagate rahen. Unhone yeh bhi salah di hai ki agar scab ban jaaye toh isse hamesha ke liye uski eyesight pe asar pad sakta hai. Unhone kaha hai ki hume dhyaan dena hoga ki humara beta use na khuje, lekin wo usse constantly rub karne ki koshish kar raha hai aur raat ko bahut zor se chillata rehta hai aur nahi sota hai aur pillow pe apne sir ko upar neeche maar maar ke hilte rehta hai. Kya hum jo kar rahe hain sahi hai ya kisi aur doctor ke paas jana chahiye? Please help.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the current treatment plan appropriate for a 10-month-old with a scratched, swollen, red, watery, light-sensitive eye that is affecting sleep? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Eye lid entirely swollen and pink in color with tear dripping of the eye.

Hinglish_Question: Mere right fore arm par ek raised hai jo practically blister ki tarah dikhta hai ya kisi kide ke katne ke saman. Maine ise couple of weeks se dekh raha hoon. Iske saath koi dard nahi hai. Ab tak ismein koi badlav nahi hua hai jaise mujhe lag raha hai. Kya mujhe doctor ke paas jana chahiye kisi bhi tarah ke skin cancer ko rule out karne ke liye. Mere parivaar mein skin cancer aur dusre cancer ke cases hain. Iske liye niche attach ki gayi image hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should a patient with a non-painful raised skin irritation on their forearm, family history of skin cancer, and an unchanged condition seek medical evaluation? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Hello, mujhe apni gaand ke andar ke lining par ek brownish line dikhai deti hai. Main bahut saaf hu aur saabun aur paani se dhote hu toilet paper istemal karna nahi pasand karte. Maine use ragadne ki koshish ki lekin meri skin bahut irritated hai, ye ek rashes ki tarah hai aur har baar jab main shower leti hu toh ye jalan karti hai, jaise ki meri gaand ke beech ki skin aasani se phat jaati hai. Main is gandha brown line se bahut pareshan hu, ye meri confidence ko sex mein khatam kar rahi hai aur mujhe bahut embarass karti hai. Kripya madad kare, bahut dhanyavaad sarah. Yahan attached image hai uski.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of the brown line on the inner lining of the buttcrack, accompanied by a rash and skin irritation? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mere 7 saal ke bete ke sar ke piche ek chota sa ganja spot achanak ban gaya hai. Skin smooth hai aur spot me thoda bal ug raha hai. Ye nickel ke size ka hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Ye kya ho sakta hai. Baccho mein ganje spot ka karan kya hai aur mein use kaise madad kar sakta hoon.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a small bald spot with hair growth in a 7-year-old child and how can it be treated? The image shows the condition of dry scalp. White and dry scalp.

Hinglish_Question: Hi, main 27 saal ki ek female hoon jo generally acchi sehat mein hai. Mujhe ek non-itchy, non-scaly rash hai, mostly red patches ke roop mein jo mera shoulder blades ke beech ek bada square banate hain. Ye rash kai saalon se hai, lekin size mein badh gaya hai. Ye bhi mere breasts ke underside aur tops mein spread ho gaya hai, lekin nipple area ko chhoda hai. Lagta hai ki ye rash suraj ya garmi ke prateekshan mein bhi bigad sakta hai, lekin ye ho sakta hai ki ye bas zyada dikh raha hai. Mere skin ko scrape kiya gaya aur fungal involvement ke liye test kiya gaya tha, jisme negative aaya tha. Mere paas abhi bhi biopsy pending hai, lekin main dekhna chahti hoon ki kya kisi ke pass ideas hai agar biopsy men kuch notable na ho. Uska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a non-itchy, non-scaly rash on the shoulder blades and breasts that worsens with sun/heat exposure? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mere dant (niche right side) mein ek bacterial infection tha aur mujhe usi taraf aankh bhi twitching ho rahi thi, bahut pareshan karti thi! Woh thoda suj gaya tha aur bahut dard, mujhe do tarah ke antibiotic use kiye jab tak dard gayab nahi ho gaya. par ab, lagbhag ek saal baad, meri aankh abhi bhi twitching kar rahi hai aur mere dant mein koi dard nahi hai, bas thoda ajeeb lag raha hai use chew karte samay. Please dekhein meri aankhein neeche. Kya aapko lagta hai ki infection fir se ho gaya hai? BTW, antibiotics ne mujhe pehle wakt meri pait aur meri puri body par bahut asar kiya tha. Aapke comments ke liye dhanyavad :)
multimodal_Question_summ: Does the patient's recurring eye twitch and discomfort when chewing suggest a potential reoccurrence of a previous dental infection? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Red colored swelling below the eye near the nose part.

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor, Meri maa 91 saal ki hai. Vo abhi 4.5 mg Coumadin le rahi hai roz. Unhone apne poore sharir par ek bahut jyada khujli wala rash develop kar liya hai. Kripya doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Vaise toh unhe 6 saal se Coumadin diya ja raha ha, lekin ye dosage unke liye khaas kar jyada hai. Unke INRs sirf 1.2 se 1.4 dikha rahe the, isliye dosage badhaya gaya hai 4.6 mg se 3 mg se. Kya ye dawa is rash ka karan hai. Vo bahut pareshan hai aur hum rash par Triamcinolone cream laga rahe hai. Coumadin pehle atrial fib ke liye prescribe kiya gaya tha, lekin ab unke pass pacemaker hai aur unhone ablation bhi karvayi hai. Kya koi tarika hai unhe Aspirin par shift karne ka aur Coumadin ko band karne ka, jo unke system mein vyasthata paida kar raha hai. Mein kal unke primary doctor ko call karunga; phir bhi, mujhe thoda knowledge hona chahiye jab mein unse baat karunga. Aapke comments ki koi bhi rai saraha hai. Dhanyavaad.
multimodal_Question_summ: Can Coumadin cause a high dosage rash in a 91-year-old patient with atrial fibrillation? Can Aspirin be a suitable alternative? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mere side mei meri dusri beti hone ke 5 saal bad maine apni gall bladder remove karvai thi aur kidney stones ke liye lithotripsy karvaya tha. Wo same abdominal pain hai jo mere peeth ko bhi affect karti hai. Main yeh soch rahi hu ki kya meri dusre pains bhi isi wajah se hote hai. Wo mujhe paagal kar rahi hai.SHOULDERS ARE REALLY PAINING, HIP BONES ARE HURT AUR CHALNA BHI MUSHKIL HO JAATA HAI, Meri peeth dard karti hai, aur meri side pain ko aur bhi badha deta hai. WALK KARNA BAHUT HI BURA HOTA HAI AUR PAIN KO OR BADHA DETA HAI. Jab main kapde fold karti hu, tabhi bhi meri discomfort hoti hai, main comfortable bhi nahi ho paati, meri tangon ko fold karne se ye aur bhi badh jati hai. Meri haatho aur pairon mei spasms hote hai jahan dard hota hai. Please dekhein something happened on foot below . Jab aur jab main so sakti hu, tab mere body parts numb ho jaate hai, kabhi kabhi sone ke tareeke ke hisaab se, mera scalp bhi numb ho jaata hai. Agar maine khana khana bhool gayi ho toh mujhe bahut light headed, dizzy, irritable aur shaky feel hota hai, khana khane se hamesha madad nahi milti hai aur mujhe bhookh mitane ki ichcha hoti hai, meri behen keh rahi thi juice peelo mujhe thoda better feel hua hai aur ab main thak gayi hu aur chidchidi ho rahi hun. Rona chahti hun, mujhe chhuna nahi pasand, OTC pain killers kaam nahi karte aur prescribed pills bhi hamesha kaam nahi karte hai. Maine kidney stones ke liye lithotripsy karvai thi aur gall bladder remove karvaya tha same abdominal pain ke liye jo mere peeth ko bhi affect karti hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Does the patient's Shoulder and Hip bone soreness, back pain, and abdominal pain have a common cause? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The right leg is swollen with redness.

Hinglish_Question: Main Bali mein hoon aur 4 din pehle Indonesia ke Flores island se wapas aaya hoon. Vahan par mere pair ke peeche aur andar thighs par thoda sa red issue hai. Ab ye pairon par aur haathon par bhi zyada failne laga hai. Shayad thoda sa bumpiness torso par bhi hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Ye rash itching ke saath aur bhi badh gaya hai aur clear fluid exuding kar raha hai. Koi treatment advice swagat hogi.
multimodal_Question_summ: Red skin rash on legs and arms, bumps on torso, itching, raised areas exuding clear fluid. Treatment advice requested. The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mere paas tonsilitis hai, mujhe Rocephin 2G daily do din tak diya gaya fir augumentin 625mg twice daily ke liye change kiya gaya aur ab maine ise do din liya hai. Kuchh badlav mere mehsoos karne mein nahi aaya hai, sirf temperature kam ho gaya hai. Mujhe abhi bhi sir dard hai aur tonsils pe white patches aur sujhan hai. Please doctor, dekhein is vartaman condition ko. Mujhe swallowing mein dard hai aur mere muh mein ek karwa swaad hai. Mere doctor kehte hain ki mujhe kuchh aur karne ki zaroorat nahi hai, sirf Aspirin guggles karna hai, vo sochti hain ki ye viral hai isliye antibiotic ka koi asar nahi hua hai. Mere dar ye hai ki ye Streptococci infection ho sakta hai, jaisa mujhe pehle hua tha aur mujhe waise hi feel ho raha hai. Main kya karu? Kya ye sahi tarika hai treatment ka?
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the current treatment for tonsillitis effective if the patient experiences swelling, white patches, headaches, pain while swallowing, and a nasty taste in their mouth? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. One of the tonsils are swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Mere paas sirf 6 din pehle hi ek baby hua hai. Mai pehle 3 dino tak theek thi hospital me, lekin jab mai ghar aayi toh mujhe sujan hone lagi. Ab meri ankho me hi sujan hai lekin chest me discomfort ho raha hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is affected area ki image neeche. Meri saanso me kuch chubh raha hai aur saans lene me uncomfortable feel ho raha hai. Maine BP check karne ka decide kiya aur vo 137/77 hai aur dil ki dhadkan 45 hai. Normally toh mera BP 90/60 rehta hai, ab mai kya karu?
multimodal_Question_summ: What should be done for a patient who recently gave birth, experiencing ankle swelling, chest discomfort, abnormal lung sensations, and changes in blood pressure and heart rate? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Pea sized swelling on lower left side of the lip. Rounded with redness and little shinyness.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste, kal mere ko kidney stone ko break karne ke liye sound waves ka use kiya gaya tha. Discharge instructions mein likha hai ki agar mere skin mein changes hai, jaise ki rash, itching ya hives ho toh mujhe apne doctor ko call karna chahiye. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Mujhe woh sab nahi hai, lekin mera chehra laal ho gaya hai. Maine doctor ko call karne ki koshish ki, lekin vo Fridays ko noon tak band ho jaate hai. Mujhe koi aur problem nahi hai, lekin pata nahi ki mujhe doctor on call se contact karne ke liye unka answering service use karna chahiye ya nahi. Agar ye kuch badi baat nahi hai toh unko pareshan karne ki jarrorat nahi hai. Mujhe pain ke liye hydrocodone/acetaminaphen aur Bactrim antibiotic liya ja raha hai. Maine dono dawaon ko pehle bhi liya hai aur koi problem nahi hui hai. Mujhe peshaab karne mein koi problem nahi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should a patient experiencing flushed face while taking hydrocodone/acetaminophen and Bactrim after a kidney stone procedure contact the on-call doctor? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Entire back covered with red and pink colored patches. Very less area where original skin color present. Shows extreme rashes or allergy.

Hinglish_Question: Lagbhag ek saal pehle mere upper lip ke right side mein sujan ho gayi thi sath hi kuch relentless twitching bhi thi.Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko below. Voh kabhi blister nahi hui aur kuch dinon ke andar hi gayab ho gayi thi, lekin ab mujhe darr hai ki ye oral herpes ho sakti hai. Main apne char saal ke bete ke saath swimming jana chahti hoon, lekin mujhe dar hai ki mujhe ek cold sore hoga jisse main jab kam ke liye jaungi aur waiteress ke roop mein aapke bhojan ko serve karungi. Hum sab sahmat ho sakte hain ki itna common hone ke baavjood bhi, ek ladki jo ki ek giant cold sore ke saath hai aapka bhojan serve kar rahi ho, voh kitna avishwasjanak hoga. Mujhe uske baad se kuch aisa nahi hua hai, lekin agar ye herpes ho sakti hai toh main risk nahi lena chahti. Aapka kya kehna hai?
multimodal_Question_summ: Patient had a lip swelling with twitching a year ago, now concerned about oral herpes and wants advice on swimming. The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Full upper lip swollen. More swelling on right side of upper lip.

Hinglish_Question: Thank you. Abhi kuch dinon se meri thumb ki mid joint ke bahar ek hard lump aaya hai. Doctor, uske image ko neeche attached kiya hai. Kya aapko lagta hai ye calcification hai? Sath hi, index finger ke andar bhi ek chota sa lump hai - top se pehle joint pe. Dono right hand mein hai. Kya ye bhi osteoarthritis ho sakta hai? Bahut dhanyavad.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the hard lump on the outside of the thumb mid joint and the smaller lump on the inside of the index finger joint signs of calcification or osteoarthritis? The image shows the condition of hand lump. One circular lump at the center of the palm.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste. Mujhe Daphne di gayi hai jabse maine delivery ki hai. Pehle 5 mahine tak, meri skin soft thi aur koi rashes nahi hue. Lekin, haal hi mein, lagbhag 2 hafte se, meri skin mein kuch problem ho rahi hai, khaas karke meri aramein aur taango mein. Mujhe samajh nahi aa raha ki ye kyun ho raha hai. Mujhe dusri brand (Diane-35) lena tha, lekin meri dost ne bataya hai ki uske OB ke according, dusre brand ke pills lene se pehle pamsper (jiise mai dare hui hoon) karna chahiye. Kya aap mujhe iske bare mein salah de sakte hai? Dhanyavaad. Yaha par jo attached image hai: [Image]
multimodal_Question_summ: Should the patient proceed with their plan to switch birth control pills or seek treatment for their current skin rash? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question:
Sai, Namaste doctor,
Mujhe 2 mahine pehle TB ka diagnosis hua tha aur main 50 dino se Forecox tablets use kar raha hoon. Pehle kuch din achha tha. Lekin ab mere thighs par rashes aur skin infection (fungal) ho gayi hai aur itching unbearable ho gayi hai. Mujhe neend nahi aa rahi hai iski wajah se. Mujhe samajh nahi aa raha ki forecox ko rukna chahiye ya skin infection ke liye additional medicine leni chahiye. Abhi main ketoconazole lotion use kar raha hoon jo mujhe helpful nahi lag raha hai. Kya aap suggest kar sakte hain?
Dhanyavad,
Sai
multimodal_Question_summ: How can I manage unbearable itching due to skin infection (fungal), while taking Forecox tablets for TB? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Meri biwi ko we mante hain ek fire ant ne kaata hai. Usne kaha ki wo jala aur paon kaafi suj gaya hai, toe mein 2 chote sa bedak ho gaye hain par paon ek din baad purple ho gaya hai aur chalne par dard ho raha hai.Pls dekhiye kuch paon mein hua hai . Aur ab uske poore sharir mein ek daane wali allergy hai aur ye ek red line ki tarah dikh rahi hai uski taang tak jaate hue. Humare paas koi health insurance nahi hai par abhi toh uski health hi sabse important cheez hai. Koi salah ho toh bataiye. Humne benadryl aur cortisone cream bhi use ki hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the wife's foot swelling with blisters and turning purple, accompanied by a rash and red line up the leg? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The right leg is swollen with redness.

Hinglish_Question: Hi. Mere gale ke piche ek massa ya ganth hai aur mujhe dard ho raha hai, mere shoulder blade area mein numbness/tingling hai (dono taraf) aur mere peeth ke niche tak. Iska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai. Mujhe sir dard hota hai agar main koi bhi physical kaam karta hoon jaise general house cleaning, pulling, pushing, throwing a ball, lifting objects ya overhead work, etc... Mere paas iss cheez ko kai saal ho gaye hain lekin samay ke saath ye aur bhi bad gaya hai. Ek neurologist ne CT scan kiya tha aur usme koi tumor ya aisa kuch nahi dikha. Unka kehna hai ki shayad ye bas fluid...fatty tissue hai. Maine kuch din pehle ek prednisone medidose pack liya tha, do baar, lagbhag paanch hafto ke beech. Lekin swelling wahi hai. Mere rheumatologist ne aaj ultrasound kiya hai lekin mujhe abhi uske results pata nahi hain.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a lump on the back of the neck accompanied by pain, numbness/tingling, and headaches? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. the back side of the neck is swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Mere husband, beta aur mein sab bimaari se theek ho rahe hain jismein fever, cough, aches aur nasal congestion shaamil the. Mere husband aur beta ko kisi bhi treatment ke bina theek ho gaya hai lekin jab mera fever utra tab mujhe pata chala ki mere haathon, kandhon aur kaano ke aas paas sunburn type ka rash ho gaya hai. Ye dikhne mein kam ho raha hai. Kya ye ek usual viral 'bug' ke saath common hai? Iski image attached hai niche.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is a sunburn-like rash common after recovering from a viral illness with symptoms of fever, cough, aches, and congestion? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mere 2 mahine ke bacchi ki lambi aur moti baal hai. Wo apne baal bahut khenchti hai (day 1 se hi karti hai). Jab wo bhookhi hoti hai ya apne aapko sulane ke liye apna haath ya angootha choosne lagti hai. Mujhe uske baalo mein petroleum jelly lagane ka vichar tha, taaki uske baal dry scalp ya kuch aur cheezo se nuksaan na ho par mujhe yeh sochna hai ki petroleum jelly ki lagatar shaan sevan ka kya negative asar hoga. Please doctor, eyes ko neeche dekhe.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the recommended approach to prevent dry scalp in a 2-month-old baby who pulls her hair and sucks on her hand/thumb? The image shows the condition of dry scalp. Slight white coloration of the scalp.

Hinglish_Question: Hello, merese boyfriend ko abhi Tetanus ka diagnosis hua hai and hum regularly sexual active hain. Mujhe yeh jaanna tha ki kya main uske sperm se Tetanus contract kar sakti hoon. Hum usually protection use karte hain, but lately do not with oral sex. Meri throat bahut suj gayi hai aur past couple of days se swallow karna difficult ho raha hai aur mujhe sure hona hai ki maine Tetanus contract nahi kiya hai, aur yeh sirf meri horrible tonsils hain jo remove karne ki zaroorat hai acting up. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko.
multimodal_Question_summ: Could the patient's swollen tonsils be a symptom of tetanus or a separate issue needing treatment? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. The left side tonsils are swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Doctor Please dekhiye patient ke neck ki image, iss mein kuch problem hai. Mere neck ke upar ki taraf jugular notch par ek ganth hai. Jab main ise dabata hoon to woh hilta nahi hai aur na hi dard hota hai. Yeh seedha sternum ke ek inch upar aur right side mein hai. Left side flat lagta hai aur jab main apni haath left se right taraf ragadta hoon toh yeh ganth meri esophagus area paar ho jaane ke baad dikhta hai. Kya mujhe is baare mein chinta karni chahiye?
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a non-painful, immobile lump above the sternum, to the right, located after the esophagus? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. There is swelling in the neck with signs of redness.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, mujhe do saal pehle ek sex worker ke saath protected sex hua tha. Almost sabhi cheezein test ki hai, sab negative hai. Lekin mere muh mein kuch serious issue hai. Do mahine exposure ke baad neuropathy jaisi cheez bhi hui thi. DNA PCR test bhi kiya tha, wo bhi negative tha. Kripya sujhav dein. Iski image neeche attach ki gayi hai.

The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. A patch of irregular swelling on the lower lips immediate right inner side. Redness around the inflammation.

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor,Two years ago, mere bhai ne apne aankh ke niche, naak ke saath, ek lal gola dekha tha. Iska shape pill jaisa tha. Kabhi kabhi ye skin peel hone ka kaaran banata hai. Jab peel hata deta hai, toh lalpan aur tej jalan hoti hai. Aur ye samay ke saath badh raha hai. Please doctor, dekhiye in aankhon ko niche. Jab usne ek dermatologist se mila, toh usne kuch dawaiya di hai. Isme Momenta, Sebodiane DS from Noreva, Kelual DS shampoo from Ducray aur Funzol 150 shaamil hai, tatkalin gayab hone ke liye.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the cause of the red circle under the eye that leads to skin peeling, redness, and growth over time? The image here shows a medical condition related to eye_redness. The eye has turned whitish red and it is also swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Hi. meri maa ko achanak rash ho gaya hai. Uske paon ke nichle hisse par lal daane hai, ab hatheliyon par aur ab haathon aur janghon ke andar bhi lal daane hai. Hum shuru ke stages mein doctor ke paas gaye the aur unhe viral ho sakta hai kaha kyun ki ye symmetrical lag raha hai. Ab ye lag raha hai ki ye baaki haath aur jangh ke andar bhi spread ho gaya hai! Mujhe chinta ho rahi hai kyun ki wo 8 hafte se pneumonia se ghar par recover kar rahi hai, uske hospitalization ke baad. Koi idea hai ki hum kya karen kyun ki ye bohot khujli kar raha hai aur poori body mein garam lag raha hai! Wo betometasone cream ko ab ek din se 2 baar istemal kar rahi hai!! Iske liye attachments mein image hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing the symmetrical rash with red spots on the feet, hands, arms, and inner thigh, along with itchiness and heat? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question:
Namaste doctor,
Maine ek alag desh mein jaake mukt roop se ho rahi health problems ke depth testing karwayi. Mujhe gastrointestinal symptoms ki wajah se start of diagnosis hua hai, idiopathic angio, thickened skin, weird blood vessels (chote red tree-like veins), family history of scleroderma, high CRP aur high WBC. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Skin test ne focal dermal sclerosis dikhaya hai. Kya aapko lagta hai ki yeh diagnosis secure karne ke liye kaafi hai? Wo ne mujhe Methotrexate aur Prednisone alternate day start kiya hai. I do not appear to have full Raynaud's aur mera ANA usually negative hai. Lekin mujhe kuch intense symptoms hai aur bahut saare jo is condition ke match karte hain. Meri past medical history mein severe asthma, allergies, angio, gout ke episodes aur anaphylaxis hai. Meri current medications Cetirizine 40 mg, Zantac 300 mg, Breo ellipta, Avamys, Singulair, Prednisone aur Methotrexate hain.
multimodal_Question_summ: Does the patient's gastrointestinal symptoms, idiopathic angioedema, thickened skin, and family history of scleroderma indicate a diagnosis of scleroderma? The image here shows a medical condition related to edema. The leg is swollen near the ankle

Hinglish_Question: Mere 1 saal ke bachche ke honthon ka ek jagah, jo ki khud bahut center hai, thanda bottle pi lene ke baad discolored ho jata hai, jaise ki blue-ish. Kuch minutes baad wo apni normal color mein wapas aa jata hai aur dusre jagahon par honthon ka color aur hontho ki veins sahi dikh rahi hoti hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Use kahi aur bhi cyanosis nahi hai aur uski saans lene mein koi dikkat nahi hai. Koi idea hai aapke paas?
multimodal_Question_summ: Why is the center of a 1-year-old's lip discolored with a bluish hue after drinking a cold bottle? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Swelling  on both upper and lower lip. Lower one more prominent.

Hinglish_Question: Iss subah main pretty normal utha phir maine notice kiya ki meri hoth thoda ajeeb feel kar rahe hain, outer top lip, bottom lip theek hai. Maine darpan mein dekha aur lag raha hai jaise ki ek bump hai, reddish hai lekin lip ke tone se mil jaata hai aur meri jeebh se touch karne par ye sujha hua lag raha hai aur ye bump numb lag raha hai, bahut numb aur itching bhi hai. Kripya dekhein patient ke hont ki image neeche. Ye kya ho sakta hai...main chinta mein hun!
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a numb, swollen, itchy, and reddish bump on the outer top lip? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Swelling present on the upper lip with shiny appearance and slightly light coloured.

Hinglish_Question: Mere bete ko kuch dino se bimari hai. Usko ek rash hai aur uske private area ke paas skin pealing ho rahi hai. Kripya doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Woh ek burning bright orange wee ke karan main bahut chinta mein hoon. Maine doctor ko phone kiya hai aur unhone kuch test kar liye hai lekin abhi tak koi result nahi aaya hai. Kya aap mujhe bata sakte hain ki yeh kya ho sakta hai? Shukriya.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of my son's illness with symptoms of rash, peeling skin, and a burning bright orange urine? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Spot swelling on the complete leg's skin, circular In shape and very ligh pink color.

Hinglish_Question: Main ek 27 saal ki mahila hu Nigeria se, mere gaal par ye daane hain jo 15 saal se hai, maine in par saare cream aur treatment try kiye hai, lekin koi fayda nahi hua, abhi mai skin-neal cream use kar rhi hu, maine funbact-A bhi try kiya hai..kabhi kabhi ye shuruat me thik ho jata hai, lekin kuch din baad wapas aa jata hai.... mujhe ismein khujli nahi hoti, lekin jab mai kapde utarti hu to bahut uncomfortable ho jata hai. kripaya mujhe ek dermatologist ki madad ki bahut jaldi chahiye. Image is attached below.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a long-lasting rash on the buttocks in a 27-year-old female from Nigeria? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mere bacche ke elbows par skin colored raised bumps hain. Lag raha hai ki ye knees par bhi shuru ho rahe hain. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Ye itching ya dard nahi karte hain. Ye warts ya psoriasis jaise dikhte hain. Ye fungal ya viral ho sakti hain, confirm nahi hai. Ye almost ek growth ki tarah jama huye hain. Kya aapko koi idea hai ki ye kya ho sakte hain aur unka ilaj kaise karein?
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing skin colored raised bumps on the patient's elbows and knees, resembling warts or psoriasis? The image here shows a medical condition related to knee_swelling. The left knee is swollen wild mid redness.

Hinglish_Question: Hi Doctor, mujhe left foot ke little finger par 10th Feb raat ko chuha (rat) ne kaat liya, wo khoon beh raha tha toh maine use saaf kiya aur soframycin lagaya aur maine 11th Feb subah vaccine bhi liya...lekin mujhe pata nahi hai ki doctor ne mujhe kaunsa vaccine diya hai...abhi tak rat bite ke alawa koi bura asar nahi dikha hai, bas ghav ke aas paas sujan hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko...kya mujhe doctor se confrim karna chahiye ki mujhe kaunsa dose diya gaya hai? Kya mujhe chuhe ke kaatne ke baad koi vaccine course karna chahiye? Kya main ghav jagah par jab tak thik nahi ho jaata hai, soframycin laga sakta hoon?
multimodal_Question_summ: Should I confirm the rat bite vaccine dose from the doctor and continue applying soframycin on the wound until it heals? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The right leg is swollen with redness.

Hinglish_Question: Mere stanon ke neeche, hysterectomy scar mein aur mere butt crack mein ek rash hai jo main kuch samay se dur nahi kar pa rahi. Mere doctor ne mujhe antifungal cream di hai, lekin usne kuch bhi asar nahi kiya, nystatin thoda madad kiya aur B&C cream kuch madad karti hai lekin phir se vapas aa jata hai. Iski wajah se meri skin par permanent discolouration ho rahi hai, kripya madad kare! Iske liye wahan attach hui image hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What treatment options are available for a persistent rash under the breasts, in a hysterectomy scar, and in the buttocks? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mere bhai ko multiple myleoma ke liye 2 stem cell transplants hue hain. Ab wo chemo aur bahut si dawaiyon se mukt hai. Pichle saal uski skin mein kuch problem hui hai-chronic-jo uski skin ko flakes mein utarta tha aur khujli bahut jyada hoti thi, almost control karne ke layak nahi thi!! Lagta hai psoriasis hai (jaisa ki mere paas bhi hai). Mera sawal ye hai ki kyunki usne most meds band kar diye hain, aur ab wo bahut kamzor aur thakan mahsoos kar raha hai, aur abhi humne yeh discover kiya hai ki wo sweeteners, aspartame, splenda le raha hai, to kal se cold turkey band kar diya hai. Last 8 mahine mein usko diabetes develop ho gayi hai aur unhe hyperthyroidism hai kehte hain. Aapki raaye bahut zaroori hogi. Wo soch raha hai ki wo mar raha hai. Mujhe lagta hai ki ye dusre khaane wali kharab chemicals se ho sakta hai...Iska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the patient's chronic skin rash, extreme fatigue, weaknes, and diabetes related to stem cell transplants or chemical ingestion? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mere hoth thode suj gaye hain, lekin andar ki taraf, hothon ke piche jo dard ho raha hai...khujli, tingling, dard. Aur thoda sa meri jeebh bhi. Ye takriban 2 din se ho raha hai. Pehle toh mujhe laga ki mere hoth par suraj ki lo se chot lagi hai, lekin vo andar ki taraf ko toh kuch farak nahi padta.Kripya doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Maine research kiya aur angio ke baare mein pata chala. Ye ho sakta hai ki ye hi hai jo mujhe hai lekin confirm nahi hai. Sabse pehle toh mujhe yaad aya ki maine ek naya mouth wash use kiya hai. Kya vo isko trigger kar sakta hai? Pehle kabhi mujhe koi problem nahi hui hai. Mujhe chinta honi chahiye?
multimodal_Question_summ: Could the patient's use of a new mouthwash be causing their swollen, itchy, tingly, and sore lips and tongue? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Bright pink coloured skin with darkening at one place on inner side of lower lip.

Hinglish_Question: Hi Doctor, mujhe bahut tej sardi, bukhar aur khansi ho rahi hai. Main ghar ke nuskhe try kar raha tha. Isse pehle maine ek root canal karwaya tha aur doctor ne amoxcilin prescribe kiya tha. Aaj mujhe apne skin par laal daane dikhayi diye hai jo din bhar badh gaye hain. Kya ye garmi ki vajah se hai. Kya febrex plus help kar sakta hai. Iska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Patient has cold, fever, cough, and skin rash after taking amoxicillin. They ask if Febrax Plus can help. The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mere clitoris pichle kuch mahino se uncomfortable ho raha hai. Mere annual checkup kam se kam chaar mahine pehle hi hua tha. Aur mere urine mein bacteria the. Sexual activity ki wajah se mere clitoris area mein sex ke baad se increase ho rahi hai discomfort... socha tha ki yeast infection hai, isliye cream li hai... aur apne clitoris ke lining par irritated and thick skin ke bumps dhundhe hain. Bohot itching ho rahi hai. Lag raha hai ki meri skin mein do abnormality hai. Kripya patient ke skin ki image dekhein. Mein bohot pareshaan hoon. Ye kya ho sakta hai, iska sahi karan kya hai?

Hinglish_Question: Mere pati ko haath aur kalai par bahut zyada khujli wala ek bahut hi gambhir rash hai. Ye bahut gaanthdar, khujli wala hai aur rash ka kuch hissa pus waale spots se bhara hai. Uski kalai bahut suji hui hai. Usne doctor ki dwaara pehle do baar dekhwaya hai aur use steroid cream aur zeroderm cream di gayi. Pichle hafte on call doctor dwaara antibiotics bhi diye gaye kyunki bahut dard tha aur usne kaha ki ye sankramit ho gaya hai. Lagta hai theek hona shuru nahi ho raha hai, hum dermatologist se appointment ke liye wait kar rahe hain lekin ye hafto tak ho sakta hai. Kya use dobara doctor ke paas jaana chahiye.. Kya hum kisi doctor se private me milne ki koshish karein. Uska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should the patient seek immediate medical attention for their husband's severe, lumpy, itchy, and infected rash with swollen wrist? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Wo kuch hafte se ek sore mouth complaint kar raha hai aur hum soch rahe hain ki kya ye uske chote dant hain jo bahut chote hain ya fir kya ye ghamori ka problem ho sakta hai. Abhi kuch hi der pehle mujhe pata chala ki mere left arm aur right shoulder blade par khujli wali ek rash hai. Mujhe aisi kabhi rash nahi hui hai. Kya wo kutte ka kata hua se sambandhit ho sakta hai? Uski tasveer neeche attached hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Could the skin rash on the left arm and right shoulder blade be related to a dog bite on the shins 30 hours ago? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe 10 din pehle apne right knee mein meniscus repair surgery hui thi aur mujhe surgery ki hui taang par ek laal rash ka aasar dikha. multimodal_Question_summ: Is a red, itchy rash extending from the middle of the shin to mid-thigh after meniscus repair surgery normal? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe chehre mein lagi aur black eye, sujna hua gaal aur upar ke front daanton mein sunn pad gaya. Doctor, please is pareshan kshetra ka image dekhiye neeche. Kuch din ho gaye hain aur mere gaal me ab tak sujhan hai aur meri daanton mein sunnai hai. Mera gaal bhi sunn hai aur mujhe lagta hai ki mera nerve suj gaya hai. Kya ye chala jayega.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is it normal for swelling, numbness in teeth and cheeks to persist after facial trauma? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. The back of the throat has swelling with whitish mass accumulation.

Hinglish_Question: Mere naak ke dono taraf ek ajeeb sa rash hai...red, flakey aur jata nahi hai. Mein ise bahut saaf rakhta hoon. Mein tea tree oil use karna shuru kiya hai aur wo madad karne lag raha hai. Mujhe kabhi bhi skin problems ya acne nahi hue hai, isliye ye anokha hai. Mein soch raha hoon kya ye kuch aur problem ka sanket hai. Uski tasveer neechekar di gayi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Could a red, flaky rash on both sides of the nose be a sign of an underlying condition? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mera beta 3 1/2 saal ka hai. Wo kehta hai ki wo din bhar 30+ baar thak gaya hai. Uska khoon check kiya gaya hai aur hemoglobin thik hai, isliye unhone kaha ki iron test karne ki koi jarurat nahi hai. Wo sust aur kabhi-kabhi pale bhi hota hai aur uske aankhon ke nichle ghere bhi hai. Mein anemic hoon toh meinne samjha ki shayad ye bhi uske liye ek possible problem ho. Mujhe bataya gaya ki usey aur zaada veggies khilayein, lekin ye usse zaada complex lag raha hai. Abhi filhaal maine ye bhi notice kiya hai ki uske aankhein hamesha widenhui hoti hain. Maine research ki hai aur jaanti hun ki yeh chote bachcho mein normal hai, lekin bhi bright light mein bhi uski aankhen bohot kam contract hoti hain, phir wapas widen hojati hain. Please doctor, aankhon ko dekhein neeche. Kya aankhon ka thakawat se kuch taal-mel hai, ya ye alag alag problems hai. Wo itna chhota hai, phir bhi itna thak kyun raha hai. Har doctor jo dekhti hun, sab kahte hain ki sare tests normal hai, lekin uske daily actions alag kehte hain. Bas main ye janna chahti hun ki mere bete ko itni thakan kyun hai aur usey madad karne mein madad karun. Dhanyavaad!
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the child's excessive tiredness related to their dilated pupils and swollen eyes, or are they separate problems? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Little swelling on the lateral side of the right eye's eyelid.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe lagbhag 2 mahine tak apne ghutne ke andar ringworm tha. Mere ek dost ke salah par main tea tree oil use kar raha tha, lekin mujhe rash hua hai jahan tea tree oil meri taang par slide hota tha, saath hi meri ringworm par bhi. Fir main walk in clinic gaya aur unhone mujhe fougera clotrimazone and betmethasone dipropionate cream likh di. Maine iska upyog 9 din tak kiya hai, din mein do baar. Doosri rash pehle 5 din mein puri tarah heal ho gayi thi, mujhe lagta hai ki ringworm bhi ab heal ho gaya hai. Iske pehle saptahon se ye khujli wala, gaddhe wala ya dandruff wala nahi tha (prescription use karne se pehle bhi). Jahan meri ringworm thi, vahan sirf thodi si ubhari hui ghat hai aur bahut hi chota sa red dot hai. Haath se toh main do sakht ghatiyan mehsoos kar sakta hoon jo haddi ke neeche hai. Chota sa red dot ek ki taraf hai aur dusra chota hai aur taraf hai. Kya yeh ab bhi ringworm hai? Agar koi tarika hai toh main ek tasveer le sakta hoon aur usko upload kar sakta hoon.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the slightly raised bump with a small red dot and two hard bumps underneath indicative of ringworm? The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_growth. There are black eruptions and mass elevated from the surface on the skin.

Hinglish_Question: Ek wisdom tooth ko Monday ko nikalvaaya tha. Tuesday ko gale par excessive swelling ki wajah se bahut takleef hui hai. Doctor se affected area ki image dekhlijiye. Steroid aur antibiotic ke injections diye gaye. Swelling jaldi kam hui. Lekin ek jagah ab bhi bahut sujhan hai. 101 ka fever aaya tha. Dentist ko iska karan nahi pata. Kya mujhe ab bhi itni sujhan hogi aur thoda sa bhi aram nahi ho sakta?
multimodal_Question_summ: Why is there excessive swelling in the neck and collarbone area after wisdom tooth removal, along with a fever? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The part of the neck near shoulder is swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Mere paas bachpan se hi skin problems hai. Mujhe eczema hai keh diya gaya hai aur mujhe tin food nahi khane diya jata hai aur jab main ghaas mein khelta hoon ya nahane ke baad mere sharir mein khujli hoti hai. Mainek rash hota hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is current condition ko below teary eyes, runny nose, jab seasons change hote hain meri skin dry ho jaati hai, especially winter mein. Ab mujhe 25 saal ki female hone ke naate meri skin tone uneven hai, mere face pe zyaada hai, kabhi kabhi mere lips aur eyelids bhi suj jaate hain aur pata nahi kyun. Main kuch products ko haal mein ek mahine se use kar rahi hoon aur abhi bhi koi fark nahi dikh raha hai. Koi skin repair products aap recommend kar sakte hain?
multimodal_Question_summ: What can be done for a 25-year-old female with eczema, skin rashes, teary eyes, runny nose, dry skin, and uneven skin tone? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor,Mere right eye (lower lid) mein lagbhag saath mahine pehle ek stye develop hua tha. Stye ko chhutane mein lagbhag chhe mahine lag gaye, lekin wo abhi bhi bilkul gaya nahi hai. Main warm compresses use kiya tha lekin mujhe laga ki ye process kaafi lambi thi. Ab mujhe apne left eye (upper lid) mein ek stye develop hua hai. Wo sujan wala hai aur gol ball jaisa ban gaya hai. Uska image neeche attached hai. Warm compresses fir se try kiye hai aur aisa lag raha hai ki ye usse aur bhi bura kar raha hai. Ab main namak aur garam pani ke soak try kar raha hoon. Maine doctor ke pass bhi jaakar blood tests karwaye hain, sab clear aaye hain. Mujhe sirf advice chahiye ki isse chutkara paane ke liye main kya karu. Main apne eyelashes ko rojana dho rahi hoon.
multimodal_Question_summ: How can I treat persistent styes in both eyes despite warm compresses and daily eyelash washing? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Eyelid of the right eye swollen and light pink in color. The eyelid is dropping down because of swelling.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, Mai ek 30 saal ka purush hoon. Vartaman mein, meri right eye ke iris ke upar ek hissa hain jo ek hafte se jyada samay tak lal reh raha hai. Meine bhi notice kiya hai ki iris ke kinare ek sikuda hua chandrama akar ka hissa hai jo lal hone waali jagah pe ek saaf halka sa raised lump jaisa hai. Uski tasveer neeche attach ki gayi hai. Kuch dino se meri aankh ke palak bhi neeche jhuk rahi hai aur aankh chhoti dikh rahi hai. Mujhe abhi tak dard jaise koi lakshan nahi hai, lekin ab dono aankhein khujli kar rahi hai. Ye raat mein zyada hota hai, aur sath hi thick stringy discharge ke saath hota hai. Bas thoda background information dena chahta hoon, kuch mahine pehle mujhe red, khujli waali aankhein ka ek gambhir mamla tha. Daily raat ko lagbhag 10 baje meri dono aankhon mein bahut zyada redness, khujli hoti thi aur thick mucus ke ghatta bhi nikalta tha jo bahut takleef deta tha. Main apni aankhen khol nahi sakta tha. Ye lakshan sirf raat ko hi hote the, jagah ke bina. Mujhe yakeen nahi hai ki ye meri jhuki hui aankh se related hai. Mere paas atopic dermatitis hai aur mujhe dust mites se allergy hai. Main Hydroxyzine orally le raha hoon. Kya aap kuch roshni daal sakte hai ki ye kya ho sakta hai aur mujhe kitni jaldi chikitsa ki zarurat hai. Agar mujhe medical help ki zarurat hai, to mujhe kya aankhen ke chikitsak ke paas jaana chahiye ya kya ek regular urgent care kaafi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the cause of a red, crescent-shaped lump with drooping eyelid, itchiness, and thick discharge in a male with atopic dermatitis? The image shows the condition of eye inflamation. Redness both above and below the eye with yellowish parts as well.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste, main 25 saal ka hoon. Meri left side ke gaal par ek sakht, harkat na karne wala gaanth hai, jo ek golf ball ki size ke barabar hai. Doctor, kripya niche patient ke neck ki image dekhe, mujhe kuch samasya hai meri neck mein. Mere extreme short term memory loss hai aur kabhi kabhi naak, pair aur haath mein sunn hona bhi hota hai, saath hi migraines hai jin par koi dawa kaam nahi karti. Main bahut chidchida hoon, aur bahut jaldi gussa bhi ho jaata hai. Kabhi kabhi faint hokar ya light-headed bhi ho jata hoon. Kya ye ek tumor jaisa lag raha hai ya sirf sujaa hua lymph node ho sakta hai?
multimodal_Question_summ: Does a hard immovable lump behind the patient's left neck, along with memory loss and migraines indicate a tumor? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. There is mild swelling in the neck.

Hinglish_Question: Meri beti ka wajan 19kg hai aur wo 7 din se urticaria ki samasya se pareshan hai. Iski samasya mere poore sharir me hai aur ye antihistaminics jaise atarax 3.5ml BD aur steroid deflazacort ke upyog par bhi sudhar nahi ho rahi hai jo 4 din se di ja rahi hai. Mujhe naye oral steroid Prednisolone (omnacortil) ka upyog shuru karna padega. Mujhe kitna dosage dena padega aur kitne din tak? Uska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the appropriate dosage and duration of Prednisolone treatment for a child with unresponsive urticaria and skin rash? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Hey sir, main skin lite 6 mahino se use kar raha hoon, meri face acchi dikh rahi hai agar main ise day se pehle lagaun, par agar nahi lagata toh woh black dikh rahi hai aur mujhe face aur upper lip par kuch balo ki growth dikhai de rahi hai, kya yeh hair problem face par sirf is skin lite cream ki wajah se hai? Uske liye attachment mein image hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the hair growth on the face and upper lip and the darkening of the skin due to the use of Skin Lite cream? The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_growth. Skin coloured mass elevated from the skin having a smooth skin.

Hinglish_Question: Hi Doc, meri baby bahut fair paida hui thi, kind of whitish. Main ek African woman hu, aur main light in complexion hu aur dad bhi fair complexion ke hain. Phir first month me use rashes ho gaye the jo use neck aur chest ke beech me dark brown dot dot coloration dekar gaye, aur woh area abhi tak rough hai, jaise kuch uski skin complexing blend ya cover kar deti hai. Kripya doctor, vartaman condition ko dekhein. Ab uski rang brownish fair ho gayi hai, lekin uske finger ab bhi bahut fair hai. Main nahi jaanti ki kya ye meri us par lagayi hui cream ki wajah se hai jise main use karti hu, jiske baad main uske ungliyon par nahi lagati kyunki woh apni ungliyon ko chus leti hai. Cream chicco hai, aur mujhe suna hai ki isme fake aur original dono hote hain... lekin kripya doctor, kya main kuch kha sakti hu ya kar sakti hu jo meri baby ki skin ko shiny aur glowing banaye permanent taur par. Accha result paane ke liye aabhari rahungi. Dhanyavad Doc....
multimodal_Question_summ:
How can I treat my baby's dark brown, rough skin on the neck and chest and achieve shiny, glowing skin? The image shows the condition of skin irritation. Pink to brown coloured multiple small dry lesions all over the skin
Condition- drying of lesions of chickenpox

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe apne 4 wisdom teeth nikalwa liye hain, 4 din pehle. Mere normal swelling hui thi lekin wo aasani se ice pack se thik ho gayi. Ab jab swelling khatam ho gayi hai, mujhe left jaw bone mein ek gaanth ki tarah ek daane hai, jo extreme pain cause kar rahi hai. Doctor, kripya image of patient some issue in my neck ko dekhein. Ye lagbhag 2-3 inch wide hai aur bahut hi sensitive hai. Is swelling ka neeche tak jaane se mere gale mein bahut dard hota hai; aur bahut laal aur sensitive hai. Mujhe kuch bhi chew karne mein taklif hoti hai.. . . Main ek bowl soup bhi puri tarah se nahi kha pa raha. Ye kya ho sakta hai. Aur kya ye serious hai?!

Hinglish_Question: Meri 20 saal ki beti ko skin mein kuch problem ho rahi hai. Unhe chote-chote pimples lag rahe hain jo chote se safed sir ke saath hain. Woh unhe phod rahi hai aur woh scab ho rahe hain. Roz unki sankhya badhti ja rahi hai. Ye unke haath, pair aur chehre par hain. Kripya doctor, neeche di gayi image ko dekhein, affected area ki. Kahi aur nahi. Unhone oatmeal baths aur benadril try kiya hai. Koi madad nahi ho rahi hai. Woh doctor ke paas jane se inkar kar rahi hai.

Doctors kehte hain ki iski koi chinta ki baat nahi hai, ye lucoma hai.

Maine isko apne doctor aur podiatrist dono ko dikhaya hai lekin unko iske bare mein kuch pata nahi hai. Mujhe lagta hai ki ye ek lipoma hai aur mujhe ye janna hai ki iske liye kaunsa medical specialist dekh sakta hai.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste, maine aakhiri 6 hafte se cipralex liya hai anxiety ke liye, aur haal hi mein mujhe ye notice hua hai ki meri neeche ki hont suj gayi hai - itni jyada ki ye thoda meri speech mein interfere kar rahi hai aur jab main khana kha rahi hun tab main ise kha leti hun. Meri neeche ki hont neeche jhukti hai aur jab main ise neeche kheenchti hun toh koi bounce back nahi hota. Main jaanti hun ki ise normal dikhe ke liye ise vapas kheenchana padega.Uski tasveer neeche attach ki gayi hai. Kya ye cipralex ke karan ho sakta hai? Kya mujhe dawai lena chahiye band karni chahiye... Main bahar gayi hui hun aur mere doctor se 4 din baad hi milungi.
multimodal_Question_summ: Could lip swelling and drooping, potentially caused by cipralex, warrant immediate cessation of the medication before seeing a doctor? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Left side of the lower lip swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe armpit ke neeche dard aur ganth hai. Mera naam hai John aur mein 27 saal ka hoon, 6' 5" lamba hoon aur lagbhag 265 pound ka weight hai. Abhi mein Citalopram le raha hoon aur antibiotics ka ek course khatam hua hai. Lagbhag ek hafte, ya shayad ek hafte aur aadhe pehle, mujhe left armpit mein random tez dard hone laga. Mein apne armpit ko chhua aur waha ek lambi ganth mehsus ki. Agar mein isko dabata hoon toh dard hota hai, aur mein poora confident hoon ki dard usi se ho raha hai. Ganthon ki tarah, ye ganth lambi hai aur vahin ligament ya phir vein ki tarah mehsus hoti hai. Mujhe bhi chinta hai ki ye lymph node bhi ho sakta hai. Mujhe kuch samajh nahi aa raha ki kya karna chahiye. Dhanyavaad! Yah hai uska image.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing the sharp pains and long lump in the left armpit of a 27-year-old male? The image shows the condition of hand lump. Oval shaped swelling the on the palm side of hand below the middle finger.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe ek rash hai aur mujhe iska kaaran nahi pata. Main dermatologist ke paas gaya tha jinhone mujhe claritin subah aur antihistamine shaam ko prescribe kiya aur steroid cream bhi. Image wahi hai niche attach kiya hua . Kuch bhi help karne lagta hai.Main apna khane ka intake log kar raha hoon aur laundry detergent bhi badal diya hai.Kya aap meri madad kar sakte hain aur mujhe possible causes determine karne mein help kar sakte hain.
multimodal_Question_summ: What are the likely causes of a non-responsive rash that has been treated with antihistamines and steroid creams? The image shows the condition of skin rash.  Pinkish red multuiple single coloured rash on the skin present close to each other.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe XXXXX mein ek saal se zyada ho gaya hai, lekin is time period me mujhe apne naak ke paas ek rash notice hua hai jo aata jata hai. Maine ek doctor ko dikhaya aur usne mujhe steroidal cream di hai jo thodi der ke liye help karti hai. Maine apni diet change ki hai taki koi common factor ho sakay (kuch nahi mila). Maine garam coffee peena band kar diya aur frappichino peene lagaya aur rash khatam ho gayi, lekin aaj subah garam coffee piya toh naak ki jagah tight hone lagi aur blotchy ho gayi aur raat ko maine garam chili khayi aur phir woh shuru ho gayi, bohot tight aur blotchy ho gayi. Kya aapke paas koi idea hai? Baki sab toh bilkul theek hai aur main healthy khana khata hoon. Kripya dekhein is vartaman condition ko doctor sahab.
multimodal_Question_summ: Summary: Patient has a recurring rash near the nose that worsens after consuming hot coffee or chili. Seeking possible causes or treatment options. The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Meri 6 saal ki beti ko upper lip mein dard ki shikayat hai. Aaj subah jab wo uthi to uske upper lip aur lip aur naak ke beech ka area suj gaya aur dard kar raha hai. Maine use aaj dentist ke paas le gaya, kyunki uske upper front tooth ko uske friend ne kuch 5 mahine pehle nikal diya tha aur apparently tooth break off ho gaya hai aur root abhi bhi usme hai. Lip ki pain to tab shuru hui thi jab wo kal raat corn on the cob khane ki koshish kar rahi thi, isi liye maine assume kiya tha ki ye sab related hai aur shayad infection ho gaya hai. Kripya dekhein affected area ki image doctor, please.The dentist ne dekha aur use agle hafte root nikalne ke liye appointment di hai, lekin unhone kaha ki koi infection nahi hai aur koi antibiotics prescribe nahi kiye hai. Wo ab bhi dard ki shikayat kar rahi hai aur area ab bhi sujaa hai. Mujhe lagta hai ki use shayad low-grade fever bhi hai. Mera sawal hai ki agar koi infection nahi hai, to phir wo sujaa kyun hai aur dard kyun ho raha hai. Kya use apna pediatrician se milna chahiye?
multimodal_Question_summ: Why is the 6-year-old's upper lip swollen, painful, and potentially causing a low-grade fever if there is no infection? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Central upper buldge swollen with redness and shiny appearance.

Hinglish_Question: Mere torso par aur thode par legs par rash hai. Itna bura nahi hai, par red blotches hai jo bahut khujli karte hain. Maine haali mein bounce dryer sheets use kiye hai pehli baar. Internet par maine dekha hai ki Bounce ek rash cause kar sakta hai, par ek common remedy nahi mili hai. Kya Benadryl work karega aur kon sa type. Dhanyavaad. The image for that is attached below.

Hinglish_Question: Meri 4 saal ki beti ka face (zada tar naak aur matha), gardan aur pet par ek halka sa issue hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Aapko kya lagta hai ye kahan se ho raha hai aur kya use dekhna chahiye.Thanks.

Hinglish_Question: Mere right upper lip 5 din pehle suj gaye aur numb ho gaye the. Mujhe laga ki ye kisi bug bite ki wajah se hua hoga. Hinglish_Question: Mera pota G6PD hai aur abhi tak 5 din se hospital me admit hai..use dengue hone ka check kar rahe hain kyunki usko 3 dino se high fever hai..lekin is last 2 dinon se uska temperature normal hai. Humne use tawaTawa juice diya hai, ye ek herbal hai jo dengue ko thik karne me prasiddh hai..aur humne use green barley apne doodh me milaya hai.. vartaman me uske platelets 141 par gir gaye hai.. is mamle me aap kya keh sakte hai aur kya salah de sakte hai. Bahut dhanyavad, mera pota G6PD hai aur abhi hospital me hai fever aur kam platelets ke wajah se jiska ab 141 hai...use dengue hone ka check kar rahe hain lekin 2 din se usko koi bukhar nahi hai lekin uske chhati ke skin me kuch problem hai. Kripya doctor dekhein is vartaman condition ko. Humne use tawatawa juice ka herbal ilaj diya hai.. aur humne uske doodh me green barley bhi milaya hai.. aap iske baare me kya keh sakte hain? aapke jawab ke liye dhanyavad.. mrs. evelyn oropilla from qc phil.

Hinglish_Question: Toh maine ER jaake apni symptoms bataye, par mujhe strep throat ke koi bhi symptoms nahi the, lekin unhone test kar diya aur wo positive nikla. Mere sirf itne hi symptoms the ki mujhe aisa lag raha tha ki mere tonsils suj gaye hain aur wo mere gale ke beech mein ek ball lag raha tha. Please dekhiye doctor is affected area ki image below. Meri throat mein ghutne ki problem ho rahi hai aur mujhe hamesha choking hone lagti hai kyunki wo meri hawa ki raah ko band kar raha tha. Ab main ghar par hoon aur mujhe wahi feeling hai. Aapko lagta hai ki mujhe kya problem hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the cause of the patient's swollen tonsils and feeling of choking with a sensation of a ball in the middle? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. The tonsils have swollen excessively in the back of the throat.

Hinglish_Question: Mere left hand ke palm ke beech mein ek chota sa bluish lump hai jo skin ke neeche hai. Isko touch karne par dard hota hai aur jab main apne ungliyan kholti aur band karti hoon to bhi dard hota hai. Doctor kripya is image ko dekhein jo neeche hai. Ek hafte pehle main garden mein khudai kar raha tha lekin uske alawa koi aur activity nahi thi. Ismein takreeban teen din se dard ho raha hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a small, painful, bluish lump in the palm of the left hand after gardening? The image shows the condition of hand lump. Swelling in the palm just below the middle finger.

Hinglish_Question:
Meri english passage ki Hinglish me anuwad is prakar hai:

Hi...mera pati jo ab 66 saal ke hain, unhone abhi apne pair ke pass ek gaath mehsus ki hai. Doctor, aap patient ki legs ki examination kar sakte hain, niche post karte hoon. Unhe kehte hain ki ye dard ho raha hai lekin wo kisi ko nahi dikhana chahte. Mujhe kya karna chahiye. Shayad unhe dar hai ki ye cancer ho sakta hai. Unhone 15 saal pehle ek gaath hatwai thi, wo right hand side me upar thi aur wo benign thi.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the recommended course of action for a 66-year-old male with a sore lump on the right side of his sac close to his leg? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The foot is swollen blue black discolour.

Hinglish_Question: Hi, mere premolar ke root mein infection hai. Dentist ke paas gaya, usne incision diya aur drainage kiya. Sirf fluid tha, pus nahi tha. Usne incision stitch kiya aur augmentin, metronidazole aur flurbiprofen ka sujhav diya. Mera dard kafi kam ho gaya hai lekin sujan mere aankh tak fail gayi hai. Mujhe discomfort ho raha hai, mere doctor kehte hain ki ye surgical hai aur wo kal mera daant nikalenge. Sujan ke liye mein kya karu? Kripya dekhein affected area ki image doctor, niche.
multimodal_Question_summ: What should the patient do to reduce the swelling, discomfort, and surgical edema before undergoing a tooth extraction? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The foot is swollen blue black discolour.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe apne periods ke saath ek saal se problem thi. Aur clinic ne mujhe cycle ko control karne ke liye trigestrel use karne ki salah di. Mujhe ise ek mahine se zyada time tak use kar rahe hai lekin mujhe iska side effect hua hai jiske wajah se mere poore chehre par acne rash ho gaye hai. Aur ab ye mere lower buttock ke beech mein bhi ho raha hai. Kya ye ek side effect hai ya mere sharir mein koi problem hai. Uski image neeche attach ki gayi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the acne rash on the patient's face and lower buttock a side effect of using trigestrel or a separate issue? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Hi,Maine haal hi mein 2 neeche ke daant (pre molars) nikalwaye, lagbhag 2 hafte pehle aur ek socket mein normal blood clot formation nahi hui, iska result hai ki waha par ek chota sa hole bana reh gaya hai. Hole bahut gehra nahi tha aur mujhe extraction ke baad lagbhag 4 din tak dard hua, maine painkillers ke saath manage kiya. Dard ab puri tarah se gayab ho gaya hai lekin kal se mujhe extraction site se kuch ulcers dikhne lage hain. Kripya dekhein affected area ki image neeche .Yeh ab 2 hafte ho gaye hain daant nikalwaye hue. Iski bandish abhi tak nahi hui hai. Aur firse daant nikalwane ke baad hi mere chehre ke neeche ki skin mein kuch problem hui hai, rash neeche ke hisse mein phail gaya hai aur mujhe bahut chinta hai. Kripya madad karein.
multimodal_Question_summ: Patient developed ulcers at extraction site 2 weeks after removal of teeth and a skin rash along their jaw. The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The foot is swollen and reddish colouration.

Hinglish_Question: Maine 4 din pehle left palmar dupuytrens rog aur left ring finger ka flexor sheath release ka excision kiya tha. 2 din baad maine andar se bahut thande mehsus kiya, jiske liye image neeche attach ki gayi hai. Jabki skin par jal raha tha, phir achanak dekha ki ek daag jaisa rash pehle legs par aa raha hai aur ab puri body mein phail gaya hai, jiske saath ek jalte hue kantili mehsus hoti hai. Kya mujhe chinta hone chahiye? Pauline
multimodal_Question_summ: Should I be concerned about the cold, burning, and prickly rash that has spread throughout my body after hand surgery? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Oval shaped or circular red patches on the leg. Little swelling and dryness on the patches with foldings of skin.

Hinglish_Question: Meri 3 saal ki poti ko ek skin condition hai aur mujhe yaad nahi ki unhone kya kaha tha. Usko spots hai jo light brown color ke lagte hain, agar wo garmi mein ya dhoop mein zyada der tak rahe to wo red bubble up ho jate hain. Uski us image neeche attach hai. Unhone mujhe kaha tha ki wo ye jab teenager banegi tab outgrow kar degi. Kya aapko iske naam pata hai?
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the name of the light brown spots on a 3-year-old that bubble up red in the sun? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Red spots on the left should and back area. Multiple spots with redness.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe kal Mantoux test karaya gaya tha aur mere hain right hand side ke niche chin ke area mein ek rash ho gaya hai, raat ko chota tha lekin ab badhne lag gaya hai. Ye bahut jyada lal nahi hai, jaisa ki dry skin lag raha hai (maine non perfumed moisturiser se moisturise kiya hai aur koi progress nahi hai), lekin bahut sahi samay par ho gaya hai, test karane ke ek din baad. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Kya ye ek side effect hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the dry rash under the chin area a possible side effect of the Mantoux test done the day before? The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_dryness. The peels of the skin near the later the eye are coming out and the skin is dry.

Hinglish_Question: Mere 3 saal ke bete ko, fluzet syrup diya gaya tha jo last 6 mahino se expire tha..,jaldi mein,use ek anti infection dose diya gaya par uske muh mein chale ho gaye. Please doctor, mouth ko dekhein. Main thoda pareshan hoon... Puchna chahta hoon ki kya expired fluzet syrup le lene ka koi side effect hota hai.., ye Cipla dwara manufacture kiya gaya hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What are the potential side effects of giving a 3-year-old expired Fluzet syrup manufactured by Cipla and could it cause mouth ulcers? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. 3 circular white patches of swelling together completely surrounded by redness around the affected area which is on the immediate inner side of the lower lips.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste, meri teen saal ki beti ko ek rash hai. Mujhe ise aaj subah uski jaangh ke andar pehli baar dikha aur yeh rash zoo ke dauran phail gaya hai. Yeh rash chhidritha nahi hai...bas laal aur daagdaar hai. Ye daag bahut bade hain aur pehli nazar me toh sunburn ki tarah lagta hai lekin jab aap dhyan se dekhte hain tab pata chalta hai ki yeh chote-chote daag saath mein hai. Uski calf tak jakar hazaaro chote-chote daag clearly dikhte hain. Kripya doctor, niche di gayi vartaman condition ko dekhe. Jahaan bhi raash ke saath bada laal daag hota hai vahaan sparsh karne par garm lag rahi hai. Beti keh rahi hai ki ise khujli ho rahi hai. Kal usne pehli baar apne sandbocks mein khela hai. Yeh rash wahin hai jahaan sand touch kiya hoga par kal raat ko nahate waqt ye nahi tha. Ye rash, raat bhar mein hi shayad develop hua hai. Uski peeth pe chot lagi hai lekin chot ke aas paas koi sankraman nahi hai. Usko bukhar nahi hai. Yeh kya hai? Iska garmahat kyun hai? Phone par meri ped. ne kaha ki usko Benadryl de do aur cortizone cream use karo aur yeh sahi dermatitis hai. Mujhe iss rash mein garmahat tab dikhi jab humne bath time ke baad unki clinic bandh hone ke baad notice ki.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of the splotchy, red rash on a three-year-old's thighs and calves, accompanied by heat, itching, and no fever? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, mein 26 saal ki ek ladki hu aur meri koi bhi significant health history nahi hai. Mere paas anxiety hai aur mujhe pehle hyperthyroidism tha. Mujhe teen mahine se jyada samay se itching wala daane ho rahe hai. Ye ek chhota patch mere left knee ke piche se shuru hua tha. Iske pehle mere left thigh par ring shaped rash thi jiske baad mujhe uske liye antifungal cream se treatment hua aur wo gayab ho gaya. Ye naya rash bilkul alag hai. Mujhe bahut itching hoti hai jiski wajah se meri life par interference ho rahi hai. Isme koi obvious rash nahi hai unless maine already wo area scratch kar liya ho. Kuch samay baad mujhe chhote chhote skin-colored bumps ho jate hai. Aur jab main scratch karti hu to petechiae and bruising bhi ho jata hai. Ye itching mere face ke alawa har jagah hoti hai. Mujhe raat ko bedroom thandi hone ke bawajood bhi pasina bahut aata hai. Kuch baar check kiya hai to temperature chhota sa fever 99.1 ke aas paas hota hai. Mera doctor mujhe antihistamines (raat ko Benadryl, din me Claritin) aur steroid cream di hai. Par ye kaam nahi kar raha hai. Unhone haal hi me mujhe Prednisone ki prescription likhi hai, par mujhe ye dar hai ki shayad ye sirf ek skin allergy nahi hai. Mujhe abhi Effexor 75 mg aur Klonopin 0.5 mg le rahi hu jab zarurat padti hai. Please doctor, dekhein is vartaman condition ko.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a persistent itchy rash, skin-colored bumps, bruising, night sweats, and low-grade fever? The image shows the condition of skin irritation. Redness and dryness on the skin area. Looks very dry and spots of blood at certain places.

Hinglish_Question: 2 din pehle mere gaal ke neeche, kaan ke pass ek chota sa ganth (ho sakta hai ki suj gayi nas) develop ho gaya hai. Din beetne ke saath saath ye ganth aur hi sensitive aur dardnak ho rahi hai. Ab us jagah ke aas paas aur bhi sujan aa gayi hai aur meri gardan (us taraf) mai sujan badh rahi hai. Doctor, kripya patient ke neck ki image dekhiye, kuch takleef hai gardan mai neeche ya dard ho raha hai, lag raha hai ki jaise chot lage ho. Yeh kya ho sakta hai...
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a small lump below the ear lobe that has become increasingly swollen, sensitive, and painful? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The part of the neck near the ear is swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe lagta hai yeh ek rash hai, lekin yeh mere haathon par hai. Woh irritated aur itchy lagte hain, woh red marks aur pimply red hai. Mene pehli baar ek hand cream istemal kiya hai, kyunki mujhe apni haathon ki dekhbhaal karni chahiye kyunki woh bahut sukhe ho jaate hain. Kya aap mujhe ek acchi hand cream recommend kar sakte hain? Uski image neeche attach ki gayi hai. Toh mujhe lag raha hai ki yeh cream se hi hai, woh bahut hi itchy aur red hai, woh ajeeb sa lagta hai aur prinkly hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the red, itchy, pimply rash on your hands possibly caused by a new hand cream you used? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Raised spots of pink color on the area of the skin just above the upper thumb. Little dryness present.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste, Mujhe aisa lagta hai ki mujhe kisi cheez se sampark ho gaya hai jis wajah se mere chehre, ek hath ki kohani aur ulte hath par bahut jyada sukhapan aur khujli ho rahi hai. Mere pass ek kam level ka rash hai aur wahan thoda sa sujan bhi hai. Kuch din pehle maine ek homeopathic gel jo calendula ke saath tha use karna shuru kiya tha aur woh thoda thandak pahuncha raha tha, lekin main ab bhi bahut sukhani wali twacha, flaking aur thodi khujli hai. Kisi ne mujhe Benadryl try karne ki salaah di hai..aapki raay kya hai?
multimodal_Question_summ: Patient has dry, itchy skin on face, forearm, and hand with minor rash, swelling, seeks opinion on using Benadryl. The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_dryness. The skiing the cheek has red and black swells read across all over.

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor, Jab main subah uth ta hoon toh mere aankhon meinÂ watery eyes,Â eyelid swelling aurÂ redness hoti hai. Kripya doctor, dekhiye aankhein niche di gayi condition ko. Ye lakshan kuch half an hour se lekar jyada se jyada 2 ghante tak saaf ho jaate hain aur phir poora din theek rehte hain. Kripya ismein meri madad karen.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of morning eyelid swelling, watery eyes, and redness that resolve within a few hours? The image here shows a medical condition related to eye_redness. The eye has turned whitish red and it is also swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste, meri beti 4 saal ki hai aur usko pichle 3 hafte se ek rash hai, ab use sore throat, irritating cough, slight fever, tummy ache aur woh kehti hai ki usko motion sickness jaisa feel hota hai. Hinglish_Question: Hi Dorian, mera left butt cheeks bleeding ka sign dikh raha hai jab meri girlfriend ne suddenly realize kiya.
