Hinglish_Question: Mujhe gym mein underwire bra pehankar ek rash ho gaya hai. Friction aur paseene ki wajah se rash ho gaya hai jo meri skin ko discolor kar diya hai. Is problem se kaise chutkara paun. Uska image below attached hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: How to treat a discolored skin rash caused by friction and sweat from wearing an underwire bra to the gym? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Annular patches on the skin, Outer rim covered with small granular spots brown in color.

Hinglish_Question: Mera 6 saal ka beta hives ho jata hai aur 2 hafto pehle breakout hua tha. Abhi se 2 din se uske neck ke aas-paas ek light rash hai. Kripya neck par something happened ko dekhein. Fir aaj raat ko uske foreskin ke nichle hisse mein ek hiva jaisi bump dikhayi di hai jo penis ke head ke just neeche hai. Ye kya ho sakta hai aur use doctor ke paas kab le jana chahiye(han kahta hai ke usko touch karne se thoda sa dard hai).
multimodal_Question_summ: Should I be concerned about my 6-year-old son's hives, neck rash, swelling, and sore bump on his foreskin? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The neck is swollen with red spots and marks in various part of the neck.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor,For the past two days, mere lower eyelid par lalima aur flaky skin hai, aur ye suj gaya aur irritate lag raha hai.Please doctor, neeche diye gaye aankhon ko dekhein. Mere paas pehle bhi aisa hua tha aur ek hafte ke lagbhag sterile drops ka upyog karne se thik ho gaya tha.Mujhe koi khujli nahi hai, koi dard nahi hai, koi drishti samasya nahi hai, chahe jab roshni dekh rahi ho. Mujhe aankh ke andar koi samasya nahi hai, bus aankh ke charo taraf ki twacha par hai. Mujhe ye janna hai ki ye kya ho sakta hai aur iska phir se dubara kyun ho gaya hai. Main apni makeup products nahi badli hai aur na hi apne chehre par kuch naya istemal kar rahi hoon.
multimodal_Question_summ: Patient has redness, flaky skin, swelling, and irritation on lower eyelid. Symptoms resolved previously; wondering why they reappeared. The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Eye lid entirely swollen and pink in color with tear dripping of the eye.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste, main Hari hoon jab maine pichhle somvaar subah utha toh mere right gale mein ek sujan dikhayi di, jo 5 se 6 cm ki hai. Dard bardasht karne layak hai lekin mujhe bilkul samajh nahi aa raha ki ye kaise hua. Uska tasveer neeche di gayi hai. multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of swelling on the right side of the neck and later on the left side? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The part of the neck between the neck and shoulder is swollen excessively.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor,Meri bikini line par pehle se ek chota sa gaanth tha, lekin maine ispar jyada dhyan nahi diya. Ab ye kariban ek inch tak grow ho gayi hai. Ye slightly oval shape ki hai, hard aur rubbery feel karti hai, aur ek jagah fixed hai. Mujhe yakeen nahi hai ki ye ek deep, infected ingrown hair hai ya phir swollen lymph node. Ye meri thigh aur vulva ke beech mein sthit hai. Mujhe gutate psoriasis bhi diagnosed kiya gaya tha pichle saal aur mere peeth par halka sa rash ya skin discoloration hai joh original outbreak ke baad bhi hai (original outbreak mein spots meri puri body par aur pubic region mein bhi the). Maine padha hai ki psoriasis lymphoma se judey ho sakti hai, isiliye mujhe sabse jyada darr is baat ka hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko.
multimodal_Question_summ: Does the recent growth on the bikini line, possibly an ingrown hair or swollen lymph node, relate to psoriasis or lymphoma? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Ek dislocated tooth ho gaya tha injury ki wajah se. Hello, kal mujhe teeth mein dard hone laga, mujhe laga ki ya to dental problems hai ya sinusitis hai. Din bhar slow swelling mehsus hui, maine ispar dhyan nahi diya, din bhar teen baar brush kiya aur so gaya. Aaj subah maine bahut zyada swollen upper lip aur dard hone waale teeth ke saath utha. Please doctor, affected area ki image dekhein neeche. Teeth ko kisi movement ki wajah se dard ho raha hai. Upper lip suj gayi hai aur mujhe laga ki waha par ek ganth hai, lip ke moustache area ke andar ki swelling hai. Meri paas abhi bahut kam paise hai aur agar ye koi major cause nahi hai toh mujhe doctor ke paas jaane ki capacity nahi hai. Main do raat pahle bar mein tha, lekin thodi der pehle hi teeth mein dard hone laga tha. Mera pehla upper right tooth 8 saal pehle ek ladai ke dauran dislocate ho gaya tha. Umeed hai maine aapko sahi jankari di hai taki mujhe pata chale ki iski wajah kya hai. Aapki madad ke liye pehle se hi dhanyavaad.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the cause of aching teeth, swollen upper lip with a lump, and a history of a dislocated tooth? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Intermediate swelling on both upper and lower lips but more on the upper portion.

Hinglish_Question: Mere 3 saal ki beti ko dermatomyosis ka diagnosis hua hai aur unhe pediatric rhuemetologist ki dekh rekh mein hai. Aaj raat humne unke jeebh par daag dikhaye - mujhe pata hai ki ye bimari muh mein ulcer present kar sakti hai - kaise pata chalega ki ye unke condition se related ulcer hai.Please doctor, mouth ko dekhein.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the spotted tongue in a 3-year-old girl with dermatomyositis indicative of mouth ulcers related to her condition? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. Circular slightly white ulcer on the tip of the tongue. Redness and little swelling around.

Hinglish_Question: hello mujhe apni hotho ke piche ek red bump hai, top left side mein, koi dard nahi hai, nahi sujana, nahi fever, kuch aisa nahi hai jo hospital bhagane ka awaaz kare. Maine ek soft candy kha kar mehsoos kiya tha aur achanak mirror mein dekha toh chup ho gaya kyunki mere aankh ke glands mein surgery ho chuki hai aur ab ye bhi. Mujhe kya karna chahiye aur kitna waqt lag sakta hai dard ya kuch painful start hone se pehle. Doctor, kripya niche di gayi affected area ki tasveer dekhe.
multimodal_Question_summ: Patient query: Patient has a painless red bump on the top left side of the back of their lips after eye gland surgery. How long until pain occurs? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Upper lip's left part is swollen with little redness.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor,Mere tonsils ke right area suj gaye hain. Sujan wale area mein ek chhed hai jaise chawal ki cheez. Mujhe nahi pata ki yeh kya hai. Kripya doctor, neeche di gayi vartaman sthiti dekhein. Mere sote waqt mujhe naak ki samasya ho jati hai, jahaan sirf ek naak ki chhed sahi se kaam karti hai. Aur main raat ko hamesha snore karta hoon. Sujan wale area ka sukon thoda kam ho gaya hai meri daayein gale mein. Umeed hai aap meri madad kar sakte hain. Mujhe abhi Habbatus sauda le raha hoon.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is causing the swollen tonsils with a hole and rice-like substance, along with nasal and snoring issues? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. One of the tonsils are swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Hi, mein Elaine hoon, 63 saal ki hoon. Mujhe lagbhag 10 saal se dentures pehenti aa rahi hoon Magar iss mein koi bhi safalata nahi mili hai. Mujhe hamesha se hi munh ke andar ki samasya hui hai. Bachpan se hi mujhe munh ke andar ulcer hone ki wajah se bubble gum bhi nahi khaane diya jaata tha. Isliye mujhe hamesha sore mouth hone se aadat ho gayi hai. Mere munh ke chaat ke oopar ek bada ya woh aisa hi lagta hai ki bada sthaan hai. Jaise aap jaante hai, munh mein koi bhi bahari cheez asal se bahut badi lagti hai. Salt water ki help karne ke baad bhi jab koi result nahi mila toh maine Colgate Peroxyl Mouth sore Rinse ka use kiya, yeh mere muh ko jalaa gaya! Main ise kal tak bhi istemaal karti rahi, dard me hi toh gain hai, yeh mujhe laga. Aaj subah mujhe full blown sore mouth hua hai aur mere muh mein dentures ke perfect outline dikhai de raha hai. Mera munh Thrush jaisa lag raha hai. Please doctor, Neeche diye gaye image mein affected area ko dekhiye. Mujhe lagbhag 48 ghante se inhe nahi pehna hai. Aise mein mujhe ab kya karna chahiye, main apne MD ko phone karun aur thrush ke liye kuch maangun.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the patient experiencing a sore mouth, ulcers, discomfort with dentures, and potential thrush infection? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. Little white patches on the inner skin of lower lip mostly on the left side.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, mujhe high school se collarbone par ek problem hai jahan meri skin lagatar react karti hai aur breakouts hoti hai. Main crew neck shirts pehenti hoon taaki isko cover kar sakoon. Haalhi mein maine salicylic acid skin wash se breakouts ko control kiya hai lekin ye sirf breakout prone skin se jyada hai. Main necklaces bhi nahi pehen sakti kyunki unse weird rash ho jata hai. Mere pure sharir ke kisi aur hisse par kabhi bhi koi reaction nahi hota. Wahan ki pores mein bhi kuch ajeeb hai. Woh hamesha raised aur stretched dikhte hain. High school mein maine ek doctor se mila aur usne mujhe basically shamed karke bola ki main area ko sahi se clean nahi kar rahi hoon. Hinglish_Question: Namaste, mujhe 21 saal ki umar hai, 120lbs. Aur m ek ladki hun. Meri ek health problem hai jise abhi tak maine kissi bhi doctor ke saath solve nahi kar payi hai. Lagbhag ek saal aur aadhe pehle mujhe bahut jyada gas ki problem hone lagi hai. Mere chaati meh dabee gas ki tarah lagta hai aur main hamesha burp karne ki koshish krti hu gas ko release karne ke liye. Lekin jaise hi m ye krti hu, wapis se gas ubharti hai. Dono taraf mujhe gas ki problem hai. Mere tonsils abhi tak nikalwaye nahi hain aur mujhe dhyan me aya hai ki jab bhi m thak jati hu, mere gale ki lymph nodes suj jaate hain aur meri awaz bilkul bhi baithi rahti hai. Kripya doctor, iss  vartaman condition ko dekhe .M ENT doctor ke paas gayi thi aur unhone mujhe btaya ki meri nasal septum curve nahi hai hamesha ke bawjood ki mai muh khulake soti hu. M ab ek gastroenterologist ke paas bhi jaa rahi hu aur unhone kaha hai ki ye reflux ya kuch aur nahi hai. Kya apko lagta hai meri sinus meri saari problems ka karan hai?
multimodal_Question_summ: Is persistent gas, burping, suppressed gas in the chest, swollen lymph nodes, and hoarseness caused by sinus issues? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. One of the tonsils are swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, main ek 32 saal ka purush hoon. Pichle mahine shaadi ho gayi thi. Shaadi ke baad roz sex karne laga hoon. Ab mere ling ke supare ke andar ki chamdi ka rang kaala ho gaya hai aur wahaan pe kaale daag bhi dikh rahe hain aur ye khujli bhi ho rahi hai. Pehle aisa koi problem nahi thi. Ab last 8 dino se maine sex karna band kar diya hai. Shuru mein sex ke baad khujli hoti thi, lekin maine usko ignore kar diya. Do din pehle khujli bohot khatarnak ho gayi thi. Ab mujhe peshaab karte waqt aur relax mode mein bhi ling mein irritation mehsoos ho rahi hai. Kripya doctor, neeche diye gaye vartaman condition ko dekhein. Meri patni ko pichle do mahine se safed paani ki problem hai aur usko iski dawai chal rahi hai. Hum koi condom ya lubricant use nahi karte. Teen din se main soap aur Clotrimazole dusting powder use kar raha hoon apne ling aur uske aas-paas saaf karne ke liye. Mujhe lagta hai ye dermatitis aur fungal infection hai. Mujhe kaunsi dawai leni chahiye. Kya main kisi dermatologist ke paas jaun ya dawai se iska ilaaj ho sakta hai. Kitne din tak sex avoid karna chahiye ya phir main sex kar sakta hoon.
multimodal_Question_summ: Can blackish, itchy patches on the penis tip, irritation during urination, and a wife with white discharge indicate a dermatitis or fungal infection? The image shows the condition of skin irritation. Red colored rashes on the right side of the neck. Raised spots of abrasion in the area with red spots prominent.

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor, maine HIV status unknown ek mard ke saath six weeks pehle oral sex kiya tha. Mujhe ab dono underarms mein rash hai aur neck mein ek sujan wala lymph node hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Maine rash aur lymph node ki pictures attach ki hain. Kya ye ARS ho sakta hai?
multimodal_Question_summ: Could the rash under both armpits and swollen lymph node in the neck be related to acute retroviral syndrome (ARS) after oral sex? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The neck is swollen and also shows signs of inflammation

Hinglish_Question: Sardi ke start mein mere chehre kaafi dry ho jata hai aur munh ke kone (wo point jahan upper aur lower lips ek saath aate hain) bahut dry ho jate hain, phir us area ki color white se black ho jati hai aur yeh halat garmi tak bani rehti hai....kripya kuch aisa sujhayein jisse yeh dryness permanently thik ho jaye...abhi mein Lobate-GM istemaal kar raha hoon..kripya sujhao dein....ise sambandhit image neeche attachment mein hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing persistent dryness and color changes in the corner of the mouth from winter to summer? Suggested treatment alternatives? The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_dryness. Dryskin with small peels of skin coming out.

Hinglish_Question: Pichle 2 saal se maine ek flat red rash hai jo mere gardan se shuru hota hai aur poore gardan me fail jata hai. Ye garam, dardnak hota hai aur dinon tak reh sakta hai.Isska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai. Jab ye kam hota hai to main chote chote tukde gardan se hata sakti hoon - jaise suraj ki jalan hui ho. Iska dharya dikhta hai jaise maine jal gaya ho. Skin tight ho sakti hai. Ye khud se aata jata hai. Normal taur par ye shuru hota hai jab main apni gardan ko titilahat mahsoos karti hoon aur kabhi kabhi ye khujli bhi ho sakti hai - jab pure gardan ke chaaro taraf ho tab bahut hi khujli hoti hai. Doctors ne iski jaankari dene mein safal nahi huye hai aur bas mujhe moisturise karne ko kehte hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of the patient's persistent, red rash on their neck that becomes hot, sore, and occasionally itchy? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Redness and spots on the right side of the neck extending to the jaw. Some have little blood as well at the center due to too much irritation.

Hinglish_Question: Mera 10 saal ka beta abhi ankho ka sujan ka sudden onset hai, jisme dard ghutnon tak phailte hain. Kabhi kabhi vo itne suj gaye hote hai ki unhe touch nahi kar sakte hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko neeche. Koi chot nahi hui hai. Yeh lagbhag 3 hafte se chal raha hai. Unhe touch karne par dard hota hai aur vo complain karte hain ki pair se ghutne tak shooting strapping pain hoti hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of sudden ankle swelling, shooting pain from foot to knee, and knee swelling in a 10-year-old with no injury?  The image here shows a medical condition related to knee_swelling. The legs are swollen with a slight red bruises in the leg.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe sinus infection hai aur mere chehre, sir, naak, kaan mein bahut dard hai aur main antibiotics le raha hoon. Pichle kuch dino se mujhe notice hua hai ki meri upper lip aur meri aankhon ke palken bhi suj gayi hain, main bilkul bhi theek nahi mehsoos kar raha hoon. Kya sujui hui hont hona normal hai? Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is it normal to have a swollen lip along with a sinus infection, facial pain, and discomfort in the nose and ears? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Swelling present on the upper lip with shiny appearance and slightly light coloured.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe 27 saal ka hoon, mard hoon. Maine apne right side ke upper chest par ek khujli wala red daane dekhe hain. Scratching ki wajah se ye aur bhi bade ho gaye hain aur mere collar bone par bhi irritation shuru ho gayi hai, usi taraf. Ye abhi do hafton se hai. Aur khujli abhi bhi hai. Lekin collarbone ke upar, red area mein maine ek series of little bump/lumps notice kiye hain. Wo hile-jhile hai, soft hai aur dard nahi hai. Lekin wo khujli kar rahe hain. Maine notice kiya hai ki ek bade size ka daana hai jo collar ke centre ki taraf hai. Sabhi daane haddi ke aas paas ki masalidaar twacha par hain. Haddi par rest kar rahe hain. Possibilities kya hain. Uske liye attached image dekh sakte hain.
multimodal_Question_summ: What are the possible causes of an itchy red rash on the upper right side of the chest and collarbone, with moveable, soft, painless bumps? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Haan, dhanyavaad. Kuch saal pehle mujhe stan cancer ka diagnosis hua tha aur mai mastectomy aur reconstructive surgery karvaya. Kuch hafte pehle maine apne kohni ke niche ek gaath mehsoos kiya hai, ye ek cherry tamatar ke size ki hai, kabhi kabhi thoda sa taj hoti hai aur meri haath, kalai aur lower arm bhi bahut suj gayi hai. Kya ye cancer waapas aa gaya hai? Doctor, uski image neeche attached hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is a lump in the armpit, accompanied by tenderness, hand swelling, and arm pain a sign of breast cancer recurrence? The image shows the condition of hand lump. A patch of skin on the wrist swollen not too big in vertical height but widespread, red in color.

Hinglish_Question: Do hafte pehle mujhe bukhar ho gaya tha jo teen din tak chala aur chautilve din mere naak aur honth ke beech ek abcess  ban gaya. Meri uppari hoth phoolne lage. Kripya dekhein patient ke honth ki image neeche. Main ER gaya jahan par abcess ko khola aur saaf kiya gaya. Lagbhag char din ke baad sujan kam ho gayi aur main normal mehsoos kar raha tha. Mujhe antibiotics aur dard ki dawa di gayi thi. Teen din pehle mujhe phir se bukhar aaya aur sar ke samne ki taraf ek dard, ulti aur bhook ki kami hui. Doctor ne mujhe ek zyada takatwar antibiotic diya. Meri allergy aur chronic sinusitis hai aur halka sa asthma ka case bhi hai. Kripya meri madad karen.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of recurrent fever, headache, nausea, loss of appetite, and a history of allergies, sinusitis, and asthma? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Full upper lip swollen. More swelling on right side of upper lip.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, meri beti jo ki do mahine mein 4 saal ki hone wali hai, usko ek saal se jyada samay se ghutno mein dard ki shikayat hai. Uske pediatrician ne hame bataya tha ki ye growing pains hai aur ye normal hai. Lekin ye bahut lamba samay tak reh gaya hai aur hamesha right knee mein hi hota hai. Iska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai. Wo din ke alag-alag samay par apne dard ki shikayat karta hai, zyadatar raat ko aur school ke baad. Wo apne chin ke niche apni taang pakadkar rota hai aur hum usse chu nahi sakte. Kuch raaton mein usse dard ki wajah se nind nahi aati hai. Uske ghutne mein koi sujan, nasoor, laalima ya kuch aisa nahi hai jo ajeeb lage ya mahsoos ho. Ye possible kya ho sakta hai. Use kis specialized doctor ke paas le jaye aur use kis tarah ke tests karwane ke expect karna chahiye.

Hinglish_Question: Rifampin bacterial cellulitis mein upyogi hai kya. Meri maa ned last me Rifampin aur Doxyclline ke liye prescription le chuki hai, dono BID x 10 din ke liye. Main ek pharmacist hoon, lekin Rifampin aur cellulitis ke baare mein pata nahi hai. Unhe pehle se hi Clindamycin aur Keflex meindose li gyi thi, dono ka help hua tha. Redness ab tak kam ho gaya hai, lekin unhe knee aur ankle ke beech mei swelling hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Thanks for your response.

Dentist ne penicillin prescribe kiya aur maine aaj tak 2000mg liya hai (recommended dose ke anusar). Main har 2 ghante mein saline rinses kar raha hoon aur ibuprofen le raha hoon. Aur kya kar sakte hai aaram ke liye. Kitne samay tak ye symptoms chalu rahenge? Main apni mouth kholne aur brush karne ke liye kafi baat nahi kar sakta.

Mein bhi 7 mahine pregnant hoon aur pehle bhi mujhe ek baar yeh hua tha lekin tab mein pregnant nahi thi, yeh dusre toe par bhi ragad raha hai aur wo bhi suj raha hai.

Hinglish_Question: Meri beti 5 saal ki hai aur lagbhag 50 pounds ka wajan hai. Aaj subah uski mathewali par goose eggya ghoonth sa aya tha aur usne pahle wale din sir hilaane ki shikayat nahi ki. Aaj raat sone se pehle maine dekha ki woh uske left eye tak chala gaya hai aur uski naak ki haddi suj gayi hai aur uske aankhein ke aas paas thodi se bruising hai. Please doctor, eyes ko niche dekhein. Humne socha ki shayad ye ek reaction ho sakta hai, isliye humne usko thodi si bachhon ki benadryl di hai aur sujhan thoda kam ho gaya hai, isliye humne use sone se pehle thodi si di hai. Hinglish_Question: Mere masudo ke left side par, peeche ki taraf, do peechle daant ke beech mein, ek bump ban gayi hai. Shayad ye 5 din pehle shuru hui thi, chew karne par us side mein dard hota tha lekin maine socha shayad kuchh stuck ho gaya hoga ya phir koi cavity ho sakti hai. Kal maine dekha ki meri gaal sujh rahi hai aur dard ho raha hai, khana nahi khane par bhi. Jab main apni jaw ke neeche chhuta hai toh bahut hi sensitive aur dard hoti hai. Ye aisa lag raha hai ki left tonsil ya lymph node sujh gayi hai.\nPlease dekhiye doctor affected area ki image neeche. Mera pura gardan ab dard kar rahi hai aur mujhe sir dard bhi ho raha hai. Aaj maine dekha ki peeche ek bump shuru ho raha hai aur constant dard hai, gaal badh gayi hai. Main kal dentist ke paas jaane ki ummid kar raha hoon lekin main ye nahi jaanta ki ye kya hai aur kya mujhe intezaar karna chahiye.

Aur woh kutta street dog tha uske baad maine actually dekha nahi ki mujhe kaunsa kutta kat gaya kyun ki raat ka time tha aur main sadak par aa raha tha. 36 din se mujhe koi bhi injection nahi laga hai, bas knee wale jagah par mujhe burning sensation feel ho rahi hai. Kripya doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko fir main vaccine lena decide kiya hai. Kya is samay ka gap effective hoga mere liye knee ke alawa aur bhi jagahon mein aur woh burning sensation ke alawa koi aur problem nahi hai. Katne wale jagah par swelling nahi hai. Kya yeh anti-rabies ab kaam karegi ya nahi, kitna samay tak rahegi rabies insan ke sharir mein aur kaise yeh anti-rabies andar ki rabies ko nasht karegi. Dhanyavad.

Kripya dekhein doctor, neeche diye gaye affected area ki image. Kya aap mujhe bata sakte hai ki ye kya hai aur iska sabse accha ilaj kya hai? multimodal_Question_summ: What is the cause and treatment for the progressively worsening rash under the patient's belly skin flap, who is obese? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Few mosquito bite like looking swelled spots.

Iske liye ek image attach hai neeche.

Ye kya ho sakta hai?

Hinglish_Question: Mere bade bete ko mono ka diagnose hua tha. Mujhe lagta hai ki ab meri choti bete (lagbhag 3 saal ki) ko bhi ye hai, lekin meine use doctor ke paas nahi le gaya hai. (symptoms 5 din pehle shuru hue). Kal raat se usko loud snoring ho rahi hai aur naak se saans lene mein bahut dikkat ho rahi hai, khaskar sone ke samay. Kabhi-kabhi wo kuch seconds tak saans lene ki rok lagta hai. Is wajah se usko neend mein bahut dikkat ho rahi hai aur wo bahut uncomfortable hai. Mujhe lag raha hai ki ye adenoids ki wajah se ho raha hai.Kripya doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Kyunki din mein wo better lag raha tha, maine use doctor ke paas nahi le gaya, lekin uske nap ke dauran use wahi problems ho rahi thi. Kya wo raat bhar theek rahega ya mujhe use aaj shaam ko doctor ke paas le jane ki koshish karni chahiye. Dhanyavad!
multimodal_Question_summ: Is it necessary to take the younger son to the doctor tonight due to persistent difficulty breathing and snoring? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. The back of the throat has swelling with whitish mass accumulation.

Hinglish_Question: 55 saal ka, 6'2" aur 210 lbs wala purush. Main ek red type ka rash hai jo mere gardan ke peeche shuru hota hai aur bhujao tak adhe raste tak hota hai. Almost waise hi jaise ki main dhoop mein muscle shirt pehne huye hoon. Problem ye hai ki main pichle do hafte se dhoop mein nahi gaya hu. Mujhe dono bazu ke fold mein bhi rash hai jo mere haathon tak jata hai. Baaki jagah koi rash nahi hai. Ye bahut khujli hota hai aur jab bhi main is par kuch lagata hoon, ye sukha jata hai aur fir khujlane aur flakes karne lagta hai. Bahut sharam aati hai. OTC 1% antibiotic creams khujli ko kam kar dete hai lekin skin ko poori tarah sukha dete hai aur phir flakes ho jate hai. Lotions kuch der tak kaam karte hai lekin baad mein khujlane shuru ho jate hai. Main apni diet nahi badla hai aur khub phal aur sabzi khata hoon. Mujhe yahan note karna chahiye ki meri life mein bhari stress hai aur jab main bahut chhota tha tab mujhe eczema ke sath- sath asthma aur allergy bhi thi. Abhi main Combivent inhaler use kar raha hoon (jo mujhe bahut madad nahi kar raha hai) aur raat ko sone se pehle main 4 ghante ka generic benadryl capsule leta hoon jisse mujhe neend aati hai aur khujli thoda kam hoti hai. Question itni lambi hai iske liye sorry lekin main puri jaankaari dene ki koshish kar raha hoon. Mere paas insurance nahi hai aur free clinics bhi bilkul bhare huye hai, line khatam hi nahi hoti hai aur mujhe emergency room jaana nahi hai. Kuch sujhav hai?<image>

The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe apne stan mai ek sakht ganth mili hai. Yah ganth upar ki taraf aur mere arm pit ki taraf hai. Ise touch karne par dard hota hai lekin dusre kisi tarah ka dard nahi hai. Mujhe pichle 6 mahino me stano se jude alag-alag lakshan bhi huye hai. Mujhe yaha tak hai ki kya ek dusre se sambandhit hai pata hi nahi chal raha hai. Yah lakshan hai, sujan, dard aur garami, saath hi ek khujli wala laal dane jaisa rash hai jaisa ki garmi ke dane ke saman dikhta hai lekin waisa nahi lag raha hai. Yah khujli wala rash bhure rang ka hai. Mere stan ke niche 2 aise spots bhi hai jo skin tag jaise dikhte hai. Kya aapko lagta hai ki ye sab sambandh me hai aur shayad stan cancer ho sakta hai? Hinglish_Question: Hie, Mera Tuesday morning ko aankh mein dard aur kuch pareshani hui (aisa laga jaise mere aankh ke kone mein aur mere aankh ke bahar ke taraf ek stye hai. Meri aankh bahut dard kar rahi thi aur suj gayi aur uske baad bahut khatarnak se kaali ho gayi. Meri nazar theek hai aur uss din main udhar raha tha. Uski tasveer neeche hai. Mene baad mein ek chemist se mila tha jinhone mujhe arnica tablets di thi. Hinglish_Question: Hi, maine Friday ko (kuch din pehle) 3 daant nikalwaye hai. Ek wisdom tooth ko katna pada (upar left side) kyunki wo abhi tak bahar nahi aaya tha. Ek aur wisdom tooth tha jo gum se thoda bahar tha (upar right) aur use nikala gaya. Bottom right tooth (molar) ek crown/root canal tooth tha. Molar par kaam karwana bahut paisa lagata hai, lekin x-ray mein kuch infection ya kuchh aisa dikha jiske wajah se use bhi nikal diya gaya. Jab maine 3 daant nikalwaye  tab mujhe haath mein IV Injection (drip) lagwayi gayi, aur jyada sujan nahi hui, lekin jab numbness khatam ho gayi to mere right bottom gum aur face ke side mein dard ho gaya. 3-4 din baad situation aur bhi kharab hai. Mere right ke daant sab dard kar rahe hain, mere jaw/chin/under my tongue bhi dard ho raha hai. Mera muh sooj gaya hai aur peeche/gardan mein bhi dard hai (shayad left side par sone ki koshish se). Kripya dekhein image of the affected area doctor, niche hai. Meri kaan me unblock hone ki koshish hoti hai, lekin lag raha hai jaise kaan mein iinfection ho gayi hai. Mainene dentist se pucha ki kya mujhe antibiotics ki dawai leni chahiye, lekin usne mujhe bas Endone/oxycodine ke liye prescription diya (main ise pasand nahi karti, ye mujhe bahut neend aati hai aur mere dil ki dhadkan tej hoti hai, ye 3 ghante baad khatam ho jata hai). Main ibuprofen aur panadol/paracetamol le rahi hoon. Khana khane aur nigalne mein taklif hoti hai aur mere muh mein ek ajeeb si taste hai (chalbuli pani se bhi kuch fark nahi padta). Mera dentist abhi aur 2 din ke liye off hai. Kya mujhe antibiotics ki tablets mere normal GP se leni chahiye. Dhanyavaad.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should the patient get antibiotic tablets from their regular GP for severe pain and swelling after teeth extraction? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The neck par below the jaws have turned red and are swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Kya swine flu ne accute heart failure trigger kiya ho sakta hai? August 2009 mein swine flu hua tha cardiomyopathy acute heart failure pulmonary odaema Kripya doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko below Feb 2010 se problem hai, 20 saal se asthma misdiagnosed kiya gaya. Kya swine flu ne isko trigger kiya ho sakta hai? Ek saal se dawaiyan le raha hoon aur ab mera pump function normal ho gaya hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Can acute heart failure and pulmonary edema be triggered by swine flu, and misdiagnosed as asthma for 20 years? The image here shows a medical condition related to edema. The right leg has swelling with redness.

Hinglish_Question: Mera jeebh suj gayi hai aur sore throat ho gaya. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Aur sath hi bahut high blood pressure bhi aaya, pata chala ki meri kidneys mein ek stent lagana padega artery ko open karne ke liye. Kya ye bhi swollen tongue aur sore mouth ka karan ho sakta hai? Mere gardan ke aas-pass ki skin mein bhi redness hai, jaise heavy blood flow ka rang, koi rashes nahi hai, viral infection ka swab bhi negative aaya. Ye almost 3 mahino se chal raha hai, ab chakkar aa raha hai aur iss hafte stent tak high blood pressure ke liye 3 pills le rahe hain. Mera doctor sure nahi hai ki sujne aur jalan wali jeebh ka issue kya kar raha hai. Lekin mujhe yeh sochne me baat aati hai ki mere kidneys blood pressure ko badhane ke liye chemical produce kar rahe hai, kya ye iss ka karan ho sakta hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Could a kidney issue causing high blood pressure be related to persistent swollen and burning tongue, sore throat, and red neck? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. There are swollen tonsils in the throat with reddish coloured throat.

Hinglish_Question: Wednesday ko mujhe double root canal hua tha (top left and right molars). Right wala theek hai. Left wala dard kar raha hai, left side of face bahut suj gaya hai aur left lip drooping ho gaya hai. Please doctor, affected area ki image dekhiye neeche. Friday se mujhe antibiotics mil rahe hain. Sujan aur lip droop aaj (Sunday) hui hai itni buri ki mujhe laga ki mujhe stroke ho raha hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Why is the left side of the face significantly swollen with a drooping lip after a double root canal? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Eyelid of the right eye swollen and light pink in color. The eyelid is dropping down because of swelling.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe lagbhag ek mahine pehle apne right knee ke andar ek strong jhatka laga tha aur usne mere ankle bone par ek hard lump chhod diya hai, jisse football kick karne par aur jab main ise chuhta hoon, dard hota hai. Doctor, kripya neeche di gayi image ko dekhe. Aur jab main ise haath se sahlaata hoon, to mere pair ke neeche ke hisse mein "pins and needle" ki tarah ek tingling feeling hoti hai. Isme kya problem hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the cause of the hard lump on the ankle bone, pain when kicking a football, and tingly sensation in the foot after a knee injury? The image here shows a medical condition related to knee_swelling. The left knee is swollen wild mid redness.

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor, main ek female hoon, 24 saal ki. Mujhe last month thoda sa fever tha, isliye maine ek pharmacist ke paas gayi, usne mujhe do doses of Nimesulide Paracetamol tablets diye aur kuch quick relief tablet (jo Chlorpheniramine, Phynelpherine, Hydrochloric aur Guaiphenesin salt hota hai). Mera fever toh chala gaya, lekin mere muh mein sukhapan tha, jise maine dhyan nahi diya. Isi beech, maine bahut saara peanut butter aur sukhe phal khaya. Aur ek hafte baad mere muh mein 2 se 3 chhale ho gaye, please doctor, dekhiye neeche muh ka condition jab maine check kiya, toh maine dekha ki mere gaal ke andar brown-darkbrown marks hai. Maine ek general physician ke paas jaake dikhaya, unhone kaha ki ye davai ke side effect hai aur thode samay mein theek ho jayenge. Lekin ab ek mahina beet gaya hai. Marks ab comparatively light hai. Aur muh kabhi kabhi sukh jaata hai sirf. Lekin mujhe lagta hai (sukhe muh ya teekha khana ke kaaran ho sakta hai) gaal ki lining kharab ho jaati hai jisse fir se problem hoti hai. Mujhe jaanna hai ki ye theek hone mein kitna samay lagega. Aur kya mujhe kuch khas food items se bachna chahiye. Doctor ne mujhe sirf probiotics diye they paanch din ke liye.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the expected healing time for mouth marks and ulcers caused by Nimesulide Paracetamol tablets, and what foods should be avoided? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers.

Hinglish_Question: Mere right side mein kareeb 2 mahine pehle crown tha...ise heal hone mein bahut time laga. Friday ko mujhe aisa laga ki kuch khaane ke beech mein phas gaya hai, isliye maine floss kiya. Mere right eye mein bhi dard tha...maine tab tak samajha nahi tha ki ye dono related hai jabtak maine Saturday ko uthne tak realize nahi kiya ki main us side par chew nahi kar sakta aur poora side face mein dard hai...ab Sunday hai aur mujhe ab bhi dard hai aur thoda sa swollen hai us side ke face aur gum aur lips white hai aur dard hai. Kripya dekhein doctor is affected area ki image ko niche. Kya mujhe karna chahiye?
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of prolonged healing after a crown placement, along with eye pain, facial pain, swelling, white gums, and lip swelling? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Full upper lip swollen. More swelling on right side of upper lip.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor..main 24 saal ki ladki hoon aur meri samasya hai ki mere ghutne ke haddi par pink aur purple rang hai.. mujhe 6 mahine pehle ghutne ke haddi ki twacha par green rang ke nishan dikhe aur thoda dard bhi hua tha. Phir 2 mahine baad mujhe wahi jagah par pink aur purple rang dikhne laga, lekin dard nahi hai..koi khujli ya koi bimari nahi hai, sirf meri twacha ka rang ghutne ke haddi ke area mein pink aur purple hai... Neeche image di gayi hai. Mujhe jaanna hai ki yeh pink aur purple tone kyu ho raha hai aur yeh kya hai.. plzzzz meri madad karein..plz..
multimodal_Question_summ: Why does the patient have pink and purple discoloration on their knee bone, with no pain or rashes? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Cluster of circular red rashes on the skin. Red around the rasied edges and clear skin in the center.

Hinglish_Question:
English: Last night, I woke up around 4 AM and noticed an inflamed red patch of skin on my arm, roughly an inch and a half long by an inch wide. I thought I had just been scratching in my sleep and ignored it. Now, I've just woken up, and the red patch has turned into two lines of nearly perfect squares. It is REALLY bizarre looking. It appears as though they might stem from a bug bite, but I was wondering if anyone has heard of this kind of thing. The image for that is attached  below.

 Kal raat, 4 baje ke aas paas, main utha aur apni baju mein ek suj gaya hua laal patch dekha, lagbhag ek aur aadha inch lamba aur ek inch choda. Socha main sone mein khujla raha hoga aur ise ignore kar diya. Abhi, main abhi utha hun aur laal patch do line ban gaye hain, lagbhag bilkul perfect squares ke. Bilkul ajeeb lag raha hai. Lag raha hai jaise inse kira kaat gaya ho, lekin mujhe yeh jaanana tha ki kya kisi ne aisi koi cheez suni hai. Niche uski tasveer bhi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of an inflamed red patch on the arm that has now turned into two lines of squares? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Lekin mujhe koi sudhaar nahi dikh raha hai, baal jyada ganje ho rahe hain. By the way, meri thyroid thik hai, meri diet healthy hai aur main jyada stress nahi leta. Mujhe ye jaanna hai ki kya main iron lena jaari rakhu ya phir main aur kuch supplements loon jaise biotin, magnesium, zinc, calcium, selenium, jo maine pehle bhi iron ke liye prescription kiye jaane se pehle le raha tha. Toh mujhe 3 din tak tej bukhar aur buri khaansi rahi aur main weak feel kar raha tha isliye maine doosre doctor ke paas gaya aur bataya ki mujhe bronchitis hai aur mujhe antibiotics ka course lena hoga. Hinglish_Question: Mera namaste doctor, main ek 31 saal ka purush hoon. Mujhe kuch samasya aa rahi hai mere gardan mein (gale mein ganth) pichle kuch hafte se. Ant me, excision biopsy karne ki salah di gayi aur karwa bhi li. Report mein tubercular lymphadenitis dikha aur treatment shuru kiya hai aur abhi Akurit ke char tablets le raha hoon teen din se. Ab mera sawal hai, mere gardan ke do hisson mein kuch samasya thi jaise ki maine picture mein mere ungliyon se bataya hai. Upar wala bada aur sakht tha aur neeche wala chhota aur hil sakta tha. ENT oncosurgeon ne kaha ke wo upar wale hisse se lymph nodes nikalenge aur neeche wale hisse ka nahi kyunki wo same area mein aate hain. Iske anusar, excision kar di gayi aur upar wale hisse se char lymph nodes histopathology ke liye bheje gaye. Intezaar karte-karte mere neeche wala node thoda badh gaya aur mai abhi incision site ke just niche ganth jaisa mahsoos kar raha hoon. Do din baad, report aayi aur usme TB tha. Ab mera sawal hai, kya doctor sahi the jo upar ke lymph nodes nikale aur neeche wale area ka nahi? Kya ho sakta hai ke upar wale area ke lymph nodes TB ke wajah se suje aur neeche wale area ke suje hone ka koi aur karan ho sakta hai? Jaise ki lymphoma, waghera. Aapka expert sujhav zaruri hai. Kya lymph TB ek hi node ko prabhavit karti hai ya alag-alag nikatsth kshetron mein bhi sujan ho sakti hai. Image, neeche attach ki gayi hai.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, yeh rogi meri maa hai, umar 58 saal, jiska chronic psoriasis control mein hai. Pichle do mahine se meri taango mein kuch problem ho rahi hai. Meri bayi taraf ki paer bilkul normal hai. Local clinics mein initial diagnosis infection aur severe arthritis tha. Unhe anti-inflammatory, antibiotics aur antifungal cream di gayi thi. Wahaan thoda symptomatic relief hua lekin sujan samapt nahi hui. Paero ke X-ray mein halki haddi ki digestion riport aayi. Anya koi significant pathology nahi thi. Unhe do hafte pehle hospital admit kiya gaya tha. FBS, ESR aur uric acid normal aaye. Unhe cryotherapy aur physiotherapy di gayi. Ab woh ghar chhodi gayi hai. Unki condition thodi si behtar hai lekin dard aur sujan poori tarah se samapt nahi hui hai. Aur kuch cycles of physiotherapy bhi baaki hai. Unhe yaad hai ki pichle do hafton se pehle woh apne daayein paer ko thoda sprain kiya tha, baad mein unhe koi dard ya taklif nahi hui thi, isliye woh sprain ko ignore kar diya tha. Unko do saal pehle hysterectomy karwaya tha kyunki calcified fibroids ke wajah se tabhi bhi unko kabhi-kabhi taangon mein sujan hoti thi. Kripya salah dein ki kya karna chahiye. Hinglish_Question: Mere 7 & 1/2 mahine ki beti ko hilne ki problem ki ek benign form recently diagnosed hui hai mere skines mein. Lambi kahani choti, wo bahut pareshan hai aur mujhe use thoda aaram dilana hai. Yahan ek list hai uske liye jo medications wo currently le rahi hai. Ibuprofen 100mg per 5 ml dosage hai,aur uski dosage 3.75 ml har 8 ghante mein leni hai. Maine haal hi mein use Tylenol dena band kar diya hai. Mai Tylenol aur ibuprofen ko alternate karte thi. Kripya doctor, below affected area ki image dekhein. Use sirf ibuprofen use karne par accha reaction milta hai. Main use Pedialyte freezer pops de rahi hoon, aur diluted Pedialyte bhi (rojana kareeb 2 oz.total; 2 din se).Dr ki permission ke saath maine aaj Q-Dryl ka 1/4 tbs liya hai 3 baar daily. Abhi tak use 2nd dose mil chuka hai, aur mujhe khushi hai ke ye kam kar raha hai; na sirf uski skin ke liye balki uski chidchidahat ke liye bhi. Main use Aveeno (baby oatmeal) 30 min tak room temperature water me bhigne deti hoon. Aur uske baad Aveeno baby lotion ka istemaal karti hoon. Meals se pahle Saline (nasal spray) 2 sprays, aur sone se pahle bhi 2 sprays. Chaliye, mera sawal ye hai; kya main use rashes par Caladryl use kar sakti hoon. Maine aaj pahle hi calamine lotion istemaal ki thi. Usmein likha tha ki 6 mahine ya usse bade baccho ke liye safe hai (wo use bahut pasand aaya) lekin Caladryl mein likha hai ki 2 saal se kum umra ke bacchon ke liye Dr se poochein. To yahan main hoon, Dr. ko normally phone kar leti lekin abhi raat ke dus baje ho rahe hain. Mai aapka bahut abhari hoon ki aapne samay nikala meri novel ki padhai ke liye, waise keh diya tha ki main mamle ko chota rakhungi. -dhanyavaad April :)

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, meri maa 75 saal ki hai. Unhe 6 mahine se sir ghoomna aur bhari pan ki problem hai. Unke BP, sugar, thyroid aur anya blood test reports normal hai. Ek doctor (Medicine) ke sujhav par unhone MRI test karaya hai. MRI test (non-contrast) of brain report mein ek shanka hai GRE mein blooming ke saboot ke vishay mein left parietal lobe aur right basifrontal lobe mein perilesional ke saboot ke bina. Kripya doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko neeche diye gaye. Aur further evaluation ke liye contrast ke saath rule out calcified granulomas aur anya nidan karna sujhaya gaya hai. MRI report findings mein chote blood vessels mein white matter ischemic changes aur right external capsule mein chronic lacunar infarct hai. Thoda cerebral atrophic changes hai. Medicine doctor ne vertigo aur nerve ka ilaj ke liye dawai di hai lekin turant ek neurologist ko dikhane ki sujhav di hai. Meri maa ko brain problem ka pata nahi hai aur unhe darr ke karan doctor ke paas further checking ke liye jaane se inkar hai. Isliye, mujhe aapki madad ki jarurat hai.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste Doctor, Baby 3 mahine ki hai. Janam ka vajan 2.9kg tha. 10 hafte mein vajan 4.6kg ho gaya hai. Average 700gms ka vajan badha hai. Kya breastfeeding jari rakhi ja sakti hai? Ya supplement feed diya ja sakti hai? Kripya acidity control aur anal ulcer/rash ke liye samadhan ke bare mein salah dein. Age kaise proceed karna hai..

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, maine lagbhag ek mahine pehle dono aankhon mein PRK eye surgery karvayi thi. Mujhe turant heavy antibiotics Ceftin ya Vigamox se ilaaj kra diya gaya. Do se teen hafte baad, dikhai me thoda sudhaar hua, laalima kam hui aur epithelial cells ka loss lagbhag 1.2 mm hai. Kripya doctor, neeche di gayi aankhen dekhein. Uske baad maine eye steroids aur vitamin C teen baar roz lena shuru kiya. Aaj mujhe pata chala hai ki pahle wale ulcer ke neeche aur ek chota epithelial defect hai (dono ab bhi bahut chote hai). Mujhe tej roshni mein bahut sensitivity hai, aur mujhe jaanna hai ki ab tak sudhaar hone ke alawa aur kuch ho sakta hai ya nahi. Mujhe kaha gaya hai ki kam se kam teen mahine tak dhairya rakhu kyunki chhale abhi bhi prominent aur central hai, haalaanki har baar doctor se milne par thoda sudhaar hota hai. Abhi main dawai le raha hu, antibiotic char baar roz, steroid teen baar aur Sythnomyine do baar roz. Jyadatar chhala front stroma mein hai, lekin central hai, aur har baar thoda roshan hota hai.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe lymph hain aur main din mein do baar compression therapy karta hoon.Doctor, kripya niche diye gaye image ko dekhein. Ab wo bade hain, dardnak hai aur mere ribs ke neeche aur bhi jagahon par hai. Ye dardnak hai, jab main saans lete waqt, halki se bhi chhu ke bhi dard hota hai. Main bistar par apni taraf nahi so sakta, isliye main recliner mein sota hoon. Mere paas MRSA aur VRSA ka itihaas hai aur mere pehle se 12 spinal surgeries ho chuki hain, jinmein se kam se kam 3 mei massive infection spinal cord aur surrounding area mei hi paye gaye the. Mere GP aur pain specialist toh mujhe ignore karte hain, unko lagta hai ki ye sirf mere lymphema ki wajah se swollen lymph nodes hai. XRays ya CT scans mangwaane ka koi order nahi hua hai. Mera appointment meri internal medicine doctor ke saath 10 March ko hai. Mujhe jaanna hai ki ye kya hain aur unka treatment kaise hoga. Mere spinal aur legs ke aur bhi bahut dard hai, lekin mujhe lagta hai ki wo log sirf mujhe shikayat karne samjhte hain....jabki main sach mein serious hoon aur madad chahta hoon. Hinglish_Question: Mere papa (age 70+ years) ko heart blockage hai aur wo last 14 saalon se medicine le rahe hain. Last 2-3 saal se unhe Parkinson bhi hai (jis wajah se unki movement mein balance khone lag gaya hai). Parkinson ki problem ke karan, unki movement bahut restricted aur slow ho gayi hai. Wo pehle chalna bhi nahi kar pa rahe hain aur bahut kam door tak walk kar pa rahe hain. Usi tarah unki zindagi chal rahi hai. Lekin haal hi mein ek subah uthne ke baad unhe notice hua hai ki unke right arm mein kuch red patches hai aur wo bhi suj gayi hai aur dard ho raha hai. Ek din baad unhe notice hua hai ki unke right leg ke knee ke baad, muscles bahut stiff ho gayi hai aur dard bhi ho raha hai. Aur unke right arm aur right leg ke color bhi change ho gaye hain. Cardiologist ki salah par saare tests ho chuke hain (ultrasound, blood test, legs ke liye doppler ultrasound). Doctor ne bataya hai ki ye Thrombosis ki wajah se ho raha hai jisme khoon clot ho jata hai. Beech beech mein unka hemoglobin ratio 7 tak gir gaya tha. Isliye unhe 3 bottles blood diya gaya hai. Vartaman condition ye hai ki haath/haatheli ka rang normal ho gaya hai lekin sujan aur dard abhi bhi hai. Doctor ne kuch anti-biotic diya hai. Hum ye nahi jaante ki treatment sahi direction mein ho raha hai ya nahi. Aur hm ye bhi jaanana chahte hain ki haath/haatheli mein sujan hone ka kya karan ho sakta hai aur isse kaise bacha ja sakta hai. Bahut bahut dhanyavaad...jawab ka intezaar kar rahe hain... Manab. Doctor, kripya dekhein prabhaavit area ki tasveer neeche.

Hinglish_Question: Hi, Mein 25 saal ka hoon, 183cm lambai hai aur vajan 77 kg hai. Mujhe 1 saal aur aadha se jock itch hai jo mera ingle area me hai. Maine ise thik se treat nahi kiya tha. Haal mein, maine apne GP ko visit kiya. Woh kaafi jaldi mein the aur mujhe anti-fungal cream aur tablets recommend kiye. Maine treatment kiya hai 3 hafte se, lekin koi sudhar nahi hua, bas meri twacha me thoda redness hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Kyunki prabhavit area ka rang thode se halka hai (aur un patches ke kinare thoda gehra hai) aur stable hai (bahut lambe samay se badh nahi raha hai), mujhe lagta hai ki infection pehle hi thik ho gaya tha, lekin lambe samay tak hone ke karan isne daag chhod diye hai. Kya ye ho sakta hai? Agar haan, to kya koi tarika hai in daago ko hatane ka? Treatment ke baare mein, maine Lamsil cream (Terbinafine 1% w/w) ko infection ke andar do baar istemaal kiya: ek baar lagbhag 6 mahine baad aur phir 9 mahine baad, har baar lagbhag 2 hafte ke liye. Us samay, twacha thodi si laal thi. Haal mein, doctor ke paas jaane ke baad, main Trimovate Cream (clobetasone butyrate, oxytetracycline, nyastin) use kar raha hoon, Canesten Cream Clotrimazole 1% w/w 20g fungalinfection ke liye aur kuch anti-fungal pills din me 4 baar 7 dino tak. Main Tea Tree Oil bhi use karta hoon (ek stick ki madad se).

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, mere pitaji ko kal cataract surgery hui thi. Unke sugar levels surgery se pehle theek the. Aaj unhe swelling ke karan 2 ml Dexa injection diya gaya hai unki aankh mein. Kripya doctor, aankhon ko dekhein. Uske baad se sugar levels 280-300 ke beech reh gaye hain. Dinner se pehle unke sugar levels 300 mg/dL the. Humein humare doctor ki salah par, unhe regular sugar medicines ke saath Mixtard insulin ke 16 units instead of 14 units diye hain. Mere sawal yeh hai: kya Dexa injection itna sugar badhata hai aur iska asar kab tak rahega. Aur saath hi unhe har ghante Predmet steroid eye drops ka ek drop bhi dal rahe hain. Kal se ye sirf teen ghante mein ek baar hoga. Kya isse bhi sugar level badh sakta hai. Kal se hum sugar levels kaise manage karein. Kya steroid ka asar chala jayega. Kripya cataract surgery ke baad ki sari eye drops ki prescription dekhein. Unhe Mixtard Insulin 30/70 - 50 units subah mein, 14 units raat mein, Glycomet GP2 1-0-1, Linagliptin 5 mg 1-0-0, Fibator 10 mg -0-0-1, Metolar 25 -1-0-0, Dynapres 0.4 - 0-0-1, Arreno 1-0-1, Ecosprin 75 1-0-0, Thyronorm 25 mg ek tablet from Monday to Thursday aur do tablet from Friday to Sunday, Cap Uprise ek mahine mein ek baar de rahe hain.
multimodal_Question_summ: Does the Dexa injection and steroid eye drops increase blood sugar levels and how to manage insulin dosage? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Redness on the eye or the blood veins/caapilliaries are swollen and red.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe kuch saal pehle borderline Sjogren's ki diagnosis hui thi, koi badi samasya nahi hai, sirf aankho, moo, naak aur skin dry hai.Is recent heat mein meri ankles mein swelling ho gayi hai aur ab knee mein bhi thodi si hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Aur mujhe bhookh lagi hai. Mai dry mouth se thrush ka bhi case ho gaya hai aur mai Rx lozenges se treat kar raha hoon. Mujhe doubt hai kahi mujhe UTI bhi hai kyunki thodi urgency hai, par koi jalan nahi hai. Mai MD se milne ka plan kar raha hoon, par tab tak mai chinta mein hoon kahi ye kidney se related to nahi hai. Mujhe koi aur shikayat nahi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Could the patient's swelling in ankles and edema in knee be related to their borderline Sjogren's diagnosis? The image here shows a medical condition related to edema. The left hand is swollen.

Hinglish_Question: 8 din pehle mein office se ghar aaya aur jab car se utra to mere kaan ke neeche, mere gale ke niche ek laal, kadak ganth dikhi.Meri neck ki image dekh lo doctor, mere gale mein kuch problem hai. Ganth thodi kam ho gayi, par mere kaan ke neeche aur gale mein dard hone laga aur bahut saara post nasal drip hua, par mere naak mein kam congestion thi. Doctor ne mujhe bataya ki shayad ye bas ek sardi hai aur unhone kaha ki unhe koi lymph node swelling nahi lagi hai. Agla subah, jab mein utha to mujhe acha mehsoos hua. Mere pati ne meri neck check kiya ki sure ho jaye ki ganth thodi si kam ho gayi. 20 minute baad mein bathroom mein gayi aur wahi ganth wahi jagah pe phir se dikhi. Woh ek machchar ke kaatne jaisi lag rahi thi, par meri puri zindagi mein machchar ke kaate ke saath itching ya dard hamesha hota hai par yaha toh kuch nahi hai. Yeh 2 din pehle hua tha. Post nasal drip abhi bhi chal rahi hai aur ab meri gardan mein dard ho raha hai post nasal drip se. Flu ke liye negative hai. Strep ke liye negative hai. Main 30 din pehle hi ek hospital mein full blood work up karwaya tha aur koi problem nahi aayi thi.

Aam taur par ye ek mahine tak hota hai phir saaf ho jata hai. Meri jagah par sukhayi shuru hoti hai aur ab hum apne wood stove ka upyog garmi ke liye shuru karte hain. Lekin, ghatak dard abhi tak bana hua hai, knees mein pain mein koi improvement nahi hai jo ki two weeks post-injury mehsoos hua tha. Kya ye iska indicate karta hai ki ye theek nahi ho raha hai.

Fir maine turant ek condom pehnne ko kaha. Is ghatna ke saath hriday savdhani barabar rakhi gayi. Is incident ke chhe hafte baad, mere right knee mein dard hua. Wahaan sujan ya lalima nahi thi. Ye dard ek din mein samapt ho gaya. Is samay mujhe koi bukhar ya thakan nahi thi. Phir do hafte baad, dard fir se hua lekin ek din mein samapt ho gaya. Hinglish_Question: Mujhe Dengue ka diagnose hua hai 10 din pehle aur ab mere platelet count normal ho gaya hai aur fever bhi nahi hai. Current count 293 hai. Hinglish_Question: Main Danielle hoon. Mujhe 2 din pehle mere neck par ek rash hua hai. Kal yeh mere chest par spread ho gaya aur aaj mujhe lag raha hai ki maybe mere arms par bhi hai. Mujhe kuch naya khane ya peene ki cheez nahi mili hai isliye mujhe pata nahi ki yeh kya ho sakta hai. Shayad yeh ek heat rash ho sakta hai lekin main ek dark skin African American girl hoon toh mujhe pata nahi ki heat rash mere liye kaisa hona chahiye. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Please help. Yeh bahut khujli bhi ho raha hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of the itchy skin rash that started on the neck and spread to the chest and arms? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste, Mera Toddler aaj 11 ghante pehle gir gaya aur usne apne car seat ke cup holder ke kone par aankh ki taraf chot kha li. Usne paanch minute se kam roya. Uski aankh suj gayi hai aur uske eyebrow ke kone par bruise hai. Usne ek neend li aur gussa se utha. Please doctor, aankhen dekhein niche. Lekin woh teen saal ka hai. Usey achhe se khana khaya tha aur sahi tareeke se baat kar raha tha/jawaab diya tha. Kya main aaj raat usey har ghante ya aise hi uthane ki chinta karu?

Hinglish_Question: Helo.Main apne doston ke saath 2 din pehle bahar gaya tha aur mujhe aisa laga ki mere pair mein khujli ho rahi hai. Maine usko khujlaya lekin kuch nahi hua, aaj tak. Mera pair suj gaya hai aur red hai aur bahut dard ho raha hai. Kripya foot par kuch hua hai, woh dekhein. Yah seli thik ek bug ke saath kuch issue hai. Maine ice aur thoda sa cream (medicaments) for suj gaya skin aur stuff try kiya lekin phir bhi, mujhe urgent tareekh tak poochna tha kyun ki mujhe kal yatra karni hai. Pehle se dhanyavaad, ek picture hai yahan par.
multimodal_Question_summ: Summary: Patient's foot became swollen, red, and painful with itchy sensation after a bug bite, seeking urgent advice before traveling. The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The foot is swollen with blue discolouration.

Hinglish_Question: Hi Mai kuch hafton se apne muh me kuch samasya se pareshan hoon. Mujhe yeh samasya aksar hoti hai jisse mera muh bahut dard hota hai. Hinglish_Question: Age 32, height 5'10" weight 83, medical history- noneMere sharir par ek gadda hai. Mere sarir mein kuch gadda hain. Sabse bada mere hath par hai aur mere left hand par teen gadda hain. Doctor, uska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai. Ye badhta ja raha hai aur doctors ne kaha hai ki ye khatarnak nahi hai aur main ise ignore kar sakti hoon. Kuch saal pehle ye bahut chota tha aur dhire dhire bada hone lagta hai. Mujhe is baat se bahut chinta hai aur main isko nikalwana chahti hoon.
multimodal_Question_summ: What are the potential causes and recommended treatment options for a patient with growing lumps on their hand? The image shows the condition of hand lump. Swellings on the end of the fingers on the palm.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe pair ki talvo, hatho, peeth, pet aur private parts par bahut khujli wala rash hai. Doctor ne pehle scabies samjha tha lekin do treatments ke baad bhi mujhe ab bhi khujli wala rash hai. Meri twacha bahut dry aur flaky hai. Agar dekhna zaroorat ho, toh mujhe rash ke tasveerein hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Please help kijiye kyunki koi steroid cream ya allergy tablets bhi kaam nahi kar rahi. Ye rash/twacha condition kya ho sakti hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of an itchy rash on the soles of feet and hands, back, stomach, and genitals, resistant to scabies treatments? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, mujhe lagbhag teen hafte pehle kuch problem hui thi meri skin mein. Mujhe antibiotics di gayi thi aur doctor ne kaha tha ki mujhe is jagah ko saaf rakhe aur anti-fungal cream lagayein. Shuru mein yeh bohot khujli kar rahi thi aur main kuch tight nahi pehen pa rahi thi. Abhi mujhe kuch nahi lag raha hai lekin jaisa aap pictures mein dekh sakte hain, yeh bhar rahi hai. Yeh meri galti thi ki maine ise itna badhne diya kyunki shuru mein yeh sirf laal hua tha aur mujhe laga ki yeh sirf mere sensitive skin ki wajah se ek chota sa rash hai lekin phir yeh rash itna kharab ho gaya ki jala raha tha. Kripya dekhiye is vartaman condition ko, doctor. Mujhe sirf iska khatam ho jana hai, abhi. Main wapas normal hona chahti hoon lekin yeh bohot dhimi tarah se bhar rahi hai aur mujhe bechaini ho rahi hai. Main Menaderm Clio, Emuaidmax, Gelmicin aur Cortisone use kar rahi hoon. Mujhe yakeen nahi hai ki kya yeh sensitive area normal hai itni dhimi tarah se bharne ke liye ya shayad mujhe galat dawaiyaan use kar rahi hoon. Unhone pehle hi infection ke liye test kar diya hai. Hamesha se hi mujhe bohot sensitivity hoti hai aur mujhe lagta hai ki shayad maine shuru ki laalness par dhyan nahi diya aur bina kuch soche samjhe kai cheezon ko karne se yeh khatarnak rash ho gaya.
multimodal_Question_summ: Why is the patient experiencing slow healing of a severe skin rash despite using multiple medications? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Maine haal hi mein Wal-dryl se Allegra par switch kiya hai ek mahine ke liye, Wal-dryl me "diphenhyramine" hota hai jabki Allegra me nahi hota. Wal-dryl se switch karne ke baad, mujhe notice hua hai ki mere bahut saare baal naahane ke baad bath tub me chhod jate hain.Usse neeche attached image hai. Aur mere topi ke andar bhi baal bikhre hue mil sakte hain, aur lag raha hai jaise baalo ka volume bahut jaldi kam hota ja raha hai. Mere baalon ko wapas swasth banane ke liye main kya kar sakta hoon.
multimodal_Question_summ: How can I restore my thinning hair and prevent hair loss after switching from Wal-dryl to Allegra? The image shows the condition of dry scalp. Red lesions on the skin of the scalp with dry skin andsilvery-white scales. Condition- Scalp psoriasis

Hinglish_Question: Mere kandhon par aur thoda neeche ek rash hai. Wo pimples ki tarah lag raha hai. Mujhe iski takriban 5 din se hai. Main cortisone aur bendryl ka istemal kiya lekin ab bhi hai. Iski image niche attach ki gayi hai. Ab mujhe pure sharir me gharshan jaise aapshan mahsoos ho rahe hain, sirf rash par nahi. Meri skin bahut sensitive hai aur main sabun, detergent, etc se allergic hoon. Mujhe plants aur cheezon se bhi allergy hai. Main pichhle hafte camping par gaya tha. Kya maine kuch chheze se takrayi? YE KYA HAI. HELP! Dhanyavaad!
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a pimply rash on shoulders and back, accompanied by prickly sensations all over the body? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Oval shaped or circular red patches on the leg. Little swelling and dryness on the patches with foldings of skin.

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor, mujhe apne aankh ke palkon mein kuch problem hai. Main paanch hafte pregnant hoon. Mere palkon mein sukhaapan hai. Palkon ke aas paas ki skin mein jaln ka anubhav hota hai. Mujhe iske upar khujli bhi hoti hai. Main ek doctor ke paas gayi thi. Unhone mujhe ek steroid cream di hai. Lekin mera gynecologist mujhe uska ek hafta istemaal karne ki salaah di hai. Maine sab kuch try kiya hai, including eyedrops, eyelid cleaner, lotions aur tea tree oil. Lekin kuch bhi mujhe madad nahi kar raha hai. Kya ye garbhavastha ke karan hai? Kripya salah dein. Uska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing swollen, dry, and itchy eyelids in a pregnant woman despite using various treatments? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Big swelling of the entire eyelid and also below the eye. Looks Dark red and little shiny.

Hinglish_Question: Mere haath aur bazuon par ek rash hai. Mere haath aur bazuon par rash tha, gardan mein laalima aur aankhe suj gayi aur khujli ho rahi thi. Mein doctor ke paas gaya, usne mujhe 5 din ke liye prednisone diya hai, 5 din mein 5 tablet leni hai, aankhon ki sujan gayab ho gayi, gardan aur bazuon par laalima gayab ho gayi, lekin rash ab bhi kalai aur haath par hai, laal aur khujli ho rahi hai.Main abhi bhi aankhon ke liye visioned use kar raha hoon, allergies ke liye abhi bhi khujli ho rahi hai. Uska image neeche attach kiya hua hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the reason for a rash on the wrist and hand, along with redness, itching, swollen eyes, and neck? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mera boyfriend ek bahut hi ganda rash mein nikal aaya hai aur uski skin par bumps hai, red aur bahut itching aur dard hai. Please, doctor, is vartaman condition ko dekhein. Bumps ko thanda shower aur Benadryl ke baad kam ho gaya. Wo baseball khelta hai aur pichle week and a half se apni pants mein gold bond powder use kar raha hai. Iska karan kya ho sakta hai?
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing the red, itchy, painful skin rash with bumps on the patient's boyfriend's legs after using gold bond powder? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Spot swelling on the complete leg's skin, circular In shape and very ligh pink color.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe kuch samay se haath mein ek problem hai- wahin par kuch redness hai, Doctor uski image attached ki gayi hai jisme ek thoda sa sujan bhi hai aur bahut jyada dard nahi hai. Ab bhi lump bahar ki taraf nikal raha hai aur ajeeb dikhta hai- koi dard nahi hai par shayad bahut bura dikhta hai. Mujhe pehle toe aur knees mein gout attacks hote the lekin ab unki sankhya kam ho gayi hai- mein allopurinol aur colchicine use karta hoon. Doctor ne mujhe salah di hai ki mein allopurinol ek tablet roz lete rahu aur agar dard hota hai to colchicine le lu. Kya koi aur tarika hai elbow lump se chutkara pane ka, mere doctor bahut responsive nahi hain. Aapki salah aur madad ke liye dhanyavad Ash.
multimodal_Question_summ: What are possible treatments for a protruding, painless hand lump in a patient with a history of gout attacks? The image shows the condition of hand lump. Lump on the wrist's bone on the right hand.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe nahi pata kya karu, mujhe lagta hai mujhe scabies hai. Mujhe kuch dino se bohot itching ho rahi hai aur mere haath ke beech mai red bumps wali rash bhi hai. Maine thoda research kiya hai aur usme likha hai ki bleach bath se ye thik ho jayega, kya ye sach hai? Ya fir mujhe seedhe bleach apne tvach par lagana chahiye. Hinglish_Question: Namaste, main 60 saal ka hoon aur apne aapko kaafi active samajhta hoon. Pichle 6 mahino se maine apne bayan humari left knee ke niche ek sakht ganth (chin area) mehsoos ki hai, jo size me badhne ka lagta hai. Ye sakht hai aur moveable nahi hai. Mainei yahi cheez right knee ke niche bhi mehsoos ki hai, lekin wah ganth abhi bahut choti hai. Ismein koi dard nahi hai. Doctor, kripya niche diye gaye tasveer par dhyan de. Mere knees pe kabhi koi surgery nahi hui hai. Haal hi mein mere right knee mein osteoarthritis ka diagnosis hua hai aur mujhe sujan aur dard ka anubhav hua tha. Mujhe dard kam karne ki dawa likhi gayi thi, lekin maine ise nahi liya. Main ek garmi wale climate mein shift hua hoon aur dard aur sujan gayab ho gayi hai!

Hinglish_Question: Hi main 46 saal ka hoon, 175cm lamba aur 75kg wazan hain aur generally fit hoon. Main alag-alag sports karta hoon aur Sunday ko 160km cycle kiya. Waise mera sawaal mere seene ke aas-pass(heart area) mein hone wali reocurring itch se related hai. Iske alawa main bilkul swasth hoon. Wahan jagah par rash ya skin irretation ke koi saboot nahi hai jahan par mujhe itching hoti hai aur wo itching skin ke upar se gehari lagti hai. Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, Mera beta 17 mahine ka hai. Uske munh ke andar ki uppar wali hoth suj gayi hai. Vo pus se bhari nahi, bas suj gayi hai. Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor, main 35 saal ka hoon aur koi heart problems nahi hai, koi dawa nahi le raha, koi known inflammation nahi hai, koi abnormal body temperature nahi hai, koi allergies nahi hai kabhi hui hai. Hinglish_Question: Mujhe apne skin lump mein ek chamdi ke niche ek abnormality ki choti si goli mili hai. Kripya neeche di gayi image ko dekhe. Hinglish_Question: हाँ धन्यवाद!मेरे मुंह के आस-पास, आँखों के ऊपर और नाक के ऊपरी हिस्से में लालिमा है। ये इलाके बहुत सूखे और फ्लेकी हैं। मैं अपने चेहरे के इन इलाकों को धोने या पोंछने की कोशिश करता हूँ लेकिन जैसे ही फ्लेक्स हटते हैं, वो वापस आ जाती है। मेरी त्वचा बहुत संवेदनशील है। कभी-कभी लालिमा कुछ दिनों या सप्ताहों के लिए चली जाती है, लेकिन फिर वापस आती है। क्या मैं किसी एलर्जी के प्रति संवेदनशील हूँ या गलत स्किन केयर उत्पादों का इस्तेमाल कर रहा हूँ, इसका कुछ अनुमान नहीं है। The image for that is attached below .

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe 2011 mein ek pacemaker lagwaya tha, agle din se meri left arm suj gayi. Ab mere left side, face, arm mein lymph hai, jahan pacemaker lagaya tha. Pacemaker ab toh nahi hai, lekin is lymph fluid ki wajah se mere internal ear mein fluid hai, mujhe chakkar aate hain, agar main apna sir ghumaun toh mujhe chakkar aate hain, kai baar jab main chal rahi hoon toh mujhe lagta hai ki main behosh ho jaungi aur meri taangein kamzor ho jaati hain. Kripya dekhein affected area ki image doctor jo hai, neeche. Aur jab main apne chair par baith jaati hoon toh mujhe aisa lagta hai ki blood meri body se, sar se pair tak bahar ja raha hai. Chip.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of lymphedema, dizziness, weakness, and foot swelling after pacemaker removal in 2011? The image here shows a medical condition related to knee_swelling. There is swelling in the knee.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, meri right eye (lower lid) mein around seven months pehle ek stye ho gaya tha. Stye ko chhutane mein lagbhag six months lage, lekin abhi tak puri tarah se nahi gaya hai, abhi bhi hai. Main ne warm compresses use kiye par mujhe laga ki ye bahut lamba process hai. Ab mujhe apni left eye (upper lid) mein ek aur stye ho gaya hai. Wo ganth suj gayi hai aur ek gol ball bana hai.Please doctor, dekhiye ankhein niche di gai hai, mujhe phir se warm compresses try kiya hai aur lag raha hai ki ye usse bhi bura ho raha hai. Ab main ne namak aur garam pani se soak karne ka bhi try kiya hai. Main ne doctors ke paas bhi ja kar blood tests etc. karvaye hain, aur sab clear aya hai. Bas mujhe isse chhutkara pane ke liye kya karne ki salah chahiye. Main apni aankhon ki lashes daily wash kar raha hoon.

multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of the persistent and itchy rash on the inner thighs, vagina, and anus? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe Hawaii se vapas aate hi mere muh ke andar, mere muh ke aas paas, dant ke paas, sab jagah sujan aayi, phir mere gale me dard hone laga aur ab meri masudo aur hont theek ho gaye hain lekin meri tonsils bahut zyada sujan ho gayi hai. Hinglish_Question: Mai 25 saal ki ek mahila hu. Mera sharir bahut patla hai aur mujhe lag raha hai ki mai vartaman mein kam vajan wali hu. Maine haal hi mein kai baar apne doctor ke paas jaake shikayatein ki hai jaise ki gaantho ki sujan, doctor please look at the image of patient kuch pareshani mere gale me hai below  wajan ghatne aur pasina aana. Hinglish_Question: Meri wife diabetic hai, usko ashma bhi hai. Knee replacement se pehle usko leg mein wound ulcer hua tha aur surgery hone se pehle kuch mahine theek hone mein lage. Hinglish_Question:
Hi! I have extremely dry skin where my two butt cheeks meet, like in the crack of my butt. It itches terribly, and often leaves a burn of flakey dry skin in my underwear. The image for that is attached below. I know that I have psoriasis on my scalp. I was just wondering if it can affect my butt cheeks and also my genital area. I ve had vaginal itch since I was young.Yeast infection medicines dont work, rarely will an anti-itch cream work. It was localized on one side of my vagina for 10 years and had since spread to both sides. My family doctor just says to use anti-itch, but I think there s a bigger issue or a better answer. Hinglish_Question:
मेरी टांग पर अगस्त में एक चट्टान लग गई थी। इसके बाद उसके चारों ओर छाला उत्पन्न हो गया । मुझे लगा कि यह बादाम एलर्जी है या फिर मूंगफली एलर्जी है, इसलिए मैंने मूंगफली और बादाम खाना बंद कर दिया। मैंने बेनाड्रिल इस्तेमाल की, जिससे खुजली बढ़ गई। फिर मैंने निओस्पोरिन आजमाया, जो छाला कम नहीं हुआ, बल्कि यह और लाल और बड़ा हो गया।
कृपया डॉक्टर, नीचे देखें वर्तमान स्थिति को। फिर मैंने खीरे के साथ एलो हाइड्रेटिंग लोशन का उपयोग किया, जिससे छाला छोटा हुआ, लेकिन यह अभी भी बना हुआ है। मुझे निकल, डी 3, गेटोरेड और कोक कोला उत्पादों और लौरी सीज़न के कुछ मसालों के प्रति एलर्जी है। मैं किसी भी प्रकार के बीयर को बर्दाश्त नहीं कर सकता। मैं धूम्रपान नहीं करता। मैं कुछ लेबल पढ़ रहा हूँ, किसी भी टी ट्री तेल के साथ खुजलाहट होती है, चाहे वह टांग पर हो या सिर पर। इसलिए यह 9 महीने हो गये हैं, अब तक टांग पर बनी निशानी अभी भी मौजूद है, जो भूरे बॉच लग रही है और लाल तड़ादान है, अगर मैं इसे बहुत खुजलाऊं तो खून बहता है, मुझे लगता है कि नया त्वचा इसके विरुद्ध लड़ रही है। आप क्या सोचते हैं मुझे क्या करना चाहिए?

Mere chest pe ek group aur bumps hai jo pass hai lekin unme kisi circle jaisi shape nahi hai. Mere legs par ankle se lekar thigh tak jaane wale ek red rash hai jo bumpy ya raised nahi hai. Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, mujhe apne ilaake mein ek rheumatologist se milne ke liye ek saal se zyada intezaar kar raha hai. Main 39 saal ka hoon, aur saal aur aadhe pehle mere jeevan ka sabse fit samay tha, jahan meri 10% body fat thi, main 4 se 5 din dil mein jaane wali workout karta tha. Mere paas meri khud ki company hai aur main har roz computer par kaam karta hoon, aur mere shauk mein computer ke saath jugaad karna, bandook banane aur hathon se kai cheezein karna shaamil hai jo fine motor skills ki zaroorat rakhti hai. Woh taqat abhi mujhe nahi rahi hai, lagbhag mere anguthe aur ungliyon ke beech ki hissiyat chali gayi hai. Meri dono anguthe joint ke bade ho gaye hain, aur saare knuckles laal aur garam ho jaate hain, kuch bhi le loon usse koi farq nahi padta hai (haan, maine abhi tak koi rheumatoid dawa nahi li hai). Main bilkul depress aur frustrated ho raha hoon, aur bas apne lakshanon ko halka karne aur normal jeevan mein lautne mein kuch madad chaahta hoon. Kabhi kabhi mere ghutne aur kohni mein taklif hoti hai, aur mere paon ki ungliyan bhi mere haathon jaise suj jaati hain. Main aksar sukhie aankhein bhi mehsoos karta hoon. Agar kabhi mauka mila toh kripya suggest karein ki main apne jagah ke rheumatologist ko kya batayein. Mere paas ek GP hai jo koshish kar rahi hai meri madad karne ki par woh specialist ke liye upchar ki salaah dene se mana kar deti hai. Koi bhi salaah bahut swagat hogi kyun ki ek saal aur aadhe mein sab kuch kaise badal gaya hai, iski mujhe koi samajh nahi aa rahi. Maine bahut saari over-the-counter dawaiyaan li hain par kuch asar nahi kar rahi. Bas mujhe kuch aisa chahiye jo sujan dur kar sake aur main phir se normal ho sakoon.

Hinglish_Question: 5 din pehle main bas North California mein weekend ke baad Esalen se aaya tha. Wahan sulfur hot springs the. Mujhe halka bukhar hua aur right side ke gaal ke niche aur right side of thyroid me sujjan aur gudgudahat mehsoos hui. Mujhe 10+ saal se right side of thyroid me benin cyst hai. 4 din pehle symptoms intensify huye with less to no fever. Mere PA ne blood test kiya. Thyroid levels perfect aaye. Test mai kuch slight elevation dikhayi gayi in something that meant my body was fighting something. Usi raat maine small dose of non-thc cdb oil liya (jo normally main nahi leta. Please dekhiye doctor the affected area ki image below. Maine bas usko treat karne ki koshish karne ke liye liya tha) toh mujhe extreme vertigo hui! 3 din pehle ek alag Dr. ne determine kiya ki ye meri atlas aur inner ear ke saath nahi hai jis se vertigo hui hai. Usne craniosacral kiya aur thoda relief mila. Maine pura din bed par bitaya. 2 din pehle bhi bedridden thi with the same symptoms. Maine acupuncture aur Chinese herbs liya jisse vertigo thik hui. Woh din main mostly bedridden thi. Bukhar aur sujjan jari rahi. Kal bukhar aur sujjan kam hui aur vertigo almost nahi thi. Aaj bukhar aur sujjan kam hui par shaky feeling hai aur vertigo nahi hai. Flu ya cold ke koi bhi symptoms nahi hai. Aapko kya lagta hai ho raha hai. Kya mujhe parasite hai. Kya vertigo cdb oil ke wajah se hui hai. Kya mujhe hot springs se ear infection hai. Dhanyavaad!
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the patient's fever, swollen lymph nodes, tender neck, vertigo, and shaky symptoms due to a parasite or ear infection causd by hot springs or CBD oil? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling.  The portion below the ear is swollen.

Hinglish_Question:
English: A egg sized lump has suddenly appeared on the left side of my seven year old sons neck. It s firm to the touch, but he gets no pain from it. I ve googled up on it with plans to get him into the doctors on Monday since he feels no discomfort however most of the advise points to cancer causing me to get even more worried. I was just after some advise about wether this is most likely swollen glands or if it could be something more sinister.Please doctor see the current condition below . It s situated in the middle of his neck but leaning more towards his ear rather then his collarbone. It appeared within the space of a hour I would guess and it s not painful or tender, there s no rash or red skin around it. It s just a hard lump that I can get my fingers round. He was I ll five days in the last two weeks could this be a lasting effect of his illness... Any advise would be appreciated thank you...

 Mere saat saal ke bete ke gardan ke left side mein achanak ek ande ke aakar ka gaanth ho gaya hai. Jo sparsh mein sakht hai, lekin use koi dard nahi hota. Maine iske baare mein googled up kiya hai aur Monday ko use doctor ke paas le jane ka plan banaya hai kyun ki use koi taklif nahi ho rahi hai, lekin adhikansh salaah cancer ke liye ishara karti hai, jiske karan mujhe aur bhi chinta ho rahi hai. Main sirf itna jaanna chahta hoon ki kya ye najdiki gaandho ka sujan hai ya kya ye kuch aur ghatak ho sakta hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Ye uski gardan ka madhya bhag mein sthit hai, lekin uski collarbone ke bajaye uske kaan ki taraf jhuka hua hai. Isey ek ghante ke andar dikhai diya hoga aur ye dard ya jyada komal nahi hai, iske aas paas koi khujli ya lal twacha nahi hai. Ye bas ek sakht gaanth hai jise mere ungliyan se ghumakar pakad sakti hoon. Usne pichle do hafte mein paanch din bimar raha tha, kya ye uski bimari ka sthayi prabhav ho sakta hai... Koi salaah ki prateeksha rahegi dhanyavaad...
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the suddenly appearing, firm, painless, egg-sized lump on a 7-year-old's neck a result of recent illness? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. There is round shaped swelling in the neck below the lower jaws.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe teen open heart surgeries ho chuki hain, pehli surgery aortic valve replacement ki thi congenital heart defects ke karan aur 1990 se mai coumadin le rahi hoon. Aur mere kidneys me cyst bhi hai aur aajkal se mere left side aur pith dard kar rahe hain, kya ye sujan ka karan mere kidneys hain, doctor ne CHF ko tohruled out kiya hai jise mujhe bhi hai, par meri side/backpain ke liye kuch examine nahi kiya gaya hai. Hinglish_Question: Mujhe bataya gaya hai mujhe kisi cheez se allergy hai, lekin kisi ko nahi pata ki kis cheez se... Lekin abhi main apne couch par leta to sone ke liye aur mujhe aisa lag raha tha ki kuch mujhe kaat raha hai, isliye main bathroom mein jaake kapde badalne gaya aur mere chehre, haath, bazu, pair aur pet par phir se hives shuru ho gayi hai... Mujhe pata hai ki mujhe billi, ghode, ped, ghas aur antibiotics se allergy hai, lekin inme se mujhe sirf apni billi se contact ho raha hai, mujhe lagta hai ki shayad kuch aur hai, kya main sahi hoon. Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor, mein 51 saal ka hoon aur nondiabetic hoon. Lagta hai ki pichle do hafto se main balanitis se suffer kar raha hoon. Pehle mujhe ringworm ka problem thi, lekin Clotrimazole ointment aur oral tablet Terbinafine ke medication ke baad woh treat ho gaya. Kuch mahine us problem ke baad, maine do hafte pehle notice kiya ki mere glans aur foreskin ke ring par laal chakkar aaye hain aur jalan ho rahi hai. Kripya dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Maine internet par check kiya aur Clotrimazole ointment, FourDerm aur Terbicip ka istemaal kiya. Ye shama ho gaya, lekin har baar nahaane ke baad, ye phir se ho gaya. Mein apne private parts ke aas-pass saaf-suthra rakhta hoon aur usse namak wale garam paani se bhi dhota hoon. Lekin iska ilaaj nahi hua, bas control mein rehta hai. Do din pehle, maine ek dermatologist se consult kiya, aur unhone sabko band karne aur instead mein DK Gel lagane aur AF 150 orally le lene ko suggest kiya, ek tablet raat ko dinner ke baad, har teen din mein ek baar. Ye aur jyada lal aur foreskin ko poori tarah se laalima aur sujan se cover kar diya hai. Maine dermatologist se check kiya, lekin unhone kaha ki ye steroid FourDerm ointment ke istemaal se hai, aur ye 7 se 8 din mein thik ho jayega. Ye jal raha hai aur bahut hi sensitive hai, kapde se touch hone par bhi. Mein apni penis ki tasveer bhi attach kar raha hoon. Kripya madad karen.
multimodal_Question_summ: Patient, a 51-year-old male, has a red rash on the glans and foreskin of his penis, with burning sensation and swelling, worsened by use of FourDerm ointment. The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Hi, Hamare kashtkar Canadian winters mein, mere pichwade par kuch samasya ho gayi hai, jyadatar, kuch pait ke hisse aur kuch jaanghon par. Ye chote chote funsi jaise daane hai jin par ek chota sa chhala hota hai. Ye khujli kar sakte hai, khaaskar din bhar woolen sweater pehne ke baad. Koi salaah kya hai iske liye, ye kya ho sakta hai. Hinglish_Question: Mere pass ek rashes hai, ek dermatologist ne ise possible lyme disease diagnose kiya hai. Mere repeated ebv tests mein bhi bahut high titers hai pichle saal se. Yeh current bullseye rash skin ke niche ek bada raised area ke saath aur bade hota ja raha hai. Mere past two weeks se antibiotics par chal raha hai aur mujhe chronic lyme, chronic ebv ka possibility hai kyun ki mujhe pichle kuch saalo se severe fatigue aur bahut saare dusre symptoms hai.Mere immediate concern hai bulleye rash aur us lump ke size ke increase ki wajah se. Kya munkin hai ki tick abhi bhi mere skin ke neeche hai. I have attached the image for that below.

Hinglish_Question: Mere inner thighs par bahut saare rashes hain aur jab bhi main unhe scratch karta hoon toh chote-chote bumps hote hain jo khushk twacha ke saath utar jaate hain. Ye twacha ke upper layer par bahut chote-se dots hote hain jo inner thighs ke taraf hai. Mujhe khujli bhi hoti hai aur kabhi-kabhi khujli bahut jyada hoti hai. Jab main khujata hoon toh bahut saari khushk twacha hata deti hai, jiski wajah se twacha safed aur khushki se dikhti hai. Main sawali twacha wala hoon aur main clearly dekh sakta hoon ki meri scrotum aur inner thighs ke side ke bhaag ki wajah excessive scratching ki wajah se kaale ho gaye hain. Main bahut pareshan hoon kyunki ye samasya kai mahino se chal rahi hai. Kripya salah de, main aur jankari bhi de sakta hoon. Dhanyawad. नीचे तस्वीर उपलब्ध है।

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe bahut sari baar baar aane wali khujliyan hai aur mujhe ye pata karna hai ki inka karan kya hai. Mene normal khujli wali creams, steroid wali khujli wali creams, sensitive skin ke liye products aur eczema friendly products try kiye hain, lekin koi bhi kaam nahi karta hai. Asal mein, in products ko use karne ke baad meri skin inka reaction dene lagi hai. Ab mein make up nahi kar sakti ya chehre par pani ke alawa kuch bhi nahi laga sakti, moisturizer bhi jalan karti hai. Piichli baar jab mein make up kiya tha, mere chehre ko dhoop lag gayi thi aur mere kaan ke kamblon mein sujan aa gayi thi. Ye khujliyan thodi alag dikh rahi hai jahan bhi mere sharir par hoti hai. Meri taange, pair, kohni, andar ke bazu, haath, chehra khaas kar lips sab par asar hota hai. Kya koi meri madad kar sakta hai? Mujhe bas isse chahiye ki ye chala jaye. Kuch samay baad maine dekha ki mere kaan ke piche ki skin itchy hai aur wahi red rash hai. Hinglish_Question: Mere teen saal ke bacche ke paon ke anguthe par blister type ke spots hai aur uske paon ke niche ki skin par red spots hai. Uske alava koi aur symptom nahi hai siwaye iske ki uska pediatrician use do hafte pehle dekha tha aur usne kaha tha ki uske peechwade par yeast rash hai. Uske paon par tab kuch nahi tha. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Meri do saal ke bacche ke pairon par kuch chote chote bump hai jo last couple of days se hai. Usko bhi uske peechwade par rash ho raha hai, jo pehle mere teen saal ke bachche ko diagnosed nahi tha. Rash paon par kya ho sakta hai aur kya yeh unke peechwade par rash se connected hai. Dhanyavad.

Ye pehle bahut choti aur faint thi, lekin pichle hafte mein bahut badh gayi hai aur lag rahi hai jaise kala aankh hai, kya is baat ko chinta karne ki jarurat hai? Hinglish_Question: Mera beta 13 saal ka hai aur pichle 2 ya 3 saalon se lagatar wahi bimari ho rahi hai....sore throat and tonsils, achy legs, low grade fever aur hamesha vomiting up mucus karta hai. Ye har couple of months me hota hai aur wo often sore throat ki shikayat karta hai aur uske tonsils seem to be quite swollen. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Hinglish_Question: Mujhe apne chhati par ek ajeeb sa burn jaisa daag mila hai aur ek exact same pot par mere piche bhi ek aaya hai, jaise ki wah seedhe saath mein gaya ho. Uske upar mere ghutne ke upar aur mere reedh ki pichli taraf bhi waise hi aaya hai, jaise ki wah seedhe saath mein gaya ho. Ye rig worm nahi hai, isse touch karne par burn hoti hai. Thodi khujli hoti hai. Ye rough hai aur ekdum perfect circle hai, pink color ka aur flat hai, na ki raised ya swollen. Uske aas paas ka area sujan nahi hai. Ye bahut ajeeb hai aur mujhe sickle cell anemia hai, mein caucasian hoon, average pH 4 hai aur hemoglobin count 8 hai. Mere sharir mein kya ho sakta hai aur ye kaise ho sakta hai. Hinglish_Question: Mere 5 saal ke bacche ko subah se low fever tha aur sham ko high ho gaya. Maine use baby tylenol diya aur uska fever 99 tak gir gaya. Hinglish_Question: Mujhe September mein biopsy hui thi, results kehte hai ki mujhe lycomucositis hai. Mujhe bataya gaya hai ki iska koi ilaj nahi hai, sirf symptoms ka treatment hota hai. Meri jaw upper aur lower frequently throbs karti hai. Red gums hai aur mujhe lagta hai ki mere gums aur mouth ke roof par bumps hai. Kripya dekhein affected area ki image neeche di hai. Mujhe pata nahi hai ki koi drainage ho raha hai ya nahi, Dentist kehte hai ki ye hormonal hai, unko sirf women ke baare mein pata hai jo ise face kar chuke hai. Meri neck ke lymph nodes kabhi kabhi toush feel karte hai aur kabhi chills bhi aate hai.
